Question #1 (ID: 416203)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}[/math] এবং [math]y=x+6[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{10}{7}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{110}{17}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{125}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{130}{11}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল= সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রফল - প্যারাবোলা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রফল-
[Image]
[math]\Rightarrow\int_{-2}^{3}(x+6) d x-\int_{-2}^{3} x^{2} d x=\frac{125}{6}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #2 (ID: 416204)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \tan x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln (\cos x)+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln (\sec x)+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\operatorname{cosec} x)+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln (\sin x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \tan x d x=\int \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} d x[z=\cos x][/math]
 [math]\mathrm{dz}=-\sin x d x]=\int \frac{-\mathrm{d} z}{\mathrm{z}}=-\operatorname{ln} \mathrm{z}+\mathrm{c}=\operatorname{ln} \sec x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #3 (ID: 416205)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{e}^{e^{2}} \frac{d x}{x(\ln x)^{3}=?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{\mathrm{e}}^{\mathrm{e}^{2}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}(\ln x)^{3}} \text { Let, } \operatorname{ln} x=z[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{dz} ; \int_{1}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}^{3}}=\left[-\frac{1}{2 \mathrm{z}^{2}}\right]_{1}^{2}=\frac{3}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #4 (ID: 416206)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{1-\cos 2 x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{2} \cos x+c[/math]
B. [math]-2 \cos x+c[/math]
C. [math]2 \cos x+c[/math]
D. [math]-\sqrt{2} \cos x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{1-\cos 2 x} d x=\int \sqrt{2} \sin x d x=-\sqrt{2} \cos x+c[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #5 (ID: 416207)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int\left(\sec ^{2} \theta-\tan ^{2} \theta\right) d \theta=\text {কত ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\theta+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan \theta-2 \operatorname{logsec} \theta+c[/math]
C. [math]\theta[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \theta+\cos \theta+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int\left(\sec ^{2} \theta-\tan ^{2} \theta\right) d \theta=\int 1 d \theta=\theta+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #6 (ID: 416208)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\left(\cos x-x \sin x+3 x^{2}\right)}{x \cos x+x^{3}} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sin x+x \cos x}{x \sin x+3 x}+c[/math]
B. [math]\log \left(x^{3}+x \cos x\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\log \left(\frac{\sin x+x \cos x}{x^{2}+x \sin x}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\log \left(\frac{\sin x+x \cos x}{x^{2}+x \sin x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x \cos x+x^{3}[/math]
 [math]=t\left(\cos x-x \sin x+3 x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=d t[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{\cos x-x \sin x+3 x^{2}}{x \cos x+x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{d t}{t}[/math]
 [math]=\ln (t)+c[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(x^{3}+x \cos x\right)[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #7 (ID: 416197)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = 3x[/math] সরলরেখা, x অক্ষ এবং [math]x = 2[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]5[/math]
গ. [math]7[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\Delta=\frac{1}{2} \times 2 \times 6=6[/math]
[Image]


Explanation:

Question #8 (ID: 416198)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{1+e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln e^{x}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]-\ln \left(1+\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1}{1+e^{x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{e^{-x}}{e^{-x}+1} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{-d z}{z}[/math]
 [math]=-\ln z=\left(e^{-x}+1\right)+c[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } e^{-x}+1[/math]
 [math]=z-e^{-x} d x[/math]
 [math]=d z \quad[/math]
 [math]\text { Or, } e^{-x} d x=d z[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #9 (ID: 416199)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math] মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-\left(1-2 x+x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d(x-1)}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1}(1-1)-\sin ^{-1}(0-1)[/math]
 [math]=0+\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #10 (ID: 416200)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-অক্ষ এবং [math]y = sinx[/math] বক্ররেখার একটি চাপ দ্বারা গঠিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]A=\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin x d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[-\cos x]_{0}^{\pi}=-\cos (\pi)+\cos (0)=1+1=2[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #11 (ID: 416201)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: """Begum Rokeya University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যোগজীকরণ কর: [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{(1+\sin \theta)} \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{(1+\sin \theta)} d \theta=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{\sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}+\cos ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}+2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cdot \cos ^{} \frac{\theta}{2}} \mathrm{~d} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\left(\sin \frac{\theta}{2}+\cos \frac{\theta}{2}\right) d \theta[/math]
 [math]=2\left[-\cos \frac{\theta}{2}+\sin \frac{\theta}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #12 (ID: 416202)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]
E. [math]4[/math]
undefined. No Answer


Correct Answer: .No Answer

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)^{2}} ; 1+\ln x=z \Rightarrow \frac{1}{x} d x=d z[/math]
 [math](x=e ; z=2 ; x=1 ; t=1)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}^{2}}=\left(-\frac{1}{\mathrm{z}}\right)_{1}^{2}=-\frac{1}{2}+1=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #13 (ID: 416180)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin ^{-1} x d x[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
B. [math]x \sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+C[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \sin ^{-1} x d x=\sin ^{-1} x \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right) \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x \sin ^{-1} x-\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} x[/math]
 [math]d x=x \sin ^{-1} x+\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{d\left(1-x^{2}\right)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]x \sin ^{-1} x+\frac{1}{2} 2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
 [math]=x \sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #14 (ID: 416181)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{t}} \cos \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{t}} \mathrm{dt}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{-x}}{x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{\prime} \sin e^{t}+\cos e^{t}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+x}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{2 t} \operatorname{cose} e^{t} d t[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{t}[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{cose}^{t} e^{t} d t[/math]
 [math]=\int z \cos z d z[/math]
 [math]{\left[z=e^{t} \Rightarrow d z=e^{t} d t\right]}[/math]
 [math]=z \int \cos z d z-\int 1[/math]
 [math]\cdot \sin z d z[/math]
 [math]=z \sin z+\cos z+c[/math]
 [math]=e^{t} \sin e^{t}[/math]
 [math]+\cos e^{t}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #15 (ID: 416182)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{3} e^{x^{4}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{x^{3}}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{x^{4}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x^{3}}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{x^{5}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int x^{3} e^{x^{4}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \int e^{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 4 x^{3} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \int e^{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]d\left(x^{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} e^{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #16 (ID: 416183)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{a} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x(a-x)}}[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{\mathrm{a}^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2 a^{2}}[/math]
E. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{a} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x(a-x)}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{a} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{a x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{a}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d x}{\sqrt{\frac{a^{2}}{4}-\left(x^{2}-a x+\frac{a^{2}}{4}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{a} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{a}{2}\right)^{2}-\left(x-\frac{a}{2}\right)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1} \frac{x-\frac{a}{2}}{\frac{a}{2}}\right]_{0}^{a}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1}(1)[/math]
 [math]-\sin ^{-1}(-1)=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]-\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\pi \text {. }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #17 (ID: 416184)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2013-2014, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right) \int_{0}^{1} \frac{-2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)\left[2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #18 (ID: 416185)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+c^{-x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1} e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1} e^{x}[/math]
E. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}+1}=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math][[/math]
ধরি, [math]\left.z=e^{x}\right]=\tan ^{-1}(z)=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #19 (ID: 416186)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর [math]\int \frac{1}{\sqrt[3]{1-6 x}} d x \quad\left[=\int(1-6 x)^{-\frac{1}{3}} d x=\frac{(1-6 x)^{-\frac{1}{3}+1}}{\left(-\frac{1}{3}+1\right)(-6)}=\frac{(1-6 x)^{\frac{2}{3}}}{-4}\right][/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{2 / 3}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{3 / 2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{2 / 3}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{4}(6 x-1)^{2 / 3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]I=-\frac{(1-6 x)^{\frac{2}{3}}}{\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{6}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{\frac{2}{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #20 (ID: 416187)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]2 \pi[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{2 a} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 a x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{2a} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{a^{2}-\left(a^{2}-2 a x+x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{2a} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{a^{2}-(x-a)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1} \frac{x-a}{a}\right]_{0}^{2 a}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1}(1)[/math]
 [math]-\sin ^{-1}(-1)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]-\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #21 (ID: 416188)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \ln x d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln (x)-\frac{x^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
B. [math]x^{2} \ln (x)-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln (x)+\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int x \ln x d x=\ln x \int x d x-\int\left\{\frac{d}{d x} \ln x \int x d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\int \frac{x}{2} d x=\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #22 (ID: 416189)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{\cos x}{4-\sin x} d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln (2)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} \ln \left(\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4} \ln (3)[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left(\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
E. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { None }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{\cos x}{4-\sin x}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{4}^{3} \frac{d z}{z}=-[\ln z]_{4}^{3}=\ln \frac{4}{3}[/math]
ধরি, [math]4-\sin x=z \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos x d x=-d z \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos x d x=-d z[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]z=4 ;[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 হলে, [math]z=3 \text {. }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #23 (ID: 416190)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\infty} e^{-2 x} \cos 4 x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]e^{-2 x}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{10}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{20}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]I=\int e^{-2 x} \cos 4 x d x[/math]
 [math]=\cos 4 x \int e^{-2 x} d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{d}{d x}(\cos 4 x) \int e^{-2 x} d x\right] d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{e^{-2 x} \cos 4 x}{-2}-\int[/math]
 [math]\left[-4 \sin 4 x \times \frac{e^{-2 x}}{-2}\right][/math]
 [math]d x=-\frac{e^{-2 x} \cos 4 x}{2}-2 \int e^{-2 x} \sin 4 x d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{-e^{-2 x} \cos 4 x}{2}-2\left[\sin 4 x \int e-{ }^{2 x} d x-\int\left\{\frac{d}{d x}(\sin 4 x) \int e^{-2 x} d x\right\} d x\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}} \cos 4 \mathrm{x}}{2}-2[/math]
 [math]\sin 4 \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}}}{-\mathrm{z}}[/math]
 [math]+2 \int 4^{2} \cos 4 \mathrm{x} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}}}{-2} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=5 \mathrm{I}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}} \sin 4 \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}} \cos 4 \mathrm{x}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{I}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}} \sin 4 \mathrm{x}}{5}-\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}} \cos 4 \mathrm{x}}{10}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{\infty} \mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}} \cos ^{4 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}} \cos 4 \mathrm{x}}{5}-\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}} \cos 4 \mathrm{x}}{10}\right]_{0}^{\infty}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow0-0-0+\frac{1}{10}[/math]
 [math]\left[\therefore \mathrm{e}^{-2 \infty}=0\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{10}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #24 (ID: 416191)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1+\tan ^{2} x}{(1+\tan x)^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+\cot x}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1-\tan x}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+\cos x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-\cot x}+c[/math]
E. [math]-\frac{1}{1+\tan x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: E. [math]-\frac{1}{1+\tan x}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1+\tan ^{2} x}{(1+\tan x)^{2}} d x=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}}=-\frac{1}{z}+c=-\frac{1}{1+\tan x}+c[/math]
ধরি, [math]1+\tan x=z \quad \therefore \sec ^{2} x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1+\tan ^{2} x\right) d x=d z[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #25 (ID: 416192)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1 / a} \mathrm{~d}\left(\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{ax}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 4[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 3[/math]
D. [math]\pi / 6[/math]
E. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text{Hints: } \int \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\text { Solve: } \int_{0}^{1 / a} d\left(\tan ^{-1} a x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left[\tan ^{-1} a x\right]_{0}^{1 / 3}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} a \frac{1}{a}-\tan ^{-1} a \cdot 0[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} 1-\tan ^{-1} 0=\frac{\pi}{4}-0=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:
1 কে x এর সাপেক্ষে যোগজ করলে মান আসে x অর্থাৎ [math]∫ dx = x[/math]
 তেমনি 1 কে [math]\tan ^{-1} a x[/math]
 এর সাপেক্ষে যোগজ করলে মান আসবে [math]\tan ^{-1} a x[/math]
 অর্থাৎ [math]\int \mathrm{d}\left(\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{ax}\right)=\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{ax}[/math]

Question #26 (ID: 416193)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x y=p^{2}, y=0, x=1[/math] এবং [math]x=2[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{p}^{2} \ln 2[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{p}^{2} \ln \frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln \frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\ln 3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\Delta=\int_{1}^{2} \frac{p^{2}}{x} d x=p^{2} \ln 2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #27 (ID: 416194)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left(\frac{1}{x+2}-\frac{1}{(x+2)^{2}}\right) d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x}[/math]
B. [math](x+2) e^{x}[/math]
C. [math](x+2)^{2} e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]e^{x} /(x+2)^{2}[/math]
E. [math]e^{x} /(x+2)[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]e^{x} /(x+2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Hints: } \int\left\{e^{x} f(x)+e^{x} f^{\prime}(x)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
Solve: এখান [math]\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{x+2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(x+2)^{-1}[/math]
 [math]=-1(x+2)^{-2}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{(x+2)^{2}}[/math]
অর্থাৎ [math]f(x)=\frac{1}{x+2} \text { and } \frac{d}{d x} f(x)[/math]
 [math]=f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{(x+2)^{2}}[/math]
তাহলে [math]\int\left\{e^{x} f(x)+e^{x} f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} \frac{1}{x+2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x}}{x+2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #28 (ID: 416195)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} x^{2} e^{x^{3}} d x[/math] এর সঠিক মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{8}-e[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(e^{8}-e\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(e^{8}-e\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(e^{8}+e\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} x^{2} e^{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]d x ; z=x^{3} ;[/math]
 [math]d z=3 x^{2} d x ; x^{2} d x=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]d z=\int_{1}^{8} \frac{1}{3} d z e^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}\left[e^{2}\right]^8[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}\left(e^{8}-e\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #29 (ID: 416196)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{4} \frac{\ln x}{\sqrt{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]4 \ln 2-8[/math]
B. [math]4 \ln 2+8[/math]
C. [math]8 \ln 2-4[/math]
D. [math]8 \ln 2+4[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\ln x}{\sqrt{x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \cdot 2 \sqrt{x}-\int \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{x} d x[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{x} \ln x-4 \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{4} \frac{\ln x}{\sqrt{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=[2 \sqrt{\mathrm{x}} \ln \mathrm{x}-4[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}]^{4}=8[/math]
 [math]\ln 2-4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #30 (ID: 416166)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = x[/math] সরলরেখা, [math]X[/math] অক্ষ এবং [math]x = 4[/math] কোনটি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\therefore \int_{0}^{4} y d x[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{4} y d x=\frac{1}{2}\left(x^{2}\right)_{0}^{4}=\frac{4^{2}}{2}=8[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:

Question #31 (ID: 416167)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(\tan ^{2} x+\tan ^{4} x\right) d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]-3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\tan ^{2} x+\tan ^{4} x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=3 \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \tan ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\left(1+\tan ^{2} x\right) d x=3 \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{2} x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \tan ^{2}[/math]
 [math]x d(\tan x)=3[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{\tan ^{3} x}{3}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{3} \frac{\pi}{4}-\tan ^{3}[/math]
 [math]0=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #32 (ID: 416168)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards: Sylhet Board, Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board, Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1 / 2} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1} x\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{2}-\sin ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Explanation:

খ. [math]0[/math]

ঘ. [math]a^{n}[/math]

Question #35 (ID: 416171)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}(x+1) d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x e^{x}+C[/math]
খ. [math]e^{x}+c[/math]
গ. [math]x^{2} e^{x}+C[/math]
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x}(x+1) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int x e^{x} d x+\int e^{x} d^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x e^{x} \frac{d x}{d x} \int e^{x} d x+\int e^{x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x e^{x}-\int 1[/math]
 [math]\cdot e^{x} d x+\int e^{x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x e^{x}-\int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]d x+\int e^{x} d x+C[/math]
 [math]=x e^{x}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #36 (ID: 416172)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=x[/math] পরাবৃত্ত এবং [math]y = x[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল -

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]1[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]=\frac{1}{6}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}x^{2}=x \Rightarrow x^{2}-x=0 \\\Rightarrow x=0, x=1\end{array}[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল, [math]A=\int_{0}^{1}\left(y_{1}-y_{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1}(\sqrt{x}-x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x^{\frac{3}{2}}}{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}=[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3} .1-\frac{1}{2}, 1=\frac{4-3}{6}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]
 বর্গএকক।Shortcut: ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{8 \mathrm{a}^{2}}{3 \mathrm{~m}^{3}}=[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8 \times\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)^{2}}{3 \times 1^{3}}=\frac{8 \times 1}{3 \times 1 \times 4 \times 4}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #38 (ID: 416174)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan x}{\sqrt{2} \cot x} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\cot x-x)+C[/math]
B. [math](\tan x-x)+C[/math]
C. [math](\tan x+x)+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\tan x-x)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{\tan x}{\sqrt{2} \cot x} d x=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \int \tan ^{2} x d x \\=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \int\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right) d x=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\tan x-x)+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #39 (ID: 416175)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{4 x d x}{\left(2 x^{2}+3\right) \log \left(2 x^{2}+3\right)}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\left(2 x^{2}+3\right) e^{2 x^{2}+3}+k[/math]
B. [math]\log \left\{\log \left(2 x^{2}+3\right)\right\}+k[/math]
C. [math]2 \log \left\{\log \left(2 x^{2}+3\right)\right\}+k[/math]
D. [math]\log \left(2 x^{2}+3\right) \log (4 x)+k[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{4 x d x}{\left(2 x^{2}+3\right) \log \left(2 x^{2}+3\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{1}{\log \left(2 x^{2}+3\right)} \cdot[/math]
 [math]d\left\{\log \left(2 x^{2}+3\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\log \left\{\log \left(2 x^{2}+3\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]+k[/math]


Explanation:

Question #40 (ID: 416176)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{2}[/math] [math]\left[1+\ln \left(x^{3}+1\right)\right][/math] [math]d x= ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\left(x^{3}+1\right) \ln \left(x^{3}+1\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(x^{3}+1\right) \ln \left(x^{3}+1\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x^{3}+1}{\ln \left(x^{3}+1\right)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3\left(x^{3}+1\right)}{\ln \left(x^{3}+1\right)}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { Hints: } \int(y+z) k d x[/math]
 [math]=\int y k d x+\int z k d x[/math]
 [math]\text { Solve: } \int x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[1+\ln \left(x^{3}+1\right)\right][/math]
 [math]d x=\int x^{2} d x+\int x^{2} \ln \left(x^{3}+1\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{3}}{3}+\frac{1}{3} \int \ln z d z\left[x^{3}+1=z \Rightarrow 3 x^{2} d x=d z\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{3}}{3}+\frac{1}{3}(z \ln z-z)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3} x^{3}+\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\left(x^{3}+1\right) \ln \left|x^{3}+1\right|-\left(x^{3}+1\right)\right.[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}\left(x^{3}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]\ln \left(x^{3}+1\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #41 (ID: 416177)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \tan e^{x} \operatorname{sece}^{x} \cdot e^{x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}[/math]
B. [math]e^{\sin x}[/math]
C. [math]\operatorname{sece}^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\sin (\ln x)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \tan e^{x} \operatorname{sece}^{x} \cdot e^{x} d x=\int \operatorname{sece}^{x} \operatorname{tane}^{x} \cdot e^{x} d x \\=\int \operatorname{sece}^{x} \operatorname{tane}^{x} \cdot d\left(e^{x}\right)=\operatorname{sece}^{x}+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #42 (ID: 416178)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\cot x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\tan x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\cos x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} x}=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} x d x=\frac{1}{2} \tan x+C[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #43 (ID: 416179)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{9-16 x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{3 x}{4}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{3}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sin ^{-1} x+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sin ^{-1} \frac{3 x}{4}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{9-16 x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{4} \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{3}{4}\right)^{2}-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}=\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 \mathrm{x}}{3}+\mathrm{C}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #44 (ID: 416132)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Find the area of the region enclosed between the curves } y=x^{2} \text { and } y=x+6 \text {. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{157}{6}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{125}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{95}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\int_{-2}^{3}\left(x+6-x^{2}\right) d x=\frac{125}{6}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #45 (ID: 416133)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2} \text { a } 4 x[/math] এবং [math]x=1[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{6}{5}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\Delta=2 \int_{0}^{1} y d x[/math]
 [math]=2 \int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{4 x} d x=4[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{2}{3}\left[x \frac{3}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8}{3}[/math]
 [math]\times(1-0)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8}{3}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #46 (ID: 416134)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{1+x^{2}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{1+x^{2}} d x=\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{3}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #47 (ID: 416135)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{e^{2 x}+1}=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}+1}\\\left[\right. \text{ let, } z=e^{x} \Rightarrow d z=e^{x} d x \mid\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1} z+c=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #48 (ID: 416136)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 / \pi[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi^{2} / 2[/math]
D. [math]1 / \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)]^ b_{0}=\pi / 2\right.[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #49 (ID: 416137)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{3} e^{x^{4}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{x^{4}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x^{3}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{x^{5}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int x^{3} \cdot e^{x^{4}} d x=\frac{1}{4} \int 4 x^{3} \cdot e^{x^{4}} d x+c=\frac{1}{4} e^{x^{4}}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #50 (ID: 416138)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] নিচের কোন মানটিকে নির্দেশ করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{192}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi^{3}}{192}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{192}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{1+x^{2}} d x=\left[\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)^{3}}{3}-\frac{0}{3}=\frac{\pi^{3}}{192}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #51 (ID: 416139)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan e-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1} e+\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{x}}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}} d x=\left[\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)\right]_{0}^{1}=\tan ^{-1} e-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #52 (ID: 416140)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln 2} \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{e^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\ln 2[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln (2)} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{x}}{1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\ln \left|1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right|\right]_{0}^{\ln (2)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\ln \left[1+e^{\ln 2}\right]-[/math]
 [math]\ln \left[1+e^{0}\right][/math]
 [math]=\ln (1+2)-\ln (1+1)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #53 (ID: 416141)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x) = ln x3[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]f" (3)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 / 3[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]-3[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln \left(x^{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3 \ln (x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{3}{x} ; \quad[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-3}{x^{2}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime \prime}(3)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-3}{3^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #54 (ID: 416142)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কত হলে- [math]\int x^{2} \cos x d x=f(x)-\int 2 x \sin x d x[/math] সূত্রটি মেনে চলে?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin x+2 x \cos x[/math]
B. [math]x^{2} \sin x[/math]
C. [math]2 x \cos x-x^{2} \sin x[/math]
D. [math]4 \cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{2} \cos x d x=x^{2} \int \cos x d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}\right) \int \cos x d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x^{2} \sin x-\int 2 x \sin x d x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #55 (ID: 416143)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{4} f(x) d x=6[/math] হলে, [math]\int_{1}^{4} f(5-x) d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]6[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]-6[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { Given, } \int_{1}^{4} f(x) d x=6 ;[/math]
 [math]\int_{1}^{4} f(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{1}^{4} f(4+1-x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{1}^{4} f(5-x) d x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{4} f(5-x) d x=6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #56 (ID: 416144)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \frac{d x}{\sqrt{16-x^{2}}}[/math] এর যোজিত ফল—

Options:
A. [math]\left(16 x^{2}-1\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{16-x^{2}}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{16-x^{2}}}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-x}{\sqrt{16-x^{2}}}+C[/math]
E. No Answer


Correct Answer: E.No Answer

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{16-x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{-2} \int \frac{(-2 x)}{\sqrt{4^{2}-x^{2}}} d x=-\frac{1}{2} \times 2 \sqrt{16-x^{2}}+c=-\sqrt{16-x^{2}}+c[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #57 (ID: 416145)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1}{1+\sin x} \mathrm{dx}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{2}-2[/math]
B. [math]2-\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]1-\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]1+\sqrt{2}[/math]
E. [math]\sqrt{2}-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1}{1+\sin x}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\frac{1-\sin x}{1-\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\frac{1-\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} x}-\frac{\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\sec ^{2} x-\sec x \tan x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=[\tan x-\sec x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=1-\sqrt{2}-0+1[/math]
 [math]=2-\sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #58 (ID: 416146)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{-x^{3}} x^{2} d x[/math] - এর সমাকলন কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 / 3 e^{-x^{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3} e^{-x^{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]-1 / 3 e^{+x^{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1 / 3 e^{-x^{2}}[/math]
ঙ. [math]1 / 3 \mathrm{e}^{+\mathrm{x}^{4}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{-x^{3}} \cdot x^{2} d x[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, }-x^{3}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3 x^{2} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{d z}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 আমরা জানি, [math]=\frac{1}{3} \int e^{z} d z[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{3} e^{z}+c[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{3} e^{-x^{3}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #59 (ID: 416147)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
B. [math]2(e+1)[/math]
C. [math]2(1-\mathrm{e})[/math]
D. [math]2 \mathrm{e}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{2}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x ; \text { Let, } \sqrt{x}=z \Rightarrow \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x=d z \Rightarrow \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x}}=2 d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 আমরা পাই, [math]2 \int_{0}^{1} e^{z} \cdot d z=2\left[e^{z}\right]_{0}^{1}=2(e-1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #60 (ID: 416148)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{3} x(\sqrt{\sin x} d x)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{8}{21}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\cos x d x ; \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\left(1-\sin ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{\sin x} \cos x \cdot d x ; \text { Let, } \sin x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x \cdot d x=d z[/math]


Explanation:

Question #61 (ID: 416149)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\tan x+c[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+c[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\sin x}+c[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x}{\sqrt{t}} d x=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+c[/math]

Question #62 (ID: 416150)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{3 \sqrt{x}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2} \sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}} \sqrt{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{3}{3} \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} d x=\frac{1}{3} \times 2 \sqrt{x}=\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]

Question #63 (ID: 416151)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{9}\left(5+\frac{1}{\sqrt{y}}\right) d y[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]51[/math]
B. [math]34[/math]
C. [math]44[/math]
D. [math]46[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{9}[/math]
 [math]\left(5+\frac{1}{\sqrt{y}}\right)[/math]
 [math]d y=[5 y+2 \sqrt{y}]_{0}^{9}[/math]
 [math]=(45+6)-(0)[/math]
 [math]=51[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #64 (ID: 416152)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text{let, } \cos x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d z=-\sin x d x\\\text{when, }[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}, z=0 ;[/math]
 [math]x=0, z=1[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\int_{1}^{0}(1+z)^{2} d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\int_{1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]\left(z^{2}+2 z+1\right) \mathrm{d}[/math]
 [math]z=-[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{z^{3}}{3}+\frac{2 z^{2}}{2}+z\right]_{1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}+1+1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #65 (ID: 416153)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x^{3} \sqrt{1+3 x^{4}} \mathrm{dx}= ?[/math] কত

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{18}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{18}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{7}{16}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{14}{9}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x^{3} \sqrt{1+3 x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]d x ; \text { Let }, 1+3 x^{4}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 12 x^{3} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} d x=\frac{d x}{12}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 আমরা পাই , [math]\frac{1}{12} \int_{1}^{4} \sqrt{2} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{1}{12} \times \frac{2^{\frac{1}{1}}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right]_{1}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{2}{3 \times 12} \times z^{\frac{3}{2}}\right]_{1}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{18}[/math]
 [math]\left[z^{\frac{3}{2}}\right]_{1}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{18}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\left(2^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}-1\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{18}(8-1)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{18}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #66 (ID: 416154)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{3} x d x-[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\pi / 4[/math]
B. [math]3 / 8[/math]
C. [math]-2 / 3[/math]
D. [math]2 / 3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { Wallis theorem }[/math]
 থেকে পাই, [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{3} x \cdot d x=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #67 (ID: 416155)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin ^{4} x \cos ^{5} x d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{22}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{315}[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin ^{4} x[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos ^{4} x \cdot \cos x[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin ^{4} x[/math]
 [math]\left(1-\sin ^{2} x\right)^{2} d x[/math]
 [math]\text{Let,}\sin x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x[/math]
 [math]\cdot d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 আমরা পাই, [math]\int_{0}^{0} z^{4}[/math]
 [math]\left(1-z^{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]d z=\int_{0}^{0} z^{4}[/math]
 [math]\left(1-2 z^{2}+z^{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]d z[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{0}[/math]
 [math]\left(z^{4}-2 z^{6}+z^{8}\right)[/math]
 [math]d z=\left[\frac{z^{5}}{5}-\frac{2 z^{7}}{7}+\frac{z^{9}}{9}\right]_{0}^{0}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #68 (ID: 416156)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\operatorname{tanx}}{\sqrt{2} \cot x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\cot x-x)+c[/math]
B. [math](\tan x-x)+c[/math]
C. [math](\tan x+x)+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\tan x-x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \int \tan ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]dx=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \in[/math]
 [math]t\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[\tan x-x]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #69 (ID: 416157)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 4}\left(\tan ^{3} x+\tan x\right) d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\tan x\left(\tan ^{2} x+1\right)[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{d} x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\tan x\left(\sec ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{d} x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{(\tan x)^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #70 (ID: 416158)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d y}{5 e^{5 y}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{15 e^{5 y}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{15} e^{5 y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{5} e^{5 y}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{15} e^{-5 y}[/math]
E. [math]\text { none }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { none }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d y}{5 e^{5 y}}=\frac{1}{5} \int e^{-5 y} d y=\frac{1}{5} \times \frac{e^{-5 y}}{(-5)}=-\frac{1}{25 e^{5 y}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]\int \sin ^{-1} x d x[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)+c}[/math]
B. [math]x \sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}+c[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+c[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{(1-x)+c}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int x^{0} \cdot \sin ^{-1} x \cdot[/math]
 [math]d x=\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\cdot \int x^{0}[/math]
 [math]\cdot d x-\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\times x \cdot d x[/math]

Question #72 (ID: 416160)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2008-2009, 2005-2006, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4x[/math] & [math]y=x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রে ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{8} \text { sq.units }[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{8}{3} \text { sq.units }[/math]
গ. [math]3 \text { sq.units }[/math]
ঘ. [math]8 \text { sq.units }[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x \Rightarrow y=2 \sqrt{x}[/math]
 আর [math]y=x[/math]
 এর ছেদবিন্দু [math](0,0)[/math]
 এবং [math](4,4)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল: [math]\int_{0}^{4}(2 \sqrt{x}-x) d x=\left[2 \frac{x^{3 / 2}}{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{4}=\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #73 (ID: 416161)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003, 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x+\sqrt{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}+\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}}=\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+1)}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sqrt{x}+1=z \Rightarrow d z=\frac{d x}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
সুতরাং [math]\int \frac{2 \mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}}=2 \ln \mathrm{z}+\mathrm{C}=2 \ln (\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+1)+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #74 (ID: 416162)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\log \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\log \left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]e^{-x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=\log \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #75 (ID: 416163)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{1-\sin \mathrm{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3}+1[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{3}+2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}+1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}+2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}} \frac{d x}{1-\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}} \frac{(1+\sin x) d x}{1-\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} x}+\frac{\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\sec ^{2} x+\sec x \tan x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=[\tan x+\sec x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \frac{\pi}{3}+\sec ^{\frac{\pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]-\tan 0-\sec 0[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}+2-0-1[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}+1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #76 (ID: 416164)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+e^{x}}[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\log _{10} e^{x}+C[/math]
B. [math]\log _{10}\left(1+e^{x}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]e^{x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+e^{x}}=\int \frac{d\left(1+e^{x}\right)}{1+e^{x}}=\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #77 (ID: 416165)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sec ^{2} x \operatorname{cosec}^{2} x d x[/math] এর যোজিত ফল নির্ণয় কর-

Options:
A. [math]tanx+cotx-C[/math]
B. [math]tanx+cotx-C[/math]
C. [math]tanx-cotx+C[/math]
D. [math]sinx-cosecx+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} x \sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\cos ^{2} x+\sin ^{2} x}{\cos ^{2} x \sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(\sec ^{2} x+\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\tan x-\cot x+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #78 (ID: 416128)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Find the area bounded by the curves } y=x^{2} \text { and } y=2 x \text {. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\left.A=\left|\int_{0}^{2}\left(x^{2}-2 x\right) d x\right|=\mid\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}-x^{2}\right]_{0}^{2}\right]=\left|\frac{8}{3}-4\right|=\frac{4}{3}[/math]
[Image]


Explanation:

Question #79 (ID: 416129)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{2} \operatorname{cosec} x^{3} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln \left(\cot \frac{x^{3}}{2}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln \left(\tan \frac{x^{3}}{2}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left(\tan \frac{x^{3}}{2}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left(\cot \frac{x^{3}}{2}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int x^{2} \operatorname{cosec} x^{3} d x=\frac{1}{3} \int 3 x^{2} \operatorname{cosec} x^{3} d x=\frac{1}{3} \ln \left(\tan \frac{x^{3}}{2}\right)+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #80 (ID: 416130)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \tan ^{3} 5 x \sec ^{2} 5 x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3} s e c^{4} 5 x+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{20} \tan ^{4} 5 x+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{20} \sec ^{4} 5 x+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{12} \sec ^{3} 5 x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { let, } \tan 5 x[/math]
 [math]=z, 5 \sec ^{2} 5 x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\int \tan ^{3} 5 x \sec ^{2} 5 x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5} \int z^{3} d t[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z^{4}}{20}+C[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{20} \tan ^{4} 5 x+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #81 (ID: 416131)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{3 \pi}{4}}|\cos x| \mathrm{d} x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]2-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{3 \pi}{4}}|\cos x| d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cos x d x-\int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{3 \pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\cos x d x[/math]
 [math]\left[\because|\cos x|=\left\{\begin{array}{c}\cos x, 0 \leq x \leq \frac{\pi}{2} \\-\cos x, \frac{\pi}{2}[math]=[\sin x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]-[\sin x]_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{3 \pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=1-\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}-1\right)[/math]
 [math]=2-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

[math]\text { Find the area of the region enclosed by } y=\sqrt{2-x}[/math] [math]\text { and }y=-x\text { as shown in the figure given below. }[/math]


[Image]

A. [math]\frac{22}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{10}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{9}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]

Question #83 (ID: 416114)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{2}|x| d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text { Hints: }|x|=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}-x, & x0\end{array}\right. \\\therefore \int_{\mathrm{b}}^{\mathrm{a}}|\mathrm{x}| \mathrm{dx}=\int_{\mathrm{b}}^{0}-\mathrm{xdx}+\int_{0}^{\mathrm{a}} \mathrm{xdx} ; \mathrm{a}>0>\mathrm{b} \\\text { Solve: } \int_{-1}^{2}|x| d x=\int_{-1}^{0}-x d x+\int_{0}^{2} x d x \\=\left[-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{-1}^{0}+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{2}=\left(\frac{1}{2}+2\right)=\frac{5}{2} \\\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:
Integration এর মুখ্য উদ্দেশ্য Area নির্ণয় করা। এখানে | x | দ্বারা y = x এর y = -x উভয় অঞ্চল বুঝায়। ফলে আমাদের Total অংশের Area বের করতে হবে। আর সেজন্য লিমিটকেও দুটো সংশ্লিষ্ট অংশে ভাগ করা হয়েছে।



Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #84 (ID: 416115)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos \theta+\sin \theta}{\cos \theta-\sin \theta} d \theta[/math] এর মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]\log _{e} \cos \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\log _{\mathrm{e}} \sec \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+\mathrm{C}[/math]
C. [math]\log _{\mathrm{e}} \sec \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+\mathrm{C}[/math]
D. [math]\log _{e} \operatorname{cosec}\left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cos \theta+\sin \theta}{\cos \theta-\sin \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]=-\log _{e}(\cos \theta-\sin \theta)[/math]
 [math]+C_{l}[/math]
 [math]=-\log _{e}\left\{\sqrt{2} \cos \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)\right\}+C_{1}[/math]
 [math]=-\ln \sqrt{2}-\log _{e} \cos[/math]
 [math]\left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+C_{t}[/math]
 [math]=\log _{e} \sec[/math]
 [math]\left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+C, \quad[/math]
 [math]\left[C_{1}-\ln \sqrt{2}=C\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #85 (ID: 416116)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{3 x}-1}{e^{3 x}+1} d x[/math] এর মান বের কর।

Options:
A. [math]x+\frac{2}{3} \log \left(1+e^{-3 x}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]x+\frac{2}{3}\left(1+e^{-3 x}\right)[/math]
C. [math]x+2 \log \left(1+e^{-3 x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]x-\frac{2}{3}\left(1+e^{-3 x}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{3 x}-1}{e^{3 x}+1} d x=\int\left(1-\frac{2}{e^{3 x}+1}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(1-\frac{2 \mathrm{e}^{-3 \mathrm{x}}}{1+\mathrm{e}^{-3 \mathrm{x}}}\right) \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{x}+\frac{2}{3} \log \left(1+\mathrm{e}^{-3 \mathrm{x}}\right)+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #86 (ID: 416117)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x e^{x}-e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]x e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]x e^{x}+e^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int x e^{x} d x=x \int e^{x} d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} x \int e^{x} d x\right) d x \\=x e^{x}-\int 1 \cdot e^{x} d x=x e^{x}-e^{x}+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #87 (ID: 416118)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math] সমান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\text { xlgox }+x[/math]
C. [math]x \log x-x[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \log x d x=\log x \int d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} \log x \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x \log x-\int \frac{1}{x} \cdot x d x=x \log x-x+C[/math]


Explanation:
