Question #88 (ID: 416119)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{1+x} d x[/math] - এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]3 \ln 3+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]2 \ln 2-1[/math]
C. [math]4 \ln 3+1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 3[/math]
E. [math]2 \ln 3+5[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{1+x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1+x}-\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{1+x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[\ln (1+x)]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]-\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1+x-1}{1+x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\ln 2-\int_{0}^{1} d x[/math]
 [math]\div \int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{1+x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln 2+[\ln (1+x)]_{0}^{1}-[a]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=2 \cdot \ln 2-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #89 (ID: 416120)

Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-a^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{a}{x} \sec ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{1}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
C. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{-1} \mathrm{x}[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1} \mathrm{x}[/math]
E. [math]\sin ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{z}-a^{2}}}=\int \frac{Y adx}{a^{\frac{x}{a} \sqrt{\left(\frac{x}{a}\right)^{2}-1^{2}}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{a} \sec ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #90 (ID: 416121)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \ln x d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]e[/math]
C. [math]e-1[/math]
D. [math]1-e[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \ln x d x=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{e}=e, 1-e-0+1=1[/math]

Question #91 (ID: 416122)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} 2 x^{3} e^{-x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{2}{e}+1[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{e}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{e}+1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{x}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{z}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{xdx}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int 2 \mathrm{x}^{3} \mathrm{e}[/math]
 [math]-\mathrm{x}^{2} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int z e^{-z} d z[/math]
 [math]=z \int e^{-z}-\int\left\{\frac{d}{d z}(z) \int e^{-z} d z\right) d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -z e^{-z}-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(-e^{-z}\right) d z[/math]
 [math]=-z e^{-z}-e^{-z}+c[/math]
 [math]=-(z+1) e^{-z}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{1} z \mathrm{e}^{-z} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[(\mathrm{z}+1) \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{z}}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\left(2 \mathrm{e}^{-1}-1\right)=1-\frac{2}{e}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2}{e}+1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #92 (ID: 416123)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sum_{k=0}^{\infty} \frac{(-1)^{k} x^{2 k}}{2^{2 k}(k !)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\sum_{k=0}^{\infty} \frac{(-1)^{k}}{(2 k+1) k !}[/math]
C. [math]\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{(-1)^{k} \ln x}{\sqrt{k} k !}[/math]
D. [math]\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{(-1)^{k+1} x^{k}}{k !}[/math]
E. [math]\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{(-1)^{k} x^{-\frac{1}{3}}}{2 \ln k}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{-x^{2} d x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1}\left(1-x^{2}+\frac{x^{4}}{2 !}-\frac{x^{6}}{3 !}+\cdots\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\left(1-\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{5 \times 2 !}-\frac{1}{7 \times 3 !}+\cdots\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(-1)^{k}}{(2 k+1) k !}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #93 (ID: 416124)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int a^{a^{a^{x}}} \cdot a^{a^{x}} \cdot a^{x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]a^{a^{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{a^{x^{\prime}}}{\log a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{x}}}}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{a^{a^{a^{x}}}}{(\log a)^{3}}[/math]
E. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]l=\int a^{a^{a^{x}}}[/math]
 [math]a^{a^{x}} \cdot a^{x} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]a^{z}=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{z}} \ln \mathrm{adz}=\mathrm{dy}[/math]
 [math]\therefore I=\int \frac{a^{y} d y}{\ln a \cdot \ln a}=\frac{a^{y}}{(\ln a)^{3}}=\frac{a^{a^{a^{x}}}}{(\ln 3)^{3}}[/math]
[ প্রশ্নে [math]log a[/math]
 বলতে [math]ln a[/math]
 কে বুঝানো হয়েছে]

Explanation:

Question #94 (ID: 416125)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{-2 x} \tan \left(e^{-2 x}\right) d=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \tan \left(e^{-2 x}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \sec \left(2^{-2 x}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{2} \ln \cos \left(e^{-2 x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\text { Both a and c }[/math]
E. [math]\text { (No answer) }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { (No answer) }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int e^{-2 x} \tan \left(e^{-2 x}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int 2 e^{-2 x} \frac{\sec \left(e^{-2 x}\right) \tan \left(e^{-2 x}\right)}{\sec \left(e^{-2 x}\right)} d[/math]
 [math]x=-\frac{1}{2} \ln[/math]
 [math]\left[\sec \left(e^{-2 x}\right)\right]+C[/math]


Explanation:

Question #95 (ID: 416126)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln \sqrt{2}} \frac{1+\cos \left(e^{-2 x}\right)}{e^{2 x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{8}+\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin 1-\sin \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin 1-\sin \frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{8}+\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin 1-\sin \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{4}+\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin 1-\sin \frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln \sqrt{2}} \frac{1+\cos \left(e^{-2 x}\right)}{e^{2 x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\ln \sqrt{2}} e^{-2 x}[/math]
 [math]d x+\int_{0}^{\ln \sqrt{2}} e^{-2 x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos \left(e^{-2 x}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\frac{e^{-2 x}}{-2}\right]_{0}^{\ln \sqrt{2}}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\sin \left(e^{-2 x}\right)\right]_{0}^{\ln \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{e^{-2 x}}{2}\right]_{\ln \sqrt{2}}^{0}+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\sin \left(e^{-2 x}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]_{\ln \sqrt{2}}^{0}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{4}\right]+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\sin 1-\sin \frac{1}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\sin 1-\sin \frac{1}{2}\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #96 (ID: 416105)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left\{\frac{1}{1-x}+\frac{1}{(x-1)^{2}}\right\} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{\pi}}{1-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x}{1-e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{x-1}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{(x-1)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1-x}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{(1-x) e^{x}+e^{x}}{(1-x)^{2}} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{x}\left\{\frac{1}{1-x}+\frac{1}{(1-x)^{2}}\right\}[/math]
 [math]d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\frac{1}{1-x}+\frac{1}{(x-1)^{2}}\right\}[/math]
 [math]d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় যোগজ [math]=\int e^{x}\left\{\frac{1}{1-x}+\frac{1}{(x-1)^{2}}\right\}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int d z=z+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x}}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #97 (ID: 416106)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x)[/math] হলে [math]y[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \cos x[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} \sec x[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \sin x[/math]
D. [math]e^{x} \operatorname{cosec} x[/math]
E. [math]e^{x}(\cos x-\sin x)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=e^{x} \sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} \sin x+e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\cos x[/math]
 [math]=e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #98 (ID: 416107)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos 2 \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} d \theta=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}-2[/math]
D. [math]2-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{0}} \frac{\cos 2 \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi/4} \frac{2 \cos ^{2} \theta-1}{\cos ^{2} \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{{\pi/4}} 2 \mathrm{~d}[/math]
 [math]\theta-\int_{0}^{{\pi/4}} \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} \theta} \mathrm{d}[/math]
 [math]\theta=2[\theta]_{0}^{\pi/4}[/math]
 [math]-[\tan \theta]_{0}^{{\pi/4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{{\pi}}{2}-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #99 (ID: 416108)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(\tan ^{2} x \sec ^{2} x\right) d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(\tan ^{2} x \sec ^{2} x\right) d x[/math]
 ধরি, [math]\tan x=z \Rightarrow \sec ^{2} x d x=d z ; x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]z=0; x=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 হলে, [math]z=1;[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{1} z^{2} d z=\frac{z^{3}}{3}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #100 (ID: 416109)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\sqrt{-1}[/math] হলে [math]\int_{0}^{1} \log e^{x 4} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]e[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \log \mathrm{e}^{x^{4}} \mathrm{dx}=\int_{0}^{1} \text { loge } \mathrm{dx}=[\mathrm{x}]_{0}^{1}=1[/math]

Question #101 (ID: 416110)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sec ^{2} x \operatorname{cosec}^{2} x d x[/math] এর যোজিত ফল নির্ণয় কর-

Options:
A. [math]tanx+cotx-C[/math]
B. [math]tanx+cotx-C[/math]
C. [math]tanx-cotx+C[/math]
D. [math]sinx-cosecx+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} x \sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\cos ^{2} x+\sin ^{2} x}{\cos ^{2} x \sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(\sec ^{2} x+\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\tan x-\cot x+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #102 (ID: 416111)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2015-2016, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]d\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)=[/math]
 [math]\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #103 (ID: 416112)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\sin x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sec x+\tan x+C[/math]
B. [math]tanx secx + C[/math]
C. [math]tanx + secx + C[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{(1-\sin x) d x}{1-\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{(1-\sin x) d x}{\cos ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]= \int\left(\sec ^{2} x-\tan x \sec x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\tan x-\sec x+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #104 (ID: 416113)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| \mathrm{d} x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x=[/math]
 ছায়াকৃত অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 1 \times 1+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 1[/math]
 [math]\times 1=1[/math]
 এককবিকল্প: [math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x[/math]
 [math]=-\int_{-1}^{0} x \cdot d x+\int_{0}^{1} x[/math]
 [math]\cdot d x[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #105 (ID: 416092)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{2}|x| d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text { Hints: }|x|=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}-x, & x0\end{array}\right. \\\therefore \int_{\mathrm{b}}^{\mathrm{a}}|\mathrm{x}| \mathrm{dx}=\int_{\mathrm{b}}^{0}-\mathrm{xdx}+\int_{0}^{\mathrm{a}} \mathrm{xdx} ; \mathrm{a}>0>\mathrm{b} \\\text { Solve: } \int_{-1}^{2}|x| d x=\int_{-1}^{0}-x d x+\int_{0}^{2} x d x \\=\left[-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{-1}^{0}+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{2}=\left(\frac{1}{2}+2\right)=\frac{5}{2} \\\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:
Integration এর মুখ্য উদ্দেশ্য Area নির্ণয় করা। এখানে | x | দ্বারা y = x এর y = -x উভয় অঞ্চল বুঝায়। ফলে আমাদের Total অংশের Area বের করতে হবে। আর সেজন্য লিমিটকেও দুটো সংশ্লিষ্ট অংশে ভাগ করা হয়েছে।



Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #106 (ID: 416093)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]\int_{\sqrt{5}}^{a} \frac{2 x}{x^{2}-4} d x=\ln 3 a ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{6}[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{3}[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]
E. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
Hints: বামপক্ষের সমাকলনের মান আগে বের করে তার পর দুইপক্ষ তুলনা করতে হবে।Solve: [math]\int_{\sqrt{5}}^{a} \frac{2 x}{x^{2}-4} d x[/math]
 [math]\text { suppose, } \mathrm{x}^{2}-4[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{z} \Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{xdx}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{d z}{z}[/math]
 [math]=[\ln z]=\left[\ln \left(\mathrm{x}^{2}-4\right)\right]_{\sqrt{5}}^{a}[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\mathrm{a}^{2}-4\right)[/math]
 [math]-\ln (5-4)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\mathrm{a}^{2}-4\right)-0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{\sqrt{5}}^{a} \frac{2 x}{x^{2}-4} \mathrm{dx}=\ln \left(\mathrm{a}^{2}-4\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln 3 \mathrm{a}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{a}^{2}-4[/math]
 [math]=3 \mathrm{a}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{a}^{2}-3 \mathrm{a}-4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{a}[/math]
 [math]=4 \text { or }-1[/math]
কিন্তু a = 1 হবে না কারণ তখন In 3a = In (3) হয় যা অসম্ভব।[math]\therefore[/math]
 a=4

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #107 (ID: 416094)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin x[/math] এবং [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math] বক্ররেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল নিম্নের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]1 / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x=\sin ^{2} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d x=2 \sin \theta[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos \theta d \theta=\sin 2 \theta d \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=0[/math]
 হলে [math]x=0, \theta=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 হলে [math]x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]I=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} \theta+\cos ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{x^{2}+(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{x^{2}+x^{2}-2 x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-x+\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{\left(x-\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}+\frac{1}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} \times 2[/math]
 [math]\left[\tan ^{-1} \frac{x-\frac{1}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #108 (ID: 416095)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]I=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} \theta+\cos ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x=\sin ^{2} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{dx}=2 \sin \theta[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos \theta \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]=\sin 2 \theta \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=0[/math]
 হলে [math]x=0, \theta=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 হলে [math]x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]I=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} \theta+\cos ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{x^{2}+(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{x^{2}+x^{2}-2 x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-x+\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{\left(x-\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}+\frac{1}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} \times 2\left[\tan ^{-1} \frac{x-\frac{1}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #109 (ID: 416096)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর: [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-e^{-2 x}}{\log (1+x)}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1 / 3[/math]
E. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-e^{-2 x}}{\log (1+x)}\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকৃতি] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 e^{-2 x}}{\frac{1}{1+x}}=2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #110 (ID: 416097)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}, x[/math]- অক্ষ এবং y-অক্ষ দ্বারা প্রথম চতুর্ভাগে আবদ্ধ অঞ্চলের ক্ষেত্রফল–

Options:
ক. [math]\pi[/math]
খ. [math]2 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]4 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{1-x^{2}} \Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=1^{2}[/math]
 = যা বৃত্তের সমীকরণ[math]\therefore[/math]
 ১ম চতুর্ভাগে ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{\pi \times 1^{2}}{4}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #111 (ID: 416098)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{7}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]z=1+\cos x ; d z=-\sin x d x[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 হলে [math]z=1 ; x=0[/math]
 হলে [math]z=2[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\pi/2}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x=-\int_{2}^{1} z^{2} d z[/math]
 [math]\int_{1}^{2} z^{2} d z=\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{1}^{2}=\frac{7}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #112 (ID: 416099)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{a} \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}} d x[/math] এর যোজিত ফল কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}[/math]
 যা বৃত্তের সমীকরণ।[math]\int_{0}^{a} y d x[/math]
 হল বৃত্তের অংশ। যার মান [math]\frac{\pi a^{2}}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #113 (ID: 416100)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{\operatorname{mtan}-1} x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{m} e^{\operatorname{man}^{-1} x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{m \operatorname{tan} n^{-1} x}[/math]
D. [math]m e^{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
E. [math]\mathrm{me}^{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan ^{-1} x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{1+x^{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{e^{m \tan ^{-1} x}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int e^{m z} d z=\frac{1}{m} e^{m z}[/math]
 [math]+c=\frac{1}{m} e^{m \tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #114 (ID: 416101)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{2} x d x[/math] সমান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 I=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\left(\sin ^{2} x+\cos ^{2} x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow I=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-0\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #115 (ID: 416102)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{\pi}|x| d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3 / 2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]5 / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{2}|x| d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{-1}^{0}(-x) d x+\int_{0}^{2} x[/math]
 [math]d x=\left[-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{-1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=-0-\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]+\frac{4}{2}-\frac{0}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #116 (ID: 416103)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{2}^{3} \frac{x}{x^{2+1}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\ln 2[/math]
D. [math]2 \ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{2}^{3} \frac{x}{x^{2}+1} d x=\frac{1}{2}\left[\ln \left|x^{2}+1\right|\right]_{2}^{3}=\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #117 (ID: 416104)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2007-2008, 2006-2007, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math] সমান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x \log x-x[/math]
B. [math]x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]x \log x+x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math]
 [math]=\log x \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d \log x}{d x} \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x \log x-x+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #118 (ID: 416085)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=6 x[/math] পরাবৃত্ত [math]y=x[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল বের কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{256}{3} \text { unit }[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{128}{3} \text { unit }[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{28}{3} \text { unit }[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{64}{3} \text { unit }[/math]
ঙ. সঠিক উত্তর নেই


Correct Answer: E.সঠিক উত্তর নেই

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{6}(\sqrt{6 x}-x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sqrt{6} \times \frac{2}{3} x^{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{1}{2} x^{2}\right]_{0}^{6}[/math]
 [math]=6[/math]


Explanation:

Question #119 (ID: 416086)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]tanx + C[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x d(\tan x)=\frac{\tan ^{\frac{1}{2}} x}{\frac{1}{2}}+C=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #120 (ID: 416087)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\cos 2 \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} d \theta=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}-2[/math]
D. [math]2-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\cos 2 \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{2 \cos ^{2} \theta-1}{\cos ^{2} \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta \\=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(2-\sec ^{2} \theta\right) \mathrm{d} \theta=[2 \theta-\tan \theta]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}=\frac{\pi}{2}-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #121 (ID: 416088)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2} x+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan x-x+C[/math]
C. [math]\sec x+C[/math]
D. [math]x-\tan ^{2} x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=\int\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right) d x=\tan x-x+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #122 (ID: 416089)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{5} \theta \cos \theta d \theta[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]1 / 4[/math]
B. [math]1 / 5[/math]
C. [math]1 / 6[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{5} \theta \cos \theta d \theta=\int_{0}^{1} z^{5} d z=\left[\frac{z^{6}}{6}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sin \theta=\mathrm{z} \quad \therefore \cos \theta \mathrm{d} \theta=\mathrm{dz} ; \quad \theta=0[/math]
 হলে [math]z=0 ; \quad \theta=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 হলে [math]z=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #123 (ID: 416090)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x = 0[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]f(x) = In(2x + 1)[/math] এবং নিচের কোন বক্ররেখার স্পর্শকের ঢাল সমান হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]f(x)=1+x+2 x^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]f(x)=-2 x-2 x^{2}+4 x^{3}[/math]
গ. [math]f(x)=x-\frac{1}{2} x^{2}+\frac{1}{3} x^{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]f(x)=2 x-2 x^{2}+\frac{8}{3} x^{3}[/math]
ঙ. [math]f(x)=x-\frac{x^{2}}{2 !}+\frac{x^{3}}{3 !}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln (2 x+1) \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{2}{2 x+1} ; x=0[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল = 2আবার, [math]f(x)=2 x-2 x^{2}+\frac{8}{3} x^{3} \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=2-4 x+8 x^{2} ; x=0[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল =2অন্যকোন অপশনের ক্ষেত্রে [math]x = 0[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ফাংশনের ঢাল [math]2[/math]
 হয় না।

Explanation:

Question #125 (ID: 416083)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| \mathrm{d} x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x=[/math]
 ছায়াকৃত অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 1 \times 1+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 1[/math]
 [math]\times 1=1[/math]
 এককবিকল্প: [math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x[/math]
 [math]=-\int_{-1}^{0} x \cdot d x+\int_{0}^{1} x[/math]
 [math]\cdot d x[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #126 (ID: 416084)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos \theta+\sin \theta}{\cos \theta-\sin \theta} d \theta[/math] এর মান হলো?

Options:
A. [math]\log _{e} \cos \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\log _{e} \sin \left(\theta-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\log _{e} \sec \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\log _{e} \operatorname{cosec}\left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+c[/math]
E. [math]\log _{e} \sin 2 \theta+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cos \theta+\sin \theta}{\cos \theta-\sin \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\cos ^{2} \theta+2 \cos \theta \sin \theta+\sin ^{2} \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta-\sin ^{2} \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int \frac{1+\sin 2 \theta}{\cos 2 \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int \sec 2 \theta \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]+\int \tan 2 \theta \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} \ln (\sec 2 \theta+\tan 2 \theta)[/math]
 [math]-\frac{1}{2} \ln \cos 2 \theta+c^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1+\sin 2 \theta}{\cos ^{2} 2 \theta}\right)+c^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} \ln[/math]
 [math]\frac{\cdot(\sin \theta+\cos \theta)^{2}}{(\cos \theta+\sin \theta)^{2}(\cos \theta-\sin \theta)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]+c^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\ln[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{\cos \theta-\sin \theta}\right)[/math]
 [math]+c^{\prime}=[/math]
 [math]\ln \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}\left(\cos \theta \cos \frac{\pi}{4}-\sin \theta \sin \frac{\pi}{4}\right)}+c^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=\ln \frac{1}{\sqrt{2} \cos \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)}[/math]
 [math]+c^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\ln \frac{\sec \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]+c^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=\ln \sec \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+\ln \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]+c^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\ln[/math]
 [math]\sec \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]+c^{\prime}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #127 (ID: 416064)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] বক্ররেখা এবং [math]y=x[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{8} \text { sq. units }[/math]
খ. [math]3 \text { sq. units }[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{8}{3} \text { sq. units }[/math]
ঘ. [math]8 \text { sq. units }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]A=\int_{0}^{4} 2 \sqrt{x} d x-\int_{0}^{4} x d x=\left[\frac{4}{3}(x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\left\{\frac{4}{3} \times 4^{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{4^{2}}{2}\right\}=\frac{8}{3} \text { sq.units }[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #128 (ID: 416065)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln 2} \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\ln \frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{6}^{\ln 2} \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}} d x=\left[\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)\right]_{0}^{\ln 2}=\ln (3 / 2)[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x e^{x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math](e+1)[/math]
B. [math](e-1)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}(e+1)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}(e-1)[/math]
E. [math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x e^{x} d x=\left[e^{x} \cdot x-e^{x} \cdot 1\right]_{0}^{1}=1[/math]

Question #130 (ID: 416067)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{2 x+3} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 x+3)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{3}(2 x+3)^{\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}(2 x+3)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{2 x+3} d x=\frac{(2 x+3)^{\frac{1}{2}}+1}{\left(\frac{1}{2}+1\right) \times 2}+c=\frac{1}{3}(2 x+3)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]

Explanation:

একটি ধ্রুবককে সময়ের সাপেক্ষে সমাকলন করলে কি পাওয়া যায়?

ঘ. কোনটিই নয়

 ধ্ৰুৰক [math]]=\mathrm{ct}[\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{mx}[/math]
 আকৃতির যেখানে [math]c[/math]
 হল ঢাল] যা মূলবিন্দুগামী সরলরেখা।

Question #133 (ID: 416070)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan x+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan x[/math]
C. [math]\tan 2 x[/math]
D. [math]\operatorname{Sin} 2 x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{1+\frac{1-\tan ^{2} x}{1+\tan ^{2} x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x d x}{2}=[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan x+C[/math]


Explanation:

B. [math]\frac{1}{a} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}[/math]

Question #135 (ID: 416072)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
B. [math]2(e+1)[/math]
C. [math]2(1-\mathrm{e})[/math]
D. [math](e+1)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি , [math]y=\sqrt{x} \Rightarrow x=y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 y \cdot d y=d x ; \int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{y}}{y} \cdot 2 y[/math]
 [math]d y[/math]
 [math]=2[e-1][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #136 (ID: 416073)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{2} \frac{x^{2}-a^{2}}{x^{2}+a^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]a\left(1-\frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
B. [math]a\left(1+\frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]a\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-1\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{a} \frac{x^{2}-a^{2}}{x^{2}+a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{a} \frac{x^{2}+a^{2}}{x^{2}+a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x-\int_{0}^{a} \frac{2 a^{2}}{x^{2}+a^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{a} d x-2 a^{2} \int_{0}^{a} \frac{d x}{a^{2}+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=a-\frac{2 a^{2}}{a}[/math]
 [math]\left[\cos ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}\right]_{0}^{a}[/math]
 [math]=a-2 a\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]=a\left(1-\frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #137 (ID: 416074)

Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{4+x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
B. [math]\cot ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \cot ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{4+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{2^{2}+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} \frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}[/math]

Question #140 (ID: 416077)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{2 x+3} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 x+3)^{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{3}(2 x+3)^{-\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}(2 x+3)^{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{2 \mathrm{x}+3} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{(2 \mathrm{x}+3)^{\frac{1}{2}+1}}{\left(\frac{1}{2}+1\right) \cdot 2}+\mathrm{C}=\frac{1}{3}(2 \mathrm{x}+3)^{\frac{3}{2}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #141 (ID: 416078)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{2+x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}+K[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{2}}+K[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{2}}+K[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{2}}+K[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{2+\mathrm{x}^{2}}=\frac{\mathrm{dx}}{(\sqrt{2})^{2}+\mathrm{x}^{2}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \tan ^{-1} \frac{\mathrm{x}}{\sqrt{2}}+\mathrm{K}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #142 (ID: 416079)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int\left(\sec ^{2} \theta-\tan ^{2} \theta\right) d \theta=[/math] কত?

A. [math]\theta+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan \theta-2 \log \sec \theta+C[/math]
C. [math]\theta[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \theta+\cos \theta+C[/math]

Question #143 (ID: 416080)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int(3 x-7)^{7} d x[/math] এর নির্ণেয় যোগজ হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4 x}{10}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{(3 x-7)^{8}}{24}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3 x}{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int(3 x-7)^{7} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{(3 x-7)^{8}}{8} \cdot \frac{1}{3}+C=\frac{(3 x-7)^{8}}{24}+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #144 (ID: 416081)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f\left(\frac{x}{x+1}\right)=x+1[/math] হলে, [math]\int f(x+3) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln x+C, x \neq 3[/math]
B. [math]\ln |x+4|+C, x \neq-4[/math]
C. [math]\ln |x+3|+C, x \neq-3[/math]
D. [math]-\ln |x+2|+C, x \neq-2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\frac{x}{x+1}=y+3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x}{x+1-x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y+3}{1-y-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{y+3}{-y-2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(y+3)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{y+3}{y+2}+1=-\frac{1}{y+2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x+3)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{x+2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int f(x+3) d x[/math]
 [math]=-\int \frac{1}{x+2} d x[/math]
 [math]=-\ln |x+2|+C[/math]
 যখন [math]x 
eq-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #145 (ID: 416082)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \cos x d x=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x \sin x+2 \cos x+C[/math]
B. [math]x sinx + cosx + C[/math]
C. [math]x sinx - cosx + C[/math]
D. [math]x sinx + sinx + C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int x \cos x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \int \cos x d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x} x \int \cos x d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x \sin x-\int 1 \cdot[/math]
 [math]\sin x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \sin x+\cos x+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #146 (ID: 416047)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-1+2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x-1}{1}\right)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #147 (ID: 416048)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{x}(1+\log x) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x \log x+c[/math]
B. [math]c+x^{x} \log x[/math]
C. [math]\log \left(x^{x}+1\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]x^{x}+c[/math]
E. [math](x+1) \log x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{x}\right)=x^{x}(1+\ln x) \therefore \int x^{x}(1+\ln x) d x=x^{x}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #148 (ID: 416049)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f\left(\frac{x}{x+1}\right)=x+1[/math] হলে [math]\int f(x+3) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln x+c, x \neq 3[/math]
B. [math]\ln |x+4|+c, x \neq-4[/math]
C. [math]\ln |x+3|+c, x \neq-3[/math]
D. [math]-\ln |x+2|+c, x \neq-2[/math]
E. [math]\ln |x+1|+c, x \neq-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { Hints: } \int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{f(x)}[/math]
 [math]d x=\ln |f(x)|+c[/math]
 [math]\text{Solve: } f\left(\frac{x}{x+1}\right)=x+1[/math]
ধরি,[math]y=\frac{x}{x+1} \text{ then, } f(y)=x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y x+y=x \quad[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-y x=y \quad[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(1-y)=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{y}{1-y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{1-y}+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y+1-y}{1-y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1-y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1-y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x+3)=\frac{1}{1-x-3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-x-2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-(x+2)}[/math]
 [math]\text{then } \int f(x+3) d x[/math]
 [math]=-\int \frac{1}{(x+2)} d x[/math]
 [math]=-\ln |x+2|+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #149 (ID: 416050)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1} \frac{\ln x}{\sqrt{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\ln 2-4[/math]
B. [math]2 \ln 2-4[/math]
C. [math]4 \ln 2-3[/math]
D. [math]8 \ln 2-4[/math]
E. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: E.কোনটিই নয়

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
 শুধুমাত্র [math]x > 0[/math]
 এর জন্য সংজ্ঞায়িত। [math]x = 1[/math]
 এর জন্য ফাংশনটি অসংজ্ঞায়িত।তাই – 1 ও 1 সীমার জন্য [math]integral[/math]
 টি সংজ্ঞায়িত নয়।

Explanation:

Question #150 (ID: 416051)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-অক্ষ এবং [math]y = sinx[/math] বক্ররেখার একটি চাপ দ্বারা গঠিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\Delta=\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin \mathrm{x} \mathrm{dx}=[\cos \mathrm{x}]_{\pi}^{0}=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #151 (ID: 416052)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\int_{1}^{a}\left\{2+x \ln \left(x^{2}+5\right)\right\} d x+\int_{1}^{a}\left\{3-x \ln \left(x^{2}+5\right)\right\} d x=30[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]\ln 3[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]\ln 5[/math]
E. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text{Hints: (i) } \int_{a}^{b}(u+v) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{a}^{b} u d x+\int_{a}^{b} v d x[/math]
 [math]\text{(ii) } \int_{\mathrm{a}}^{\mathrm{b}} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{F}(\mathrm{b})-\mathrm{F}(\mathrm{a})[/math]
 [math]\text { Solve: } \int_{1}^{a}[/math]
 [math]\left\{2+x \ln \left(x^{2}+5\right)\right\} d x+\int_{1}^{a}[/math]
 [math]\left\{3-x \ln \left(x^{2}+5\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]d x=30[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{a} 2 d x+\int_{1}^{\alpha} x \ln \left(x^{2}+5\right)[/math]
 [math]dx+\int_{1}^{\alpha} 3 d x-\int_{1}^{\alpha} x[/math]
 [math]\ln \left(x^{2}+5\right) d x=30[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{a} 2 d x+\int_{1}^{\alpha} 3 d x[/math]
 [math]=30[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[2 x]_{1}^{\alpha}+[3 x]_{1}^{\alpha}[/math]
 [math]=30[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha-2+3 \alpha-3[/math]
 [math]=30[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5 \alpha-5[/math]
 [math]=30[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5 \alpha[/math]
 [math]=35[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha=7[/math]


Explanation:
অংকটা দেখতে কঠিন মনে হলেও আসলে কিন্তু খুব সহজ। প্রথমেই Integration এর কোনো সূত্র ফেলার চেষ্টা না করে ফাংশনের রাশিগুলোকে আলাদা করলেই বুঝা যায় একই রাশি একবার (+) চিহ্ন দিয়ে, আরেকবার(-) চিহ্ন দিয়ে আছে। ফলে রাশি দুটো দূর হয়ে গিয়ে এরপর একদম Normal দুটো রাশি থাকে, যাদেরকে খুব সহজেই যোগজ করে ডানপক্ষের 30 এর সাথে মিলালে x এর মান পাওয়া যায় ।By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরের সাহায্যে খুব সহজেই অংকটা করা যায়। ক্যালকুলেটরের ইন্টিগ্রেশন [80 বাটনটা চেপে পুরো সমীকরণের বামপক্ষটুকু তুলে অপশন থেকে ৫ এর মান বসিয়ে যেই option এর জন্য 30আসবে, সেটাই হচ্ছে Ans.option A অর্থাৎ a এর মান 2 বসালে ক্যালকুলেটর থেকে মান আসে 5option B অর্থাৎ a এর মান In3 " " " " 0.493option C " 4 " " " " 15option D " α " In5 3.047option E " α " " 7 30অর্থাৎ option E থেকে x এর মান 7 বসালে ডানপক্ষের 30 এর সাথে মিলে যায়। সুতরাং Answer হচ্ছে E

Question #152 (ID: 416053)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{-x}\left(-\frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{-x}}{x}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{e^{-x}}{x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{e^{x}}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 e^{-x}}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{-x}\left(\frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int e^{-x}\left\{\left(-\frac{1}{x}\right)+\frac{d}{d x}\left(-\frac{1}{x}\right)\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\frac{e^{-x}}{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{x}\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right) d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}+c[/math]
B. 1-\frac{1}{x}+c$
C. [math]x-\frac{1}{x^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]x-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1}{x}\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right) d x=\int\left(1+x^{-2}\right) d x=x-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]

Question #156 (ID: 416058)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]
undefined. [math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: .[math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\tan ^{-1} x d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)^{2}-0\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi^{2}}{32}[/math]


Explanation:

 [math]d x=\sec ^{2} a \int \sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]d x=\sec ^{2} a .{t a n} x+c[/math]

Question #159 (ID: 416061)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]tanx + C[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x d(\tan x)=\frac{\tan ^{\frac{1}{2}} x}{\frac{1}{2}}+C=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]


Explanation:

Question #160 (ID: 416062)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x+e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{e}^{x}}+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}+e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}+C[/math]
D. [math]e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x+e^{x}} d x=\int e^{x} \cdot e^{e^{x}} d x=\int e^{e^{x}} d\left(e^{x}\right)=e^{e^{x}}+C[/math]

Question #162 (ID: 416043)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] বক্ররেখা এবং [math]y=x[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{8} \text { sq. units }[/math]
খ. [math]3 \text { sq. units }[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{8}{3} \text { sq. units }[/math]
ঘ. [math]8 \text { sq. units }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]A=\int_{0}^{4} 2 \sqrt{x} d x-\int_{0}^{4} x d x=\left[\frac{4}{3}(x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\left\{\frac{4}{3} \times 4^{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{4^{2}}{2}\right\}=\frac{8}{3} \text { sq.units }[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #163 (ID: 416044)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} x \sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1} x+\frac{1}{2} x \sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} x+\frac{1}{2} x \sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
E. [math]None[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]None[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\text { left, } x=\sin \theta ;[/math]
 [math]d x=\cos \theta d \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{\sin ^{2} 0 \cdot \cos \theta \mathrm{~d} \theta}{\cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left|2 \sin ^{2} \theta \mathrm{d} \theta=\frac{1}{2}\right|[/math]
 [math](1-\cos 2 \theta) \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{\sin ^{2} 0 \cdot \cos 0 \mathrm{~d} \theta}{\cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left|2 \sin ^{2} \theta \mathrm{d} \theta=\frac{1}{2}\right|[/math]
 [math](1-\cos 2 \theta) \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\sin ^{-1} x-\frac{1}{2} x \sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #164 (ID: 416045)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{3} x \sin ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{15}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{13}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cos ^{3} x \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } \sin x=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos x d x=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\text { When, } x=0[/math]
 [math]\text { then } z=0 ;[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}, z=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{2}\left(1-\sin ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\sin ^{2} x \cdot \cos x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(1-z^{2}\right) z^{2} d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{1}\left(z^{2}-z^{4}\right) d z[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{z^{3}}{3}-\frac{z^{5}}{5}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}-\frac{1}{5}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5-3}{15}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{2}{15}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #165 (ID: 416046)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The area bounded by the curves } y^{2}=x \text { and } y=x-2 \text { is- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{9}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{11}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\therefore \text { Area }=\int_{-1}^{2}\left(y+2-y^{2}\right) \mathrm{d} y=\left[\frac{y^{2}}{2}+2 y-\frac{y^{3}}{3}\right]_{-1}^{2}=\frac{9}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

ক. 2 বর্গ একক
খ. 5 বর্গ একক
গ. 8 বর্গ একক
ঘ. 4 বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: ঘ

[Image]
[math]\therefore[/math]
 আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=2 \times 2=4[/math]

Question #168 (ID: 416030)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 5^{2 x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5^{\operatorname{ax}}}{\ln 5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5^{\mathrm{ax}}}{5 \ln a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\ln a 5^{2 x}}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5^{\mathrm{ax}}}{a \ln 5}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int 5^{\mathrm{ax}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{5^{\mathrm{ax}}}{\ln 5} \cdot \frac{1}{\mathrm{a}}+\mathrm{C}=\frac{5^{\mathrm{ax}}}{\operatorname{aln} 5}+\mathrm{C}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #169 (ID: 416031)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{(3-4 x)^{\frac{3}{3}}}=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{3}{4}(3-4 x)^{\frac{1}{5}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}(3-4 x)^{-\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{4}(3-4 x)^{\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{3}(3-4 x)^{\frac{1}{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{(3-4 x)^{\frac{2}{3}}}=\int(3-4 x)^{-\frac{2}{3}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(3-4 x)^{-\frac{2}{3}+1}}{\left(-\frac{2}{3}+1\right)(-4)}=\frac{(3-4 x)^{\frac{1}{3}}}{\frac{1}{3} \times(-4)}=-\frac{3}{4}(3-4 x)^{\frac{1}{3}}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #170 (ID: 416032)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{(1-\sin 2 x)} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]sinx + cosx[/math]
B. [math]cos2x[/math]
C. [math]sin2x[/math]
D. [math]sinx - cosx[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sqrt{1-\sin 2 x} d x=\int \sqrt{(\cos x-\sin x)^{2}} d x \\=\int(\cos x-\sin x) d x=\sin x+\cos x\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #171 (ID: 416033)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos x e^{\sin x} d x=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. $cosx
B. [math]e^{\cos x}[/math]
C. [math]sinx[/math]
D. [math]e^{\sin x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \cos x e^{\sin x} d x=\int e^{\sin x} d(\sin x)=e^{\sin x}+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #172 (ID: 416034)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)}{x^{2}} d x=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
C. [math]-\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\cos \left(\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text { Let } \frac{1}{x}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\frac{1}{x^{2}} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x^{2}} d x=-d z[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{\cos \frac{1}{x}}{x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \cos \frac{1}{x} \cdot \frac{1}{x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \cos z(-d z)[/math]
 [math]=-\sin z[/math]
 [math]=-\sin[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #173 (ID: 416035)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit

[math]\int \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)}[/math] এর সমাধান-

Options:
A. [math]\ln (1-\ln x)+C[/math]
B. [math]-\ln (1-\ln x)+C[/math]
C. [math]-\ln (\ln x-1)+C[/math]
D. [math]\ln (1+\ln x)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)}==\ln (1+\ln x)+C[/math]

Question #174 (ID: 416036)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{e^{2 x}+1}=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}+1}\\\left[\right. \text{ let, } z=e^{x} \Rightarrow d z=e^{x} d x \mid\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1} z+c=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #175 (ID: 416037)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\sin x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sec x+\tan x+C[/math]
B. [math]tanx secx + C[/math]
C. [math]tanx + secx + C[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{(1-\sin x) d x}{1-\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{(1-\sin x) d x}{\cos ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]= \int\left(\sec ^{2} x-\tan x \sec x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\tan x-\sec x+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #176 (ID: 416038)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x=\int_{-1}^{0}-x d x+\int_{0}^{1} x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{-1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #177 (ID: 416039)

B. [math]-\ln (\cos x)+C[/math]
C. [math]-\ln (\cot x)+C[/math]
D. [math]-In (Incotx) + C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\tan x}{\ln \cos x} d x=-\ln (\ln \cos x)+C[/math]

Question #178 (ID: 416040)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}-1}{x^{2}-4} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]x+\frac{3}{4} \ln \left|\frac{x+2}{x-2}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]x+\frac{3}{4} \ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
C. [math]x+\frac{3}{2} \ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]x+\frac{3}{2} \ln \left|\frac{x+2}{x-2}\right|+c[/math]
E. [math]x+\frac{1}{2} \ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}-1}{x^{2}-4} d x=\int \frac{x^{2}-4+3}{x^{2}-4} d x=\int d x+3 \int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-4}=x+\frac{3}{22} \ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c=x+\frac{3}{4} \ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #179 (ID: 416041)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\int_{0}^{4} f(x) d x=6[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\int_{-1}^{3} f(x+1) d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]9[/math]
খ. [math]5[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x+1=y[/math]
 তাহলে, [math]\mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{d} y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{-1}^{3} f(x+1) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{4} f(y) d y[/math]
 [math]= \int_{0}^{4} f(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #180 (ID: 416042)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x-\cos 2 x}{1-\cos x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 x+\sin x+c[/math]
B. [math]x+\sin x+c[/math]
C. [math]x+\sin 2 x+c[/math]
D. [math]x+2 \sin x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x-\cos 2 x}{1-\cos x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{2 \sin \frac{x}{2} \sin \frac{3 x}{2}}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}} d x=[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int \frac{\sin \frac{3 x}{2}}{\sin \frac{3}{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{3 \sin \frac{x}{2}-4 \sin \frac{x}{2}}{\sin \frac{x}{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int\left(3-4 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}\right) d[/math]
 [math]x=\int\{3-2(1-\cos x)\} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+2[/math]
 [math]\sin x+c[/math]
 [math]\text { Alternate: } \int \frac{\cos x-\cos 2 x}{1-\cos x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\cos x-2 \cos ^{2} x+1}{1-\cos x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{2 \cos ^{2} x-2 \cos x+\cos x-1}{\cos x-1} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int(2 \cos x+1)[/math]
 [math]\frac{\cos x-1}{\cos x-1} d x[/math]
 [math]=2 \sin x+x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{a}^{2}+\mathrm{x}^{2}}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{\mathbf{a}}{\mathbf{x}}[/math]
