Question #187 (ID: 416021)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x y=c^{2}[/math] অধিবৃত্ত, x-অক্ষ এবং [math]x = a, x = b[/math] রেখা দুইটি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]c^{2} \ln \left(\frac{1}{a b}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]c^{2} \ln \left(\frac{b}{a}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]c^{2} \ln (a b)[/math]
ঘ. [math]c^{2} \ln \left(\frac{a}{b}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\Delta=\int_{x_{1}}^{x_{2}} y d x=\int_{a}^{b} \frac{c^{2}}{x} d x=c^{2}[\ln x]_{2}^{b}=c^{2} \ln \frac{b}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #188 (ID: 415995)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=x[/math] এবং [math]x^{2}=y[/math] বক্ররেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]A=\int_{0}^{1}\left(\sqrt{x}-x^{2}\right) d x=\left[\frac{2}{3} x^{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{2}{3}-\frac{1}{3}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #189 (ID: 415996)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int f(x) d x=\frac{e^{x}}{x+1}+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{(x+1)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{(x+1)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x e^{x}}{(x+1)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x e^{x}}{(x+1)}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]d x=\frac{e^{x}}{x+1}+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{e^{x}}{x+1}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(x+1) e^{x}-1 \cdot e^{x}}{(x+1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x e^{x}+e^{x}-e^{x}}{(x+1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x e^{x}}{(x+1)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #190 (ID: 415997)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x=\int_{-1}^{0}-x d x+\int_{0}^{1} x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{-1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #191 (ID: 415998)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
3 একক ব্যাস ও 15 একক উচ্চতা বিশিষ্ট একটি সিলিন্ডার 3 একক ব্যাস বিশিষ্ট সুষম ও মসৃণ গোলক দ্বারা পূর্ণ করা হলো।

সিলিন্ডারের কত অংশ ফাঁকা থাকবে।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{15}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{15}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
সিলিন্ডারটি [math]\frac{15}{3}[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]
 টি গোলক দ্বারা পূর্ণ করতে হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাঁকা অংশ [math]=\frac{\frac{n d^{2} h}{1}-5 \times \frac{4}{2} \pi \frac{d^{3}}{8}}{\frac{n d^{2} h}{h}}[/math]
 [math]=1-5 \times \frac{4}{3} \times \frac{\pi d^{3}}{n}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{4}{\pi d^{2} h}[/math]
 [math]=1-\frac{10}{3} \frac{d}{h}[/math]
 [math]=1-\frac{10}{3} \times \frac{3}{15}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #192 (ID: 415999)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{n \frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{2} \theta d(\tan \theta)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\tan \left(n \frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3} \cos ^{3}\left(n \frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3} \sin ^{3}\left(n \frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\mathbf{n} \pi[/math]
E. [math]\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
Hints: tan কে x ধরে নাও, অর্থাৎ সাপেক্ষ চলক আর মূল চলক same বানিয়ে নাও ।[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{Solve: } \int_{0}^{\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{2} \theta d(\tan \theta)\\=\int_{0}^{\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}+1} \mathrm{dx} \\=\left[\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}\right]_{0}^{\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}} \\=\left[\tan ^{-1} \tan \theta\right]_{0}^{\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}} \\=[\theta]_{0}^{\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}}=\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}-0=\mathrm{n} \frac{\pi}{2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}, \tan \theta=x \\\therefore \tan ^{2} \theta=x^{2} \\\Rightarrow \sec ^{2} \theta-1=x^{2} \\\Rightarrow \sec ^{2} \theta=x^{2}+1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
প্রশ্নটি হচ্ছে [math]\int \cos ^{2} \theta d(\tan \theta)[/math]
 অর্থাৎ tanθ এর সাপেক্ষে যোগজীকরণ করতে হবে ।কিন্তু মূল Integrand টি হচ্ছে [math]\cos ^{2} \theta[/math]
 অর্থাৎ Integrand এর চলক হচ্ছে [math]\theta[/math]
 । প্রশ্নটি যদি এমন হতো [math]\int \cos ^{2} \theta d \theta[/math]
, তাহলে সরাসরি যোগজ করে ফেলা যেতো।কিন্তু সাপেক্ষ চলক ( tanθ ) আর Integrand এর চলক ( [math]\theta[/math]
) ভিন্ন হওয়াতে সাপেক্ষ চলককে change করে Integrand এর চলকের মতো একই বানাতে হবে। তাই tan কে x ধরে সবকিছুকে x এর মাধ্যমে রূপান্তরিত করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #193 (ID: 416000)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{\tan \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left[2 \tan \frac{\pi}{4}-2 \tan 0\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[2.1-2.0]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #194 (ID: 416001)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{x \ln x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln x[/math]
B. [math]\ln (\ln x)[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\ln x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\ln x=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x} \ln x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\mathrm{d} y}{y}=\ln[/math]
 [math]y=\ln (\ln x)+\mathrm{c} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dy}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #195 (ID: 416002)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\left(1+e^{-x}\right)\left(1+e^{x}\right)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}+c[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\left(1+e^{-x}\right)\left(1+e^{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\left(1+\frac{1}{e^{x}}\right)\left(1+e^{x}\right)}[/math]
 [ধরি [math]1+e^{x}=y \Rightarrow e^{x} \cdot d x=d y ][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int \frac{e^{x} \cdot d x}{\left(1+e^{x}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d y}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{y}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{1+e^{x}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #196 (ID: 416003)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{5} f(x)=5[/math] হলে [math]\int_{1}^{5} f(x-1)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]6[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{5} f(x) d x[/math]
 ধরি, [math]x=z-1, d x=d z[/math]
 যখন, [math]x=0, z=1 ; x=5, z=6[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{5} f(x) d x=\int_{1}^{6} f(z-1) d z=\int_{1}^{6} f(x-1) d x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #197 (ID: 416004)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\int_{-3}^{2} f(x) d x=5[/math] হয় ,তবে [math]\int_{1}^{6} 4 f(x-4) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]9[/math]
C. [math]-5[/math]
D. [math]20[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{-3}^{2}+(x) \mathrm{d} x[/math]
 [math]=5 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore 4 \cdot \int_{-3+4}^{2+4}+(x-4) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=4 \times 5=20[/math]


Explanation:

Question #200 (ID: 416007)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int(x-2)=x^{2}-2 x+8[/math] হলে [math]\int(-4)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]16[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x-2=-4 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(-4)=(-2)^{2}-2(-2)+8=16[/math]


Explanation:

Question #201 (ID: 416008)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sin x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \cos x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3} \tan x[/math]
E. [math]\text { blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { blank }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{1}{2}}=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} \cdot d x=\tan \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #202 (ID: 416009)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}} \sin \sqrt{x} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]O[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi}}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\mathrm{u}=\sqrt{\mathrm{x}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{du}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\mathrm{x}}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \mathrm{dx} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{u} . \mathrm{du}[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\pi} u \sin (u) \cdot d u[/math]
 [math]=\left[2(\sin u-u \cos u]_{0}^{\pi / 2}=2\right.[/math]


Explanation:

Question #203 (ID: 416010)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\tan x-x+C[/math]
B. [math]\cot x+x+C[/math]
C. [math]\cot x-x+C[/math]
D. [math]\tan x+x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]d x=\int\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \sec ^{2} x d x-\int[/math]
 [math]d x=\tan x-x+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #204 (ID: 416011)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]2 \pi[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{(1)^{2}-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)^{-1}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Question #205 (ID: 416012)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{e^{2 x}+1}=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}+1}\\\left[\right. \text{ let, } z=e^{x} \Rightarrow d z=e^{x} d x \mid\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1} z+c=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #206 (ID: 416013)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003, 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x+\sqrt{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}+\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}}=\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+1)}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sqrt{x}+1=z \Rightarrow d z=\frac{d x}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
সুতরাং [math]\int \frac{2 \mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}}=2 \ln \mathrm{z}+\mathrm{C}=2 \ln (\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+1)+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #207 (ID: 416014)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}} x \ln x d x[/math] dx এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}} \mathrm{x} \ln x \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\mathrm{x}^{2}}{2} \ln \mathrm{x}-\frac{1}{4} \mathrm{x}^{2}\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}}{2} \ln \sqrt{\mathrm{e}}-\frac{1}{4} \mathrm{e}-0[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}}{4} \ln \mathrm{e}-\frac{\mathrm{e}}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}}{4}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{\mathrm{e}}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #208 (ID: 416015)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{3}+1}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x^{3}+1}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x^{2}+1}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sqrt{\mathrm{x}^{3}+1}+\mathrm{C}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x^{3}-1}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2} d x}{\sqrt{x^{3}+1}}=\frac{2}{3} \int \frac{d\left(x^{3}+1\right)}{2 \sqrt{x^{3}+1}}=\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x^{3}+1}+C[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #209 (ID: 416016)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{1+x^{4}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}i[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
দেওয়া আছে, [math]y=x^{2} ; d y=2 x \cdot d x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{1+x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} \frac{d y}{1+y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left [\tan ^{-1} y\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #210 (ID: 416017)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (x+1)}{x+1} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]
C. [math]\alpha[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln 2} y \cdot d y=\frac{1}{2}\left[y^{2}\right]_{0}^{\ln 2}=\frac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #211 (ID: 416018)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \ln x d x= কত ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln (x)-\frac{1}{2} x^{2}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln (x)+\frac{1}{2} x^{2}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln (x)-\frac{1}{4} x^{2}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln (x)+\frac{1}{4} x^{2}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int x \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \int x d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left\{\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int x d x\right\}[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\ln x-\int \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\ln x-\frac{1}{2} \int x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\ln x-\frac{1}{2} \frac{x^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #212 (ID: 416019)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int f(x) d x=x+e^{2 x}[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]1+2 e^{2 x}[/math]
B. [math]1+e^{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]1+\frac{1}{2} e^{2 x}[/math]
D. [math]x^{2}+e^{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int f(x)[/math]
 [math]d x=x+e^{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(x+e^{2 x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=1+2 e^{2 x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #213 (ID: 416020)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x}{2}+\frac{y}{5}=1, x[/math] অক্ষরেখা ও [math]y[/math] অক্ষরেখা যারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{10}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2} a b=\frac{1}{2} \times 2 \times 5=5[/math]

Explanation:

Question #214 (ID: 415994)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} 0+\cos ^{4} 0} d \theta[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{z}=\tan \theta, \mathrm{dt}=\sec ^{2} \theta \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]

[Image]
[math]\text { Let, } z^{2}=x, 2 z d z=d x[/math]

[Image]
[math]\int_{/theta}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} 0+\cos ^{4} \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{2 \sin \theta \cos \theta}{\sin ^{4} \theta+\cos ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow2 \int \frac{z}{1+z^{4}} d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left.\tan ^{-1}(x)\right|_{0} ^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #215 (ID: 415993)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The figure given below shows triangle } A O C \text { inscribed in the region cut from the parabola } y=x^{2} \text { by the }[/math] [math]\text { line } y=a^{2} \text {. Find the limit of the ratio if the area of the triangle to the area of the parabolic region as a }[/math] [math]\text { approaches zero. }[/math]


[Image]


Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{-4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} ;[/math]
 [math]x=\sqrt{y}[/math]
 [math]2 \int_{0}^{a^{2}} d x=2 \int_{0}^{a^{2}} \sqrt{y} d y[/math]
 [math]=2\left[\frac{2}{3} y^{3 / 2}\right]_{0}^{a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3} a^{3}[/math]
 [math]\text { For triangle area }=[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{2} \times 2 \mathrm{a} \times \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{a}^{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ratio }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a^{3}}{\frac{4}{3} a^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #216 (ID: 415958)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=1[/math] এবং [math]y^{2}=1-x[/math] বক্ররেখা দুইটি দ্বারা সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]=2\left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{2}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]=2\left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]=2\left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]=- 2\left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}x^{2}+y^{2}=1\\\text{ (i) } \Rightarrow y=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\end{array}[/math]
এবং [math]y^{2}=-(x-1) \ldots \ldots . . \text { (ii) }[/math]

[Image]
(i) ও (ii) হতে পাই,[math]\begin{array}{l}x^{2}-(x-1)=1 \Rightarrow x^{2}-x+1=1 \\\Rightarrow x^{2}-x+1=1 \Rightarrow x^{2}-x=0 \\\Rightarrow x(x-1)=0 \quad \therefore x=0, x=1\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]A=2 \int_{0}^{1}\left(y_{1}-y_{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]A=2 \int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\sqrt{1-x^{2}} d x-\sqrt{1-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]=2\left[\frac{x \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}{2}+\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} x\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.-\frac{(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}}{\frac{3}{2} \times(-1)}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=2\left[0+\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} 1-0-0-\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} 0-\frac{2}{3}\right][/math]
 [math]=2\left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #218 (ID: 415960)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \mathrm{e}^{-1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{e}-1[/math]
C. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
D. [math]1-\frac{1}{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{x}=z \Rightarrow \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x=d z 2 \int_{0}^{1} e^{z} d z=2(e-1)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #219 (ID: 415961)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: """Begum Rokeya University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=2 x[/math] পরাবৃত্ত এবং এর উপকেন্দ্রিক লম্ব দ্বারা বেষ্টিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]1 / 3[/math]
খ. [math]2 / 3[/math]
গ. [math]4 / 3[/math]
ঘ. [math]8 / 3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=2 x \Rightarrow y=\sqrt{2} \cdot \sqrt{x}y^{2}[/math]
 [math]=2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\sqrt{2} \cdot \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=2 \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \sqrt{2} \cdot \sqrt{x} d x[/math]
 [math]=2 \cdot\left[\sqrt{2} \cdot \frac{x^{3 / 2}}{3 / 2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \cdot \frac{2 \sqrt{2}}{3}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{3 / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #220 (ID: 415962)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x} \sin x d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{2}(\sin x-\cos x)+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{2}(\sin x+\cos x)+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{2}(\cos x-\sin x)+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{2}(\sec x-\cos x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{e^{a x}}{a^{2}+b^{2}}(a \sin b x-b \cos b x)+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #221 (ID: 415963)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=x[/math] এবং [math]x=1[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{8}{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]2 \int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{x} d x=\frac{4}{3}\left[x^{\frac{3}{2}}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{4}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #222 (ID: 415964)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\infty} \frac{e^{-x}}{1+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান হবে ?

Options:
A. [math]\infty / \infty[/math]
B. [math]1 / 2[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\infty} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}}{1+\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}=-\int \frac{\mathrm{d}\left(1+\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}\right)}{1+\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\int\left[\ln \left(1+\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}\right)\right]_{0}^{\infty}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\ln \left(1+\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}\right)\right]_{0}^{\infty}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\ln \left(1+\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}\right)\right]_{0}^{\infty}[/math]
 [math]=-[\ln 1-\ln 2][/math]
 [math]=\ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #223 (ID: 415965)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]X=\int_{0}^{4} \sqrt{2 x+1} d x[/math] হলে [math]x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{26}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{26}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{26}[/math]
D. [math]26[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{4} \sqrt{2 x+1} d x=\left[\frac{1}{3}(2 x+1)^{\frac{3}{2}}\right]_{0}^{4}=\frac{26}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #224 (ID: 415966)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}} d x[/math] এর মান হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+C[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{1-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x-\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\sin ^{-1} x-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{2 x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} x+\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 2+c=\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #225 (ID: 415967)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d \theta}{1+3 \cos ^{2} \theta}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+3 \cos ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x d x}{\sec ^{2} x+3}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d(\tan x)}{1+\tan ^{2} x+3}=\int[/math]
 [math]\frac{d(\tan x)}{2^{2}+(\tan x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan x}{2}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #226 (ID: 415968)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2-x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{2-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2-x}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-2 \sqrt{2-x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2-x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{2-x}}=\int \frac{2 \mathrm{dx}}{2 \sqrt{2-x}}=\frac{2 \sqrt{2-x}}{-1}=-2 \sqrt{2-x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #227 (ID: 415969)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2 x+c[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{x}+c[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2 x}+c[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} d x=\int x^{-\frac{1}{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{\frac{1}{2}}}{\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #228 (ID: 415970)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x^{4}(1-x)^{5} d x= কত ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1260}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{280}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{315}[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x^{4}(1-x)^{5}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{1} x^{4}[/math]
 [math]\left(1-5 x+10 x^{2}-10 x^{3}+5 x^{4}-x^{5}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(x^{4}-5 x^{5}+10 x^{6}-10 x^{7}+5 x^{8}-x^{6}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\frac{1}{5} x^{5}-\frac{5}{6} x^{6}+\frac{10}{7} x^{7}-\frac{10}{8} x^{8}+\frac{5}{9} x^{9}-\frac{1}{7} x^{7}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5}-\frac{5}{6}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{10}{7}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{10}{8}+\frac{5}{9}-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1260}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #229 (ID: 415971)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int a^{x} d x[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{\log a}[/math]
খ. [math]\log a+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{a^{x}}{\log a}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{a^{x}}{\log a}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)=\mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{x}} \ln \mathrm{a}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int a^{x} \ln a d x=a^{x}+[/math]
 ধ্রুবক[math]\therefore \int \mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{\mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{x}}}{\ln \mathrm{a}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #230 (ID: 415972)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos ^{3} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{12} \sin 3 x+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{12} \sin 3 x+\sin x+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{12} \sin 3 x+9 \sin x+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{12}(\sin 3 x+9 \sin x)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \cos ^{3} x d x=\frac{1}{4} \int \cos ^{2} x d x=\frac{1}{4} \int(\cos 3 x+3 \cos x) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{1}{3} \sin 3 x+3 \sin x\right)+C=\frac{1}{12}(\sin 3 x+9 \sin x)+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #231 (ID: 415973)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left[f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right] d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} f(x)[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} f(x)[/math]
C. [math]x e^{x} f(x)[/math]
D. [math]f^{\prime}(x)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left[f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right][/math]
 [math]d x=e^{x} f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #232 (ID: 415974)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{d x}{1+\tan x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sec x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{d x}{1+\tan x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{\cos x}{\sin x+\cos x}[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(\sin x+\cos x)+(\cos x-\sin x)}{\sin x+\cos x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math][x+\ln |\sin x+\cos x|]_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{\pi}{2}+0-0-0\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #233 (ID: 415975)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d \theta}{1+3 \cos ^{2} \theta}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d \theta}{1+3 \cos ^{2} \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} \theta d \theta}{\sec ^{2} \theta+3}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} \theta d \theta}{\tan ^{2} \theta+4}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d(\tan \theta)}{\tan ^{2} \theta+2^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #234 (ID: 415976)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sin x+c[/math]
B. [math]\cos x+c[/math]
C. [math]x+c[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{sin ^{2} x+\cos ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sin x+\cos x}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int d x=x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #235 (ID: 415977)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1}{1+\cos x} d x= কত ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x=\left[\tan \frac{x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}=1-0=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #236 (ID: 415978)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x>a>0[/math] হয় তবে [math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-a^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{x+a}{x-a}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{x-a}{x+a}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{2+x}{a-x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{a-x}{a+x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { i. } \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{a}^{2}+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\mathrm{a}} \tan ^{-1} \frac{\mathrm{x}}{\mathrm{a}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]\text { ii. } \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+c[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{a}^{2}-\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \mathrm{a}} \ln \left|\frac{\mathrm{a}+\mathrm{x}}{\mathrm{a}-\mathrm{x}}\right|+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]\text { iv. } \int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \left|\frac{x-a}{x+a}\right|+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #238 (ID: 415980)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{4} f(x) d x=6[/math] হলে [math]\int_{1}^{5} f(x+1) d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x+1=t[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow t-1=x \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore t=5[/math]
 হলে [math]x=4 ; t=1[/math]
 হলে [math]x=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]\int_{1}^{5} f(t)[/math]
 [math]d t=\int_{0}^{4}[/math]
 [math]f(x) d x=6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #239 (ID: 415981)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি , [math]x>a>0[/math] তবে [math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-a^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{x+a}{x-a}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{x-a}{x+a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{a+x}{a-x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{a-x}{a+x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { i. } \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{a}^{2}+\mathrm{x}^{2}}=\frac{1}{\mathrm{a}} \tan ^{-1} \frac{\mathrm{x}}{\mathrm{a}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]\text { ii. } \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}}=\sin ^{-1} \frac{\mathrm{x}}{\mathrm{a}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \int \frac{d x}{a^{2}-x^{2}}=\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \left|\frac{a+x}{a-x}\right|+c[/math]
 [math]\text { iv. } \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}-\mathrm{a}^{2}}=\frac{1}{2 \mathrm{a}} \ln \left|\frac{\mathrm{x}-\mathrm{a}}{\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{a}}\right|+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #240 (ID: 415982)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{4} f(x) d x=6[/math] হলে [math]\int_{1}^{5} f(x+1) d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x+1=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|c|c|c|}\hline x & 0 & 3 \\\hline 2 & 1 & 4 \\\hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{4} f(x) d x=6[/math]
এখানে, [math]\int_{1}^{3} f(x+1) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{4} f(z) d z[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{4} f(x) d x=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

C. [math]\frac{1}{a^{2}-x^{2}}[/math]

Question #242 (ID: 415984)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{3} \theta d \theta[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}z=\sin \theta \\d z=\cos \theta d \theta\\\begin{array}{lll}\theta & 0 & \frac{\pi}{2}\end{array}\\\begin{array}{lll}2 & 0 & 1\end{array}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{2} \theta \cos \theta d \theta=\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}\left(1-\sin ^{2} \theta\right) \cos \theta d \theta[/math]


Explanation:

Question #243 (ID: 415985)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}}{\sqrt{1+x}} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}+1[/math]
B. [math]\pi[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}}{\sqrt{1+x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}+\frac{1}{2} \frac{(-2 x)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}+\frac{1}{2} \frac{d\left(1-x^{2}\right)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}+0-0-1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #244 (ID: 415986)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে নিচের কোন যোগজের উত্তর [math]x - Inx² + C?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1-2 x}{x^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x-2}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1-\frac{2}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় উত্তর [math]=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\mathrm{x}-\ln \mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{C}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(x-2 \ln x+c)=1-\frac{2}{x}=\frac{x-2}{x}[/math]
 [math]\because[/math]
 যোগজ অন্তরীকরণের বিপরীত প্রক্রিয়া।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #245 (ID: 415987)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2} x+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan x-x+C[/math]
C. [math]\sec x+C[/math]
D. [math]x-\tan ^{2} x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=\int\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right) d x=\tan x-x+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #246 (ID: 415988)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+e^{x}}[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\log _{10} e^{x}+C[/math]
B. [math]\log _{10}\left(1+e^{x}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]e^{x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+e^{x}}=\int \frac{d\left(1+e^{x}\right)}{1+e^{x}}=\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #247 (ID: 415989)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2013-2014, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \ln x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x+\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int x \ln x d x=\ln x \int x[/math]
 [math]d x-\int\left\{\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int x d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\int \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2} d x=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{2} \frac{x^{2}}{2}+C[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}[/math]
 [math]+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #248 (ID: 415990)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{a}[/math] [math]\sqrt{\left(a^{2}-x^{2}\right)} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi a^{2}}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{A}^{2}}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{7}[/math]
E. [math]3 \pi a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{a}[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{\left(a^{2}-x^{2}\right)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}}{2}+\frac{a^{2}}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}\right]_{0}^{a}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[0-0+\frac{a^{2}}{2} \sin ^{-1} 1-0\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2} \times \frac{a^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi a^{2}}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #249 (ID: 415991)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{x}(1+\ln x) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]x^{2 x}+c[/math]
C. [math]x^{2 x} \ln x+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1+\ln x}{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { Let } x^{x}=z ; x \ln x=\ln z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(1+\ln x) d x=\frac{d z}{z}[/math]
 [math]\text { Now } \int x^{x}(1+\ln x) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int z \frac{d z}{z}=\int d z[/math]
 [math]=z+c=x^{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #250 (ID: 415992)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x+\sqrt{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x}+1)+c[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+c[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x}+1)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } 1+\sqrt{x}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} d x=2 d z[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \int x^{x}(1+\ln x) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int z \frac{d z}{z}=\int d z[/math]
 [math]=z+c=x^{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #251 (ID: 415952)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Find the area of the region enclosed by the graphs } y=x-1 \text { and } x=3-y^{2} \text {. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{11}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{9}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x-1 ; x=3-y^{2}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\therefore \text { Area, } \Lambda=\int_{-2}^{1}\left[\left(3-y^{2}\right)-(y+1)\right] d y=\frac{9}{2} \text { sq. unit. }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #252 (ID: 415953)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Find the integration of the following- } \int e^{x}\left(\frac{1+\sin x}{1+\cos x}\right) d x \text {. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{2 x} \cdot \cos x+c[/math]
B. [math]2 e^{x} \cdot \sin x+c[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \cdot \tan \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}} \cdot \cot \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1+\sin x}{1+\cos x}\right) d x=\int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1+\sin x}{2 \cos ^{\frac{2}{2}}}\right) d[/math]
 [math]x=\int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}+\tan \frac{x}{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int\left[e^{x} \cdot \tan \frac{x}{2}+e^{x} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)\right] d x[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} \tan \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \int e^{x}\left(f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right) d x=e^{x} f(x)+c\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #253 (ID: 415954)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{e^{a x}+e^{-a x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1}\left(e^{a x}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{a} \cot ^{-1}\left(e^{a x}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{a} \cot ^{-1}\left(1+e^{a x}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1}\left(1+e^{a x}\right)+c[/math]
E. [math]\ln \left(e^{a x}+e^{-a x}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Hints: লব ও হরকে [math]e^{a x}[/math]
 দিয়ে গুণ করে নিয়ে এরপর Integration করতে হবে[math]\\ \ \ \\[/math]
Solve: [math]\int \frac{1}{e^{a x}+e^{-a x}} d x=\int \frac{e^{a x}}{\left(e^{a x}\right)^{2}+1} d x[/math]
 [লব ও হরকে [math]e^{a x}[/math]
 দ্বারা গুণ করে ][math]=\int \frac{e^{a x}}{1^{2}+\left(e^{a x}\right)^{2}}=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \frac{e^{a x}}{1}+c[/math]
 [ সূত্র [math]\left.\int \frac{1}{a^{2}+x^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+\mathrm{c}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{ax}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:
চাইলে [math]\int \frac{e^{a x}}{1+\left(e^{a x}\right)^{2}} d x[/math]
 এর পর [math]e^{i x}=z[/math]
 ধরা যেতো।[math]=\frac{1}{a} \int \frac{d z}{1+z^{2}}[/math]
 [ধরি, [math]\left.\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{ax}}=\mathrm{z} \Rightarrow \mathrm{a} \mathrm{e} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{ax}} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz} \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{ax}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{1}{a} \mathrm{dz}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{z}+\mathrm{c}=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{a} x}+\mathrm{c}\left[\mathrm{z}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{ax}}\right.[/math]
 বসিয়ে][math]\ \ \\[/math]
By Claculator: a ও x এর যে কোনো মান ধরে নিয়ে প্রত্যেকটি অপশনকে ক্যালকুলেটরের সাহায্যে অন্তরীকরণ করলে দেখা যাবে (A) অপশনটির অন্তরকের মান প্রদত্ত Integrand অর্থাৎ [math]\frac{1}{e^{a x}+e^{-a x}}[/math]
 এর মানের সমান ।যেহেতু যোগজীকরণের ঠিক বিপরীত প্রক্রিয়া হচ্ছে অন্তরীকরণ, অই অনির্দিষ্ট যোগজগুলোর ক্ষেত্রে উল্টো প্রক্রিয়ায় অর্থাৎ যে Option কে অন্তরীকরণ করলে প্রশ্নের মূল রাশিটি পাওয়া যায়, সেটিই ঐ প্রশ্নটির যোগজ ।

Question #254 (ID: 415955)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)}[/math] যোগজীকরণ এর সমাধান নির্ণয় কর-

Options:
ক. [math]1.097[/math]
খ. [math]1.096[/math]
গ. [math]1.095[/math]
ঘ. [math]1.098[/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let } 1+\ln x=7 \Rightarrow \frac{1}{x} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{2} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)}=\int_{1}^{1+\ln 2} \frac{d z}{z}=[\ln z]_{1}^{1+\ln 2}=0.5265[/math]


Explanation:

Solution:

Question:
[math]\int_{-\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos 2 x}{2}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{-\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin x d x=[-\cos x]_{-\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}=0[/math]

Question #257 (ID: 415951)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1 / 2}^{1} \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{4 x^{2}-1}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{1 / 2}^{1} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{x \sqrt{4 x^{2}-1}} ; \text { Let, } x=\frac{1}{z} \Rightarrow d x=-\frac{1}{z^{2}} \cdot d z[/math]

[Image]
[math]\Rightarrow\int_{2}^{1} \frac{-\frac{1}{z^{2}} \cdot d z}{\frac{1}{z} \sqrt{\frac{4}{z^{2}}-1}}=\int_{2}^{1} \frac{-\mathrm{dz}}{\sqrt{4-z^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{1}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{z}^{2}-\mathrm{z}^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1} \mathrm{z} / 2\right]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1} 1-\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{2}=\frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
 [math]\text { [Warning: Carnot be solved by directly using calculator] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\pi}(1+\sin x)^{2} \cos x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{7}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]1+\sin x=z \therefore \cos x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\int_{2}^{1} z^{2} d z=\frac{1}{3}\left[z^{3}\right]_{2}^{1}=\frac{1}{3}-\frac{8}{3}=-\frac{7}{3}[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:

Question #260 (ID: 415936)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান হবে ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5 \pi}{2}[/math]
E. [math]\text { no correct answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { no correct answer }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d(x-1)}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} 0-\sin ^{-1}(-1)[/math]
 [math]=0-\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #261 (ID: 415937)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} e^{(1-2 x)} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e-1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e-1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{e}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \mathrm{e}^{1-2 x} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \mathrm{e}^{1-2 \mathrm{x}} \mathrm{d}(1-2 \mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\mathrm{e}^{1-2 \mathrm{x}}\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\mathrm{e}^{0}-\mathrm{e}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}-1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #262 (ID: 415938)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{x}}{1+x}[(1+x) \ln (1+x)+1] d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]e[/math]
D. [math]\ln 2[/math]
E. [math]e \ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]e \ln 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Hints: } \int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})\right\} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]\text { Solve: } \int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{c}}}{1+\mathrm{x}}[(1+\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]\ln (1+\mathrm{x})+1] \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\ln (1+\mathrm{x})+\frac{1}{1+\mathrm{x}}\right][/math]
 [math]\mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \ln (1+\mathrm{x})\right][/math]
 [math]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{1} \ln (1+1)[/math]
 [math]-\mathrm{e}^{0} \ln (1+0)[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e} \ln 2-\ln 1\\=\mathrm{e} \ln 2-0\\=\mathrm{e} \ln 2[/math]


Explanation:
যদিও এই অঙ্কটি অন্য আরেকটি Method-এ করা যায় তবে এখানে যে সূত্রের সাহায্যে Solve করা হয়েছে, সেভাবে করাই উত্তম। সূত্রটি হচ্ছে [math]\int e^{x}\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
অর্থাৎ, [math]e^{x}[/math]
 এর সাথে গুণাকারে যদি কোনো ফাংশন এবং ঠিক এর পরে ঐ ফাংশনটির অন্তরক থাকে তবে [math]e^{x}[/math]
 সহ সম্পূর্ণ ফাংশনটির যোগজ হবে [math]e^{x} f(x)[/math]
।By Calculator: সরাসরি Calculator এর মাধ্যমেও অংকটি খুব সহজে করা যায়। ক্যালকুলেটরে Integration বাটনটি চেপে হুবহু ফাংশনটি তুলে lower limit ও upper limit এর মান বসিয়ে সমান চাপলে Answer আসবে 1.88416 যা eln2 এর সমান ।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #263 (ID: 415939)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{2x}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)-\mathrm{c}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]
D. [math]\log \left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]I=\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+\frac{1}{e^{x}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{e^{2 x}+1}[/math]
ধরি , [math]\mathrm{e}^{x}=\mathrm{z} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{I}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{1+\mathrm{z}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} z+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #264 (ID: 415940)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{\frac{2}{3}} \ln x[/math] x বক্ররেখার প্রথম চতুর্থাংশে [math]x = 8[/math] রেখার সাথে আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\infty[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]-\infty[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{9}{25}(160 \ln 2-31)[/math]
ঙ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Hints: x = 1 ( Lower Limit) থেকে x = 8 (Upper Limit) পর্যন্ত y [math]=x^{2 / 3} \ln x[/math]
 কে যোগজ করলেই আবদ্ধ অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল পাওয়া যাবে।[math]\text{Solve: Arca }[/math]
 [math]=\int_{1}^{8} y[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{1}^{8} x^{2 / 3} \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]\text{Here, } \int \ln x x^{\frac{2}{3}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \int \mathrm{x}^{\frac{2}{5}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]-\int\left\{\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\ln \mathrm{x}) \int \mathrm{x}^{\frac{2}{3}} \mathrm{dx}\right\} \mathrm{d} x[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \cdot \frac{x^{\frac{5}{3}}}{\frac{5}{3}}[/math]
 [math]-\int\left(\frac{1}{x} \cdot \frac{x^{\frac{5}{3}}}{\frac{5}{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{3}{5} \ln x \cdot x^{\frac{5}{3}}-\frac{3}{5} \int x^{\frac{2}{3}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{5} x^{\frac{5}{3}} \ln x-\frac{3}{5} \frac{x^{\frac{5}{3}}}{\frac{5}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{5}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{3}{5} \times x^{\frac{5}{3}}\left(\frac{5}{3} \ln x-1\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Area }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{25}[/math]
 [math]\left[x^{\frac{5}{3}}\left(\frac{5}{3} \ln x-1\right)\right]_{1}^{8}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{25}\left[8^{\frac{5}{5}}\left(\frac{5}{3} \ln 8-1\right)-1^{\frac{5}{3}}\left(\frac{5}{3} \ln 1-1\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{25}\left[32\left(\frac{5}{3} \ln 2^{3}-1\right)+1\right]=\frac{9}{25}[160 \ln 2-32+1][/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{25}(160 \ln 2-31)[/math]
$\text{Ans. (D)}

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #265 (ID: 415941)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2-x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{2-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2-x}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-2 \sqrt{2-x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2-x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{2-x}}=\int \frac{2 \mathrm{dx}}{2 \sqrt{2-x}}=\frac{2 \sqrt{2-x}}{-1}=-2 \sqrt{2-x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #266 (ID: 415942)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]tanx + C[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x d(\tan x)=\frac{\tan ^{\frac{1}{2}} x}{\frac{1}{2}}+C=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #267 (ID: 415943)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\log \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\log \left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]e^{-x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=\log \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #268 (ID: 415944)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{3}+1}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x^{3}+1}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x^{2}+1}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sqrt{\mathrm{x}^{3}+1}+\mathrm{C}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x^{3}-1}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2} d x}{\sqrt{x^{3}+1}}=\frac{2}{3} \int \frac{d\left(x^{3}+1\right)}{2 \sqrt{x^{3}+1}}=\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x^{3}+1}+C[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #269 (ID: 415945)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x d x}{\sqrt{4-\cos ^{2} x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-2 \cos ^{-1} x+C[/math]
B. [math]-\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{\cos x}{2}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]-2 \sin ^{-1} x+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{2}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x d x}{\sqrt{4-\cos ^{2} x}}[/math]
 [math]=-\int \frac{d(\cos x)}{\sqrt{2^{2}-(\cos x)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{\cos x}{2}\right)+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #270 (ID: 415946)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x d x}{\sqrt{\sin x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{\sin x}}{2}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sqrt{\cos x}}{2}+C[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\cos x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x d x}{\sqrt{\sin x}}=2 \int \frac{d(\sin x)}{2 \sqrt{\sin x}}=2 \cdot \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #271 (ID: 415947)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\sin x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sec x+\tan x+C[/math]
B. [math]tanx secx + C[/math]
C. [math]tanx + secx + C[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{(1-\sin x) d x}{1-\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{(1-\sin x) d x}{\cos ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]= \int\left(\sec ^{2} x-\tan x \sec x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\tan x-\sec x+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #272 (ID: 415948)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{2}}+C[/math]
B. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2-x^{2}}}=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{(\sqrt{2})^{2}-x^{2}}}=\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{2}}+C[/math]

Explanation:
