Question #273 (ID: 415949)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(-2 x^{2}+4 x+1\right)}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \sin ^{-1}\left\{\sqrt{\frac{2}{3}}(x-1)\right\}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1} x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \sin ^{-1}(x+1)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{6} \cos ^{-1}(x+1)[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \cos ^{-1}(x-1)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(-2 x^{2}+4 x+1\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{-\left(x^{2}-2 x+\frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{2}-1\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)^{2}-(x-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \sin ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{x-1}{\sqrt{\frac{3}{2}}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \sin ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\sqrt{\frac{2}{3}}(x-1)\right\}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #274 (ID: 415950)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1} \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+2 e^{x}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\ln (1+e)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{1+2 e}{1+2 e^{-1}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln (1+2 \mathrm{e})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} \ln (1-2 \mathrm{e})[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln (1+3 e)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]1+2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{z} \therefore 2 \mathrm{e}^{x} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz} \therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}=-1, \mathrm{z}=1+\mathrm{e}^{-1}[/math]
 [math]x=1, z=1+2 e[/math]
 [math]\int_{1+2 \mathrm{c}^{-1}}^{1+2 \mathrm{e}} \cdot \frac{1}{z} \cdot \frac{d z}{2}[\ln z]_{1+2 e^{-1}}^{1+2 \mathrm{c}}=\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{1+2 \mathrm{e}}{1+2 \mathrm{e}^{-1}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #275 (ID: 415878)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{6}} \sin 3 x \cos 3 x d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{6}} \sin 3 x \cos 3 x d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{6}} \sin 6 x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}\left[\frac{\cos 6 x}{6}\right]^{\frac{\pi}{6}}_{0}\\=-\frac{1}{12}[\cos \pi-\cos 0]\\=-\frac{1}{12}[-1-1]=\frac{1}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #276 (ID: 415879)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\int_{-5}^{4} f(x) d x=10[/math] হয় তবে [math]\int_{1}^{10} 6 f(x-6) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. 36
B. 80
C. 50
D. 60


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x-6=z \Rightarrow d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|c|c|c|}\hline \mathrm{x} & 1 & 10 \\\hline \mathrm{z} & -5 & 4 \\\hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int_{-5}^{4} 6 f(z) d z=6 \int_{-5}^{4} f(z) d z=6 \times 10=60[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #277 (ID: 415880)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-2}^{2}|x| d x=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. 2
B. 4
C. 1
D. 0


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{-2}^{2}|x| d x=\left[\frac{x|x|}{2}\right]_{-2}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2|2|}{2}-\frac{(-2)|-2|}{2}\\=\frac{2 \times 2}{2}-\frac{(-2) \times(2)}{2}\\=2+2\\= 4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #278 (ID: 415881)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x, x-1=0[/math] এবং [math]x-4=0[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{28}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3}{14}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{28}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{14}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x-1=0 \Rightarrow x=1[/math]
 এবং [math]x-4=0 \Rightarrow x=4[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{1}^{4} \sqrt{4 x} d x=2 \int_{1}^{4} \sqrt{x} d x=\left[\frac{4}{3} x^{\frac{3}{2}}\right]_{1}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3} 4^{\frac{3}{3}}-\frac{4}{3} 1^{\frac{3}{3}}=\frac{4}{2}(8-1)=\frac{28}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #279 (ID: 415882)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{5x} + e^{3x}}{e^{x} + e^{-x}} , dx[/math] এর মান হলো:

Options:
A. [math]e^{2x} + 5 + C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{4x} + C[/math]
C. [math]e^{3x} + C[/math]
D. [math]e^{4x} + 5 + C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
গুণন ও ভাগের সূত্র প্রয়োগ করলে পাই, [math]\frac{e^{5x} + e^{3x}}{e^{x} + e^{-x}} = \frac{e^{3x}(e^{2x} + 1)}{e^{x} + e^{-x}} = \frac{e^{3x}(e^{2x} + 1)}{e^{x} + e^{-x}}[/math]
। এই ধরনের বিভাজ্য ও বিভাজকের গঠন থেকে ধারণা করা যায় এটি একটি সরল রূপে পরিণত হবে যা [math]e^{4x}[/math]
 এর আকার ধারণ করে। সঠিক উত্তর হলো [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{4x} + C[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #280 (ID: 415883)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_0^{\pi} \cos^5 x \sin x , dx[/math] এর মান

Options:
A. ১
B. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
সমাধানে [math]u = \cos x \Rightarrow du = -\sin x dx[/math]
 নিয়ে ইন্টিগ্রেশন করলে [math]\int u^5 (-du) = -\frac{u^6}{6} = -\frac{\cos^6 x}{6}[/math]
 এবং সীমানা বসালে উত্তর [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
 পাওয়া যায়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #281 (ID: 415884)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
পুকুরে 1 বর্গফুট জায়গা জুড়ে কচুরীপানা আছে। প্রবৃদ্ধির হার প্রতিদিন 10 হলে চার দিন পর কচুরীপানা কত বর্গফুট জায়গা দখল করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]1.21[/math]
খ. [math]1.46[/math]
গ. [math]1.58[/math]
ঘ. [math]1.62[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
চারদিন পর কচুরিপানার বৃদ্ধি = [math]=1(1+.1)^{4}=1.46[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #282 (ID: 415885)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-\pi}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}} \cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\mathrm{x}}{\sqrt{\pi}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}} \sec ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{\sqrt{\pi}}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}} \sec \sqrt{\pi}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}} \sec ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]
E. [math]\sec ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{\sqrt{\pi}}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-\pi}}=\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-(\sqrt{\pi})^{2}}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}} \sec ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{\pi}}+c[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #283 (ID: 415886)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x = 1[/math] এর জন্য [math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{1+x^{6}} d x[/math] এর মান [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math] ও মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]
E. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{1+x^{6}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{3} \int \frac{d\left(x^{3}\right)}{1+\left(x^{3}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1} x^{3}+C[/math]
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\frac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1} x^{3}+C[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1} 1+C[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]
 [math][\because x=1][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3} \times \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{C}=\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{C}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #284 (ID: 415887)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d \theta}{1+3 \cos ^{2} \theta}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \theta}{2}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+3 \cos ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x d x}{\sec ^{2} x+3}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d(\tan x)}{1+\tan ^{2} x+3}=\int[/math]
 [math]\frac{d(\tan x)}{2^{2}+(\tan x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan x}{2}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #285 (ID: 415888)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int(\ln x)^{2} \mathrm{~d} x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]x(\ln x)^{2}+2 x \ln x+2 x+c[/math]
B. [math]x(\ln x)^{2}+2 x \ln x-2 x+c[/math]
C. [math]x(\ln x)^{2}-2 x \ln x-2 x+c[/math]
D. [math]x(\ln x)^{2}-2 x \ln x+2 x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int(\ln x)^{2}[/math]
 [math]d x=(\ln x)^{2} \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)^{2} \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x(\ln x)^{2}-\int\left(2 \ln x \cdot \frac{1}{x} \cdot x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=x(\ln x)^{2}-2 \int \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]=x(\ln x)^{2}-2[/math]
 [math]\left[\ln x \int d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int d x\right) d x\right][/math]
 [math]=x(\ln x)^{2}-2[x \ln x-x][/math]
 [math]+c=x(\ln x)^{2}-2 x \ln x+2 x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #286 (ID: 415889)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}(\cos x+\sin x) d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \cos \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
B. [math]-\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \cos \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{x} \sin \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
D. [math]-e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x}(\cos x+\sin x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x) d x=e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #287 (ID: 415890)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}=\mathrm{m} \pi[/math] হলে m এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{m} \pi[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\sin ^{-1} \mathrm{x}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{m} \pi[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin ^{-1} 1-\sin ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{m} \pi[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}-0=\mathrm{m} \pi[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{m} \pi[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2} \therefore \mathrm{m}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #288 (ID: 415891)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{\sqrt{2}}^{2} \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
E. [math]-\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{\sqrt{2}}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x} \sqrt{\mathrm{x}^{2}-1}}=\left[\mathrm{sec}^{-1} \mathrm{x}\right]_{\sqrt{2}}^{2}=\sec ^{-1} 2-\sec ^{-1} \sqrt{2} \\=\frac{\pi}{3}-\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{12}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #289 (ID: 415892)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{15} \frac{x+2}{(x+1)(x+3)} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]In6[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{15} \frac{x+2}{(x+1)(x+3)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{1}^{15}\left(\frac{1}{x+1}+\frac{1}{x+3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[\ln (x+1)+\ln (x+3)]_{1}^{15}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[\ln (x+1)(x+3)]_{1}^{15}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[\ln (16 \times 18)[/math]
 [math]-\ln (2 \times 4)]=[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{16 \times 18}{2 \times 4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln 36[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \times 2 \ln 6[/math]
 [math]=\ln 6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #290 (ID: 415893)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\log \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\log \left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]e^{-x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=\log \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #291 (ID: 415894)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-x+1}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 \mathrm{x}-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)+\mathrm{C}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}} \tan ^{-1} 1\left(\frac{2 x-1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)+C[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x-1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)+C[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}-\mathrm{x}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}-2 \mathrm{x} \cdot \frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{4}+1-\frac{1}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\left(x-\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x-\frac{1}{2}}{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}\right)+C[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #292 (ID: 415895)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{4} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2\left(e^{2}-1\right)[/math]
B. [math]e^{2}-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{2}-1\right)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}(e-1)^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{c}\int_{0}^{4} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}=\int_{0}^{4} \mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{d}(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}})=\left[\mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}}\right]_{0}^{4} \\=\mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{4}}-\mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{0}}=\mathrm{e}^{2}-\mathrm{e}^{0}=\mathrm{e}^{2}-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #293 (ID: 415896)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-4 x+13}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
D. $ \frac{1}{2}(e-1)^{2} $


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-4 x+13}=\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{(x-2)^{2}+3^{2}} \\=\frac{1}{3}\left[\tan ^{-1} \frac{x-2}{3}\right]_{2}^{5}=\frac{\pi}{12}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #294 (ID: 415897)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{1-\sin \mathrm{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3}+1[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{3}+2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}+1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}+2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}} \frac{d x}{1-\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}} \frac{(1+\sin x) d x}{1-\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} x}+\frac{\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\sec ^{2} x+\sec x \tan x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=[\tan x+\sec x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \frac{\pi}{3}+\sec ^{\frac{\pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]-\tan 0-\sec 0[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}+2-0-1[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}+1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #295 (ID: 415898)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\cos 2 \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} d \theta=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}-2[/math]
D. [math]2-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\cos 2 \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{2 \cos ^{2} \theta-1}{\cos ^{2} \theta} \mathrm{d} \theta \\=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(2-\sec ^{2} \theta\right) \mathrm{d} \theta=[2 \theta-\tan \theta]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}=\frac{\pi}{2}-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #296 (ID: 415899)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\sin x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]2+\sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]2-\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}-2[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{2}+1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\sin x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{(1-\sin x) d x}{1-\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\sec ^{2} x-\sec x \tan x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=[\tan x-\sec x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\sec \frac{\pi}{4}-\tan 0+\sec 0[/math]
 [math]=1-\sqrt{2}+1[/math]
 [math]=2-\sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #297 (ID: 415900)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{1+\cot x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 \pi[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]I=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{d x}{1+\cot x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{d x}{1+\frac{\cos x}{\sin x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin x d x}{\sin x+\cos x} \ldots \ldots[/math]
আবার, [math]I=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right) d x}{\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)+\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cos x d x}{\cos x+\sin x} \ldots[/math]
 [math](\mathrm{i})+(\mathrm{ii})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{I}+\mathrm{I}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\frac{(\sin \mathrm{x}+\cos \mathrm{x}) \mathrm{dx}}{\sin \mathrm{x}+\cos \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{I}[\mathrm{x}]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{I}=\frac{\pi}{2}-0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2\mathrm{I}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{I}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #298 (ID: 415901)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}} x \ln x d x[/math] dx এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}} \mathrm{x} \ln x \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\mathrm{x}^{2}}{2} \ln \mathrm{x}-\frac{1}{4} \mathrm{x}^{2}\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}}{2} \ln \sqrt{\mathrm{e}}-\frac{1}{4} \mathrm{e}-0[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}}{4} \ln \mathrm{e}-\frac{\mathrm{e}}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}}{4}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{\mathrm{e}}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #299 (ID: 415902)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x+1| d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}[/math]
 [math]|x+1| d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{-1}^{0}|x+1|[/math]
 [math]d x+\int_{0}^{1}|x+1|[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{-1}^{0}-(x+1) d x+\int_{0}^{1}(x+1) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[-\left(\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x\right)\right]_{-1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=0+\left(\frac{1}{2}-1\right)[/math]
 [math]+\left(\frac{1}{2}+1\right)-0[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}+\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #300 (ID: 415903)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}[/math] এবং [math]y=2 x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ এলাকার ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4}{3} \text { unit }^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3}{4} \text { unit }^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]4 \text { unit }^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \text { unit }^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]2 x=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(x-2)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0,2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{2}\left(2 x-x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{2 x^{2}}{2}-\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=4-\frac{8}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\text { unit }^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #301 (ID: 415904)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] পরাবৃত্ত এবং [math]x=2 y[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{56}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{64}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{64}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{8 \mathrm{a}^{2}}{3 \mathrm{~m}^{3}}=\frac{8 \times 1^{2}}{3 \times\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{3}}=\frac{64}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #302 (ID: 415905)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{\sqrt{x}}+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{\sqrt{x}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{\sqrt{x}}+C[/math]
D. [math]e^{\frac{\sqrt{x}}{2}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x=2 \int e^{\sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x=2 e^{\sqrt{x}}+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #303 (ID: 415906)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](- 1, 1)[/math] বিন্দুগামী একটি বক্ররেখার ঢালের সমীকরণ [math]y=\sqrt[3]{x}-1[/math] বক্ররেখাটির সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y=\frac{1}{3} x^{-\frac{2}{3}}+\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]y=\frac{3}{4} x^{\frac{4}{3}}-x-\frac{3}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]y=\frac{2}{3} x^{\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=\frac{4}{3} x^{\frac{4}{3}}-x+\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt[3]{x}-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=x^{\frac{1}{3}}-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d y[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{\frac{1}{3}}-1\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int d y[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(x^{\frac{1}{3}}-1\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{x^{\frac{4}{3}}}{\frac{4}{3}}-x+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{4} x^{\frac{4}{3}}-x+C[/math]
ইহা [math](-1, 1)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী [math]\therefore 1=\frac{3}{4}+1+C[/math]
 [math]\therefore C=-\frac{3}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বক্ররেখাটি [math]y=\frac{3}{4} x^{\frac{4}{3}}[/math]
 [math]-x-\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #304 (ID: 415907)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)^{2}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\ln (1+\ln x)+C[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{1+\ln x}+C[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{\ln |x|}+C[/math]
D. [math]x+\ln x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1}{x(1+\ln x)^{2}} d x=\int \frac{1}{(1+\ln x)^{2}} \frac{1}{x} d x[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{1+\ln x}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #305 (ID: 415908)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x+e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{e}^{x}}+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}+e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}+C[/math]
D. [math]e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x+e^{x}} d x=\int e^{x} \cdot e^{e^{x}} d x=\int e^{e^{x}} d\left(e^{x}\right)=e^{e^{x}}+C[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #306 (ID: 415909)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{x^{2}} \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]cosx + C[/math]
B. [math]\cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]sinx + C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{1}{x^{2}} \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) d x=\int \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) \cdot \frac{1}{x^{2}} d x \\=-\int \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) \cdot d\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)=\cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #307 (ID: 415910)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}} d x=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1} x^{2}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} x^{2}+C[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1} x^{2}+C[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{2 x}{\sqrt{1-\left(x^{2}\right)^{2}}} d x=\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} x^{2}+C[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #308 (ID: 415911)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2015-2016, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]d\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)=[/math]
 [math]\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #309 (ID: 415912)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}(1+x)}{x e^{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x e^{x}+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}(1+x)+C[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|e^{x}(1+x)\right|+C[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left|x e^{x}\right|+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}(1+\mathrm{x})}{\mathrm{x} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}=\int \frac{\mathrm{d}\left(\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)}{\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}}}=\ln \left|\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}}\right|+\mathrm{C}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #310 (ID: 415913)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{e^{a x}+e^{-a x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{a} \cot ^{-1}\left(e^{a x}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1}\left(e^{a x}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1}\left(1+e^{a x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{a} \cot ^{-1}\left(1+e^{a x}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1}{e^{a x}+e^{-a x}} d x=\int \frac{e^{a x}}{1+\left(e^{a x}\right)^{2}} d x=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1}\left(e^{a x}\right)+C[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #311 (ID: 415914)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{10+6 x+x^{2}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1}(x+3)+C[/math]
B. [math]\cot ^{-1}(x+3)+C[/math]
C. [math]\cot ^{-1}(x+3)+C[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}(x+5)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{10+6 \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{x}^{2}}=\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}+6 \mathrm{x}+9+1} \\=\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{1+(\mathrm{x}+3)^{2}}=\tan ^{-1}(\mathrm{x}+3)+\mathrm{C}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #312 (ID: 415915)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{2} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{4 x+1}}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]9[/math]
E. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: E.কোনটিই নয়

Solution:
[math]z=4 x+1 \Rightarrow d z=4 d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d z}{4}=d x[/math]
 [math]x=0, z=1 ; x=2, z=9[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{2} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{4 x+1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \int_{1}^{9} \frac{d z}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}[2 \sqrt{z}]_{1}^{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\sqrt{9}-\sqrt{1})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(3-1)=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #313 (ID: 415916)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{2} x e^{x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(1-e)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}(e-1)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}(e+1)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x e^{x^{2}} d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} 2 x e^{x^{2}} d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} e^{z} d z=\frac{1}{2}[e-1][/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #314 (ID: 415917)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](- 1, 1)[/math] বিন্দুগামী একটি বক্ররেখার ঢালের সমীকরণ [math]y=\sqrt[3]{x}-1[/math] বক্ররেখাটির সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y=\frac{1}{3} x^{-\frac{2}{3}}+\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]y=\frac{3}{4} x^{\frac{4}{3}}-x-\frac{3}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]y=\frac{2}{3} x^{\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=\frac{4}{3} x^{\frac{4}{3}}-x+\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt[3]{x}-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=x^{\frac{1}{3}}-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d y[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{\frac{1}{3}}-1\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int d y[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(x^{\frac{1}{3}}-1\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{x^{\frac{4}{3}}}{\frac{4}{3}}-x+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{4} x^{\frac{4}{3}}-x+C[/math]
ইহা [math](-1, 1)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী [math]\therefore 1=\frac{3}{4}+1+C[/math]
 [math]\therefore C=-\frac{3}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বক্ররেখাটি [math]y=\frac{3}{4} x^{\frac{4}{3}}[/math]
 [math]-x-\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #315 (ID: 415918)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x+e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{e}^{x}}+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}+e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}+C[/math]
D. [math]e^{x^{2}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x+e^{x}} d x=\int e^{x} \cdot e^{e^{x}} d x=\int e^{e^{x}} d\left(e^{x}\right)=e^{e^{x}}+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #316 (ID: 415919)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{x^{2}} \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]cosx + C[/math]
B. [math]\cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]sinx + C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{1}{x^{2}} \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) d x=\int \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) \cdot \frac{1}{x^{2}} d x \\=-\int \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) \cdot d\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)=\cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #317 (ID: 415920)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}(1+x)}{x e^{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x e^{x}+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}(1+x)+C[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|e^{x}(1+x)\right|+C[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left|x e^{x}\right|+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}(1+\mathrm{x})}{\mathrm{x} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}=\int \frac{\mathrm{d}\left(\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)}{\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}}}=\ln \left|\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}}\right|+\mathrm{C}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #318 (ID: 415921)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{4-9 x^{2}}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{1}{3} \sin a x+c[/math] হয়,তাহলে [math]'a'[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{3} \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{2}-x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{3} \cdot \sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{\frac{2}{3}}\right) \therefore a=\frac{3}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #319 (ID: 415922)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\pi[/math]
C. [math]2 \pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\left.\sin ^{-1}(x-1)\right|_{0} ^{1}=\frac{\pi}{2}\right.[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #320 (ID: 415923)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{3} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{3 x-x^{2}}}= কত ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\pi[/math]
C. [math]2 \pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{3} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)^{2}-\left(x-\frac{3}{2}\right)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x}{3}-1\right)\right]_{0}^{3}=\pi[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #321 (ID: 415924)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}, x[/math] অক্ষ [math]x=1[/math] এবং [math]x=3[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{26}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{25}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল: [math]=\int_{1}^{3} y d x=\int_{1}^{3} x^{2} d x=\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{1}^{3}=\frac{1}{3}\left(3^{3}-1^{3}\right)=\frac{26}{3}[/math] ব.একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #322 (ID: 415925)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\pi[/math]
C. [math]2 \pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #323 (ID: 415926)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\ln (\ln x)}{x} \mathrm{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln x|\ln (\ln x)+1|[/math]
B. [math]\ln \mathrm{x}|\ln (\ln \mathrm{x})-1|[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\ln x)-1[/math]
D. [math]\ln x|\ln (\ln x)|[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\ln x=z \Rightarrow \frac{1}{x} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \int \ln \mathrm{d} \mathrm{d}=\int \ln \mathrm{d} \mathrm{z}=\mathrm{z} \ln \mathrm{z}-\mathrm{z}+\mathrm{C} \\=\ln \mathrm{x} \ln (\ln \mathrm{x})-\ln \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}=\ln \mathrm{x}[\ln (\ln \mathrm{x})-1]+\mathrm{C}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #324 (ID: 415927)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-2 \sin \sqrt{x}+C[/math]
B. [math]-\sin \sqrt{x}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sin \sqrt{x}+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \sin \sqrt{x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text { } \int \frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}} d x=2 \int \cos \sqrt{x} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x \\=2 \int \cos \sqrt{x} d(\sqrt{x})=2 \sin \sqrt{x}+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #325 (ID: 415928)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 3 \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}\left(x-\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}\left(x+\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}\left(x-\frac{\cos 2 x}{2}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}\left(x+\frac{\cos 2 x}{2}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int 3 \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int\left(2 \sin ^{2} x\right) d x=\frac{3}{2} \int(1-\cos x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(x-\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #326 (ID: 415929)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\log x}{x^{2}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\log (x+1)+C[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{x}(\log x+1)+C[/math]
C. [math]\log (x-1)+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \log (x+1)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\log x}{x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \log x x^{-2}[/math]
 [math]d x=\log x \int x^{-2} d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x}(\log x) \int x^{-2} d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\log x \frac{x^{-2+1}}{-2+1}-\int\left(\frac{1}{x} \times \frac{x^{-2+1}}{-2+1}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=-\frac{\log x}{x}-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(-\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\log x}{x}+\int x^{-2} d x[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\log x}{x}+\frac{x^{-2+1}}{-2+1}+C[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\log x}{x}-\frac{1}{x}+C[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{x}(\log x+1)+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #327 (ID: 415930)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x-[/math]এর সাপেক্ষে [math]2xe^{x^{2}}[/math] এর যোগজ কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2 x e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
খ. [math]e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{e^{x^{2}}}{2 x}+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{2} e x^{x^{2}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি , [math]x^{2}=z \Rightarrow 2 x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int 2 x e^{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int e^{z} d z=e^{z}+[/math]
 [math]c=e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #328 (ID: 415931)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{9} e^{x^{10}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{9} e^{x^{10}}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{10} e^{x^{10}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{9} e^{x^{10}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{10} e^{x^{10}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x^{10}=z \therefore 10 x^{9} d x=d z ;[/math]
 [math]x^{9}[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{10} d z ; 1=\int \frac{1}{10} e^{z}[/math]
 [math]d z=\frac{1}{10} e^{z}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x^{10}}}{10}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #329 (ID: 415932)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\operatorname{lan}^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{32}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{16}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{32}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text { let, } \tan ^{-1} x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{1+x^{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz} ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}=0,[/math]
 [math]z=0 ; x=1,[/math]
 [math]z=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \mathrm{zdz}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\mathrm{z}^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}=\frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{2}-0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi^{2}}{32}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #330 (ID: 415933)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x d x}{1+x^{4}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} \frac{2 x d x}{1+\left(x^{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 ধরি , [math]z=x^{2} ; d z=2 x \cdot d x[/math]
এখানে , [math]x=1[/math]
 হলে [math]z=1 ; x=0[/math]
 হলে [math]z=0=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} \frac{d z}{1+z^{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\left[\tan ^{-1} z\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #331 (ID: 415835)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=2 x[/math] পরাবৃত্ত (Parabola) এবং এর উপকেন্দ্রিক লম্ব দ্বারা বেষ্টিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল: [math]2 \int_{0}^{1 / 2} y d x[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \sqrt{x} d x=2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\left[x^{3 / 2}\right]_{0}^{1 / 2}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\Rightarrow 2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{2}{3}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \sqrt{2} \cdot \frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{3 / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 \sqrt{2}}{3}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3} \cdot \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #332 (ID: 415836)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{b} \frac{d x}{x \log x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\log b[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\log b}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\log \log b}[/math]
D. [math]\log \log b[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{b} \frac{d x}{x \log x}=[\log (\log x)]_{0}^{b}=\log (\log b)-\log (\log 0)\\=kog(logb)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #333 (ID: 415837)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{a}^{b} \mathbf{f}(\mathbf{x}) \mathbf{d x}[/math] এর মান কত? এখানে [math]f(x) = x² - 4x² + 4x.x[/math] -অক্ষকে a, b > a দুইটি বিন্দুতে কর্তন করে।

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{4}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
x অক্ষকে ছেদ করলে [math]f(x)=0 \Rightarrow x ^ 3 - 4x ^ 2 + 4x = 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x\left(x^{2}-4 x+4\right)=0 \\\Rightarrow x(x-2)^{2}=0 \\\Rightarrow x=0,2 \\\Rightarrow a=0, b=2 \\\int_{0}^{2} f(x) dx=\int_{0}^{2}\left(x^{3}-4 x^{2}+4 x\right) d x\\=\left[\frac{x^{4}}{4}-4 \cdot \frac{x^{3}}{3}+4 \cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2^{4}}{4}-4 \cdot \frac{2^{3}}{3}+4 \cdot \frac{2^{2}}{2}=\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #334 (ID: 415838)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-x+1}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 \mathrm{x}-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)+\mathrm{C}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}} \tan ^{-1} 1\left(\frac{2 x-1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)+C[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x-1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)+C[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}-\mathrm{x}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}-2 \mathrm{x} \cdot \frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{4}+1-\frac{1}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\left(x-\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x-\frac{1}{2}}{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}\right)+C[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #335 (ID: 415839)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-\infty}^{0} \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}+0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}-0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}-0[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}+0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\mathrm{z}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]x=0, z=1 ;[/math]
 [math]x=-\infty, z=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{-\infty}^{0} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{x} d x}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d z}{1+z^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\tan ^{-1} z\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} 1-\tan ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{\pi}{4}- 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #336 (ID: 415840)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সরল পথে একটি কণা [math]v_{0}\left(1-\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{kt}}\right)[/math] গতিতে চলমান। [math]t[/math] সময়ে কণাটির সরণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]v_{0} t+\frac{v_{0}}{k}\left(1-e^{-k t}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]v_{0} t+v_{0}\left(1-e^{-k t}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]v_{0} t+\frac{v_{0}}{k}\left(e^{-k t}-1\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]v_{0} t+v_{0}\left(e^{-k t}-1\right)[/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]t[/math]
 সময়ে সরণ, [math]\mathrm{s}=\int_{0}^{t} v \mathrm{dt}=\int_{0}^{t} v_{0}\left(1-\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{kt}}\right) \mathrm{dt}=v_{0}\left(\int_{0}^{t} \mathrm{dt}-\int_{0}^{t} \mathrm{c}^{-\mathrm{kt}} \mathrm{dt}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow v_{0}\left(t+\frac{1}{k} e^{-k t}-\frac{1}{k}\right)=v_{0} t+\frac{v_{0}}{k}\left(e^{-k t}-1\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #337 (ID: 415841)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-3}^{-2}(x + |x|)dx[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 3
B. -3
C. 1
D. 0


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]-3 \leq x \leq -2[/math]
 রেঞ্জে [math]x < 0[/math]
 হয়, তাই [math]|x| = -x[/math]
⇒ [math]x + |x| = x - x = 0[/math]
⇒ [math]\int_{-3}^{-2}(x + |x|)dx = \int_{-3}^{-2} 0 , dx = 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #338 (ID: 415842)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} \log x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. log2
খ. 2log2
গ. 2log2-1
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{1}^{2} \log x d x=[x \log x-x]_{1}^{2} \\\quad=2 \log 2-2-\ln 1+1=2 \log 2-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #339 (ID: 415843)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2(e+1)[/math]
B. [math]2(1-e)[/math]
C. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
D. [math](e+1)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x=\left[2 e^{\sqrt{x}}\right]_{0}^{1}=2(e-1)[/math]

Question #340 (ID: 415844)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (x+1)}{x+1} \mathrm{~d} x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]
C. [math]\infty[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (x+1)}{x+1} d x=0=\int_{0}^{\ln 2} z d z=\frac{z^{2}}{2}=\frac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #341 (ID: 415845)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
xy - 4 = 0 অধিবৃত্ত, x-অক্ষ, x = 1 এবং x = e রেখা দুইটি দ্বারা সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. 2
খ. 3
গ. 4
ঘ. 5


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x y-4=0 \Rightarrow x y=4 \Rightarrow y=\frac{4}{x}[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]\int^{e}_{1}\frac{4}{x} d x=[4 \ln |x|]_{1}^{e}=4 \ln |e|-4 \ln |1|=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #342 (ID: 415846)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর মান কত হলে, [math]F(x)=\int_{0}^{x} \frac{t-4}{9-t^{2}} d t[/math] ফাংশনটির মান বৃহত্তম হবে?

Options:
ক. 3
খ. 4
গ. 5
ঘ. 25


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]F(x)=\int_{0}^{x} \frac{t-4}{9-t^{2}} d t \\\Rightarrow F^{\prime}(x)=\frac{x-4}{9-x^{2}}[/math]
বৃহত্তম মানের জন্য [math]F^{\prime}(x)=0 \\\Rightarrow \frac{x-4}{9-x^{2}}=0 = 4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #343 (ID: 415847)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \int_{0}^{1} \operatorname{cosec}\left(\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{x}\right) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2.5[/math]
B. [math]2.0[/math]
C. [math]1.5[/math]
D. [math]1.0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]2 \int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{cosec}\left(\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=2 \int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\operatorname{cosec} \operatorname{cosec}^{-1} x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=2 \int_{0}^{1} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[x^{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=1^{2}-0^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1.0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #344 (ID: 415848)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\int \varphi(x) d x=\ln (\ln x)+c[/math] হয়, যেখানে [math]c[/math] একটি ধ্রুবক, তবে [math]\varphi(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x \ln (\ln x)+x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
D. [math]x \ln x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \phi(x) d x=\ln (\ln x)+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \phi(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math][\ln (\ln x)+c]=\frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{x}+0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #347 (ID: 415851)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{dx}{\sqrt{25 - x^2}} =\ ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\tan^{-1} \frac{x}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\cos^{-1} \frac{x}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\sin^{-1} \frac{x}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\sin^{-1} \frac{x}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
এটি একটি স্ট্যান্ডার্ড ইন্টিগ্রাল ফর্ম: [math]\int \frac{dx}{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} = \sin^{-1} \frac{x}{a} + C[/math]
। এখানে [math]a = 5[/math]
, সুতরাং [math]\int \frac{dx}{\sqrt{25 - x^2}} = \sin^{-1} \frac{x}{5}[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #348 (ID: 415852)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_0^4 x^2 e^x dx[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]e^{-1}[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]e + 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
বাই পার্টস প্রয়োগ: [math]u = x^2[/math]
, [math]dv = e^x dx[/math]
 ⇒ [math]du = 2x dx[/math]
, [math]v = e^x[/math]
। ধাপে ধাপে ইন্টিগ্রেশন করে পাই: [math](x^2 - 2x + 2)e^x[/math]
 ⇒ সীমা [math]x = 0[/math]
 ও [math]x = 4[/math]
 বসিয়ে চূড়ান্ত ফলাফল [math]e + 2[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #349 (ID: 415853)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_0^4 f(x), dx = 6[/math] হলে [math]\int_1^5 f(x + 1), dx =[/math] কত?

Options:
A. 6
B. 5
C. 6
D. 7


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Substitution [math]u = x + 1[/math]
 ⇒ [math]dx = du[/math]
, সীমা পরিবর্তন করে [math]x = 1 \to u = 2[/math]
, [math]x = 5 \to u = 6[/math]
 ⇒ [math]\int_2^6 f(u), du = \int_2^6 f(x), dx = 6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #350 (ID: 415854)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_0^{\pi/2} \frac{\cos x, dx}{\sqrt{4 - \sin^2 x}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
প্রথমে [math]\sin x = t[/math]
 বসাই।তাহলে [math]dx = \dfrac{dt}{\cos x}[/math]
 এবং [math]\cos x = \sqrt{1 - t^2}[/math]
সুতরাং, [math]\cos x , dx = \sqrt{1 - t^2} \cdot \dfrac{dt}{\cos x} = dt[/math]
সীমান্ত পরিবর্তন:[math]x = 0 \Rightarrow t = 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x = \dfrac{\pi}{2} \Rightarrow t = 1[/math]
এখন ইন্টিগ্রালটি হয়:[math]\displaystyle \int_0^1 \frac{dt}{\sqrt{4 - t^2}}[/math]
আমরা জানি:[math]\displaystyle \int \frac{dx}{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} = \sin^{-1}\left( \frac{x}{a} \right) + C[/math]
এখানে [math]a = 2[/math]
, তাই[math]\displaystyle \int_0^1 \frac{dt}{\sqrt{4 - t^2}} = \sin^{-1} \left( \frac{1}{2} \right) - \sin^{-1}(0)[/math]
 [math]= \dfrac{\pi}{6} - 0 = \dfrac{\pi}{6}[/math]
সঠিক উত্তর: [math]\boxed{\dfrac{\pi}{6}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #351 (ID: 415855)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int f(x)dx = \frac{\sin x}{1 + \cos x} + C[/math] হলে, [math]f(x) =[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}\sec^2\frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}\cos^2\frac{x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}\tan^2\frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}\cos\sec^2\frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{\sin x}{1 + \cos x} = \tan\frac{x}{2}[/math]
, তাই [math]f(x) = \frac{d}{dx}(\tan\frac{x}{2}) = \frac{1}{2}\sec^2\frac{x}{2}[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #352 (ID: 415856)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{6}} \sin 3 x \cos 3 x d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{6}} \sin 3 x \cos 3 x d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{6}} \sin 6 x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}\left[\frac{\cos 6 x}{6}\right]^{\frac{\pi}{6}}_{0}\\=-\frac{1}{12}[\cos \pi-\cos 0]\\=-\frac{1}{12}[-1-1]=\frac{1}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #353 (ID: 415857)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} x \ln x d x=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \ln 2+c[/math]
B. [math]2 \ln 2-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln 2-\frac{3}{4}[/math]
D. 1


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} x \ln x d x=\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}\right]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2^{2}}{2} \ln 2-\frac{2^{2}}{4}-\frac{1^{2}}{2} \ln 1+\frac{1}{4}\\=2 \ln 2-1-0+\frac{1}{4}=2 \ln 2-\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #354 (ID: 415858)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln 2} \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\ln \frac{-3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\ln \frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\ln \frac{-2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln 2} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}{1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}\\=\int_{0}^{\ln 2} \frac{d\left(1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)}{1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}\\=\left[\ln \left(1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)\right]_{0}^{\ln 2}[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(1+e^{\ln 2}\right)-\ln \left(1+e^{0}\right)\\=\ln (1+2)-\ln (1+1)\\=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #355 (ID: 415859)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(\ln x+1)}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. e
B. e+1
C. e-1
D. ln2


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text { } \int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(\ln x+1)}=[\ln (\ln x+1)]_{1}^{e} \\=\ln (\ln e+1)-\ln (\ln 1+1) \\=\ln (1+1)-\ln (0+1)=\ln 2-\ln 1=\ln 2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #356 (ID: 415860)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y² = 4x এবং y = x দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
খ. 3
গ. 8
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{8 \mathrm{a}^{2}}{3 \mathrm{~m}^{3}}=\frac{8.1^{2}}{3(1)^{3}}=\frac{8}{3}[/math]

Explanation:
