Question #357 (ID: 415861)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{2} \frac{x}{\sqrt{9-2 x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. 1
B. 4
C. 3
D. 0


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{2} \frac{x}{\sqrt{9-2 \mathrm{x}^{2}}} d x\\=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{2} \frac{d\left(x^{2}\right)}{\sqrt{9-2 x^{2}}}\\=\int_{0}^{2} \frac{d\left(x^{2}\right.}{2 \sqrt{9-2 x}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\sqrt{9-2 x^{2}}}{-2}\right]_{0}^{2}\\=-\frac{1}{2}(\sqrt{9-8}-\sqrt{9})\\=-\frac{1}{2}(1-3)=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #358 (ID: 415862)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cos x}{1+\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
C. [math]2 \pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cos x d x}{1+\sin ^{2} x}\\=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{d(\sin x)}{1+(\sin x)^{2}}\\=\left[\tan ^{-1}(\sin x)\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}\left(\sin \frac{\pi}{2}\right)-\tan ^{-1}(\sin 0)\\=\tan ^{-1} 1-\tan ^{-1} 0=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #359 (ID: 415863)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x d x}{1+x^{4}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\mathrm{x}}{1+\mathrm{x}^{4}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} \frac{\mathrm{~d}\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}\right)}{1+\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}\right)\right]_{0}^{1}\\=\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} 1-\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} 0\\=\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #360 (ID: 415864)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{32}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{32}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{16}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=\int_{0}^{1} \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x} \cdot \mathrm{~d}\left(\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} 1\right)^{2}}{2}-\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} 0\right)^{2}}{2}\\=\frac{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)^{2}}{2}-0=\frac{\pi^{2}}{22}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #361 (ID: 415865)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{4}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1} x\right]_{1}^{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}-\sin ^{-1} 1=\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{\pi}{2}=-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #362 (ID: 415866)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int f(x) d x=x+e^{2 x}[/math] হলে f(x) কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]1+2 e^{2 x}[/math]
B. [math]1+e^{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]1+\frac{1}{2} e^{2 x}[/math]
D. [math]x^{2}+e^{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\int f(x) d x\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(x+e^{2 x}\right) \\\Rightarrow f(x)=1+2 e^{2 x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #363 (ID: 415867)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}(\cos x+\sin x) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \cos x+C[/math]
B. [math]-e^{x} \cos x+C[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \sin x+C[/math]
D. [math]-e^{x} \sin x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x}(\cos x+\sin x) d x=e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #364 (ID: 415868)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}\left(e^{x}\right)^{3 / 2}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]
C. [math]2 e^{x / 2}+C[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x} / 2}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{e^{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\int \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{x}}\mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{x}}}{\frac{1}{2}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x} / 2}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #365 (ID: 415869)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|+C[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left|\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=\int \tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right) \cdot d\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right) \\\quad=\ln \left|\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #366 (ID: 415870)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d \theta}{1+3 \cos ^{2} \theta}[/math] dx = কত?

Options:
A. [math]-x+c[/math]
B. [math]x+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sec ^{2}\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=-\int \sec ^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]d\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\tan[/math]
 [math]\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]+c=-\tan \tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]+c=-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #367 (ID: 415871)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] এর যোগজ নির্ণয় কর ?

Options:
A. [math]-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{1+x^{2}}+C[/math]
D. [math]-\sqrt{1+x^{2}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]1-x^{2}=z \Rightarrow x d x=-\frac{d z}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=-\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}}\\=-\sqrt{z}+C=-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #368 (ID: 415872)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{25-4 x^{2}}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{5}+K[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{5}+K[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{5}+K[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{5}+K[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{25-4 x^{2}}}=\int \frac{d x}{2 \sqrt{\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2}-x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{5}+K[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #369 (ID: 415873)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{1+\tan x}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{1+\tan x}+C[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{1+\tan x}+C[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{1+\tan ^{2} x}+C[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{1+\tan x}}=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x d x}{\sqrt{1+\tan x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d(1+\tan x)}{\sqrt{1+\tan x}}=2 \sqrt{1+\tan x}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #370 (ID: 415874)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{2 x+e^{2 x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2 e^{e^{2 x}}+C[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2 x+1}+C[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{2 x}+C[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{e^{2 x}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{2 x+e^{2 x}} d x=\int e^{2 x} \cdot e^{e^{2 x}} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]e^{2 x}=z \\\Rightarrow 2 e^{2 x} d x=d z \\\Rightarrow e^{2 x} d x=\frac{d z}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d z}{2} e^{z}=\frac{1}{2} \int e^{z} d z\\=\frac{1}{2} e^{z}+C=\frac{1}{2} e^{e^{2 x}}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #371 (ID: 415875)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{\cos ^{-1} x}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{\cos ^{-1} \mathrm{x}}+C[/math]
B. [math]-e^{\cos ^{-1} x}+C[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{2} e^{\cos ^{-1} x}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{\cos ^{-1} \mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{\cos ^{-1} \mathrm{x}}}{\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}} d x=-\mathrm{e}^{\cos ^{-1} \mathrm{x}}+C[/math]

Explanation:

================================================================================
Question #372 (ID: 415876)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1}{1-\sin \mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2+\sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]\text { } 2-\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1}{1-\sin x} d x=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1+\sin x}{1-\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1+\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x} d x=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(\sec ^{2} x+\tan x \sec x\right) d x \\=[\tan x+\sec x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}=\tan \frac{\pi}{4}+\sec \frac{\pi}{4}-\tan 0-\sec 0 \\=1+\sqrt{2}-0-1=\sqrt{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #373 (ID: 415877)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{1+\sin x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2+\sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]2-\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}-2[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{2}+1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\sin x} d x\\=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{(1-\sin x) d x}{1-\sin ^{2} x}\\=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(\sec ^{2} x-\sec x \tan x\right) d x\\=[\tan x-\sec x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\sec \frac{\pi}{4}-\tan 0+\sec 0\\=1-\sqrt{2}+1=2-\sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #374 (ID: 415826)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}[/math] বক্ররেখা এবং [math]y=0, x=1[/math] ও [math]x=3[/math] সরলরেখা তিনটি দিয়ে সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]5 \text { sq. unit }[/math]
খ. [math]20 \text { sq. unit }[/math]
গ. [math]10 \text { sq. unit }[/math]
ঘ. [math]15 \text { sq. unit }[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল : [math]=\int_{1}^{3} x^{3} d x[/math]

[Image]
[math]=\left[\frac{x^{4}}{4}\right]_{1}^{3}=\frac{3^{4}-1^{4}}{4}=20 \text { sq. unit }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #375 (ID: 415827)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}(1+x)}{\cos ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)} d x[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
A. [math]\sin \left(x e^{x}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\cos \left(\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)+\mathrm{C}[/math]
C. [math]\tan \left(x e^{x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]z=x e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{b} z=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}(1+\mathrm{x}) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
সমাধান: [math]\int \frac{e^{x}(1+x)}{\cos ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)} d x=\int \frac{d z}{\cos ^{2} z}[/math]
 [math]=\int \sec ^{2} z d z=\tan z+C=\tan \left(x e^{\mathrm{x}}\right)+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #376 (ID: 415828)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\pi[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}+1[/math]
E. [math]1-\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]-\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]+\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\frac{1}{2}(-2 x)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\sin ^{-1} x\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]+\left[\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right][/math]
 [math]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1}(1)-0+0-1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #377 (ID: 415829)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় করঃ [math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{3} x \sqrt{\sin x} d x[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]\frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{15}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of the above }[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]\cos ^{3} x \sqrt{\sin x} d x ; \sin x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos d x=d z[/math]
 [math]x=0 \Rightarrow z=0 ;[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow z=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{1}\left(1-z^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{z} d z=\int_{0}^{1}\left(\sqrt{z}-z^{\frac{5}{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]d z=\left[\frac{z^{\frac{1}{2}+1}}{\frac{1}{2}+1}-\frac{z^{\frac{5}{2}+1}}{\frac{5}{2}+1}\right][/math]
 [math]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{8}{21}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #378 (ID: 415830)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sec ^{2}\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
C. [math]x+c[/math]
D. [math]-x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sec ^{2}\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)}{1+x^{2}} d x ;[/math]
 [math]\cot ^{-1} x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\int \sec ^{2} z d z[/math]
 [math]=-\tan z+c[/math]
 [math]=-\tan \left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)+c[/math]
 [math]=-\tan \left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\int \sec ^{2} z d[/math]
 [math]z=-\tan z+c[/math]
 [math]=-\tan[/math]
 [math]\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)+c[/math]
 [math]=-\tan[/math]
 [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #379 (ID: 415832)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]I=\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} \theta+\cos ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]1=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} \theta+\cos ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]\left[\cos ^{4} \theta\right.[/math]
দ্বারা ভাগ করে][math]I=\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{2 \sin \theta \cos \theta \times \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} \theta \cdot \cos \theta \cdot \cos \theta}}{1+\tan ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{2 \tan \theta \sec ^{2} \theta}{1+\tan ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } \tan ^{2} \theta=p[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \tan[/math]
 [math]\theta \sec ^{2} \theta d \theta=d p[/math]
 [math]\text { When, } \theta=0,[/math]
 [math]\theta=\frac{\pi}{4} ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{p}=0, \mathrm{p}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore I=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d p}{1+p^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\tan ^{-1} p\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #380 (ID: 415833)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d \theta}{1+3 \cos ^{2} \theta}[/math] dx = কত?

Options:
A. [math]-x+c[/math]
B. [math]x+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sec ^{2}\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=-\int \sec ^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]d\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\tan[/math]
 [math]\left(\cot ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]+c=-\tan \tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]+c=-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #381 (ID: 415834)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}} d x[/math] এর মান হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+C[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{1-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x-\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\sin ^{-1} x-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{2 x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} x+\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 2+c=\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #382 (ID: 415810)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=-\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}[/math] ও [math]y=0[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4} \pi a^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \pi a^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \mathbf{a}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]y=-\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}} \Rightarrow y^{2} = a^{2}-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}[/math]
 যা বৃত্তের সমীকরণ তার (-) মাইনাস থাকার চিত্র অর্ধবৃত্ত ক্ষেত্রফল আসবে। ফলে ক্ষেত্রফল [math]\frac{1}{2} \pi a^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #383 (ID: 415811)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2008-2009, 2005-2006, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4x[/math] & [math]y=x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রে ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{8} \text { sq.units }[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{8}{3} \text { sq.units }[/math]
গ. [math]3 \text { sq.units }[/math]
ঘ. [math]8 \text { sq.units }[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x \Rightarrow y=2 \sqrt{x}[/math]
 আর [math]y=x[/math]
 এর ছেদবিন্দু [math](0,0)[/math]
 এবং [math](4,4)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল: [math]\int_{0}^{4}(2 \sqrt{x}-x) d x=\left[2 \frac{x^{3 / 2}}{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{4}=\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #384 (ID: 415812)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{e^{2 x}+1}=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}+1}\\\left[\right. \text{ let, } z=e^{x} \Rightarrow d z=e^{x} d x \mid\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1} z+c=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #385 (ID: 415813)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 / \pi[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi^{2} / 2[/math]
D. [math]1 / \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)]^ b_{0}=\pi / 2\right.[/math]

Explanation:

Question #386 (ID: 415814)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2013-2014, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right) \int_{0}^{1} \frac{-2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)\left[2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #387 (ID: 415815)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2003-2004, 2013-2014, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}}[/math] এর একটি অনির্দিষ্ট যোগজ-

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right) \ln \left(1+x^{2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}}=\int \tan ^{-1} x d\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #388 (ID: 415816)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003, 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x+\sqrt{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x}+1)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}+\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}}=\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+1)}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sqrt{x}+1=z \Rightarrow d z=\frac{d x}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
সুতরাং [math]\int \frac{2 \mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}}=2 \ln \mathrm{z}+\mathrm{C}=2 \ln (\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+1)+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #389 (ID: 415817)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\log \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\log \left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]e^{-x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=\log \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #390 (ID: 415818)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math] এর মান কত? (What is the value of [math]\left.\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} ?\right)[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\tan \left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\tan \left(e^{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d u[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{e^{x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d u[/math]
এখানে, [math]u=e^{x}[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{du}=e^{x} d x[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d u}{u^{2}+1}[/math]
 [প্রতিস্থাপন করে][math]\tan ^{-1}(u)+c[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:
সমাধান প্রতিস্থাপন পদ্বতী বা u-Substitulin পদ্বতিতে করা হয়েছে। এবং সর্বশেষ [math]\tan ^{-1} x=\frac{1}{x^{2}+1}[/math] সূত্র: ব্যাবহার করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #391 (ID: 415819)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
বক্ররেখা [math]x=y^{2}[/math] এবং [math]y=x-2[/math] রেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{9}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{7}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{11}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Area}[/math]
 [math]=\left|\int_{Y_1}^{Y_2}\left(y^{2}-y-2\right) d y\right|[/math]
 [math]=\left|\int_{-1}^{2}\left(y^{2}-y-2\right) d y\right|[/math]
 [math]=\left|-\frac{9}{2}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{2} \text { sq.unit }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #392 (ID: 415820)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] - অক্ষ, [math]y[/math] - অক্ষ, [math]y=\ln 5[/math] এবং [math]y=\ln x[/math] বক্ররেখা দ্বারা সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\ln 4 \text { sq. unit }[/math]
খ. [math]5 \text { sq. unit }[/math]
গ. [math]4 \text { sq. unit }[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln 5 \mathrm{sq} \text {. unit }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln x[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=e^{y}[/math]
 [math]\text { Area }[/math]
 [math]=\int_{y_{1}}^{y_{2}} \mathrm{e}^{y}[/math]
 [math]d y=\int_{0}^{\ln 5} e^{y} d y[/math]
 [math]=e^{\ln 5}-e^{0}[/math]
 [math]=5-1=4 sq. unit[/math]


Explanation:

Question #393 (ID: 415821)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \int \sin \left(2 e^{x^{2}}\right) x e^{x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান হলঃ

Options:
A. [math]\sin \left(2 e^{x^{2}}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]2 \sin \left(2 e^{x^{2}}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{x^{2}}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=e^{x^{2}}[/math]
ধরে , [math]\mathrm{I}=\int \sin 2 \mathrm{ydy}=-\frac{\cos 2 \mathrm{y}}{2}+\mathrm{c}=\frac{1-2 \sin ^{2} \mathrm{y}}{2}+c^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]\sin ^{2} y-\frac{1}{2}+c^{\prime}=\sin ^{2}\left(e^{x^{2}}\right)+c\left[c=c^{\prime}-\frac{1}{2}\right.[/math]
 ধরে [math]][/math]


Explanation:

Question #394 (ID: 415822)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\pi / 4[/math]
B. [math]-\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 4[/math]
D. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
E. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{\frac{1}{x}-1}}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\frac{1}{x}=z^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=2 \mathrm{zdz} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{x} \mathrm{dx}=-2 \mathrm{xzdz}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \frac{1}{\mathrm{z}^{2}} \mathrm{zdz}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 \mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}} \text {. }[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{\frac{1}{x}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{-\frac{2 d z}{z}}{\sqrt{z^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \int \frac{d z}{z \sqrt{z^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -2\left[\sec ^{-1} z\right]+c[/math]
 [math]=-2 \sec ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}+c[/math]
 [math]=-2 \cos ^{-1} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d x}{\sqrt{x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[-2 \cos ^{-1} \sqrt{x}\right]_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2[/math]
 [math]\cos ^{-1}(1)+2 \cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #395 (ID: 415823)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \int \sin \left(2 e^{x^{2}}\right) x e^{x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
A. [math]\sin \left(2 e^{x^{2}}\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]2 \sin \left(2 e^{x^{2}}\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{2}\left(e^{x^{2}}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{2}\left(e^{x^{2}}\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{z}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 4 \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]2 \int \sin \left(2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}\right) \mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \cdot 2 \int \sin \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2} \cos \mathrm{z}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{C}^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2} \cos \left(2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{C}^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2}\left(1-2 \sin^{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}\right)\right)[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{C}^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2}+\sin ^{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{C}^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #396 (ID: 415824)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left(\frac{1+\sin x}{1+\cos x}\right) d x[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \cos \left(\frac{x}{2}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} \sin \left(\frac{x}{2}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \tan \left(\frac{x}{2}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]e^{x} \cot \left(\frac{x}{2}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]I=\int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1+\sin x}{1+\cos x}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{x}\left(\frac{1+2 \sin \frac{x}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{2}+\tan \frac{x}{2}\right) d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\tan \frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\sec ^{2} \frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{I}=\int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})\right] \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\tan \frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দেয়া আছে, [math]F(x)=\int_{0}^{x} \frac{t-3}{t^{2}+7} d t[/math]। x এর মান কত হলে [math]F(x)[/math] ন্যূনতম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\sqrt{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{F}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=0 ; \frac{\mathrm{x}-3}{\mathrm{x}^{2}+7}=0 \therefore \mathrm{x}=3[/math]

Explanation:

Question #398 (ID: 415806)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x[/math] এবং [math]y=x^{2}[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল (বর্গ এককে)-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{5}{6}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\therefore \int_{0}^{1}\left(\mathrm{x}-\mathrm{x}^{2}\right) \mathrm{dx}=\left[\frac{\mathrm{x}^{2}}{2}-\frac{\mathrm{x}^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{3}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #399 (ID: 415807)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]tanx + C[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x d(\tan x)=\frac{\tan ^{\frac{1}{2}} x}{\frac{1}{2}}+C=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]


Explanation:

Question #400 (ID: 415809)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=-\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}[/math] ও [math]y=0[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4} \pi a^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \pi \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=-\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{2}=a^{2}-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]=a^{2}[/math]
 যা বৃত্তের সমীকরণ তার (-) মাইনাস থাকার চিত্রঅর্ধবৃত্ত ক্ষেত্রফল আসবে। ফলে ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2} \pi \mathrm{a}^{2} .[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #401 (ID: 415803)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2011-2012, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=16 x[/math] এবং [math]y=4 x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{3} {unit}{ }^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{3} \text { unit }^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2} {unit}{ }^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3} \text { unit }^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:

[Image]
ক্ষেত্রফল= [math]\int_{0}^{1}(4 \sqrt{x}-4 x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left[4 x^{\frac{1}{2}}-4 x\right] d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[4 \times x^{\frac{1}{2}} \times \frac{2}{3}-4 \cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{\theta}{3}-2[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3} \text { unit }^{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #402 (ID: 415804)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (x+1)}{x+1} \mathrm{~d} x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]
C. [math]\infty[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (x+1)}{x+1} d x=0=\int_{0}^{\ln 2} z d z=\frac{z^{2}}{2}=\frac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #403 (ID: 415805)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{(1+x) e^{x}}{\cos ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sin \left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\cos \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\cot \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}(1+x)}{\cos ^{2}\left(x^{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \sec ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\cdot d\left(x e^{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #404 (ID: 415802)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{10}|x-5| d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{25}{2}[/math]
B. [math]25[/math]
C. [math]50[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{10}|x-5|[/math]
 [math]d x=-\int_{0}^{5}(x-5) d x+\int_{5}^{10}(x-5) d x=-[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}-5 x\right]_{0}^{5}[/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}-5 x\right]_{5}^{10}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\left[\frac{25}{2}-25\right][/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{100}{2}-5 \times 10-\frac{25}{2}+5 \times 5\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{25}{2}[/math]
 [math]+\left[50-50-\frac{25}{2}+25\right][/math]
 [math]=25[/math]
বিকল্পঃ
[Image]
[math]\int_{0}^{10}|x-5| d x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 5[/math]
 [math]\times 5+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 5[/math]
 [math]\times 5=25[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #405 (ID: 415799)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x, y=0[/math] রেখাদ্বয় এবং [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=16[/math] বৃত্ত দ্বারা প্রথম চতুর্ভাগে আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল–

Options:
ক. [math]2 \pi \text { sq. units }[/math]
খ. [math]3 \pi \text { sq. units }[/math]
গ. [math]4 \pi \text { sq. units }[/math]
ঘ. [math]5 \pi \text { sq. units }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
আবদ্ধ অংশটি বৃত্তের [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
 অংশ[math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{8} \times \pi r^{2}=\frac{1}{8} \times \pi \times 16=2 \pi \text { sq. units }[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:

Question #406 (ID: 415800)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{x} f(p) f^{\prime}(p) d p=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} f^{2}(x)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} x^{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left[\{f(x)\}^{2}-(f(0)\}^{2}\right][/math]
D. [math]f(x)-f(0)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{x} f(P)[/math]
 [math]\cdot f^{\prime}(P) \cdot d P[/math]
 [math]=\left\{\frac{(f(P))^{2}}{2}\right\}_{0}^{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left[(f(x)]^{2}-[f(0)]^{2}\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #407 (ID: 415801)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}(1+x)}{\cos ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)} d x=f(x)+c ; f(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sin \left(x e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\tan \left(\mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\cot \left(x e^{x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\sec \left(x e^{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int[/math]
 [math]\frac{e^{x}(1+x)}{\cos ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } z=x e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d z=e^{x}(1+x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \sec ^{2} z \cdot[/math]
 [math]d z=\tan z+c=\tan[/math]
 [math]\left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #408 (ID: 415797)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}, x=1, x=3[/math] এবং X-অক্ষ দ্বারা সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. 26/3 sq units
খ. 80/3 sq units
গ. 8/3 sq units
ঘ. 35/3 sq units


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:

[Image]
[math]A=\int_{1}^{3} x^{2} \mathrm{~d} x=\left(\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right)_{1}^{3}=\frac{27}{3}-\frac{1}{3}=\frac{26}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #409 (ID: 415798)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } \int_{1}^{4} f(x) d x=5, \text { the value of } \int_{0}^{1} f(3 x+1) d x \text { is- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-5}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]z=3 x+1 \Rightarrow d z=3 d x[/math]
 যখন, [math]x=0, z=1[/math]
এবং [math]x=1, z=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{1} f(3 x+1)[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{3} \int_{1}^{4} f(z)[/math]
 [math]d z=\frac{5}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #410 (ID: 415789)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math][0,2][/math] ব্যবধিতে [math]y=x-1[/math] এবং [math]y=0[/math]; রেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ অঞ্চলের মোট ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\int_{0}^{2}(x-1) d x[/math]
খ. [math]\int_{0}^{2}|x-1| d x[/math]
গ. [math]2 \int_{1}^{2}(1-x) d x[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \int_{0}^{1}(x-1) d x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
(যেহেতু, ক্ষেত্রফল সবসময়ই ধনাত্মক এবং পরমমানের সাহায্যে লিখা হয়)[math]\therefore \text { Area }=\int_{0}^{2}|x-1| d x[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #411 (ID: 415790)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}\right)^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2\left(\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}+1\right)}+\mathrm{C}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{2\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 e^{2 x}}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2 e^{2 x}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি , [math]e^{2 x}+1=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{dz}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d x}{\left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\left(e^{x}+\frac{1}{e^{x}}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\frac{\mathrm{d}}{2}}{\mathrm{z}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left(-\frac{1}{\mathrm{z}}\right)[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{C}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2\left(\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}+1\right)}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #412 (ID: 415791)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}\left(e^{x}\right)^{3 / 2}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
C. [math]2 e^{x / 2}+c[/math]
D. [math]e^{x / 2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{z}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{z}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{zdz}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{\sqrt{e^{x} \cdot e^{x}}}{e^{x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{z \cdot 2 z d z}{z^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int 2 d z=2 z+c[/math]
 [math]=2 e^{\frac{x}{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #413 (ID: 415792)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left|\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]d\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left|\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #414 (ID: 415793)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|+C[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left|\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=\int \tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right) \cdot d\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right) \\\quad=\ln \left|\sec \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)\right|+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #415 (ID: 415794)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2 \tan \frac{x}{2}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan \frac{x}{2}+C[/math]
C. [math]\tan \frac{x}{2}+C[/math]
D. [math]\tan x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x=\tan \frac{x}{2}+C[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #416 (ID: 415795)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি , [math]\int_{0}^{6} f(t) d t=8[/math] হয় তবে , [math]\int_{0}^{3} f(2 x) d x[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{6} f(t) d t=8[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{3} f(2 x) d x=\int_{0 \times 2}^{2 \times 3} \frac{f(2 x) d(2 x)}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left.=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{6} f(2 x) d(2 x)\right)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 8=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #417 (ID: 415796)

Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-1}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\sin x[/math]
B. [math]\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
C. [math]\cos x[/math]
D. [math]\sec ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=\sec ^{-1} x+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=\sec ^{-1} x[/math]

Question #418 (ID: 415765)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]I=\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)}[/math] হলে 1 এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]e+1[/math]
C. [math]\text { lne }-1[/math]
D. [math]\ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]1+\ln x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\begin{array}{l}I=\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)} \\\Rightarrow\int_{1}^{2} \frac{d z}{z} \\\left.=[\ln z]_{1}^{2}\right) \\\Rightarrow\ln 2-\ln 1 \\\Rightarrow\ln 2-0=\ln 2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #419 (ID: 415766)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin x^{\circ} d x=\text {}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\cos x^{\circ}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\cos x^{0}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{180}{\pi} \cos x^{\circ}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{180}{\pi} \cos x^{\circ}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \sin x^{\circ} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \sin \frac{x \pi}{180} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\cos \frac{x \pi}{180}}{\frac{\pi}{180}}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-180}{\pi} \cos x^{\circ}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #421 (ID: 415768)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{\theta} d \theta}{1+c^{6}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left(1+e^{\theta}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]1+c^{\theta}+c[/math]
C. [math]1+c^{\theta}+c[/math]
D. [math]\theta+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}1+e^{0}=z \\\therefore c^{\theta} d \theta=d z\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{e^{\theta} d \theta}{1+c^{\theta}}=\int \frac{d z}{z}=\ln z+c=\ln \left|1+e^{\theta}\right|+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #422 (ID: 415769)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \operatorname{cosec} x d x-1[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln |\sin x|+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln |\sec x|+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|\tan \frac{x}{2}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left|\tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \operatorname{cosec} x d x =\int \frac{d x}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{2 \sin \frac{x}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x}{2 \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} \sin \frac{x}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\left(\frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}\right)}{\tan \frac{x}{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left|\tan \frac{x}{2}\right|+c^{}[/math]
 [math]{\left.\left[\because \int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{f(x)} d x=\ln |f(x)|+c\right]\right] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{36-x^{2}}}=[/math] কত ?

A. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+C[/math]
B. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{6}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{6} \sin ^{-1} x+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{6} \sin ^{-1\frac{x}{6}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]

Question #424 (ID: 415771)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \ln x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]x \ln x-x[/math]
C. [math]x \ln x+x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \ln x d x=\ln x \int d x-\int\left[\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int d x\right] d x \\\Rightarrow x \ln x-\int \frac{1}{x} \cdot x \cdot d x=x \ln x-x+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #425 (ID: 415772)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin x d x[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin x d[/math]
 [math]x=[-\cos x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-[/math]
 [math]\left(\cos \frac{\pi}{2}-\cos 0\right)[/math]
 [math]=-(0-1)=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #426 (ID: 415773)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 2 \sin ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 2 \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\left[x-\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-0\right)-(0-0)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #427 (ID: 415774)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{3 d x}{1+x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3 \pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{3 d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=3\left[\tan ^{-1} x\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\tan ^{-1} 1-\tan ^{-1} 0\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left(\frac{\pi}{4}-0\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 \pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #428 (ID: 415775)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{2}^{3} \frac{x}{x^{2}-1} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \frac{8}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{8}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 24[/math]
D. [math]\ln 24[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{2}^{3} \frac{x}{x^{2}-1} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{2}^{3} \frac{2 x}{x^{2}-1} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left[\ln \left(x^{2}-1\right)\right\}_{2}^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\ln 8-\ln 3)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{8}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #429 (ID: 415776)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022, 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board, Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board, Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=4 x[/math] হলে—

i. [math]\int \frac{d x}{f(x)}=\frac{1}{4} \ln x+c[/math]

ii. [math]\int e^{f(x)} d x=\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c[/math]

iii. [math]\int_{0}^{2} f(x) d x=8[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{4 x}=\frac{1}{4} \ln x+c[/math]
 [math]\int e^{4 x} d x=\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{2} 4 x d x=\left[4 \frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=2\left(2^{2}-0\right)=8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #430 (ID: 415777)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1[/math] উপবৃত্তের ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]4 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]9 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]12 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]16 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1[/math]
 এখানে ,এর ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi \mathrm{ab}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{x^{2}}{4^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3^{2}}=1[/math]
 এর ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi \times 4 \times 3=12 \pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #431 (ID: 415778)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin 2 x[/math] হলে -

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{
ot(x)}{2 x}=1\\\text{ii. } f^{\prime}(x)=2 \cos 2 x\\\text{iii. } \int f(x) \mathrm{dx}=\cos 2 \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i,ii,ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
iii. সঠিক নয়। কারণ, [math]\int \sin 2 x d x=\frac{-\cos 2 x}{2}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #432 (ID: 415779)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=4 x[/math] [math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \int \frac{d x}{f(x)}=\frac{1}{4} \ln x+c\\\text{ii. } \int e^{f(x)} d x=\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c\\\text{iii. } \int_{0}^{2} f(x) \mathrm{dx}=8\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i,ii,ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{4 x}=\frac{1}{4} \ln x+c[/math]
 [math]\int e^{4 x} d x=\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{2} 4 x d x=\left[4 \frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{2}=2\left(2^{2}-0\right)=8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #433 (ID: 415780)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board

Question:

[math]f(x)=\cot x, g(x)=\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math] [math]\int f(x) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x+c[/math]
খ. [math]-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x+c[/math]
গ. [math]\ln |\operatorname{cosec} x|+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln (\sin x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:

Question #434 (ID: 415781)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\ln 2 x[/math] [math]f(x)[/math]বক্ররেখার [math]x = 2[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(\mathrm{x})=\ln 2 \mathrm{x} \therefore f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{1}{2 \mathrm{x}} \cdot 2=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \therefore \mathrm{x}=2[/math]
 : বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #435 (ID: 415782)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int f(x) d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2 x}+C[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{x}+C[/math]
গ. [math]x \ln 2 x+x+C[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \ln 2 x-x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int f(x) \mathrm{dx} =\int \ln 2 \mathrm{x} \cdot \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\ln 2 \mathrm{x} \int \mathrm{dx}-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\ln 2 \mathrm{x}) \int \mathrm{dx}\right) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\mathrm{x} \ln 2[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}-\int \frac{1}{2 \mathrm{x}} \cdot 2[/math]
 [math]\cdot \mathrm{x} \cdot \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\mathrm{x} \ln 2 \mathrm{x}-\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #436 (ID: 415783)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y=2x−x2 এবং x-অক্ষ দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. 34​ square units
খ. 32​ square units
গ. 38​ square units
ঘ. 1 square units


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_0^2 (2x - x^2)dx = x^2 - \frac{x^3}{3} \Rightarrow \frac{4}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #437 (ID: 415784)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
∫01​f(x)dx=8 হলে, ∫12​f(x+1)dx এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. 0
খ. 6
গ. 8
ঘ. 9


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
রূপান্তর [math]u = x+1 \Rightarrow[/math] সীমা হয় 1 থেকে 2, মান অপরিবর্তিত থাকে।

Explanation:

Question #438 (ID: 415785)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2(e+1)[/math]
B. [math]2(1-e)[/math]
C. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
D. [math](e+1)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x=\left[2 e^{\sqrt{x}}\right]_{0}^{1}=2(e-1)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #439 (ID: 415786)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}\left(e^{x}\right)^{3 / 2}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]
C. [math]2 e^{x / 2}+C[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x} / 2}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{e^{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\int \mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{x}}\mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{x}}}{\frac{1}{2}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x} / 2}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #440 (ID: 415787)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{2}|x-1| d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{2}|x-1| d x[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{1}-(x-1) d x+\int_{1}^{2}(x-1)[/math]
 [math]d x=-\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}-x\right]_{0}^{1}+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}-x\right]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\frac{1}{2}-1-0\right][/math]
 [math]+\left[\left(\frac{4}{2}-2\right)-\left(\frac{1}{2}-1\right)\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{1}{2}-1\right][/math]
 [math]+\left[0-\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #441 (ID: 415788)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{2\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 e^{2 x}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2 e^{2 x}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}+1[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{z}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d x}{\left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{2 e^{2 x} d x}{\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{d z}{z^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #442 (ID: 415760)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


ছায়াকৃত অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
A. [math]93[/math]
B. [math]46[/math]
C. [math]39[/math]
D. [math]33[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{2}^{5} x^{2} d x=\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{2}^{5}=\frac{125}{3}-\frac{8}{3}=39[/math] বর্গ একক

Explanation:

Question #443 (ID: 415761)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 x^{2}+25 y^{2}=100[/math] উপবৃত্ত দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]93[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]25 \pi[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]10 \pi[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]100 \pi[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1[/math]
 এখানে , [math]a=5[/math]
 ও [math]b=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 উপবৃত্তের দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi \times 5 \times 2=10 \pi[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
