Question #445 (ID: 415763)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=2 x[/math] [math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{x}\{f(x)+g(x)\} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]e[/math]
খ. [math]-e[/math]
গ. [math]2 \mathrm{e}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 e^{}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left(x^{2}+2 x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[e^{x} x^{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \int e^{2}[f(x)+P(x)] d x=e^{x} f(x)\right][/math]
 [math]=e-0=e[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #446 (ID: 415764)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}=g(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]g(\mathbf{x})[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sec \frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 \cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x} =\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \frac{\tan \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
 [math]=\tan \frac{x^{}}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore g(x)=\tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #447 (ID: 415734)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


চিত্রে ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{16}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{-2}^{2} x^{2} d x=\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{-2}^{2}=\frac{16}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #448 (ID: 415735)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=4 x^{2}[/math] বক্ররেখা এবং [math]x = 1[/math] ও [math]x = 2[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{24}{5}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]32[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{28}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
নির্ণেয় ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{1}^{2} 4 x^{2} \mathrm{dx} .[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{1}^{2}=\frac{4}{3}\left(2^{3}-1^{3}\right)=\frac{4}{3} \times 7=\frac{28}{3}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #449 (ID: 415736)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 \mathbf{a x}[/math] ও [math]x^{2}=4 a y[/math] পরাবৃত্ত দুটি দ্বারা সীমাবদ্ধ সমতল ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল নির্ণয়ের জন্য কোন যোগজটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\int_{0}^{4 a}\left(2 \sqrt{a x}-\frac{x^{2}}{4 a}\right) d x[/math]
খ. [math]\int_{0}^{4 a}\left(2 \sqrt{a x}-\frac{4 a}{x^{2}}\right) d x[/math]
গ. [math]\int_{0}^{4 a}\left(\frac{4 a}{x^{2}}-2 \sqrt{a x}\right) d x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\int_{0}^{4 a}\left(\sqrt{a x}-\frac{x^{2}}{2 a}\right) d x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 a x[/math]
 ও [math]x^{2}=4 a y[/math]
 সমীকরণদ্বয় হতে পাই,[math]\begin{array}{l}x^{4}=64 a^{3} x \\\Rightarrow x\left(x^{3}-64 a^{3}\right)=0 \\\Rightarrow x(x-4 a)\left(x^{2}+4 a x+16 a^{2}\right)=0 \therefore x=0,4 a\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{4 n}\left(y_{1}-y_{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{4 a}\left(2 \sqrt{a x}-\frac{x^{2}}{4 a}\right) d x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #450 (ID: 415737)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. } \int \frac{d x}{f(x)}=\frac{1}{2} \ln x+c[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \int e^{f(x)} d x=\frac{1}{2} e^{2 x}+c[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \int_{0}^{1} f(x) d x=1[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { i. } \int \frac{d x}{f(x)}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln x+c[/math]
 [math]\text { ii. } \int e^{f(x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{2 x} d x=\frac{1}{2} e^{2 x}+c[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \int_{0}^{1} f(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} 2 x d x[/math]
 [math]=2\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #451 (ID: 415738)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos x[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } f^{\prime}(2 t)=-\sin 2 t\\\text{ii. } \int f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-\mathrm{x}\right) \mathrm{dx}=-\cos \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}\\\text{iii. } \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} f(2 x) d x=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(2 t)=\cos 2 t \quad \therefore f^{\prime}(2 t)=-2 \sin 2 t[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { (i) }[/math]
 নং সঠিক ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #452 (ID: 415739)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin 2 x, g(x)=\sin ^{2} x[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. . } g^{\prime}(x)=f(x)[/math] হবে

[math]\text { ii. }\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x)}{g(x)}=0[/math] [math]\text { iii. }\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} f(x) \mathrm{dx}=1[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x)}{g(x)}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 2 x}{\sin ^{2} x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin x \cos x}{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 . \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \cot x=[/math]
 অসংজ্ঞায়িত[math]\therefore \text { (ii) }[/math]
 সঠিক নয় ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #453 (ID: 415740)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\sec x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\tan x[/math] [math]\int f(x) d x=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\ln \left|\tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{x}{2}\right)\right|+c[/math]
খ. [math]\ln \left|\tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)\right|+c[/math]
গ. [math]\ln |\sec x-\tan x|+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln |\tan x-\sec x|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #454 (ID: 415741)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\sec x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\tan x[/math] [math]\int e^{x} f(x)\{1+g(x)\} d x=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{e}^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
খ. [math]e^{x} g(x)+c[/math]
গ. [math]-e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]-e^{x} g(x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x} . \sec x\{1+\tan x\} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int e^{x}[/math]
 [math](\sec x+\sec x, \tan x) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d[/math]
 [math]x=e^{x} \cdot f(x)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #455 (ID: 415742)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\tan x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sec ^{2} x[/math] [math]\int f(x) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\ln \cos x+c[/math]
খ. [math]-\ln \sec x+c[/math]
গ. [math]\text { ln } \cos x+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln \sin x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int f(x) d x=\int \tan x \mathrm{dx}=\ln \sec x+\mathrm{c}=-\ln \cos x+c[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #456 (ID: 415743)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\tan x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sec ^{2} x[/math] [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} e^{x}\{f(x)+g(x)\} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]e^{\frac{\pi}{4}}-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\int e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d[/math]
 [math]x=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
এখানে, [math]f(x)=\tan x[/math]
 [math]g(x)=\sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(\tan x)[/math]
 [math]=f(x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} e^{x}\{f(x)+g(x)\} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\left[e^{x} f(x)\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[e^{x} \cdot \tan x\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=e^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\left(e^{0} \cdot \tan 0\right)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #457 (ID: 415744)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1-\cos x}=\text { কত ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4} \cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{4} \cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1-\cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \operatorname{cosec}^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{-\cot \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right)+c[/math]
 [math]=-\cot \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #458 (ID: 415745)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin \left(5-\frac{x}{10}\right) d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-10 \cos \left(5-\frac{x}{10}\right)[/math]
B. [math]10 \cos \left(5-\frac{x}{10}\right)[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{10} \cos \left(5-\frac{x}{10}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{10} \cos \left(5-\frac{x}{10}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}& 5-\frac{x}{10}=z \\\Rightarrow & 0-\frac{1}{10}=\frac{d z}{d x} \\\Rightarrow & d x=-10 d z\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sin \left(5-\frac{x}{10}\right) d x \\\Rightarrow-10 \int \sin z d z \\\Rightarrow10 \cos z+c \\\Rightarrow10 \cos \left(5-\frac{x}{10}\right)+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #459 (ID: 415746)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]I=\int \frac{\cos x}{\sqrt{\sin x}} d x[/math] হলে [math]1[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-2 \sqrt{\cos x}+c[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+c[/math]
C. [math]2 \cos x+c[/math]
D. [math]-2 \sin x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\sin x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}I &=\int \frac{\cos x}{\sqrt{\sin x}} d x=\int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}} \\&\Rightarrow2 \sqrt{z}+c=2 \sqrt{\sin x}+c\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #461 (ID: 415748)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin ^{4} x \cos x d x=f(x)+c[/math] সেখানে [math]c[/math] একটি ধ্রুবক হলে [math]f(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5} \cos ^{5} x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{5} x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\sin ^{5} x \cos ^{2} x}{10}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{5} \cos ^{5} x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \sin ^{4} x \cos x d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\begin{array}{l}\sin x=u \\\cos x d x=d u\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow\int u^{4} d u=\frac{1}{5} u^{5}+c \\\Rightarrow\frac{1}{5}(\sin x)^{5}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #462 (ID: 415749)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x e^{x^{2}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
B. [math]e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]x e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{x^{2}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x^{2}=z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 2 x d x=d z \\\therefore x d x=\frac{1}{2} d z\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int x e^{x^{2}} d x=\int e^{2} \frac{1}{2} d z=\frac{1}{2} e^{2}+c=\frac{1}{2} e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #463 (ID: 415750)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sin 2 x}{\cos ^{2} 2 x} d x=কত ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sec 2 x+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sec 2 x-c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sec 2 x+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sec 2 x-c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sin 2 x}{\cos ^{2} 2 x} d x[/math]
 [math]\int \tan 2 x \sec 2 x \cdot d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \sec 2 x+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #464 (ID: 415751)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022, 2019 | Boards: Mymensingh Board, Rajshahi Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x}{\sqrt{\sin x}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{\cos x}+C[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\cos x}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x d x}{\sqrt{\sin x}}=\int \frac{d(\sin x)}{\sqrt{\sin x}}=2 \sqrt{\sin x}+c[/math]

Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-1}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]\sec ^{-1} x[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
D. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-1}}=\sec ^{-1} x+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=\sec ^{-1} x[/math]

Question #466 (ID: 415753)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{9-x^{2}} d x=\text {কত ?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{9-x^{2}}+\frac{9}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{9-x^{2}}-\frac{9}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{9-x^{2}}+\frac{3}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{9-x^{2}}-\frac{3}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{9-x^{2}} \cdot d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \sqrt{3^{2}-x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{9-x^{2}}+\frac{9}{2}[/math]
 [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #467 (ID: 415754)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}(\cos x-\sin x) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} \cos x+c[/math]
C. [math]-\mathrm{e}^{x} \cos x_{3}+c[/math]
D. [math]-e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x}\left[f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right] d x=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
এখানে , [math]f(x)=\cos x[/math]
 এবং [math]f^{\prime}(x)=-\sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int e^{x}(\cos x-\sin x) d x=e^{x} \cos x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #468 (ID: 415755)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{-x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{c}-1[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{e}-1[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{e}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{e}+1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{-x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[-e^{-x}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=-\left(e^{-1}-e^{-0}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\left(\frac{1}{e}-1\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{e}+1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #469 (ID: 415756)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{5 x+3} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{8}-e^{3}[/math]
B. [math]\left(e^{3}-e^{8}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{5}\left(e^{8}-e^{3}\right)[/math]
D. [math]5\left(e^{8}-e^{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{5 x+3} d x=\frac{1}{5}\left[e^{5 x+3}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{1}{5}\left(e^{4}-e^{3}\right)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #470 (ID: 415757)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\cos ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\cos ^{-1}(x)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=-\int_{0}^{1} \cos ^{-1}(x) \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\frac{\left\{\cos ^{-1}(x)\right\}^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}\left\{\cos ^{-1}(0)\right\}^{2}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{\left\{\cos ^{-1}(1)\right\}^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #471 (ID: 415758)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\ln 3[/math]
D. [math]\ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\begin{array}{l}z=1+x^{2} \\\Rightarrow d z=2 x d x\end{array}[/math]
আবার , [math]\begin{array}{l}x=0, z=1+0^{2}=1 \\x=1, z=1+1^{2}=2\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{1} \frac{2 x d x}{1+x^{2}} \\\Rightarrow\int_{1}^{2} \frac{d z}{z} \\\Rightarrow[\ln z]_{1}^{2} \\\Rightarrow\ln 2-\ln 1=\ln \end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #472 (ID: 415759)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{e}} x \ln x d x=\text { কত ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{c}{2}-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{c}{2}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int x \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \int x d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int x d x\right] d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\ln x-\int \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\ln x-\frac{1}{2} \int x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{\sqrt{e}} x \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{e}}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{e}{2} \ln \sqrt{e}-\frac{\dot{e}}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]-\left(0-\frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{e}{2} \cdot \frac{1}{2}-\frac{e}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #473 (ID: 415692)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\sin x}{1+\cos ^{2} x} d x=\text { কত ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\cos x=z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow-\sin x=\frac{d z}{d x} \\\therefore \sin x d x=-d z\end{array}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\sin x}{1+\cos ^{2} x} d x \\\Rightarrow\int_{1}^{-1} \frac{-d z}{1+z^{2}} \\\Rightarrow\int_{-1}^{1} \frac{d z}{1+z^{2}} \\\Rightarrow\left[\tan ^{-1} z\right]-1 \\\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1}(1)-\tan ^{-1}(-1) \\\Rightarrow\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #474 (ID: 415693)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}-4} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} \ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
C. [math]x-\ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]x+\ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}-4} d x=\int \frac{x^{2}-4+4}{x^{2}-4} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int\left(1+\frac{4}{x^{2}-4}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int d x+4[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{1}{x^{2}-2^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+4 \frac{1}{2.2} \ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]
 [math]=x+\ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #475 (ID: 415694)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
- x এর একটি ফাংশন [math]f(x)[/math] হলে, [math]\int \frac{f(x)}{f(x)} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]f({\mathrm{x}})+\mathrm{c}[/math]
B. [math]f(x)+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})\right|+\mathrm{c}[/math]
D. [math]\ln |f(\mathrm{x})|+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{f(x)} d x=\ln |f(x)|+c[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #476 (ID: 415695)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{2-3 x} d x=\text { কত? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{2}{9}(2-3 x)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{6}(2-3 x)^{-\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]-(2-3 x)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]-3(2-3 x)^{-\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sqrt{2-3 x} d x=\int(2-3 x)^{\frac{1}{2}} d x \\\Rightarrow\frac{(2-3 x)^{\frac{3}{2}}}{\frac{3}{2} \times(-3)}+c=\frac{-2}{9}(2-3 x)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #477 (ID: 415696)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{2-3 x} d x=\text { কত? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{2}{9}(2-3 x)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{6}(2-3 x)^{-\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]-(2-3 x)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]-3(2-3 x)^{-\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sqrt{2-3 x} d x=\int(2-3 x)^{\frac{1}{2}} d x \\\Rightarrow\frac{(2-3 x)^{\frac{3}{2}}}{\frac{3}{2} \times(-3)}+c=\frac{-2}{9}(2-3 x)^{\frac{3}{2}}+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #478 (ID: 415697)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}+a^{2}}=K \cot ^{-1} \frac{a}{x}+c[/math] হলে [math]K=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-a[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{a}[/math]
D. [math]a[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}+a^{2}}=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+c=\frac{1}{a} \cot ^{-1} \frac{a}{x}+c \\\therefore k=\frac{1}{a}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #479 (ID: 415698)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \log _{a} x d x=\text { কত?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \log _{x} x d x=\int \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\ln x \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left\{\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \ln x-\int \frac{1}{x} \cdot x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \ln x-x+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{e} \log x d x[/math]
 [math]=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{e}[/math]
 [math]=(e \cdot \ln e-e)-(-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(e-e)+1=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #480 (ID: 415699)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 a x[/math] ও [math]x^{2}=4 a y[/math] পরাবৃত্ত দুটি দ্বারা সীমাবদ্ধ সমতল ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল নির্ণয়ের জন্য কোন যোগজটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\int_{0}^{4 a}\left(2 \sqrt{a x}-\frac{x^{2}}{4 a}\right) d x[/math]
খ. [math]\int_{0}^{4 a}\left(2 \sqrt{a x}-\frac{4 a}{x^{2}}\right) d x[/math]
গ. [math]\int_{0}^{4 a}\left(\frac{4 a}{x^{2}}-2 \sqrt{a x}\right) d x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\int_{0}^{42}\left(\sqrt{a x}-\frac{x^{2}}{2 a}\right) d x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 a x[/math]
 ও [math]x^{2}=4 a y[/math]
 - সমীকরণদ্বয় হতে পাই,[math]x^{4}=64 a^{3} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x\left(x^{3}-64 a^{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(x-4 a)[/math]
 [math]\left(x^{2}+4 a x+16 a^{2}\right)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0,4 a[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{4a}\left(y_{1}-y_{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{4a}\left(2 \sqrt{a x}-\frac{x^{2}}{4 a}\right) d x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #481 (ID: 415700)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{f(\mathrm{x})}=\frac{1}{2} \ln x+\mathrm{c}\\\text{ii. } \int \mathrm{e}^{f(x)} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{c}\\\text{iii. } \int_{0}^{1} f(x) d x=1\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক ?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i,ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { i. } \int \frac{d x}{f(x)}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{2 x}=\frac{1}{2} \ln x+c[/math]
 [math]\text { ii. } \int e^{f(x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{2 x} d x=\frac{1}{2} e^{2 x}+c[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{1} f(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} 2 x d x[/math]
 [math]=2\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #482 (ID: 415701)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(\mathbf{x})=\cos x[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } f^{\prime}(2 t)=-\sin 2 t\\\text{ii. } \int f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-\mathrm{x}\right) \mathrm{dx}=-\cos \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}\\\text{iii. } \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} f(2 x) d x=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i,ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(2 t)=\cos 2 t \therefore f(2 t)=-2 \sin 2 t[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 (i) নং সঠিক নয়

Explanation:

Question #483 (ID: 415702)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (x)[/math] হলে -

[math]\text { i. } \frac{d}{d x} f(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \quad \int f(\mathrm{x}) \mathrm{d} \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{x} \ln (\mathrm{x})-\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \int_{1}^{2} f(x) \mathrm{dx}=\ln 2[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i,ii,ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(iii) সঠিক নয়।কারণ- [math]\int_{1}^{2} f(x) d x=\int_{1}^{2} \ln x d x=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=(2 \ln 2-2)-(\ln 1-1)=2 \ln 2-2+1=2 \ln 2-1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #484 (ID: 415703)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin 2 x, g(x)=\sin ^{2} x[/math] হলে -

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } g^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=f(\mathrm{x}) \\\text{ii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x)}{g(x)}=0\\\text{iii.}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} f(x) d x=1\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x)}{g(x)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\frac{2 \sin x \cos x}{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
][math]=2 \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \cot x=[/math]
 অসংজ্ঞায়িত[math]\therefore[/math]
 (ii) নং সঠিক নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]F(x)=\operatorname{cosec} x[/math] হলে -

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \int F(x) d x=\ln |\operatorname{cosec} x+\cot x|+c\\\text{ii. } \int F(x) d x=\ln \left|\tan \frac{x}{2}\right|+c\\\text{iii. } \int F(x) d x=-\ln |\operatorname{cosec} x+\cot x|+c\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i,ii,ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \operatorname{cosec} x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\ln |\operatorname{cosec} x+\cot x|+c[/math]

Question:
যোগজীকরণের ক্ষেত্রে প্রযোজ্য—

[math]\text { : i. } \int f(\mathrm{x}) \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{F}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math] যেখানে [math]c[/math] - হল যোগজীকরণ ধ্রুবক

[math]\text { ii. } f({x})[/math] কে যোজ্য ফাংশন (Integrand) বলে

[math]\text { iii. } \frac{d}{d x}[/math] ও [math]\int \mathrm{dx}[/math] পরস্পর বিপরীত প্রক্রিয়া

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii

সব তথ্য সত্য।

Question #487 (ID: 415707)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\cot x, g(x)[/math] [math]=\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math] [math]\text{i. } \int g\left(\frac{x}{2}\right) d x[/math] [math]=-2 \cot \frac{x}{2}+c[/math] [math]\text{ii. } \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math] [math]\left\{f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 \mathrm{x}\right)\right\}[/math] [math]=2 \sec ^{2} 2 \mathrm{x}[/math] [math]\text{iii. } \int f(x) g(x) d x[/math] [math]=-\frac{1}{2} \cot ^{2} x+c[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i,ii,ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text{i. } \int g\left(\frac{x}{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \operatorname{cosec}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{x}{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\cot \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}+c=-2 \cot \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]\text{ii. } \frac{d}{d x}\left\{f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 x\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \cot \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \tan (2 x)[/math]
 [math]=2 \operatorname{scc}^{2} 2 x[/math]
 [math]\text{iii. } \int f(x) g(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \cot x \operatorname{cosec}^{2} x d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\cot x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d z}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \operatorname{cosec}^{2} x d x=-d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int z(-d z)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\frac{z^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{-1}{2} \cot ^{2} x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\sec x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\tan x[/math] [math]\int f(x) d x=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\ln \left|\tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{x}{2}\right)\right|+c[/math]
খ. [math]\ln \left|\tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)\right|+c[/math]
গ. [math]\ln |\sec x-\tan x|+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln |\tan x-\sec x|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #489 (ID: 415709)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(\mathrm{x})=\sec x[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{x})=\tan x[/math] [math]\int e^{x} f(x)\{1+g(x)\} d x=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{e}^{x} f(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math]
খ. [math]e^{x} g(x)+c[/math]
গ. [math]-\mathrm{e}^{x} f(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-e^{x} g(x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \cdot \sec x\{1+\tan x\} \mathrm{dx} \\\quad=\int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}(\sec x+\sec x \cdot \tan x) \mathrm{dx} \\\quad=\int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\left\{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})\right\}\mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}, f(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #490 (ID: 415710)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\tan x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sec ^{2} x[/math] [math]\int f(x) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\text { ln } \cos x+c[/math]
খ. [math]-\text { ln } \sec x+c[/math]
গ. [math]\text { ln } \cos x+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln \sin x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int f(x) d x =\int \tan x d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln \sec x+c[/math]
 [math]=-\ln \cos x+c^{}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #491 (ID: 415711)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} e^{x}\{f(x)+g(x)\} d x=\text {কত ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]e^{\frac{\pi}{4}}-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\int e^{x}\{f(x)+f(x)\} d x[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
এখানে, [math]f(x)=\tan x[/math]
 [math]g(x)=\sec ^{2} x=\frac{d}{d x}(\tan x)[/math]
 [math]=f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} e^{x}\{f(x)+g(x)\} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[e^{x} f(x)\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[e^{x} \cdot \tan x\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\left(e^{0} \cdot \tan 0\right)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #492 (ID: 415712)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt[3]{x}}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{3} x^{\frac{4}{3}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2} x^{\frac{2}{3}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2} x^{-\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3} x^{-\frac{2}{3}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]v\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt[3]{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{x^{\frac{1}{3}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int x^{-\frac{1}{3}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{-\left(\frac{1}{3}+1\right)}}{-\frac{1}{3}+1}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2} x^{\frac{2}{3}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #493 (ID: 415713)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5 \cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]-5 \cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{5} \cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}\left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \sin \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right) d x=\frac{-\cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)}{\frac{d}{d x}\left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)}+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-\cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)}{\frac{-1}{5}}+c=5 \cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #494 (ID: 415714)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\ln x^{2}}{x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2(\ln x)^{2}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\ln x)^{2}+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln x+c[/math]
D. [math](\ln x)^{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]I=\int \frac{\ln x^{2}}{x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow I=\int \frac{2 \ln x}{x} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\ln x=z \Rightarrow \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d z}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d x}{x}=d z[/math]
 [math]\because I=f 2 z d z=2 \cdot \frac{z^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]=z^{2}+c=(\ln x)^{2}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #495 (ID: 415715)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} p \sqrt{\tan p}} d p=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{\tan p}+c[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{\cot p}+c[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan p}+c[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\cot p}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan p=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sec ^{2} p d p=d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} p \sqrt{\tan p}} d p \\\Rightarrow \int \frac{\sec ^{2} p}{\sqrt{\tan p}} d p=\int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}}=2 \sqrt{z}+c=2 \sqrt{\tan p}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #496 (ID: 415716)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan (\ln x)}{x} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left(\sec ^{2} {x}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\text { In } \sec (\ln x)+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\sec x)+c^{}[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left(\tan ^{2} x\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\ln x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{\tan (\ln x)}{x} \mathrm{dx} \\\quad\Rightarrow \int \tan z d z \\\quad\Rightarrow \ln |\sec z|+\mathrm{c} \\\quad\Rightarrow \ln |\sec (\ln x)|+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #497 (ID: 415717)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{2-3 x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\ln (2-3 x)}{3}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\ln (2-3 x)}{3}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\ln (2-3 x)+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln (2-3 x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{2-3 x}=\frac{\ln (2-3 x)}{-3}+c=\frac{-\ln (2-3 x)}{3}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #498 (ID: 415718)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{16-25 x^{2}}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1} \frac{5 x}{4}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{5}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{5 x}{4}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{5}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{16-25 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{25\left(\frac{16}{25}-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{5} \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{4}{5}\right)^{2}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1}\frac{\frac{x}{4}}{5}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1} \frac{5 x}{4}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #499 (ID: 415719)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}+a^{2}}=K \cot ^{-1} \frac{a}{x}+c[/math] হলে [math]K=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-a[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{a}[/math]
D. [math]a[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}+a^{2}}=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+c=\frac{1}{a} \cot ^{-1} \frac{a}{x}+c \quad \therefore k=\frac{1}{a}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #500 (ID: 415720)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{4 x^{3}}{1+x^{8}} d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\sin ^{-1} x^{3}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1} x^{4}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} x^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{4 x^{3}}{1+x^{8}} d x=\int \frac{4 x^{3}}{1+\left(x^{4}\right)^{2}} d x^{8}=\int \frac{d\left(x^{4}\right)}{1+\left(x^{4}\right)^{2}}=\tan ^{-1} x^{4}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #502 (ID: 415722)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{-2 x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2\left(1-e^{-2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(2\left(e^{-2}-1\right)\right.[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{-2}-1\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(1-e^{-2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \mathrm{e}^{-2 x} \mathrm{dx}=\left[\frac{\mathrm{c}^{-2 x}}{-2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2}\left(e^{-2}-\mathrm{e}^{-0}\right)=\frac{-1}{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{-2}-1\right)=\frac{1}{2}\left(1-\mathrm{e}^{-2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #503 (ID: 415723)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{1+x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln 2-2[/math]
B. [math]1-2 \ln 2[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln 2-1[/math]
D. [math]2 \ln 2+2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{1+x} d x=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{-(1+x)+2}{1+x} d x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{1}\left(-1+\frac{2}{1+x}\right) d x=[-x+2 \ln (1+x)]_{0}^{1} \\\Rightarrow (-1+2 \ln 2)-(0+2 \ln 1)=2 \ln 2-1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #504 (ID: 415724)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\ln \frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{x}{1+x^{2}} d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}} d x=\frac{1}{2}\left[\ln \left(1+x^{2}\right)\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\ln 4-\ln 2)=\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{4}{2}=\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #505 (ID: 415725)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos 2 x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos 2 x d x=\left[\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}=\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin 2 \cdot \frac{\pi}{4}-\sin 0\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}\left(\sin \frac{\pi}{2}-0\right)=\frac{1}{2}(1-0)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #506 (ID: 415726)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1}{2 \cos ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \cdot \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[ \tan x] \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #507 (ID: 415727)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022, 2021, 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board, Barisal Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board, Jessore Board, Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \ln x d x[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{e}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \ln x \mathrm{dx}=\ln x \int 1 .[/math]
 [math]d x-\int\left\{\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\ln x) \int 1 . \mathrm{dx}\right\} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{e} \ln x d[/math]
 [math]x=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{e}[/math]
 [math]=(\text { $elne$ }-e)-(0-1)=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #508 (ID: 415728)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\sin ^{-1} p}{\sqrt{1-p^{2}}} d p[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি,[math]\begin{aligned}&\sin^{-1}p=z \\ \Rightarrow &\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-p^2}}dp=dz\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|l|l|l|}\hline \mathrm{p} & 0 & 1 \\ \hline \mathrm{z} & 0 & \pi / 2 \\ \hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int_0^1\frac{\sin^{-1}p}{\sqrt{1-p^2}}dp\\\Rightarrow\int_0^{\pi/2}zdz\\\Rightarrow\left[\frac{z^2}{2}\right]^{\pi/2}\\\Rightarrow\frac{\pi^2}{8}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #509 (ID: 415729)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin x}{5-\cos x} d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\text { ln } 20[/math]
B. [math]-\ln 20[/math]
C. [math]\ln 5-\ln 4[/math]
D. [math]\ln 4-\ln 5[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin x}{5-\cos x} d x[/math]
 [math]=[\ln (5-\cos x)]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{f(x)} \mathrm{dx}=\ln |\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})|+\mathrm{c}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln \left(5-\cos \frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]-\ln (5-\cos 0)[/math]
 [math]=\ln 5-\ln 4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #510 (ID: 415730)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos x d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\cos ^{-1}(x)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=-\int_{0}^{1} \cos ^{-1}(x) \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=-\left[\frac{\left\{\cos ^{-1}(x)\right\}^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #511 (ID: 415731)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\int_{1}^{5} \frac{d x}{2 x-1}=\ln P[/math] হয় তবে [math]P[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]9[/math]
গ. [math]10[/math]
ঘ. [math]81[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{5} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{2 \mathrm{x}-1} \stackrel{}{=}\left[\frac{\ln (2 x-1)}{2}\right]_{1}^{5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{\ln 9}{2}-\frac{\ln 1}{2}=\frac{1}{2} \ln 9=\frac{1}{2} \ln 3^{2}=\frac{1}{2} \cdot 2 \ln 3=\ln 3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #512 (ID: 415732)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=36[/math] বৃত্ত দ্বারা প্রথম চতুর্ভাগে আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]36 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]24 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]12 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]9 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=36 \Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=6^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বৃত্তটির ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi \times 6^{2}=36 \pi[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 প্রথম চতুর্ভাগে আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{36 \pi}{4}=9 \pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #513 (ID: 415733)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{25}=1[/math] উপবৃত্তটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক ?

Options:
ক. [math]16 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]20 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]25 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]400 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1[/math]
উপবৃত্তের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]\pi a b[/math]
 বর্গ একক।সুতরাং [math]\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{25}=1 \Rightarrow \frac{x^{2}}{4^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{5^{2}}=1[/math]
উপবৃত্তটির ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi .4 .5[/math]
 বর্গ একক [math]=20 \pi[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:

Question:

[Image]


চিত্রে ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{16}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{-2}^{2} x^{2} d x=\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{-2}^{2}=\frac{16}{3}[/math]

Question #515 (ID: 415685)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1-\cos x}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে, [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-2 \cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 \cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1-\cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{1}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} \int[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} x-\frac{\cot \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
 [math]=-\cot \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)[/math]
 [math]=-\cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #516 (ID: 415686)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{2-3 x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\ln (2-3 x)}{3}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\ln (2-3 x)}{3}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\ln (2-3 x)+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln (2-3 x)+c^{}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{2-3 x}=\frac{\ln (2-3 x)}{-3}+c=\frac{-\ln (2-3 x)}{3}+c[/math]

Question #517 (ID: 415687)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x=2\left[\tan \frac{x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \\\quad\Rightarrow2\left(\tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\tan 0\right)=2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #518 (ID: 415688)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=36[/math] বৃত্ত দ্বারা প্রথম চতুর্ভাগে আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]36 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]24 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]12 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]9 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=36 \Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=6^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বৃত্তটির ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi \times 6^{2}=36 \pi[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 প্রথম চতুৰ্ভাগে আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{36 \pi}{4}=9 \pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #519 (ID: 415689)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \ln x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]e[/math]
খ. [math]e+1[/math]
গ. [math]e - 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{c} \ln x d x=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{c}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e} \ln[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{e}-\mathrm{e}-1[/math]
 [math]\ln 1+1=\mathrm{e}-\mathrm{e}-0+1=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #520 (ID: 415690)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=4 x^{2}[/math] বক্ররেখা এবং [math]x = 1 x 2[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{24}{5}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]বর্গ একক
গ. [math]32[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{28}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
নির্ণেয় ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{1}^{2} 4 x^{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=4\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3}\left(2^{3}-1^{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\times 7[/math]
 [math]=\frac{28}{3}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #521 (ID: 415691)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x}{5}+\frac{y}{6}=1[/math] রেখাটি অক্ষদ্বয়ের সাথে যে ত্রিভুজ উৎপন্ন করে তার ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]6[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]15[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]30[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\frac{x}{a}+\frac{y}{b}=1[/math]
 সরলরেখা অক্ষদ্বয়ের সাথে যে ত্রিভুজ উৎপন্ন করে তার ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2} a b^{2}[/math]
 বর্গ একক[math]\therefore \frac{x}{5}+\frac{y}{6}=1[/math]
 রেখাটি অক্ষদ্বয়ের সাথে যে ত্রিভুজ উৎপন্ন করে তার ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2} \times 5 \times 6=15[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #522 (ID: 415675)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


চিত্রটির ক্ষেত্রে ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{9 \pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{9 \pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]9 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল[math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} x[/math]
 বৃত্তের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2} \times \pi \times 3^{2}=\frac{9 \pi}{2}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #523 (ID: 415676)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan (\ln x)}{x} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left(\sec ^{2} x\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\text { ln } \sec (\ln x)+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\sec x)+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left(\tan ^{2} \dot{x}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\ln x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{\tan (\ln x)}{x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \tan z d z[/math]
 [math]=\ln |\sec z|+c[/math]
 [math]\ln |\sec (\ln x)|+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

D. [math]x \cdot 7^{x-1}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Question #525 (ID: 415678)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin x^{\circ} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\cos x^{\circ }+c[/math]
B. [math]\cos x^{\circ }+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \cos \frac{\pi x}{180}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \cos \frac{\pi x}{180}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \sin x^{\circ} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \sin \frac{\pi x}{180} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\cos \frac{\pi x}{180}}{\frac{\pi}{180}}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-180}{\pi} \cos \frac{\pi x}{180}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #526 (ID: 415679)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin x}{5-\cos x} d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\ln 20[/math]
B. [math]-\ln 20[/math]
C. [math]\ln 5-\ln 4[/math]
D. [math]\ln 4-\ln 5[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin x}{5-\cos x} d x \\\quad\Rightarrow[\ln (5-\cos x)]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\left[\because \int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{f(x)} d x=\ln |f(x)|+c\right] \\\quad\Rightarrow\ln \left(5-\cos \frac{\pi}{2}\right)-\ln (5-\cos 0)=\ln 5-\ln 4\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #527 (ID: 415680)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}, X[/math] অক্ষে [math]x = 0[/math] এবং [math]x = 3[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল–

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]6[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{3} y d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{3} x^{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3^{3}}{3}=9[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #528 (ID: 415681)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt[3]{x}}[/math] সমান?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{3} x^{\frac{4}{3}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2} x^{\frac{2}{3}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2} x^{-\frac{3}{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3} x^{-\frac{2}{3}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt[3]{x}}=\int \frac{d x}{x^{\frac{1}{3}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int x^{-\frac{1}{3}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{-\left(\frac{1}{3}+1\right)}}{-\frac{1}{3}+1}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2} x^{\frac{2}{3}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #529 (ID: 415682)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{9-x^{2}}}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{3}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{3}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{x}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{x}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{9-x^{2}}}=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{3^{2}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{3}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #530 (ID: 415683)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos x d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ক্যালকুলেটরের সাহায্যে অথবা[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos x d x=\left(-\cos \frac{\pi}{2}+\cos 0^{\circ}\right)=1[/math]

Explanation:
