Question #531 (ID: 415673)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\sin ^{-1} x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=d z^{\prime}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \mathrm{dx} \\\quad=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \mathrm{zdz}=\left[\frac{z^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \\\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}\left\{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)^{2}-0^{2}\right\}=\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{\pi^{2}}{4}=\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #532 (ID: 415674)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{3} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\text { ln } 10[/math]
B. [math]\ln 5[/math]
C. [math]\ln 4[/math]
D. [math]\ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{3} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\ln \left(1+x^{2}\right)\right]_{1}^{3}[/math]
 [math]\left[\therefore \int \frac{f(x)}{f(x)} d x=\ln |f(x)|+c\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\ln 10-\ln 2[/math]
 [math]=\ln \frac{10}{2}=\ln 5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #533 (ID: 415661)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x e^{x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]1-\frac{2}{e}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}(e-1)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} \mathrm{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x^{2}=z \Rightarrow 2 x d x=d z\Rightarrow x d x=\frac{1}{2} d z[/math]

[Image]
[math]\therefore \int_{0}^{1} x e^{x^{2}} d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} e^{x^{2}} d z=\frac{1}{2}\left[e^{x}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{1}{2}(e-1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #534 (ID: 415662)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{1+x} \mathrm{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln 2-2[/math]
B. [math]1-2 \ln 2[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln 2-1[/math]
D. [math]2 \ln 2+2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{1+x} d x=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{-(1+x)+2}{1+x} d x \\\left.\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{1}\left(-1+\frac{2}{1+x}\right) d x=[-x+2 \ln (1+x)]\right]_{0}^{1} \\\Rightarrow(-1+2 \ln 2)-(0+2 \ln 1)=2 \ln 2-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #535 (ID: 415663)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\ln x^{2}}{x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2(\ln x)^{2}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\ln x)^{2}+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln x+c[/math]
D. [math](\ln x)^{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]I=\int \frac{\ln x^{2}}{x} d x\Rightarrow I=\int \frac{2 \ln x}{x} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\ln x=z \Rightarrow \frac{1}{x}=\frac{d z}{d x} \therefore \frac{d x}{x}=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore I=\int 2 \mathrm{zdz}=2 \cdot \frac{\mathrm{z}^{2}}{2}+\mathrm{c}=\mathrm{z}^{2}+\mathrm{c}=(\ln \mathrm{x})^{2}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #536 (ID: 415664)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} p \sqrt{\tan p}} d p=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{\tan p}+c[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{\operatorname{cotp}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan p}+c[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\cot p}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan p=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sec ^{2} \mathrm{pdp}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} p \sqrt{\tan p}} d p \\\Rightarrow\int \frac{\sec ^{2} p}{\sqrt{\tan p}} d p=\int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}} \\\Rightarrow2 \sqrt{z}+c=2 \sqrt{\tan p}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #537 (ID: 415665)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\sin ^{-1} p}{\sqrt{1-p^{2}}} d p[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\sin ^{-1} p}{\sqrt{1-p^{2}}} d p=\frac{1}{2}\left[\left(\sin ^{-1} p\right)^{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{1}{2}\left[\left(\sin ^{-1} 1\right)^{2}-\left(\sin ^{-1} 0\right)^{2}\right] \\=\frac{1}{2}\left(\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}-0\right)=\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #538 (ID: 415666)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left(\frac{1}{x}-\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right) d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{e^{x}}{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{e^{x}}{x^{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{x}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\int c^{2}\left\{(f(x)+f(x)\} d x=c^{x} f(x)+c\right.[/math]
ধরি, [math]f(\mathrm{x})=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \therefore f(\mathrm{x})=\frac{-1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \mathrm{c}^{x}\left(\frac{1}{x}-\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right) d x=e^{x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #539 (ID: 415667)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\ln \frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left[\ln \left(1+x^{2}\right)\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}(\ln 4-\ln 2)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{4}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #541 (ID: 415669)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\int_{1}^{5} \frac{d x}{2 x-1}=\ln P[/math] হয় তবে P এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]9[/math]
গ. [math]10[/math]
ঘ. [math]81[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{1}^{5} \frac{d x}{2 x-1}=\left[\frac{\ln (2 x-1)}{2}\right]_{1}^{5} \\\quad\Rightarrow\frac{\ln 9}{2}-\frac{\ln 1}{2}=\frac{1}{2} \ln 9=\frac{1}{2} \ln 3^{2}=\frac{1}{2} .2 \ln 3=\ln 3\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #542 (ID: 415670)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{4 x^{3}}{1+x^{8}} d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(\mathbf{x})[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\sin ^{-1} x^{3}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1} x^{4}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} x^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{4 x^{3}}{1+x^{8}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{4 x^{3}}{1+\left(x^{4}\right)^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d\left(x^{4}\right)}{1+\left(x^{4}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} x^{4}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #543 (ID: 415671)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{16-25 x^{2}}}=\text { কত?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1} \frac{5 x}{4}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{5}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{5 x}{4}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{5}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{16-25 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{25\left(\frac{16}{25}-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{5} \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{4}{5}\right)^{2}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{\frac{4}{5}}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5} \sin ^{-1} \frac{5 x}{4}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

D. [math]2 \sqrt{f(x)}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Question #545 (ID: 415650)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (x+1)}{x+1} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 \ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]
C. [math]2(\ln 2)^{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি [math]z=\ln (x+1)[/math]
বা, [math]\frac{d}{d x}(z)=\frac{d}{d x}\{\ln (x+1)\}[/math]
বা, [math]\frac{d z}{d x}=\frac{1}{x+1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{dz}=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}+1} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
যখন [math]x = 1[/math]
 তখন [math]z = ln~2[/math]
যখন [math]x = 0[/math]
 তখন [math]z = 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}& \int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (x+1)}{x+1} d x \\= & \int_{0}^{\ln 2} z d z \\= & {\left[\frac{z^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{\ln 2}+c } \\= & \frac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}+c\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #546 (ID: 415651)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}-\sin ^{8} \theta \cos \theta d \theta[/math] এর মান [math]-[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{7}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\sin 0=z[/math]
বা, [math]\frac{d}{d x}(\sin 0)=\frac{d}{d 0}(x)[/math]
বা, [math]\cos 0=\frac{d z}{d 0}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{dz}=\cos 0 \mathrm{~d} \theta[/math]
যখন' [math]\theta=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 তখন [math]z=1[/math]
যখন [math]\theta= 0[/math]
 তখন [math]z = 0[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{\star} 0 \cos \theta d \theta[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\int_{0}^{1} z^{8} d z \\=\left[\frac{z^{8+1}}{8+1}\right]_{0}^{1} \\=\frac{1}{9}\left(1^{9}-0\right)=\frac{1}{9}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #547 (ID: 415652)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{2} x d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{2} x d x & =\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 2 \cos ^{2} x d x \\& =\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1+\cos 2 x) d x \\& =\frac{1}{2}\left[x+\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\pi / 2} \\& =\frac{1}{2}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}+\frac{\sin \pi}{2}-0-\sin 0\right) \\& =\frac{1}{2}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}+0-0-0\right)=\frac{\pi}{4}\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #548 (ID: 415653)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{3} f(x) d x=4[/math] হলে [math]\int_{2}^{5} f(x-2) d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x-2=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dy}[/math]
যখন [math]x = 5[/math]
 তখন [math]y = 3[/math]
যখন [math]x = 2[/math]
 তখন [math]y = 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \int_{2}^{5} f(x-2) d x \\=\int_{0}^{3} f(y) d y \\=\int_{0}^{3} f(x) d x=4\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #549 (ID: 415654)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{x^{2}+1}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}\therefore \int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{x^{2}+1} & =\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}} \\& =\left[\tan ^{-1} x\right] \\& =\tan ^{-1} 1-\tan ^{-1} 0 \\& =\frac{\pi}{4}-0 \\& =\frac{\pi}{4}\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #550 (ID: 415655)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5 \cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]-5 \cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{5} \cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}\left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \sin \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right) d x=\frac{-\cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)}{\frac{d}{d x}\left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)}+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{-\cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)}{\frac{-1}{5}}+c=5 \cos \left(10-\frac{x}{5}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #551 (ID: 415656)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos 2 x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos 2 x d x=\left[\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}=\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin 2 \cdot \frac{\pi}{4}-\sin 0\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin \frac{\pi}{2}-0\right)=\frac{1}{2}(1-0)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #552 (ID: 415657)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{-2 x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2\left(1-e^{-2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(2\left(e^{-2}-1\right)\right.[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(e^{-2}-1\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(1-e^{-2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{-2 x} d x=\left[\frac{e^{-2 x}}{-2}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{-1}{2}\left(e^{-2}-e^{-0}\right)=\frac{-1}{2}\left(e^{-2}-1\right)=\frac{1}{2}\left(1-e^{-2}\right)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #553 (ID: 415658)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{25}=1[/math] উপবৃত্তটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]16 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]20 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]25 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]400 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1[/math]
উপবৃত্তের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]\pi a b[/math]
 বর্গ একক।উপবৃত্তটির ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi .4 .5[/math]
 বর্গ একক [math]=20 \pi[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:

Question #554 (ID: 415659)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{3-4 x^{2}}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{\sqrt{3}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{\sqrt{3}}+c[/math]
C. [math]2 \sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{\sqrt{3}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{\sqrt{3 x}}{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{3-4 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{4\left(\frac{3}{4}-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\right)^{2}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{\sqrt{3}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #555 (ID: 415660)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{-2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{-3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1}{2 \cos ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[\tan x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #556 (ID: 415613)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


চিত্রে ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
A. [math]-\dfrac{5}{6}[/math]
B. [math]-\dfrac{1}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\dfrac{1}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\dfrac{5}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
প্রদত্ত সমীকরণদ্বয়: [math]\mathrm {y=x^{2}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\mathrm {y = -x}[/math]
এখন, [math]\mathrm x^{2}=-x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(x+1)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0,-1[/math]
অতএব ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল[math]\mathrm {= \int_{-1}^0} \{(- \mathrm x) - (\mathrm x^2)\} \mathrm {dx} = - \int_{-1}^0 \mathrm {(x+x^2)dx} = \int_0^{-1} \mathrm {(x+x^2) dx}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm =\bigg [\dfrac{x^2}{2}+\dfrac{x^3}{2}\bigg]_0^{-1}[/math]
 [math]= \dfrac{1}{2}+ \dfrac{-1}{3}- 0[/math]
 [math]= \dfrac{1}{2}-\dfrac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]= \dfrac{1}{6}[/math]
 বর্গ একক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #557 (ID: 415614)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{-10 x} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{-10 x}+c[/math]
B. [math]-10 e^{-10 x}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{e^{-10 x}}{10}+c[/math]
D. [math]-e^{-10 x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{-10 x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-10} e^{-10 x}+c[/math]
 [math]~~~~~~~~\left[\because \int e^{m x} d x=\frac{1}{m} e^{m x}+c\right][/math]
 [math]=-\frac{e^{-10 x}}{10}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #558 (ID: 415615)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)[/math] এর যোগজ-

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\ln x+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\ln \mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর যোগজ [math]=\int\left[\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)\right] d x[/math]
যেহেতু, [math]\int\left[\frac{d}{d x}\{F(x)\}\right] d x=F(x)+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int\left[\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)\right] d x=\ln x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #559 (ID: 415616)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1} x^{2} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}& \int_{-1}^{1} x^{2} d x \\= & {\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{-1}^{1} } \\= & \frac{1}{3}\left\{1^{3}-(-1)^{3}\right\} \\= & \frac{1}{3}\{1-(-1)\}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{1}{3}(1+1) \\=\frac{2}{3}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #561 (ID: 415618)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{3 \sqrt{x}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1}{3 \sqrt{x}} d x=\frac{1}{3} \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} d x=\frac{1}{3} \times 2 \sqrt{x}+c[/math]

Question #562 (ID: 415619)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022, 2019 | Boards: Mymensingh Board, Rajshahi Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x}{\sqrt{\sin x}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{\cos x}+C[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\cos x}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x d x}{\sqrt{\sin x}}=\int \frac{d(\sin x)}{\sqrt{\sin x}}=2 \sqrt{\sin x}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #563 (ID: 415620)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{5}{1-5 x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln (1-5 x)+c[/math]
B. [math]-\ln (1-5 x)+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\ln (1-5 x)}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-\ln (1-5 x)}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{5}{1-5 x} d x=5 \int \frac{1}{1-5 x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{5 \cdot \ln (1-5 x)}{\frac{d}{d x}(1-5 x)}=\frac{5 \cdot \ln (1-5 x)}{-5}-\ln (1-5 x)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #564 (ID: 415621)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cot x}{\sqrt{\sin x}} d x[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-2}{\sqrt{\sin x}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{\sin x}}+x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sin x}}+c[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cot x}{\sqrt{\sin x}} d x=\int \frac{\cos x}{\sin x \sqrt{\sin x}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int \frac{\cos x}{(\sin x)^{\frac{3}{2}}} d x=\int \frac{d z}{z^{\frac{3}{2}}}[/math]
 [ ধরি [math]z=\sin x ][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-2}{\sqrt{z}}+c=\frac{-2}{\sqrt{\sin x}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #565 (ID: 415622)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{18-2 x^{2}}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3 \sqrt{2}} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{6 \sqrt{2}} \ln \left|\frac{3+x}{3-x}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{6 \sqrt{2}} \ln \left|\frac{x-3}{x+3}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{18-2 x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{3^{2}-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{3}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #566 (ID: 415623)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 10^{5 x} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{10^{5 x}}{\ln 10}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{10^{5 x}}{5 \ln 10}+c[/math]
C. [math]5.10^{5 x} \ln 10+c[/math]
D. [math]10^{5 x} \ln 10+0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int 10^{5 x} d x=\frac{10^{5 x}}{\ln 10 \frac{d}{d x}(5 x)}=\frac{10^{5 x}}{5 \ln 10}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #567 (ID: 415624)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left(\frac{1}{x}+\ln x\right) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \ln x+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}+\ln x+C[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}+C[/math]
D. [math]e^{x}+\frac{1}{x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\left\{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})\right\} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]f(x)=\ln x[/math]
 হলে [math]f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int e^{x}\left(\frac{1 }{x}+\ln x\right) d x=e^{x} \ln x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #568 (ID: 415625)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{10 x}\left[10 \ln x+\frac{1}{x}\right] d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{10 x} \ln |x|+c[/math]
B. [math]e^{10 x} \cdot 10 \ln |x|+c[/math]
C. [math]10 e^{x} \ln |x|+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{10} \mathrm{e}^{10 x} \cdot \ln |x|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\int e^{a x}\left[a f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right] d x=e^{a x} f(x)+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int e^{10 x}\left[10 \ln x+\frac{1}{x}\right] d x=e^{10 x} \ln |x|+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #569 (ID: 415626)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{24}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}& \int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}=\left[\tan ^{-1} x\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \\\Rightarrow & \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{3}-\tan ^{-1} 1=\frac{\pi}{3}-\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{12}\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #570 (ID: 415627)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]-\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-\left(x^{2}-2 x+1\right)}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin ^{-1} 0-\sin ^{-1}(-1)=0+\sin ^{-1} 1=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #571 (ID: 415628)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{3 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]4\left(e^{4}-1\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5}\left(e^{5}-1\right)[/math]
C. [math]5\left(e^{5}-1\right)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left(e^{4}-1\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{3 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{3 x}\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)}{e^{-x}\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{1} e^{4 x} d x=\left[\frac{e^{4 x}}{4}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{1}{4}\left(e^{4}-1\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #572 (ID: 415629)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \sec \theta d \theta=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln (\sqrt{2}+1)[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\sqrt{2}+1)[/math]
D. [math]\ln (\sqrt{2}-1)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \sec[/math]
 [math]\theta d \theta=[\ln |\sec x+\tan x|]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln[/math]
 [math]\left|\sec \frac{\pi}{4}+\tan \frac{\pi}{4}\right|-[/math]
 [math]\ln |\sec 0+\tan 0|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln |\sqrt{2}+1|-\ln |1+0|[/math]
 [math]=\ln |\sqrt{2}+1|-\ln 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln |\sqrt{2}+1|-0[/math]
 [math]=\ln |\sqrt{2}+1|[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #573 (ID: 415630)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} x}=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}[\tan x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}=\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\tan 0\right)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #574 (ID: 415631)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln 2} \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln 2} \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\left[\ln \left|1+\mathrm{e}^{x}\right|\right]_{0}^{\ln 2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{f(x)} d x=\ln |f(x)|+c\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln \left|1+e^{\ln 2}\right|[/math]
 [math]-\ln \left|1+e^{0}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\ln 3-\ln 2=\ln \frac{3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #575 (ID: 415632)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{2} \theta \cos \theta d \theta[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{-9}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{9}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{9}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]z=\sin {\theta}[/math]
 [math]\therefore d z=\cos \theta \cdot d \theta[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|c|c|c|}\hline \theta & \frac{\pi}{2} & 0 \\\hline z & 1 & 0 \\\hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{8} \theta \cos \theta d \theta[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{1} z^{8} \cdot d z \\\Rightarrow \left[\frac{z^{9}}{9}\right]_{0}^{1} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{9}-\frac{0}{9}=\frac{1}{9}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #576 (ID: 415633)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]I=\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)}[/math] হলে [math]I[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\text { e }[/math]
B. [math]\text { } e+1[/math]
C. [math]\ln e-1[/math]
D. [math]\ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]1+\ln x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{x} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|l|l|l|}\hline x & 1 & \mathbf{e} \\\hline z & 1 & 2 \\\hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]I=\int_{2}^{1} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{2} \frac{1}{\mathrm{z}} \mathrm{dz}=[\ln \mathrm{z}]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln 2-\ln 1=\ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #577 (ID: 415634)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022, 2021, 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board, Barisal Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board, Jessore Board, Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \ln x d x[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{e}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \ln x \mathrm{dx}=\ln x \int 1 .[/math]
 [math]d x-\int\left\{\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\ln x) \int 1 . \mathrm{dx}\right\} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{e} \ln x d[/math]
 [math]x=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{e}[/math]
 [math]=(\text { $elne$ }-e)-(0-1)=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #578 (ID: 415635)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{3} f(x)=4[/math] হলে [math]\int_{2}^{5} f(x-2)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x-2=z \therefore d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|c|c|c|}\hline \mathrm{x} & 5 & 2 \\\hline \mathrm{z} & 3 & 0 \\\hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{5}^{2} f(x-2) d x=\int_{0}^{3} f(z) d z=4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #580 (ID: 415637)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y-অক্ষ এবং [math]x=4-y^{2}[/math] পরাবৃত্ত দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{32}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]\frac{2}{33}[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{33}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}x=4-y^{2} & \Rightarrow 0=4-y^{2} \\& \Rightarrow y^{2}=4 \Rightarrow y= \pm 2\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ছেদবিন্দু : [math](0, 2)[/math]
 এবং [math](0,-2)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{-2}^{2}\left(4-y^{2}\right) d y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[4 y-\frac{y^{3}}{3}\right]_{-2}^{42}=\left(4.2-\frac{2^{3}}{3}\right)-\left(\frac{2^{3}}{3}-4.2\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 8-\frac{8}{3}-\frac{8}{3}+8= 16-\frac{16}{3}=\frac{32}{3}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #581 (ID: 415639)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022, 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board, Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board, Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=4 x[/math] হলে—

i. [math]\int \frac{d x}{f(x)}=\frac{1}{4} \ln x+c[/math]

ii. [math]\int e^{f(x)} d x=\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c[/math]

iii. [math]\int_{0}^{2} f(x) d x=8[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{4 x}=\frac{1}{4} \ln x+c[/math]
 [math]\int e^{4 x} d x=\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{2} 4 x d x=\left[4 \frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=2\left(2^{2}-0\right)=8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #582 (ID: 415640)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে—

i. [math](1, 2)[/math] বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের ঢাল [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]

ii. [math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{2 x}{f(x)} d x=\ln 2[/math]

iii. ফাংশনটির চরম বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math](0, 1)[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { (i) } f(x)=x^{2}+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=2 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore(1,2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=2.1=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অভিলম্বের ঢাল [math]=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\text { (ii) } \int_{0}^{1} \frac{2 x}{f(x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{2 x}{x^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\ln \left(x^{2}+1\right)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln 2-\ln 1[/math]
 [math]=\ln 2-0=\ln 2[/math]
(iii) চরম বিন্দুর জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=2 x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(0)[/math]
 [math]=0^{2}+1=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 চরম বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math](0, 1 )[/math]
সুতরাং তিনটি তথ্যই সঠিক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #583 (ID: 415641)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-2(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}+\dot{c}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{3}(\sqrt{1-x})(x+2)+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3}(\sqrt{1-x})(x+2)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}& \int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x}}=\int \frac{1-1+x}{\sqrt{1-x}} d x=\int \frac{1-(1-x)}{\sqrt{1-x}} d x \\= & \int\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x}}-\frac{1-x}{\sqrt{1-x}}\right) d x \\= & \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x}} d x-\int \sqrt{1-x} d x\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=-2 \sqrt{1-x}+\frac{(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}+1}}{\frac{1}{2}+1}+c \\=\frac{2}{3}(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-2 \sqrt{1-x}+c \\=\frac{2}{3}(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-2(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #584 (ID: 415642)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{3 \sqrt{x}} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{\mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\therefore \int \frac{1}{3 \sqrt{x}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{2}{3} \int \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #585 (ID: 415643)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left(\frac{1}{x}+\ln x\right) d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \ln x+C[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}+\ln~x+C[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}+C[/math]
D. [math]e^{x}+\frac{1}{x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=\ln x[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}& \int e^{x}\left(\frac{1}{x}+\ln x\right) d x \\= & \int e^{x}\left(\ln x+\frac{1}{x}\right) d x\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} \ln x+C\left[\because \int e^{x}\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x=e^{x} f(x)+C\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #586 (ID: 415644)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x} \cos x(1+\tan x) d x[/math] এর মান ব কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \cos x+c[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \tan \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \sec x+c[/math]
D. [math]e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x} \cos x(1+\tan x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{x}(\cos x+\sin x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x) d x[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} \sin x+c~~~~~~~~~\left[\because \int e^{x}\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x=e^{x} f(x)+c\right][/math]


Explanation:

Question #587 (ID: 415645)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{5}{1-5 x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\ln (1-5 x)+c[/math]
B. [math]-\ln (1-5 x+c)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\ln (1-5 x)}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-\ln (1-5 x)}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{5}{1-5 x} d x=5 \cdot \frac{1}{-5} \ln (1-5 x)+c=-\ln (1-5 x)+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #588 (ID: 415646)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]-\int_{2}^{1} \ln x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \ln 2-1[/math]
খ. [math]2 \ln 2+1[/math]
গ. [math]2 \ln 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \ln x d x=\ln x \int d x-\int\left\{\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\begin{array}{l}=x \ln x-\int \frac{1}{x} \cdot x d x \\=x \ln x-x+c\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\therefore-\int_{2}^{1} \ln x d x & =-[x \ln x-x]_{2}^{1} \\& =-[(1 \ln 1-1)-(2 \ln 2-2)] \\& =1+2 \ln 2-2=2 \ln 2-1\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #589 (ID: 415647)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2 \mathrm{e}^{-1}[/math]
B. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{e}-1[/math]
D. [math]1-\frac{1}{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\sqrt{x}=z[/math]
বা, [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{d z}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}}} \mathrm{dx}=2 \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}& \int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x \\= & \int_{0}^{1} e^{z} \cdot 2 d z \\= & 2 \int_{0}^{1} e^{z} d z \\= & 2\left[e^{x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{1} \\= & 2\left(e^{1}-e^{0}\right) \\= & 2(e-1)^{\prime}\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #590 (ID: 415648)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\left[\begin{array}{ll}8 & 6 \\5 & 4\end{array}\right][/math] হলে [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{1+\cos ^{2} 2 x} & =\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} x} \\& =\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \sec ^{2} x d x \\& =\frac{1}{2}[\tan x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \\& =\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\tan 0\right) \\& =\frac{1}{2}(1-0)=\frac{1}{2}\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #591 (ID: 415649)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{24}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}=\left[\tan ^{-1} x\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\begin{array}{l}=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{3}-\tan ^{-1} 1 \\=\frac{\pi}{3}-\frac{\pi}{4} \\=\frac{4 \pi-3 \pi}{12} \\=\frac{\pi}{12}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #592 (ID: 415612)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


চিত্রের ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
A. [math]\dfrac{16}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\dfrac{4}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\dfrac{8}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\dfrac{32}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {O(0, 0)}[/math]
 হতে [math]\mathrm A(4, 4)[/math]
 পর্যন্ত ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল[math]\mathrm =\int_{0}^{4}\left(y_{1}-y_{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{4}(\sqrt{4 x}-x) d x[/math]
 [math]\mathrm =\left[2 \cdot \dfrac{x^{\dfrac{3}{2}}}{\dfrac{3}{2}}-\dfrac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\dfrac{4}{3} \times ~4^{\dfrac{3}{2}}-\dfrac{4^{2}}{2}\right)-0=\dfrac{32}{3}-8[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{8}{3}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #593 (ID: 415610)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
চিত্রে ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?


[Image]


Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {y = x}[/math]
 এবং [math]\mathrm {y=\sqrt{x}}[/math]
রেখাদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দু [math]\mathrm O(0, 0)[/math]
 এবং [math]\mathrm B (1, 1)[/math]
। অর্থাৎ, [math]\mathrm { OA = AB = 1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\dfrac{1}{2} \times \mathrm{OA} \times \mathrm{AB}[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{1}{2} \times 1 \times 1=\dfrac{1}{2}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #594 (ID: 415611)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {5 x^{2}+20 y^{2}=100}[/math] উপবৃত্ত দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]100[/math]
গ. [math]10 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]100 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm 5 x^{2}+20 y^{2}=100[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \dfrac{x^{2}}{20}+\dfrac{y^{2}}{5}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \dfrac{x^{2}}{(\sqrt{20})^{2}}+\dfrac{y^{2}}{(\sqrt{5})^{2}}=1[/math]
এখানে, [math]\mathrm {a=\sqrt{20}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\mathrm {b=\sqrt{5}}[/math]
উপবৃত্ত দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল[math]=\mathrm { \pi ab}[/math]
 বর্গএকক [math]=\pi[/math]
 [math]\times \sqrt{20}[/math]
 [math]\times \sqrt{5}=10 \pi[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #595 (ID: 415585)

Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int \dfrac{1}{\sqrt{5-x^{2}}} d x=?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {\sin ^{-1} \dfrac{x}{\sqrt{5}}+c}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{5}} \sin ^{-1} \dfrac{x}{\sqrt{5}}+c}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\tan ^{-1} \dfrac{x}{\sqrt{5}}+c}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{5}} \tan^{-1} \dfrac{x}{\sqrt{5}}+c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm \int[/math]
 [math]\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{5-x^{2}}} d x=[/math]
 [math]\int \dfrac{d x}{\sqrt{(\sqrt{5})^{2}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} \dfrac{x}{\sqrt{5}}+c[/math]


Explanation:

যদি [math]\mathrm {\int \mathbf{P}^{x} d x=F(x)+C}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm {F(x)}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{P^{x}}{\log _{e} P}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {P^{x} \log _{e} P}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {xP^{ x-1}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{P^{x+1}}{x+1}}[/math]

Question #597 (ID: 415587)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int \dfrac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=f(x)+c}[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm {f(x)} =[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {\sin ^{-1} x}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {\cos^{-1} x}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\ln \left(\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right)}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি[math]\begin{array}{l}1-x^2=z\\\Rightarrow-2xdx=dz\\\Rightarrow xdx=-\frac{1}{2}dz\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{ }^{ }\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}dx=\int_{ }^{ }\frac{-\frac{1}{2}dz}{\sqrt{z}}\\=-\sqrt{z}+c=-\sqrt{1-x^2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
[math]\mathrm {\int \dfrac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=f(x)+c}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\mathrm {1-x^{2}=z^{2} \Rightarrow-2 x ~d x=2 z ~d z \therefore x d x=-z d z.}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {\therefore \int \dfrac{-z ~d z}{\sqrt{z^{2}}}=-\int d z=-z+c=-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c}[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #598 (ID: 415588)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board

Question:
যদি [math]\mathrm {\int \operatorname{cosec}^{2}(5-8 x) d x=a \cot (5-8 x)+c}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\mathrm a[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-8[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
D. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\int \operatorname{cosec}^{2}(5-8 x) d x }[/math]
 [math]\mathrm =-\cot (5-8 x)[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(\dfrac{-1}{8}\right)[/math]
 [math]+c=\dfrac{1}{8}[/math]
 [math]\cot (5-8 x)+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm a[/math]
 এর মান [math]\dfrac{1}{8}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #599 (ID: 415589)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023, 2023 | Boards: Dhaka Board, Mymensingh Board | Tags: Dhaka Board, Mymensingh Board

[math]\mathrm {\int \dfrac{1}{9+x^{2}} d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1} \dfrac{x}{3}+c}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{-1}{3} \tan \dfrac{x}{3}+c}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1} \dfrac{3}{x}+c}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\tan ^{-1} \dfrac{x}{3}+c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm \int \dfrac{1}{9+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \dfrac{1}{3^{2}+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1} \dfrac{x}{3}+c[/math]

Question #600 (ID: 415590)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int x \sec ^{2} x d x=}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {x \tan x+\ln |\sin x|+c}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {x \tan x-\ln |\sin x|+c}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {x \tan x+\ln |\cos x|+c}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {x \tan x-\ln |\cos x|+c}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm \int x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \int \sec ^{2} x d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left\{\dfrac{d}{d x}(x) \int \sec ^{2} x d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]\mathrm = x \tan x-\int \tan x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \tan x-\ln |\sec x|+c[/math]
 [math]\mathrm = x \tan x+[/math]
 [math]\ln |\cos x|+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #601 (ID: 415591)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int \dfrac{1+\tan ^{2} x}{(1-\tan x)^{2}} d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{-1}{1+\tan x}+c}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{-1}{1-\tan x}+c}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{1-\tan x}+c}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{1+\tan x}+c}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\int \dfrac{1+\tan ^{2} x}{(1-\tan x)^{2}} d x=\int \dfrac{\sec ^{2} x d x}{(1-\tan x)^{2}}}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\mathrm {1-\tan x=z}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {\Rightarrow-\sec ^{2} x d x=d z \therefore \sec ^{2} x d x=-d z }[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {\therefore \int \dfrac{-d z}{z^{2}}=-\left(\dfrac{-1}{z}\right)+c=\dfrac{1}{1-\tan x}+c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #602 (ID: 415592)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int e^{x}\left(\sin 3 x+\dfrac{3}{\sec 3 x}\right) d x=?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {3 e^{x} \sin 3 x }[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm { e^{x} \sin 3 x }[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm { 3 e^{x} \cos 3 x }[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm { e^{x} \cos 3 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm {\int e^{x}\left(\sin 3 x+\dfrac{3}{\sec 3 x}\right) d x} \\\mathrm {=\int e^{x}(\sin 3 x+3 \cos 3 x) d x}\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]f\mathrm {(x)=\sin 3 x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime} \mathrm {(x)=3 \cos 3 x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\left\{f(\mathrm{x})+f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})\right\}\\=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} f(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {=e^{x} \sin 3 x+c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #603 (ID: 415593)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board

Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{1}^{2} e^{2 x+5} d x=?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{2}\left(e^{7}-e^{9}\right)}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {2\left(e^{9}-e^{7}\right)}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{2}\left(e^{9}-e^{7}\right)}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {2\left(e^{9}+e^{7}\right)}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}+5} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\dfrac{\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}+5}}{2}\right]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{1}{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{9}-\mathrm{e}^{7}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm e[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:

Question #606 (ID: 415596)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos ^{2} 2 x d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\dfrac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\dfrac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]\dfrac{\pi}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm {\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos ^{2} 2 x d x=\dfrac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} 2 \cos ^{2} 2 x d x }\\\mathrm {=\dfrac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\dfrac{\pi}{4}}(1+\cos 4 x) d x=\dfrac{1}{2}\left[x+\dfrac{\sin 4 x}{4}\right]_{0}^{\dfrac{\pi}{4}}=\dfrac{1}{2}\left[\left(\dfrac{\pi}{4}+0\right)-(0+0)\right]=\dfrac{\pi}{8}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #607 (ID: 415597)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{(1+\sin 2 x)} d x=\text { ? }}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm { \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{1+\sin 2 x} d x=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{\sin ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x+\cos ^{2} x} d x}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm { =\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(\sin x+\cos x) d x=[-\cos x+\sin x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} }[/math]
 [math]\mathrm { =\left(-\cos \dfrac{\pi}{2}+\sin \dfrac{\pi}{2}\right)-(-\cos 0+\sin 0) }[/math]
 [math]=(0+1)-(-1+0)=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #608 (ID: 415598)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{e^{x}}{e^{x}+1} d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {ln ~e}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {\ln (e+1)}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\ln (e+1)-\ln 2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{\mathrm{e}^{x}}{\mathrm{e}^{x}+1} d x=\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{d\left(e^{x}\right)}{e^{x}+1}=\left[\ln \left(e^{x}+1\right)\right]_{0}^{1}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {=\ln (e+1)-\ln \left(e^{0}+1\right)=\ln (e+1)-\ln 2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #609 (ID: 415599)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023, 2023 | Boards: Barisal Board, Mymensingh Board | Tags: Barisal Board, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{2}^{3} \dfrac{\ln (x-1)}{x-1} d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {2 ~ ln2}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {2 (ln2)^2}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{2}~{ (ln2)^2}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{2}~{ (ln2)^2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\mathrm {\int f(x) f^{\prime}(x) d x=\dfrac{1}{2}[f(x)]^{2}+c}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\mathrm {f(x)=\ln (x-1) \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\dfrac{1}{x-1}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm { \therefore \int_{2}^{3} \dfrac{\ln (x-1)}{x-1} d x=\dfrac{1}{2}\left[\{\ln (x-1)\}^{2}\right]_{2}^{3} }\\\mathrm { =\dfrac{1}{2}\{\ln (3-1)\}^{2}-\dfrac{1}{2}\{\ln (2-1)\}^{2}=\dfrac{1}{2}(\ln 2)^{2}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #610 (ID: 415600)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{6}} \sin ^{2} x \cos x d x=}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{5}{24}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{24}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{24}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{24}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{2} x \cos x d x}[/math]
 ধরি, [math]\mathrm {\sin x=z}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {\therefore \cos x~ dx = dz}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|l|l|l|}\hline \mathrm x & 0 & \dfrac{\pi}{6} \\\hline \mathrm z & 0 & \dfrac{1}{2} \\\hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {=\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} z^{2} d z=\left[\dfrac{z^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{\dfrac{1}{2}}=\dfrac{\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{3}}{3}-0=\dfrac{1}{24}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #611 (ID: 415601)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{x^{2}}{x^{3}+2} d x=}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\dfrac{1}{3} \ln \left(\dfrac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\ln \left(\dfrac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\dfrac{1}{3} \ln \left(\dfrac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left(\dfrac{2}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{x^{2}}{x^{3}+2} d x=\dfrac{1}{3} \int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{3 x^{2}}{x^{3}+2} d x }\\\mathrm {=\dfrac{1}{3}\left[\ln \left|x^{3}+2\right|\right]_{0}^{1}=\dfrac{1}{3}(\ln 3-\ln 2)=\dfrac{1}{3} \ln \left(\dfrac{3}{2}\right)}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #612 (ID: 415602)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{4 d x}{1+x^{2}}=}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]4 \ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\ln 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]\dfrac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{4 d x}{1+x^{2}}=4\left[\tan ^{-1} x\right]_{0}^{1}=4\left[\tan ^{-1} 1-\tan ^{-1} 0\right]=4 \cdot \dfrac{\pi}{4}=\pi}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #613 (ID: 415603)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{2} \dfrac{d x}{\sqrt{4 x-x^{2}}}=?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\dfrac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\dfrac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]-\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{4 \mathrm{x}-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{(2)^{2}-(\mathrm{x}-2)^{2}}}=[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1} \frac{\mathrm{x}-2}{2}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=0-\left(-\frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #614 (ID: 415604)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{1-x}{1+x} d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \ln 2+1[/math]
B. [math]2 \ln 2-1[/math]
C. [math]\ln 2+1[/math]
D. [math]\ln 2-2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{1-x}{1+x} d x=\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{-(1+x)+2}{1+x} d x}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {=\int_{0}^{1}\left(-1+\dfrac{2}{1+x}\right) d x=[-x+2 \ln (1+x)]_{0}^{1}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {=(-1+2 \ln 2)-(0+2 \ln 1)=2 \ln 2-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #615 (ID: 415605)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{x}{1+x} d x=?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1 -\ln2[/math]
B. [math]\ln2[/math]
C. [math]\ln2-1[/math]
D. [math]-\ln2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{x}{1+x} d x}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {=\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{x+1-1}{1+x} d x=\int_{0}^{1} d x-\int_{0}^{1} \dfrac{1}{1+x} d x=[x-\ln (1+x)]_{0}^{1}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {=1-\ln (1+1)-0+\ln (1+0)=1-\ln 2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #616 (ID: 415606)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{1}^{\sqrt{e}} \ln x d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-1-\dfrac{1}{2} \sqrt{ \mathrm e}[/math]
B. [math]1-\dfrac{1}{2} \sqrt{\mathrm e}[/math]
C. [math]1+\dfrac{1}{2} \sqrt{\mathrm e}[/math]
D. [math]-1+\dfrac{1}{2} \sqrt{\mathrm e}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\int_{1}^{\sqrt{e}} [\ln x d x=[x \ln x-x_{1}]_1^{\sqrt{e} }}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm =(\sqrt{e} \ln \sqrt{e}-\sqrt{e})-(\ln 1-1)[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{\sqrt{e}}{2}-\sqrt{e}+1=1-\dfrac{1}{2} \sqrt{e}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #617 (ID: 415607)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {f(x)=\sin 2 x}[/math] হলে —

[math]\begin{array}{l} \mathrm {\text{i. } \int f(x) d x=-\dfrac{\cos 2 x}{2}+c}\\\mathrm {\text{ii. } \int \sqrt{1+f(x)} d x=\sin x-\cos x+c} \\\mathrm {\text{iii. } \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{1-\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})} \mathrm{dx}=0}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক ?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\text { i. }~~ \quad \int f(x) d x=\int \sin 2 x d x=-\dfrac{\cos 2 x}{2}+c}[/math]
 [math]\text { ii. } \quad~\int \sqrt{1+\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})} d \mathrm{~d}=\int \sqrt{1+\sin 2 \mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\qquad~ \mathrm {=\int \sqrt{\sin ^{2} x+\cos ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x} d x} \\\qquad~ \mathrm {=\int \sqrt{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}} d x} \\\qquad~ \mathrm {= \int(\cos x+\sin x) d x} \\\qquad~ \mathrm {=\sin x-\cos x+c}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \quad \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{1-\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})} d \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{1-\sin 2 \mathrm{x}} d \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(\cos \mathrm{x}-\sin \mathrm{x}) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l} \qquad~~\mathrm {=[\sin x+\cos x]^{\frac{\pi}{2}}} \\ \qquad~~\mathrm {=\left(\sin \dfrac{\pi}{2}+\cos \dfrac{\pi}{2}\right)-(\sin 0+\cos 0)} \\ \qquad~=1-1=0\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\qquad~~ \therefore[/math]
 তিনটি তথ্যই সঠিক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #618 (ID: 415608)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {f(x)=\ln (2 x)}[/math] হলে —

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad ~~ \mathrm {f^{\prime}(x)=\dfrac{1}{x}}\\\text{ii. } \quad ~ \mathrm {\int f(x) d x=x(\ln |2 x|-1)+c}\\\text{iii. } \quad \mathrm {\int_{1}^{\frac{1}{2}} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x}) \mathrm{dx}=\dfrac{1}{2}-\ln 2}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক ?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { i. } \quad~~~ \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\ln (2 \mathrm{x}) \therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\dfrac{1}{2 \mathrm{x}} \cdot 2=\dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {\text { ii. } \quad~\int f(x) d x=\int \ln (2 x) d x}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm { \qquad~ =\ln 2 x \int d x-\int\left\{\dfrac{d}{d x}(\ln 2 x) \int d x\right\} d x }[/math]
 [math]\mathrm { \qquad~ =x \ln 2 x-\int \dfrac{1}{x} \cdot x d x=x \ln 2 x-x+c=x(\ln |2 x|-1)+c}[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \quad \mathrm {\int_{1}^{\frac{1}{2}} f(x) d x=[x \ln 2 x-x]_{1}^{\frac{1}{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm { \qquad ~=\left[\dfrac{1}{2} \ln \left(2 \frac{1}{2}\right)-\dfrac{1}{2}\right]-(\ln 2-1)}[/math]
 [math]\qquad ~=-\dfrac{1}{2}-\ln 2+1[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{1}{2}-\ln 2 ~\therefore[/math]
 তিনটি তথ্যই সঠিক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #619 (ID: 415580)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\Large{\int} 
ormalsize \dfrac{1}{x^{2}} d x}=[/math] কত? [math]\mathrm {x 
e 0}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {-\dfrac{1}{3 x^{3}}+c}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {-\dfrac{1}{ x}+c}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{3 x^{3}}+c}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{ x}+c}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm \int \dfrac{1}{x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int x^{-2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{x^{-2+1}}{-2+1}+c[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{x^{-1}}{-1}+c[/math]
 [math]=-\dfrac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:

D. [math]\mathrm {-5 e^{-5 x}+c}[/math]

Solution:

Question #622 (ID: 415583)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int \cos ^{2} 3 x ~d x=}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{2}(x+\sin 6 x)+c}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{2}(x-\sin 6 x)+c}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{12}(6 x+\sin 6 x)+c}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{12}(6 x-\sin 6 x)+c}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm \int \cos ^{2} 3 x ~d x=\dfrac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int 2 \cos ^{2} 3 x ~d x[/math]
 [math]\mathrm =\dfrac{1}{2} \int(1+\cos 6 x) ~d x[/math]
 [math]=\dfrac{1}{2}\left(x+\dfrac{\sin 6 x}{6}\right)+c[/math]
 [math]\mathrm =\dfrac{1}{12}[/math]
 [math]~(6 x+\sin 6 x)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #623 (ID: 415584)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\int e^{x}(x+1) d x=?}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {x+e^{x}+c}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {e^{x}+x+c}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {e^{x} x^{2}+c}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {x e^{x}+c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int e^{x}(x+1) d x \\=\int x e^{x} d x+\int e^{x} d x\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=x \int e^{x} d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} x \int e^{x} d x\right) d x+e^{x} \\=x e^{x}-\int e^{x} d x+e^{x} \\=x e^{x}-e^{x}+e^{x}+k \\=x e^{x}+k\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
আমরা জানি, [math]\mathrm {\int e^{x}\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x=e^{x} f(x)+c}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\mathrm {f(x)=x \quad \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=1}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm {\therefore \int e^{x}(x+1) d x=x e^{x}+c}[/math]


Sub-Questions:

Question #624 (ID: 415420)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]X-[/math] অক্ষ এবং [math]y=\sin x[/math] বক্ররেখার একটি চাপ দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]\pi[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin x d x \\\Rightarrow [-\cos x]_{0}^{\pi} \\\Rightarrow -\cos \pi+\cos 0=1+1=2\end{array}[/math]
[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
