Question #625 (ID: 415415)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajuk Uttara Model College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2[/math] এবং [math]y = |x|[/math] রেখা দুইটি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]6[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]4[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]8[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2} \times[/math]
 ভূমি [math]\times[/math]
 উচ্চতা[math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} \times(2+2) \times 2=4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #627 (ID: 415417)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-অক্ষ ও [math]y=4 x-x^{2}[/math] বক্ররেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গএকক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{16}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
নির্ণেয় ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{4}\left(4 x-x^{2}\right) d x=\left[4 \cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left(2.4^{2}-\frac{4^{3}}{3}\right)-0=\frac{32}{3}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #628 (ID: 415418)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=x[/math] বক্ররেখা ও [math]y = 2x[/math] রেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{7}{48}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{1}{48}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{8}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=x[/math]
 এবং [math]y = 2x[/math]
 এর ছেদবিন্দু [math](0, 0)[/math]
 এবং [math]\left(\frac{1}{4}, \frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{4}}(\sqrt{x}-2 x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{2}{3} x^{\frac{3}{2}}-x^{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{8}-\frac{1}{16}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{48}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #629 (ID: 415419)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Government Mahila College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}, y=0, x=1, x=3[/math] রেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]14[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{16}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]20[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{3}\left(x^{3}\right) d x=\left[\frac{x^{4}}{4}\right]_{1}^{3}=\frac{1}{4}\left(3^{4}-1\right)=20[/math] বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #630 (ID: 415405)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Holy Cross College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{a}^{b} \frac{\ln x}{x} d x[/math] এর নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln (a b) \ln \left(\frac{a}{b}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln (a b) \ln \left(\frac{a}{b}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\mathrm{ab}) \ln \left(\frac{\mathrm{b}}{\mathrm{a}}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln (\mathrm{ab}) \ln \left(\frac{\mathrm{b}}{\mathrm{a}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\int_{a}^{b} \frac{\ln x}{x} d x[/math]
 ধরি, [math]\ln \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{z}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{a}^{b} \frac{\ln x d x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\operatorname{lna}}^{\ln b} z d z[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{z^{2}}{2}\right]_{\ln a}^{\ln b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \left\{(\ln b)^{2}-(\ln a)^{2}\right\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}(\ln b+\ln a)[/math]
 [math](\ln b-\ln a)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln (a b)[/math]
 [math]\cdot \ln \frac{b}{a}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #631 (ID: 415406)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Viqarunnisa Noon School & College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x| d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{-1}^{0}-x d x+\int_{0}^{1} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{-x^{2}}{2}\right]_{-1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]+\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #632 (ID: 415407)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Holy Cross College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{3 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{-4}\left(e^{4}-1\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left(e^{4}-1\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(e^{4}+1\right)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}\left(e^{4}-1\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{3 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{4 x} \cdot e^{x}+e^{4 x} \cdot e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{1} e^{4 x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}\left[e^{4 x}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}\left(e^{4}-e^{0}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}\left(e^{4}-1\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #634 (ID: 415409)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka City College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \ln x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-e[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \ln x d x=[/math]
 [math]\ln x \int d x-\int \frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left.(\ln x) \int d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \ln x-\int[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{x} x d x=x \ln x-x+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{e} \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{e}[/math]
 [math]=(e \ln e-e)-(\ln 1-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (e-e)[/math]
 [math]-(0-1)[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin 2 x[/math] ও [math]{g}(x)=3 x^{2}[/math] হলে -

[math]\text { i. } \int f(x) \mathrm{d} x^{}=-\frac{1}{2} \cos 2 \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \int f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right) d x=\frac{1}{2} \sin 2 x+c[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \int_{0}^{1} g(x) d x=1[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক ?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
i ও iii

Question #637 (ID: 415412)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka Imperial College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}[/math] এবং [math]2 x=y[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{20}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}[/math]
 এবং [math]2 x=y[/math]
 সমাধান করে পাই, [math]x=0,[/math]
 [math]x=2[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\left|\int_{0}^{2}\left(x^{2}-2 x\right) d x\right|[/math]
 [math]=\left|\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}-x^{2}\right]_{0}^{2}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\left|\frac{2^{3}}{3}-2^{2}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\left|\frac{8-12}{3}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #638 (ID: 415413)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajuk Uttara Model College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=16 x[/math] এবং [math]y = 4x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y^{2}=16 x \ldots \ldots \ldots \text { (i) } \\y=4 x \ldots \ldots \ldots \text { (ii) }\end{array}[/math]
(i) ও (ii) সমাধান করে পাই, [math]x = 1[/math]
 এবং [math]x = 0[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]\int_{0}^{1} 4 \sqrt{x} d x-\int_{0}^{1} 4 x d x=4\left[\frac{x^{3 / 2}}{3 / 2}\right]_{0}^{1}-4\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{8}{3}-2=\frac{2}{3}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #640 (ID: 415404)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Comilla Victoria Govt. College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{-1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{e}-1[/math]
C. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
D. [math]1-\frac{1}{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\sqrt{x}=z[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x=d z[/math]

[Image]
[math]2 \int_{0}^{1} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \mathrm{dz}=2\left[\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}}\right]_{0}^{1}=2\left[\mathrm{e}^{1}-\mathrm{e}^{0}\right]=2(\mathrm{e}-1)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #641 (ID: 415401)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Armed Police Battalion Public School And College, Bogura
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\ln 3[/math]
D. [math]\ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]1+x^{2}=z \Rightarrow 2 x d x=d z[/math]

[Image]
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}} d x=\int_{1}^{2} \frac{d z}{z}=[\ln z]_{1}^{2}=\ln 2-\ln 1=\ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #642 (ID: 415402)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dinajpur Govt. College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{3} \frac{d x}{2 x-1}=\ln P[/math] হলে [math]P[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{1}^{5} \frac{d x}{2 x-1}=\ln P \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}[\ln \mid 2 x-1]_{1}^{5}=\ln P \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}(\ln 9-\ln 1)=\ln P \\\Rightarrow \ln P^{2}=\ln 9 \\\Rightarrow P^{2}=9 \therefore P=3\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #644 (ID: 415399)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong Cantonment Public School & College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{10} x \cos x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{12}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{11}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{10}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\begin{array}{l}\sin x=z \\\cos x d x=d z\end{array}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{10} x \cos x d x \\\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{1} z^{10} d z=\left[\frac{z^{11}}{11}\right]_{0}^{1} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{11}-0=\frac{1}{11}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #645 (ID: 415400)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Joypurhat Girls’ Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{a}} d\left(\tan ^{-1} a x\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{a}}[/math]
 [math]d\left(\tan ^{-1} a x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left[\tan ^{-1} a x\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{a}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} a \cdot \frac{1}{a}[/math]
 [math]-\tan ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #646 (ID: 415394)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cantonment Public School & College, Rangpur
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\ln 3} \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \ln 2+c[/math]
B. [math]3 \ln 2+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln 2[/math]
D. [math]2 \ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]1+e^{x}=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore e^{x} d x=d z[/math]

[Image]
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}} d x=\int_{2}^{4} \frac{d z}{z} \\\Rightarrow [\ln z]_{2}^{4}=\ln 4-\ln 2 \\\Rightarrow \ln \left(\frac{4}{2}\right)=\ln 2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #647 (ID: 415395)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Govt. College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\pi[/math]
C. [math]-\pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1^{2}-(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\sin ^{-1} \frac{1-x}{1}}{-1}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=-\left(\sin ^{-1} 0-\sin ^{-1} 1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #649 (ID: 415397)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka City College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1}\left|\begin{array}{cc}\cos x & \sin x \\-\sin x & \cos x\end{array}\right| d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1}\left(\cos ^{2} x+\sin ^{2} x\right) d x=\int_{0}^{1} d x=[x]_{0}^{1}=1-0=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #650 (ID: 415398)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Uttora High School and College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1-\cos 2 \theta}{1+\cos 2 \theta} d \theta[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]1-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{2 \sin ^{2} \theta}{2 \cos ^{2} \theta} d \theta=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \tan ^{2} \theta d \theta \\\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(\sec ^{2} \theta-1\right) d \theta \\\Rightarrow [\tan \theta-\theta]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \\\Rightarrow \left(\tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)-0 \\\Rightarrow 1-\frac{\pi}{4}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #651 (ID: 415392)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Birsrestha Noor Mohammad Public College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{9-5 x^{2}}}=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]3.5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি,[math]\begin{array}{l}9-5 x^{2}=z\\\Rightarrow -10 x \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}\\\therefore x d x=-\frac{d z}{10}\end{array}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{9-5 x^{2}}} \\\Rightarrow \int_{9}^{4}-\frac{d z}{10 \sqrt{z}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{10} \int_{4}^{9} \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}} \\\Rightarrow \left[\frac{1}{10} \times 2 \sqrt{z}\right]_{4}^{9}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{5}(\sqrt{9}-\sqrt{4})=\frac{1}{5}(3-2)=\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #652 (ID: 415393)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Joypurhat Girls’ Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x) d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
C. [math]e^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}(\sin \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]+\cos \mathrm{x}) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \sin \mathrm{x}\right]_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[f(\mathrm{x})+f(\mathrm{x})]\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} f(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]\sin ^{\pi / 2}-0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\pi / 2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #653 (ID: 415354)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: BAF Shaheen College, Chattogram
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{1+\cos x}=f(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sec \frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\sec \frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}\left(\frac{\tan \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right)+c=\tan \frac{x}{2}+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #654 (ID: 415355)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 5^{a x} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5^{a x}}{\ln 5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5^{a x}}{\operatorname{aln} 5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5^{\mathbf{a}^{x}}}{5 \ln \mathrm{a}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 5^{a x}}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int 5^{a x} d x=\frac{5^{a x}}{\ln 5} \times \frac{1}{a}=\frac{5^{a x}}{a \ln 5}+c[/math]

Question #658 (ID: 415359)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Feni Girls' Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \tan x+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan x-x+c[/math]
C. [math]\sec ^{2} x+{c}[/math]
D. [math]\sec x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=\int\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right) d x=\tan x-x+c[/math]

Question #659 (ID: 415360)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Govt. Bangabandhu College, Gopalganj
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x+c[/math]
B. [math]1+c[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2 x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{(\sin x+\cos x)^{2}}} d x=\int d x=x+c[/math]

Question #660 (ID: 415361)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Ahammad Uddin Shah Shishu Niketon School & College, Gaibandha
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math] এর সমাকলন কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\cos x}{2}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sin x}{2}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\cot x}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\tan x}{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cdot \cos ^{2} x}=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} x d x=\frac{1}{2} \tan x+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #661 (ID: 415362)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{3 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]4 e^{4 x}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c[/math]
C. [math]5 e^{5 x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5} e^{5 x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{3 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=\int \frac{e^{3 x}\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)}{e^{-x}\left(e^{2 x}+1\right)} d x \\\Rightarrow \int e^{4 x} d x=\frac{e^{4 x}}{4}+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #663 (ID: 415364)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Govt. Hazi Mohammad Mohsin College, Chottogram
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cot x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln |\sin \cdot x|+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln |\sec x|+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|\tan \frac{x}{2}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]\tan x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \cot x d x=\int \frac{\cos x}{\sin x} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sin x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \mathrm{xdx}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \int \frac{d z}{z} \\\Rightarrow \ln |z|+c \\\Rightarrow \ln |\sin x|+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #665 (ID: 415366)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{\sin ^{-1} x}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{a} e^{\sin ^{-1} x}+c[/math]
B. [math]e^{\sin ^{-1} x}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{a} \sqrt{e^{\sin ^{-1} x}+c}[/math]
D. [math]-e^{\sin ^{-1} x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\sin ^{-1} x=z \therefore \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int e^{z} d z=e^{z}+c=e^{\sin ^{-1} x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #666 (ID: 415367)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Joypurhat Girls’ Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan x}{\ln \cos x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln |\ln \cos x|+c[/math]
B. [math]-\ln |\cos x|+c[/math]
C. [math]-\ln |\ln \cos x|+c[/math]
D. [math]|\ln \cos x|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি , [math]\ln (\cos x)=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\cos x}(-\sin x) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \tan \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=-\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{\tan x}{\ln (\cos x)} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{-\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}}[/math]
 [math]=-\ln |\mathrm{z}|+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=-\ln |\ln (\cos x)|+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #667 (ID: 415368)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Narail Govt. Victoria College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 2 x e^{x^{2}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]2 e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]I=\int 2 x e^{x^{2}} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]x^{2}=z \Rightarrow 2 x d x=d z \therefore I=\int e^{z} d z=e^{z}+c=e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #668 (ID: 415369)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: সফিউদ্দিন সরকার একাডেমি এন্ড কলেজ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) d x}{x^{2}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\cos \frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]-x \cos \frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\cos \frac{1}{x}+ \mathrm{c}[/math]
D. [math]x \cos \frac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\mathrm{z}=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\mathrm{dz}[/math]
এখন, [math]-\int \sin z d z=-(-\cos z)+c[/math]
 [math]=\cos \frac{1}{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #669 (ID: 415370)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Viqarunnisa Noon School & College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=1-\sin x, g(x)=x+\cos x, x[/math] এর প্রেক্ষিতে [math]\frac{f(x)}{g(x)}[/math] এর অনির্দিষ্ট - যোগজ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\ln | 1-\sin | +c[/math]
খ. [math]\ln | 1+cos | +c[/math]
গ. [math]\ln |\sin | +c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln | \cos x | +c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{f(x)}{g(x)} d x=\int \frac{1-\sin x}{x+\cos x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int \frac{d z}{z}[/math]
ধরি , [math]x+\cos x=z ;[/math]
 [math](1-\sin x) d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln |\mathrm{z}|+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=\ln |x+\cos x|+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\tan ^{2} x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sec ^{2} x[/math] [math]\int f(x) d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\sec ^{2} x+c[/math]
খ. [math]\tan ^{3} x+c[/math]
গ. [math]\tan x-x+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sec x-x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

Question #672 (ID: 415373)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\tan ^{2} x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sec ^{2} x[/math] [math]\int f(x) g(x) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\tan ^{3} x+c[/math]
খ. [math]\sec ^{3} x+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3} \tan ^{3} x+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sec ^{3} x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sec ^{2} x=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sec ^{2} x \tan ^{2} x d x \\\Rightarrow \int z^{2} d x=\frac{z^{3}}{3}+c \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3} \tan ^{3} x+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #673 (ID: 415374)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Ideal School & College, Motijheel, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{36-x^{2}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{6} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{6}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{6} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{6}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{12} \ln \left|\frac{6+x}{6-x}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{12} \ln \left|\frac{x-6}{x+6}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{36-x^{2}}=\int \frac{d x}{6^{2}-x^{2}}=\frac{1}{2.6} \ln \left|\frac{6+x}{6-x}\right|+c \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{12} \ln \left|\frac{6+x}{6-x}\right|+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #674 (ID: 415375)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Ideal School & College, Motijheel, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{9 x^{2}-16}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{24} \ln \left|\frac{3 x+4}{3 x-4}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{24} \ln \left|\frac{3 x-4}{3 x+4}\right|+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{9} \tan ^{-1} \frac{4}{3 x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{9} \sin ^{-1} \sqrt{x-4}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{9 x^{2}-16}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{9} \int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-\left(\frac{4}{3}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{2 \cdot \frac{4}{3}} \ln \left|\frac{x-\frac{4}{3}}{x+\frac{4}{3}}\right|+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{24}[/math]
 [math]\ln \left|\frac{3 x-4}{3 x+4}\right|+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #675 (ID: 415376)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Holy Cross College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{25-7 x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\sqrt{25-7 x^{2}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{25-7 x^{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{7} \sqrt{25-7 x^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{7} \sqrt{25-7 x^{2}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]25-7 x^{2}[/math]
 [math]=y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-7 \times 2 x d x[/math]
 [math]=2 y d y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -7 x d x[/math]
 [math]=y d y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{7} y d y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad \int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{25-7 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-7} \int \frac{y d y}{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\frac{1}{7} \int 1 . d y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\frac{1}{7}(y)+c=-\frac{1}{7}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \sqrt{25-7 x^{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #678 (ID: 415379)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{4-3 x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{8} \ln \left|\sqrt{4-3 x^{2}}\right|+C[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{6} \ln \left|\sqrt{4-3 x^{2}}\right|+C[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{3} \sqrt{4-3 x^{2}}+C[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{3}+\sqrt{4-3 x^{2}}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]4-3 x^{2}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-6 x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x d x=\frac{-1}{6} d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{4-3 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{6} \int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{6} \times 2 \sqrt{z}+C[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{3} \sqrt{4-3 x^{2}}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #680 (ID: 415381)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna Govt. Women’s College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2} d x}{x^{2}-4}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
C. [math]x+\ln \left|\frac{{x}-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]2 x+\ln \left|\frac{x-2}{2 x+2}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\left(x^{2}-4\right)+4}{x^{2}-4} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int d x+4 \int \frac{1}{x^{2}-4}+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+4 \times \frac{1}{2.2}[/math]
 [math]\times \ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
 [math]=x+\ln \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #681 (ID: 415382)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Barisal Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{36-16 x^{2}}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{6}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{6}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{6}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{36-16 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{4 \sqrt{\frac{36}{16}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{6}{4}\right)^{2}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{6 / 4}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{6}+{c}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #682 (ID: 415383)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahid Syed Nazrul Islam College, Mymensingh
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sqrt{3} d x}{\sqrt{2-3 x^{2}}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3} \sin ^{-1} \frac{\sqrt{3} x}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{\sqrt{3} x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \sin ^{-1} \frac{\sqrt{3} x}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{\sqrt{3} x}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{\sqrt{3} d x}{\sqrt{2-B x^{2}}}=\int \frac{\sqrt{3} d x}{\sqrt{3} \sqrt{\frac{2}{3}-x^{2}}}=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}-x^{2}}} \\\Rightarrow \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{\frac{\sqrt{2}}{\sqrt{3}}}+c=\sin ^{-1} \frac{\sqrt{3} x}{\sqrt{2}}+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #683 (ID: 415384)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Faujdarhat Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\int x^{3} e^{x} d x=f(x)+c[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f(x)[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3} e^{x}\left(3 x^{2}-6 x+6\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3} e^{x}\left(x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x-6\right)[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}\left(x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x-6\right)[/math]
D. [math]e^{x}\left(x^{4}-5 x^{2}+3 x^{2}-6 x+6\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int x^{3} e^{x} d x=x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\int e^{x} d x-\int 3 x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot e^{x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} e^{x}-3[/math]
 [math]\left[x^{2} \int e^{x} d x-\int 2 x \cdot e^{x} d x\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} e^{x}-3[/math]
 [math]\left[x^{2} \cdot e^{x}-2\left\{x \int e^{x} d x-\int 1 \cdot e^{x} d x\right\}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} e^{x}-3[/math]
 [math]\left[x^{2} e^{x}-2 x e^{x}+2 e^{x}\right][/math]
 [math]=e^{x}\left(x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x-6\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #684 (ID: 415385)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: IDEAL COLLEGE, DHANMONDI
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \ln x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]
B. [math]x^{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x+\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]
D. [math]\text { none }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int x \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \int x d x-[/math]
 [math]\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} \ln x \int x d x\right) d x+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x \cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2}-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{x} \frac{x^{2}}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x+c=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{2} \frac{x^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #685 (ID: 415386)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Viqarunnisa Noon School & College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 5 x \sec ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5[x \tan x+\ln |\sin x|]+c[/math]
B. [math]5\left[x \sec ^{2} x+\ln |\sin x|\right]+c[/math]
C. [math]5[x \tan x+\ln |\sec x|]+c[/math]
D. [math]5[x \tan x-\ln |\sec x|]+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int 5 x \sec ^{2} x d[/math]
 [math]x=5 x \int \sec ^{2} x d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x}(5 x) \int \sec ^{2} x d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5 x \tan x-[/math]
 [math]\int 5 \tan x d x=5 x[/math]
 [math]\tan x-5 \ln |\sec x|+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5[x \tan x-\ln |\sec x|][/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #686 (ID: 415387)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{1+x}{1-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+c[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{1+x}{1-x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \sqrt{\frac{(1+x)(1+x)}{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int \frac{1+x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}-\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{-2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\sin ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Holy Cross College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=e^{x}[/math] হলে -

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \int g(-2 x+3) d x=\frac{-1}{2} e^{-2 x+3}+c\\\text{ii. } \int \frac{(f(x))^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=\frac{1}{3}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{3}+c\\\text{iii. } \int \frac{g(-x)}{1+g(-x)} d x=\ln \left(\frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}\right)+c\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
i, ii ও iii

Question #688 (ID: 415389)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: National Ideal College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin ^{2} x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{-2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\pi} 2 \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math](1-\cos 2 x) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[x-\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\pi-\frac{\sin 2 \pi}{2}-0+0\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #690 (ID: 415391)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Thakurgaon Govt. College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{3}^{4} \frac{d x}{25-x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{10} \ln \frac{9}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{5} \ln \frac{9}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{10} \ln \frac{4}{9}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{9}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{3}^{4} \frac{d x}{25-x^{2}}=\int_{3}^{4} \frac{d x}{5^{2}-x^{2}}=\left[\frac{1}{2.5} \ln \left|\frac{5+x}{5-x}\right|\right]_{3}^{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{10}[\ln 9-\ln 4]=\frac{1}{10} \ln \frac{9}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{1+\ln x}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+\ln x}}[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{1+\ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{1+\ln x}[/math]
D. কোনটি নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]2 \sqrt{1+\ln x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{1+\ln x}}=\int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}}=2 \sqrt{z}+c \quad[z=1+\ln x[/math]
 ধরে[math]\Rightarrow 2 \sqrt{1+\ln x}+c[/math]


Explanation:

[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}} d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

B. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\cot ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]

Question #694 (ID: 415283)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos ^{-1} x d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]x \cos ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]x \cos ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]x \cos ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \cos ^{-1} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} x \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right) \int d x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \cos ^{-1} x-\int[/math]
 [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \cos ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #695 (ID: 415284)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{1+x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left(\frac{2}{\mathrm{e}}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\ln \left(\frac{4}{e}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left(\frac{3}{e}\right)[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]\ln \left(\frac{4}{e}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{1+x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1}\left(-1+\frac{2}{1+x}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=[-x+2 \ln (1+x)]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \ln 2-1[/math]
 [math]=\ln 4-\ln e[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\frac{4}{\mathrm{e}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #696 (ID: 415285)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{1+x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2^{(\ln 2)^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি , [math]\ln (1+x)=z[/math]
 [math]\text { (4), } \frac{1}{1+x} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{(1+x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \ln (1+x) \frac{1}{(1+x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} z d z[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{z^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\{\ln (1+x)\}^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\left(n^{2}\right)^{2}}{n}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #697 (ID: 415286)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int f(x) d x=\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{x^{2}-1}[/math]
D. [math]\left(x^{2}-1\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \rho(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)+c[/math]
 [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right\}\right.[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(1+\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x^{2}-1}} \cdot 2 x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{\left(\sqrt{x^{2}-1}+x\right)}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #698 (ID: 415287)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sqrt{\tan x}}{\sin x \cos x} d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan x[/math]
B. [math]\cot x[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{\tan x}}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sqrt{\tan x}}{\sin x \cos x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sqrt{\tan x}}{\frac{\sin x}{\cos x} \cdot \cos ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sqrt{\tan x}}{\tan x \cos ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}{\tan x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int[/math]
 [math]\frac{\sec ^{2} x}{\sqrt{\tan x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #699 (ID: 415288)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x} \sec x(1+\tan x) d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \sec x[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} / \sec x[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \tan x[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\sec x)[/math]
 [math]=\sec x \cdot \tan x[/math]
 [math]\int e^{x}(\sec x+\sec x \cdot \tan x) d x[/math]
 [math]=e^{x} \sec x+c[/math]
 [math]=f(x)[/math]
 [math]\left[\int e ^ { x } \left(f(x)+f^{\prime}(x) d x\right.\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.=e^{x} f(x)+e\right][/math]


Explanation:

Question #700 (ID: 415289)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]X-[/math]অক্ষ, [math]Y-[/math]অক্ষ, [math]y=\ln 5[/math] এবং [math]y=\ln x[/math] বক্ররেখা দ্বারা সীমাবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল -

Options:
ক. [math]\ln 4[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]4[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\ln 5[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]5[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\ln x \\\therefore x=e^{y}\end{array}[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{\ln 5} e^{y} d y=\left[e^{y}\right]_{0}^{\ln 5}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=e^{\ln 5}-e^{0} \\=5-1=4\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #701 (ID: 415291)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{x}=\mathrm {y}[/math] এবং [math]x=y^{2}[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{5}{6}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1}(\sqrt{x}-x)^{2} d x=\left[\frac{2}{3} x^{3 / 2}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #702 (ID: 415292)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x) =[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sec \frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\sec \frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cdot \cos^2 x / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} x / 2 d x .[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \frac{\tan x / 2}{1 / 2}+c[/math]
 [math]=\tan x / 2+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #703 (ID: 415293)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{9-16 x^{2}}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{4} \cos ^{-1} \frac{3 x}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4} \cos ^{-1} \frac{3 x}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{9-16 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{16\left(\frac{9}{16}+x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \cdot \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{3}{4}\right)^{2}-x^{\sqrt{11}}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{\frac{3}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{4 x}{3}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #704 (ID: 415294)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan ^{-1} x d x}{1+x^{2}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\text { ln }\left|\tan ^{-1} x\right|[/math]
B. [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan ^{-1} n=z[/math]
 [math]\pi 1 \frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{1} x\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(z)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left(\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}\right) ; d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{\tan ^{-1} x d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \tan ^{-1} x \cdot \frac{1}{1+x^{2}} \cdot d x[/math]
 [math]=\int z \cdot d z[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} n\right)^{2}}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #705 (ID: 415295)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{1+x}{1-x}} d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: .

Solution:
[math]\int \sqrt{\frac{a-x}{a+x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=a \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}+c[/math]

Question #706 (ID: 415296)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x d x}{(1-\sin x)^{2}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1-\sin x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{1-\sin x}[/math]
C. [math](1-\sin )^{3 / 2}[/math]
D. [math](1-\sin x)^{-3 / 2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math](1-\sin x y)=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d z=-\cos x d x[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{\cos x d x}{(1-\sin x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}}=-\left(-\frac{1}{z}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1-\sin x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #707 (ID: 415297)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt[3]{1-6 x}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{2 / 3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{3 / 2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{2 / 3}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{3 / 2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt[3]{1-6 x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int(1-6 x)^{\frac{-1}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{dx}=\left(\frac{-1}{6}\right) \frac{(1-6 x)^{\frac{-1}{3}+1}}{-\frac{1}{2}+1}=[/math]
 [math]-\frac{1}{4}(1-6 x)^{2 / 3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #708 (ID: 415298)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{9 x^{4}+4}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{18} \tan ^{-1} \frac{2}{3} x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{12} \tan ^{-1} \frac{3 x^{2}}{2}[/math]
C. $\frac{1}{24} \tan ^{-1} \frac{3 x^{2}}{2} $
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x}{9 x^{4}+4} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{x}{\left(3 x^{2}\right)^{2}+2^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{6 \cdot 3.2} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 x^{2}}{2}\right)+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{36} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 x ^2}{2}\right)+C[/math]


Explanation:

Question #709 (ID: 415299)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{3 x^{2} d x}{1+x^{6}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(x^{3}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1}\left(x^{3}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(x^{3}\right)[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি , [math]x^{3}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2} \cdot d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{3 x^{2} d x}{1+x^{6}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{3 x^{2} d x}{1+\left(x^{3}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d z}{1+z^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} z[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} x^{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #710 (ID: 415300)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \mathrm{x} \ln x \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{c}[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\mathrm{x}^{2}}{2} \ln \mathrm{x}+\frac{\mathrm{x}^{2}}{4}[/math]
C. [math]x^{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \alpha \ln x d x .[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \int x d x-[/math]
 [math]\int \{ \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)[/math]
 [math]\left.\int x d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]-\int \frac{7}{x} \cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x[/math]
 [math]-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #711 (ID: 415301)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+e^{2 x}}=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+e^{2 x}}=f(x)+c[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1} e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1} e^{2 x}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]e^{n}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{x} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d z}{1+z^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} z[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} e^{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #713 (ID: 415303)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{2} x d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} 2 \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}(1-\cos 2 x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[x+\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left[\frac{\pi}{2}+0\right]-0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #714 (ID: 415304)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{2}^{3} \frac{x d x}{x^{2}+1}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\ln 5[/math]
C. [math]\ln \sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]\ln 10[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{2}^{3} \frac{x d n}{x^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{2}^{3} \frac{2 x d x}{x^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\ln \left|x^{2}+1\right|\right]_{2}^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \cdot[\ln 10-\ln 5][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{1}{2} \ln 2 \\=\ln \sqrt{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #715 (ID: 415305)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{3} \frac{d x}{2 x+3}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\ln \sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]\ln \sqrt{5}[/math]
C. [math]\ln \sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]\ln \sqrt{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{3} \frac{d x}{2 x+3}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\operatorname{m}|2 x+3|}{2}\right]_{0}^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln 9}{2}-\frac{\ln 3}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln 9-\ln 3}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln 3}{2}=\ln 3^{1 / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\ln \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #718 (ID: 415308)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=16 x[/math] এবং [math]y = 4x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল—

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y^{2} =16 x[/math]
 [math]=4.4 x[/math]
 [math]y =4 x[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{8 a^{2}}{3 m^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8.4^{2}}{3 \cdot 4^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #720 (ID: 415310)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

Question #722 (ID: 415312)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{e^{x} d x}{2+e^{x}}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\ln 3 / 2[/math]
B. [math]\ln 5 / 3[/math]
C. [math]\ln 4 / 3[/math]
D. [math]\ln 3 / 4[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: .

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}}{2+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}=\left[\ln \left(2+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)\right]_{0}^{x / 4}=\ln \left(\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}+2}{3}\right)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #725 (ID: 415315)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=4 x[/math] সরলরেখা x-অক্ষ এবং [math]x = 3[/math] রেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল–

Options:
ক. 6 বর্গ একক
খ. 8/3 বর্গ একক
গ. 18 বর্গ একক
ঘ. 16 বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=4 x[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{3} 4 x d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{4 x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{3}[/math]
 [math]=2.9[/math]
 [math]=18[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #726 (ID: 415316)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = 3x[/math] সরলরেখা x-অক্ষ এবং [math]x = 1[/math] ও [math]x = 2[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]5 / 2[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]9 / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=3 x \\x=1, x=2\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int_{1}^{2} 3 x d x[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=3 \cdot\left[\frac{4}{2}-\frac{1}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=3 \cdot \frac{3}{2} \\=\frac{9}{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #727 (ID: 415317)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 x-x^{2}[/math] বক্ররেখা এবং x-অক্ষ দ্বারা বেষ্টিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{16}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{10}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=2 x-x^{2}[/math]
x- অক্ষ [math]y=0[/math]
 [math]0=2 x-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]= x(2-x)=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}x=0 \\x=2\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{2} 2 x-x^{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{2 x^{2}}{2}-\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\left(4-\frac{8}{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #728 (ID: 415318)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x[/math] এবং [math]y^{2}=16 x[/math] রেখা দুইটি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]130 / 3[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]128 / 3[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]128[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]40 / 3[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y =x[/math]
 [math]y =16 x[/math]
 [math]=4.4 x[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{8 a^{2}}{3 m^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8.4^{2}}{3.1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{128}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #729 (ID: 415319)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\cos \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} d \theta[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln |1+\sqrt{2}|[/math]
B. [math]\ln |1-\sqrt{2}|[/math]
C. [math]\ln 3[/math]
D. [math]\ln \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{\cos \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int^{\pi / 4} \frac{1}{\cos \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int^{\pi / 4} \sec \theta d \theta[/math]
 [math]=[\ln \mid \tan[/math]
 [math]\left.\left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)\right]_{0}^{\pi / 4}[/math]
 [math]=\ln \mid \tan[/math]
 [math]=\ln |1+\sqrt{2}|[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #730 (ID: 415320)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{pv}=5[/math] হলে [math]\int_{1}^{3} p d v[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]10[/math]
B. [math]5 \log 2[/math]
C. [math]5 \log 3[/math]
D. [math]10 \log 3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}P V=5\\\Rightarrow P=\frac{5}{V}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int_{1}^{3} p d v[/math]
 [math]=\int_{1}^{3} \frac{5}{v} d v[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=5[\ln v]_{1}^{3} \\=5 \ln 3\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #731 (ID: 415321)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cos x d x}{\sqrt{4-\sin ^{2} x}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি[math]\begin{aligned}& \sin x=z \\\Rightarrow & \cos x d x=d z\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\left[\begin{array}{c|c|c}x & \pi / 2 & 0 \\\hline z & 1 & 0\end{array}\right][/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cos x}{\sqrt{4-\sin ^{2} x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{4-z^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1} \frac{z}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{2} \\=\frac{\pi}{6}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #734 (ID: 415324)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{3 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]4 e^{4 x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c[/math]
C. [math]5 e^{5 x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5} e^{5 x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{3 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{e^{4 x}\left(e^{ x}+e^{-x}\right)}{\left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{4 x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} e^{4 x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #736 (ID: 415326)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]X-[/math] অক্ষ এবং [math]y=4 x-x^{2}[/math] বক্ররেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. 16/3 বর্গ একক
খ. 8/3 বর্গ একক
গ. 32/3 বর্গ একক
ঘ. 4/3 একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
x অক্ষ অর্থাৎ [math]y=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}y=4 x-x^{2} \\0=4 x-x^{2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]x(4-x)=0[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 [math]x=4[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{4}\left(4 x-x^{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{4 x^{2}}{2}-\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=32-\frac{64}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{32}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #737 (ID: 415327)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}[/math] ও [math]y = 0[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}} \\y=0 \\0=\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow x^{2}=a^{2}\\\Rightarrow x= \pm a\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\int_{-a}^{a} \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}}{2}+\frac{a^{2}}{2}\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}\right]_{-a}^{a}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{a^{2}}{2} \cdot \frac{\pi}{2}\right)+\frac{a^{2}}{2} \cdot \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi a^{2}}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #738 (ID: 415328)

B. [math]-\frac{1}{a} \cos a x+c[/math]
C. [math]a \cos a x+c[/math]
D. [math]-a \cos a x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \sin a x d x=-\frac{1}{a} \cos a x+c[/math]

Question #740 (ID: 415330)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{x^{2}+4}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \left|x^{2}+4\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln \left|x^{2}+4\right|+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{x^{2}+4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{2 x d x}{x^{2}+4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln \left|x^{2}+4\right|[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #741 (ID: 415331)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{5} x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{28}{15}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{8}{15}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ক্যালকুলেটরের সাহায্যে[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{5}[/math]
 [math]x d x=0.533[/math]
 যা [math]8/15[/math]
 এর সমান।

Explanation:

Question #742 (ID: 415332)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]F(x)=\int_{0}^{x} \frac{t-3}{t^{2}+7} d t[/math] হলে x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]F(x)[/math] ন্যূনতম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-\sqrt{7}[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ন্যূনতম হতে হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\{\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})\}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 হতে হবেএখানে, [math]\frac{d}{d x}\{f(x)\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{t-3}{t^{2}+7}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow t=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #743 (ID: 415333)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}+1[/math] পরাবৃত্ত ও তার উপকেন্দ্রিক লম্ব দ্বারা বেষ্টিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}=2 y-2=2(y-1)[/math]
=4$$ \times \frac{1}{2}(y-1)$পরাবৃত্তের শীর্ষ [math](0, 1)[/math]
 উপকেন্দ্রিক লম্ব, [math]y-1=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=2 \int_{1}^{\frac{3}{2}} x d y[/math]
 [math]=2 \int_{1}^{\frac{3}{2}} \sqrt[4]{2(y-1)}[/math]
 [math]d y=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #745 (ID: 415335)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos x^{\circ} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sin x^{\circ}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\sin x^{\circ}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{180}{\pi} \sin \frac{\pi x}{180}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{180}{\pi} \sin \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #746 (ID: 415336)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left(\tan x+\sec ^{2} x\right) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \tan x+c[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} \sec ^{2} x+c[/math]
C. [math]\tan x+c[/math]
D. [math]\sec ^{2} x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x}\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #747 (ID: 415337)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin 2 x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\cos 2 x}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\cos 2 x}{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin 2 x d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[-\frac{\cos 2 x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}(\cos \pi-\cos 0)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}(-1-1)[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #749 (ID: 415339)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]g(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. } g^{}(x)=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \int_{0}^{1} g(x) d x=\frac{2}{3}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \int \frac{\sec ^{2} x}{g(\tan x)} d x=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+c[/math]

উপরের তথ্যের আলোকে নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { ii. } \int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x^{\frac{1}{2}}+1}{\frac{1}{2}+1}\right]_{0}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}\left[\frac{3}{x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}(1-0)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \int \frac{\sec ^{2} x}{g(\tan x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x}{\sqrt{\tan x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}}[/math]
[ ধরি [math]\left.\tan x=z \therefore \sec ^{2} x d x=d z\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \sqrt{z}+c[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #750 (ID: 415340)
