Question:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{a} x\right)=\frac{1}{x} \log _{a} e\\\text{ii. } \int \sec ^{2} \frac{1}{2} x d x=\frac{1}{2} \tan \frac{1}{2} x+C\\\text{iii. } \int_{a}^{b} \frac{d x}{x}=\ln \left(\frac{b}{a}\right)\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii

Question #751 (ID: 415341)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } f(2 x)=2 \sin x \cos x\\\text{ii. } \int \mathrm{f}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 x\right) d x=\frac{1}{2} \sin 2 x+c\\\text{iii. } \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} f(x) d x=1\end{array}[/math]

উপরের তথ্যের আলোকে নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text{ii. } \int f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \cos 2 x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \sin 2 x+c[/math]
 [math]\text{iii. } \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} f(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin x d x[/math]
 [math]=[-\cos x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-(0-1)=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #753 (ID: 415343)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] [math]g^{\prime}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{5}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]g^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore g^{\prime}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\frac{1}{4}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #754 (ID: 415344)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] [math]\int \frac{g(x)}{f(x)} d x=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sin ^{-1} x^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
খ. [math]\sin ^{-1} x^{2}+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{g(x)}{f(x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=\int z d z[/math]
[ধরি [math]\sin ^{-1} x=z[/math]
 ;[math]\left.\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}=\mathrm{dz}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{z^{2}}{2}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin ^{-1} \mathrm{x}\right)^{2}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #756 (ID: 415346)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}, \phi(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math] [math]x=f(y)[/math] বক্ররেখা, [math]y=0, y=3[/math] এবং y-অক্ষ দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{9}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{y}) \therefore \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{y} \therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{3} y d y=\left[\frac{y^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{3}=\frac{3^{2}}{2}-\frac{0^{2}}{2}=\frac{9}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #757 (ID: 415347)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Comilla Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]F(t)=\int \ln t d t, t>0[/math] হলে [math]F^{\prime}(t)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{t}[/math]
B. [math]\ln t[/math]
C. [math]t \ln t[/math]
D. [math]t \ln t-t[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x}\left[\int f(x) d x\right]=f(x) \\\therefore F^{\prime}(t)=\frac{d}{d t}\left[\int \ln t d t\right]=\ln t\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #759 (ID: 415349)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka Residential Model College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos x-1}=f(x)+C[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\cot \frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 \cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos x-1}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{-2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2} \int \operatorname{cosec}^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-1}{2}\left(\frac{-\cot \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right)+c[/math]
 [math]=\cot \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #760 (ID: 415350)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cantonment College Jashore
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin a x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{a}+\cos a x+c[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{a} \cos a x+c[/math]
C. [math]a \cos a x+c[/math]
D. [math]-a \cos a x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \sin a x d x=[-\cos a x] \cdot \frac{1}{a}+c=-\frac{1}{a} \cos a x+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #761 (ID: 415351)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Milestone College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos x^{\circ} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \cos \frac{\pi x}{180}+c[/math]
B. [math]\sin x+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{180}{\pi} \sin \frac{\pi x}{180}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \sin \frac{\pi x}{180}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int \cos x^{\circ} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \cos \frac{x \pi}{180} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sin \frac{x \pi}{180}}{\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x \pi}{180}\right)}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{180}{\pi} \sin \frac{x \pi}{180}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #764 (ID: 415277)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :


[Image]


চিত্রে [math]y=\sin x[/math] এর লেখচিত্র।

[math]\mathbf{A}_{1}[/math] এর মান কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} y d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin x d x[/math]
 [math]=[-\cos x]_{0}^{\pi}=-[\cos \pi-\cos 0][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -[-1-1][/math]
 [math]=-(-2)=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore A_{1}[/math]
 এর মান [math]2[/math]
 একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #765 (ID: 415265)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


উপরের চিত্রানুসারে—

i. [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} f(x) d x=1[/math]

ii. [math]\int_{0}^{2 \pi} f(x) d x=0[/math]

iii. x অক্ষ ও [math]f(x)[/math] এর চারটি চাপ দ্বারা আবদ্ধ মোট ক্ষেত্রফল [math]8[/math] বর্গ একক

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
i ও iii

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #766 (ID: 415266)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}x+1 & \text { for } x<0 \\\cos \pi x & \text { for } x \geq 0\end{array}\right.[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. }\int_{-1}^{-1 / 2} f(x) d x=\frac{1}{8}\\\text{ii. } \int_{0}^{1} f(x) d x=0\\\text{iii. } f(-1)=1\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: A.i ও ii

Solution:
[math]\text { (i) } \int_{-1}^{-1 / 2} f(x) d x=\int_{-1}^{-1 / 2}(\mathrm{x}+1) \mathrm{dx} \quad[/math]
 [math]\left[\begin{array}{l}\because \mathrm{x}<0 \\\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}+1\end{array}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x\right]_{-1}^{-1 / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\frac{1}{4}}{2}-\frac{1}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]-\left[\frac{1}{2}-1\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[\frac{1}{8}-\frac{1}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]-\left[-\frac{1}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{8}-\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{8}[/math]
 [math]\text { (ii) } \int_{0}^{1} f(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \cos \pi x d x \quad[\because x \geq 0][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[\frac{\sin \pi x}{\pi}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\pi}[\sin \pi-\sin 0][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\pi}[0-0]=0[/math]
 [math]\text{(iii) } f(x)=x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \underset{f}{f(-1)}=-1+1 \quad[/math]
 [math][\because \mathrm{x}<0][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #767 (ID: 415267)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]f(x)=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\cos ^{-1} x[/math] [math]\int \frac{\{f(x)\}^{3}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{3}+c[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{3}+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{4}+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{4}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{4}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sin ^{-1} x \\\therefore \int \frac{\{f(x)\}^{3}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{3}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]\int z^{3} d z[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z^{4}}{4}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{4}}{4}+c[/math]
মনে করি [math]\sin ^{-1} x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]f(x)=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\cos ^{-1} x[/math] [math]\int \frac{\{g(x)\}^{3}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math] এর যোজিত ফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{3}+c[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{3}\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{3}+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{4}+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{4}\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{4}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\frac{1}{4}\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{4}+c[/math]

Question #769 (ID: 415269)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\int_{1}^{10} f(x) d x=4[/math] এবং [math]\int_{1}^{3} g(x) d x=A[/math] [math]f(x)=m x+2[/math] হলে, [math]m[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{28}{99}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-28}{99}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{14}{99}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{-14}{99} .[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-28}{99}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=m x+2 \\\therefore \int_{1}^{10} f(x) d x=4 \\\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{10}(m x+2) d x=4 \\\Rightarrow \left[m \frac{x^{2}}{2}+2 x\right]_{1}^{10}=4 \\\Rightarrow \left[m \cdot \frac{100}{2}+20\right]-\left[\frac{m}{2}+2\right]=4 \\\Rightarrow 50 m+20-\frac{m}{2}-2=4 \\\Rightarrow \frac{100 m-m}{2}=4+2-20 \\\Rightarrow \frac{99 m}{2}=-14 \\\therefore m=-\frac{28}{99}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #770 (ID: 415270)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\int_{1}^{10} f(x) d x=4[/math] এবং [math]\int_{1}^{3} g(x) d x=A[/math] [math]g(x)=\sqrt{x-1}[/math] হলে [math]A[/math] এর মান কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sqrt{32}}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{32}}{-3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{25}}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{32}}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\sqrt{32}}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]g(x)=\sqrt{x-1} \therefore \int_{1}^{3} g(x) d x=A[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{3} \sqrt{x-1} d x=A[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\frac{(x-1)^{\frac{1}{2}}+1}{\frac{1}{2}+1}\right]^{3}_{1}=A[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\frac{(3-1)^{\frac{3}{2}}}{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{(1-1)^{\frac{3}{2}}}{\frac{3}{2}}\right]=A[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \frac{2^{\frac{3}{2}}}{\frac{3}{2}}-0=A \\\Rightarrow\frac{2 \sqrt{2^{3}}}{3}=A \\\Rightarrow A=\frac{\sqrt{2^{2}} \sqrt{2^{3}}}{3} \\\Rightarrow A=\frac{\sqrt{2^{5}}}{3} \\\therefore A=\frac{\sqrt{32}}{3}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=e^{3 x}, g(x)=\cos 4 x[/math] এবং [math]h(x)=\sin 4 x[/math] [math]\int f(x) h(x) d x[/math] কোনটি ?

Question #773 (ID: 415273)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\frac{1-\cos 2 x}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math] [math]\int f^{\prime}(x) d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\tan 2 x+c[/math]
খ. [math]\tan ^{2} x+c[/math]
গ. [math]-\tan ^{2} x+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\tan 2 x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\tan ^{2} x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=\frac{1-\cos 2 x}{1+\cos 2 x}=\frac{2 \sin ^{2} x}{2 \cos ^{2} x}=\tan ^{2} x \\\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=2 \tan x \sec ^{2} x \\\therefore \int f^{\prime}(x) d x=\int 2 \tan x \sec ^{2} x d x\end{array}[/math]
মনে করি,[math]\begin{array}{l}\tan \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{z} \\\therefore \sec ^{2} \mathrm{x} d \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{dz}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 2 \int z d z \\\Rightarrow 2 \cdot \frac{z^{2}}{2}+c \\\Rightarrow z^{2}+c=\tan ^{2} x+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #774 (ID: 415274)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\frac{1-\cos 2 x}{1+\cos 2 x}[/math] [math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} f\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]2-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]2+\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \mathrm{f}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{1-\cos 2\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)}{1+\cos 2\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{1-\cos \frac{\pi}{2}}{1+\cos \frac{\pi}{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{1-0}{1+0}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=[\mathrm{x}]_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\pi}{2}-0\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #775 (ID: 415275)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\int_{0}^{4} \sqrt{16-x^{2}} d x=4 \pi[/math] [math]\int_{3}^{7} \sqrt{16-(x-3)^{2}} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{4 \pi \times 7}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4 \pi \times 3}{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4 \pi}{3+7}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4 \pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]\int_{3}^{7} \sqrt{16-(x-3)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \int_{a}^{b} f(x-c) d x=\int_{a-c}^{b-c} f(x) d x\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{3-3}^{7-3}[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{16-x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{4}[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{16-x^{2}}=4 \pi[/math]


Explanation:

Question #776 (ID: 415276)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\int_{0}^{4} \sqrt{16-x^{2}} d x=4 \pi[/math] [math]\int_{-4}^{0} \sqrt{16-(x+4)^{2}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]4 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]-4 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4 \pi}{4+(-4)}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4 \pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{-4}^{0} \sqrt{16-(x+4)^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{(x+4) \sqrt{16-(x+4)^{2}}}{2}\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.+\frac{16}{2} \sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x+4}{4}\right)\right]_{-4}^{0}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{4 \sqrt{16-4^{2}}}{2}+8\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\sin ^{-1} \cdot 1\right][/math]
 [math]-\left[0+8 \sin ^{-1} 0\right][/math]
 [math]=\left[0+8 \cdot \frac{\pi}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]-[0+0]=4 \pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #777 (ID: 415261)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{10}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{11}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{10}{3}[/math]

Solution:
ছায়াঘেরা অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল[math]=\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{2} y d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{1}^{2}\left(x^{2}+1\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}+x\right]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{2^{3}}{3}+2\right]-[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{1}{3}+1\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{8}{3}+2\right][/math]
 [math]-\left[\frac{1+3}{3}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{14}{3}-\frac{4}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{10}{3}[/math]
 [math]=[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #778 (ID: 415262)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} g(x) d x=1\\\text{ii. } \int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\pi} f(x) d x=1\\\text{iii. } \int_{\frac{\pi}{4}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{g(x)}{f(x)} d x=\ln \sqrt{2}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: D.i, ii ও iii

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)[/math]
 এবং [math]g(x)=\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
 [math]\text { (i) } \int_{0}^{\pi / 2} g(x) d x=\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos x d x \\\quad[/math]
 [math]=[\sin x]_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin \frac{\pi}{2}-\sin 0\right][/math]
 [math]=1-0=1[/math]
 [math]\text { (ii) } \int_{\pi / 2}^{\pi} f(x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\pi / 2}^{\pi} \cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\pi / 2}^{\pi} \sin x d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow [-\cos x]_{\pi / 2}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\cos \pi-\cos \frac{\pi}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]=-[(-1)-0]=1[/math]
 [math]\text { (iii) } \int_{\pi / 4}^{\pi / 2} \frac{g(x)}{f(x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\pi / 4}^{\pi / 2} \frac{\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)}{\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{\pi / 4}^{\pi / 2} \frac{\cos x}{\sin x} d x=[\ln |\sin x|]_{\pi / 4}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[\ln \left|\sin \frac{\pi}{2}\right|-\ln \left|\sin \frac{\pi}{4}\right|\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[\ln \left|\frac{\sin \frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin \frac{\pi}{4}}\right|\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln \frac{1}{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}}=\ln \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #781 (ID: 415234)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:


[Image]


ছায়াবৃত্ত অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]

Solution:
ছায়াবৃত্ত অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল[math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 1 \cdot d x-\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{1+\sin 2 \mathrm{x}} \\\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 1 \cdot d x-\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin 2 x}{\cos ^{2} 2 x} d x \\\Rightarrow [x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}-\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\left(\sec ^{2} 2 x-\tan 2 x \cdot \sec 2 x\right) d x \\\Rightarrow \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-0\right)-\frac{1}{2}[\tan 2 x-\sec 2 x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[0+1-0+1]=\frac{\pi}{2}-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #782 (ID: 415235)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}-x^{2}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}} \ell n \left|\frac{\sqrt{5}+2 x-1}{\sqrt{5}-2 x+1}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{5}} \ell n \left|\frac{\sqrt{5}+2 x-1}{\sqrt{5}-x+2 x}\right|+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}} \tan ^{-1}\left|\frac{\sqrt{5}+x}{\sqrt{5}-x}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4} \tan ^{-1}\left|\frac{x-\sqrt{5}}{x+\sqrt{5}}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}} \ell n \left|\frac{\sqrt{5}+2 x-1}{\sqrt{5}-2 x+1}\right|+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{1+x-x^{2}}=\int \frac{d x}{\frac{5}{4}-\left(x-\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}=\int \frac{d x}{\left(\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}\right)^{2}-\left(x-\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}} \\\quad=\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}} \ln \left|\frac{\sqrt{5}+2 x-1}{\sqrt{5}-2 x+1}\right|+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #783 (ID: 415236)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{2 x^{2}+x+1}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{7}} \tan ^{-1} \frac{4 x+1}{\sqrt{7}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{7}} \ell n \frac{4 x+1}{\sqrt{7}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{x+1}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{7}} \tan ^{-1} \frac{4 x+1}{7}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{7}} \tan ^{-1} \frac{4 x+1}{\sqrt{7}}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{2 x^{2}+x+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{d x}{\left(x+\frac{1}{4}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{\sqrt{7}}{4}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{7}} \tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{4 x+1}{\sqrt{7}}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #784 (ID: 415237)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x}{(x+2)(x-1)^{2}} d x=g(x)+e^{3}[/math] হলে, [math]g(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ell n \left|\frac{x-1}{x+2}\right|[/math]
B. [math]\ell n \left|\frac{x+2}{x-1}\right|[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{9} \ell n \left|\frac{x-1}{x+2}\right|-\frac{1}{3} \frac{1}{x-1}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{9} \ell n \left|\frac{x-1}{x+2}\right|+\frac{1}{3} \frac{1}{x-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{9} \ell n \left|\frac{x-1}{x+2}\right|-\frac{1}{3} \frac{1}{x-1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{{ }^{} x}{(x+2)(x-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2}{(x+2)(-2-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{(1+2)(x-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{A}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2}{9} \frac{1}{x+2}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{(x-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{\frac{2}{9}}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]\left[A=\frac{2}{9}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\frac{2}{9}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{x+2}+\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{(x-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{2}{9}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{x-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #785 (ID: 415238)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{2} \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{9-2 x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{r}-\frac{1}{4} \int_{0}^{2} \frac{-4 x}{\sqrt{9-2 x^{2}}} d x=\left[-\frac{1}{4} \times 2 \sqrt{9-2 x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{2} \\\quad\Rightarrow \frac{-1}{2}\left[\sqrt{9-2 x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{2}=-\frac{1}{2}[\sqrt{1}-\sqrt{9}]=1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #786 (ID: 415239)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sin ^{2} x \cos x d x[/math] যোজিত ফল কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{3} x+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sin ^{3} x}{3}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2} x}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{2} x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\sin ^{3} x}{3}+c[/math]

Solution:
মনে করি,[math]\begin{array}{l}\sin \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{z} \\\therefore \cos \mathrm{x} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sin ^{2} x \cos x d x \\\Rightarrow \int z^{2} d z \\\Rightarrow \frac{z^{3}}{3}+c \\\Rightarrow \frac{\sin ^{3} x}{3}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #787 (ID: 415240)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{e^{x^{3}}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{3} \ln e^{x^{3}}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{e^{x^{3}}}{3}+c[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{3 \mathrm{e}^{x^{3}}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x^{3}}{3 \mathrm{e}^{x^{3}}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{1}{3 \mathrm{e}^{x^{3}}}+c[/math]

Solution:
মনে করি, [math]x^{3}=z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore 3 \mathrm{x}^{2} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}\\\Rightarrow x^{2} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{\mathrm{dz}}{3}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{x^{2}}{e^{x^{3}}} d x \\\quad=\int \frac{1}{e^{z}}\left(\frac{d z}{3}\right) \\\quad=\frac{1}{3} \int e^{-z} d z\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\frac{1}{3} e^{-z}+c=-\frac{1}{3} e^{-x^{3}}+c=-\frac{1}{3 e^{x^{3}}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #789 (ID: 415242)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)^{3}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{7}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{3}{8}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি,[math]\begin{array}{l}1+\ln x=z \\\therefore \frac{1}{x} d x=d z\end{array}[/math]
সুতরাং, [math]x = e[/math]
 হলে,[math]z=2[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d x}{x(1+\ln x)^{3}} \\\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{2} \frac{d z}{z^{3}} \\\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{2} z^{-3} d z \\\Rightarrow \cdot\left[\frac{z^{-2}}{-2}\right]_{1}^{2} \\\Rightarrow -\frac{1}{2}\left[2^{-2}-1^{-2}\right] \\\Rightarrow -\frac{1}{2}\left[\frac{1}{4}-1\right]\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\frac{1}{2}\left[\frac{1-4}{4}\right]=\frac{3}{8} x=1[/math]
 হলে [math]z=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #791 (ID: 415244)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} \frac{x+1}{x^{2}+2 x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln 8-\ln 3[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\ln 8-\ln 3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3 \ln 2+2}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\ln 8[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\ln 8-\ln 3}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{1}^{2} \frac{x+1}{x^{2}+2 x} d x=\int_{1}^{2} \frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{2 x+2}{x^{2}+2 x} d x=\frac{1}{2}\left[\ln \left(x^{2}+2 x\right)\right]_{1}^{2} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}[\ln (4+4)-\ln (1+2)]=\frac{1}{2}(\ln 8-\ln 3)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #792 (ID: 415245)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{x^{2}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]e^{x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2} e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]

Solution:
মনে করি,[math]\begin{array}{l}x^{2}=\mathrm{z}\\\therefore 2 x d x=d z\\\Rightarrow d x=\frac{1}{2} d z\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int x \mathrm{e}^{x^{2}} \mathrm{dx} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \int \mathrm{e}^{z} d z \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{z}+\mathrm{c} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{x^{2}}+\mathrm{c}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #795 (ID: 415248)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{k}\left(2 k x-x^{2}\right) d x=18[/math] হলে [math]k[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-9[/math]
B. [math]-3[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{k}\left(2 k x-x^{2}\right) d x=18 \\\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{k} 2 k x d x-\int_{0}^{k} x^{2} d x=18 \\\Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{k}\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{k}-\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{k}=18 \\\Rightarrow \frac{2 k}{2}\left[k^{2}-0\right]-\frac{1}{3}\left[k^{3}-0\right]=18 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{k}^{3}-\frac{k^{3}}{3}=18 \\\Rightarrow 3 \mathrm{k}^{3}-\mathrm{k}^{3}=54 \\\Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{k}^{3}=54 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{k}^{3}=27 \\\therefore \mathrm{k}=3\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #797 (ID: 415250)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1-\sin x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan x+\sec x+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan x-\sec x+c[/math]
C. [math]-\tan x+\sec x+c[/math]
D. [math]-\tan x-7 \sec x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\tan x+\sec x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1-\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{(1+\sin x) d x}{(1-\sin x)(1+\sin x)}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{1+\sin x}{1-\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int \frac{1+\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} x}+\frac{\sin x}{\cos ^{2} x}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(\sec ^{2} x+\sec x \tan x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]+\int \sec x \tan x d x[/math]
 [math]=\tan x[/math]
 [math]+\sec x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #799 (ID: 415252)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \tan ^{2} x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}-1[/math]
B. [math]1-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}+1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \tan ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]d x-\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow [\tan x]_{0}^{\pi / 4}[/math]
 [math]-[x]_{0}^{\pi / 4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[\tan \frac{\pi}{4}-\tan 0\right]-[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{\pi}{4}-0\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow [1-0]-[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{\pi}{4}-0\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #800 (ID: 415253)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=0, x=2[/math] এবং [math]y = 0[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ বক্ররেখা [math]y=e^{x / 2}[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রফল কত

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{e-1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]e-1[/math]
গ. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 e-1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2(e-1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{2} \mathrm{e}^{\frac{x}{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\frac{x}{2}}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=2\left[\mathrm{e}^{\frac{2}{2}}-\mathrm{e}^{\frac{0}{2}}\right][/math]
 [math]=2\left[\mathrm{e}^{\prime}-1\right][/math]
 [math]=2(\mathrm{e}-1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #801 (ID: 415254)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-9}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left|\frac{x-3}{x+3}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln \left|\frac{x+3}{x-3}\right|+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{6} \ln \left|\frac{x-3}{x+3}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln \left|\frac{x+3}{x-3}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{6} \ln \left|\frac{x-3}{x+3}\right|+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-9}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-3^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2.3} \ln \left|\frac{x-3}{x+3}\right|+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6} \ln[/math]
 [math]\left|\frac{x-3}{x+3}\right|[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #802 (ID: 415255)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} x \cos x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} x \cos x d x[/math]
 [math]\int x \cos x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \int \cos x d x[/math]
 [math]-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} x \int \cos x d x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \sin x-\int \sin x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \sin x-(-\cos x)+c[/math]
 [math]=x \sin x[/math]
 [math]+\cos x+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} x \cos x d x[/math]
 [math]=[x \sin x+\cos x]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[\frac{\pi}{2} \sin \frac{\pi}{2}+\cos \frac{\pi}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]-[0 . \sin 0+\cos 0][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left[\frac{\pi}{2}+0\right]-[0+1] \\\Rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #803 (ID: 415256)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1}\left\{\frac{d}{d x}\left(2 \tan ^{-1} x\right)\right\} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{1}\left\{\frac{d}{d x}\left(2 \tan ^{-1} x\right)\right\} d x=\left[2 \tan ^{-1} x\right]_{0}^{1} \\\Rightarrow 2\left[\tan ^{-1} 1-\tan ^{-1} 0\right]=2\left[\frac{\pi}{4}-0\right]=\frac{\pi}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #805 (ID: 415258)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{3}+1}{x+1} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{x}^{3}+\mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{x}+{\mathrm{c}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x^{3}}{3}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x^{3}}{3}+x^{2}+\frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]x^{3}+\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{x}{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{x^{3}}{3}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{x^{3}+1}{x+1} d x=\int \frac{(x+1)\left(x^{2}-x+1\right)}{(x+1)} d x \\\quad\Rightarrow \int{\left(x^{2}-x+1\right) d x} \\\quad\Rightarrow \frac{x^{3}}{3}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #806 (ID: 415259)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{e} \ln x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{e} \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln x \int d x-\int \frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\ln x \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \ln x-\int \frac{1}{x} \cdot x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \ln x-\int d x[/math]
 [math]=x \ln x-x+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{e} \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{e}=[e \ln e-e][/math]
 [math]-[\ln 1-1][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow [e-e][/math]
 [math]-[0-1][/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #807 (ID: 415260)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{2}{\sqrt{1-4 x^{2}}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} 2 x+c[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} 2 x+c[/math]
C. [math]-\sin ^{-1} 2 x+c[/math]
D. [math]-\cos ^{-1} 2 x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\sin ^{-1} 2 x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{2}{\sqrt{1-4 x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{2}{\sqrt{1-(2 x)^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\sin ^{-1} x+c\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin ^{-1} 2 x+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #808 (ID: 415233)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:


[Image]


[math]\int f\left(x+\frac{\pi}{4}\right) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\tan 2 x-\sec 2 x)+c[/math]
খ. [math]\tan 2 x+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sec x+c}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{2} \tan x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=\frac{1}{1+\sin 2 x} \\f\left(x+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=\frac{1}{1+\sin \left(2 x+\frac{\pi}{2}\right)}=\frac{1}{1+\cos 2 x} \\\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 2 x}=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} x}=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} x d x \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \tan x+c \\\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #809 (ID: 415232)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y^{2}=9 x[/math] ও [math]y = 3[/math] [math]y[/math] অক্ষ ও সমীকরণদ্বয় দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=9 x \Rightarrow x=\frac{y^{2}}{9}[/math]
y-অক্ষের সমীকরণ [math]x = 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{3}\left(\frac{y^{2}}{9}-0\right) d y \\\Rightarrow \left[\frac{y^{3}}{27}\right]_{0}^{3} \\\Rightarrow 1\end{array}[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #810 (ID: 415210)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


ছায়াকৃত অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-48}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{72}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{112}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=(x+4)^{2}-4, y=0[/math]
 হলে ছেদবিন্দু[math]\begin{array}{l}0=x^{2}+8 x+16-4\\\Rightarrow x^{2}+8 x+12=0\\\Rightarrow x+6 x+2 x+12=0\\\Rightarrow (x+6)(x+2)=0\\\therefore x=-2,-6\end{array}[/math]
নির্ণেয় ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{-2}^{-6}\left\{(x+4)^{2}-4\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \left[\frac{(x+4)^{3}}{3}-4 x\right]_{-2}^{-6} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3}\left[(x+4)^{3}-12 x\right]_{-2}^{-6} \\\Rightarrow\frac{1}{3}\{(-8+72)-(8+24)\} \\\Rightarrow \frac{32}{3}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #811 (ID: 415211)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \operatorname{cosec} x d x[/math] এর যোগজ-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \ln \left|\tan \frac{x}{2}\right|+c\\\text{ii. } -\ell n|\operatorname{cosec} x+\cot x|+c\\\text{iii. } \ell n|\sec x+\tan x|+c\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: A.i ও ii

Solution:
[math]\int \sec x d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln \tan \left[\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]+c[/math]
 [math]=\ln |\sec x+\tan x|+c[/math]
 [math]\int \operatorname{cosec} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left|\tan \frac{x}{2}\right|+c[/math]
 [math]=-\ln (\operatorname{cosec} x+\cot x)[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #812 (ID: 415212)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f^{-1}(x)=\ln x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে -

[math]\text{i. } \int f^{-1}(x) d x=x \ln x-x+c[/math] [math]\text{ii. } \int g(x) f\left(x^{3}\right) d x=\frac{1}{2} f\left(x^{3}\right)+c[/math] [math]\text{iii. } \int f^{-1}(g(x)) d x=2 \int f^{-1}(x) d x=[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: C.i ও iii

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x^{3}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore x^{2} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d z}{3}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}^{-1}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\ln \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\int g(x) f\left(x^{3}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int x^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-x^{3}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]e^{x^{3}}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3} f\left({x}^{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #813 (ID: 415213)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=a^{2}+x^{2}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \int \frac{d x}{f(x)}=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{a}\right)+c\\\text{ii. } \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{f(x)}}=\ln \left|x+\sqrt{\mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{a}^{2}}\right|+c\\\text{iii. } \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\{f(x)\}^{3}}}=\frac{x}{a^{2} \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}+c\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: C.i ও iii

Solution:
(ii) নং সঠিক নয়।[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{f(x)}}=[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{a^{2}+x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #814 (ID: 415214)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sec x[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \int\{f(x)\}^{2} d x=\tan x+c\\\text{ii. } \int\{f(x)\}^{3} d x=\frac{1}{2}(\sec x \tan x+\ln |\sec x+\tan x|)+c\\\text{iii. } \int\{f(x)\}^{4} d x=\tan x+3 \tan ^{3} \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(iii) নং সঠিক নয় ।ধরি, [math]\tan x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sec ^{2} x d x=d z \quad[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int\{f(x)\}^{4} d x=\int \sec ^{4} x d x \\\quad\Rightarrow \int \sec ^{2} x \cdot \sec ^{2} x d x \\\quad\Rightarrow \int\left(1+\tan ^{2} x\right) \sec ^{2} x d x \\\quad\Rightarrow \int\left(1+z^{2}\right) d z \\\quad\Rightarrow z+\frac{1}{3} z^{3}+c \\\quad\Rightarrow \tan x+\frac{1}{3} \tan ^{3} x+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #815 (ID: 415215)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=1+\sin x, a=0, b=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. } \sqrt{f(x)}[/math] এর মান [math]\sin \frac{x}{2}+\cos \frac{x}{2}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \int \sqrt{f(x)} d x[/math] এর মান [math]2\left(\sin \frac{x}{2}-\cos \frac{x}{2}\right)[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \int_{a}^{b} \sqrt{f(x)} d x=2[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: D.i, ii ও iii

Solution:
[math]\text { (i) } \sqrt{f(x)}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1+\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{\sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}+\cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}+2 \sin \frac{x}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sqrt{\left(\sin \frac{x}{2}+\cos \frac{x}{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin \frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]+\cos \frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]\text { (ii) } \int \sqrt{f(x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(\sin \frac{x}{2}+\cos \frac{x}{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -2 \cos \frac{x}{2}+2[/math]
 [math]\sin \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]\text { (iii) } \int_{a}^{b} \sqrt{f(x)} d x[/math]
 [math]=2\left[\sin \frac{x}{2}-\cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow2\left[\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}-0+1\right][/math]
 [math]=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #816 (ID: 415216)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln x^{2}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \int f(x) d x=\frac{1}{x}+c\\\text{ii. } \int_{1}^{e} f(x) d x=\ln e\\\text{iii. } \int_{1}^{e} f(x) d x=\frac{1}{\ln e}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
(i) সঠিক নয়; কারণ [math]\int \ln x d x=x \ln x-x[/math]
(ii) সঠিক; কারণ [math]\int_{1}^{e} \ln x d x=[x \ln x-x]_{1}^{e}=1=\ln e[/math]
(iii) সঠিক; কারণ [math]\ln e=1=\frac{1}{\ln e}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #817 (ID: 415217)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=e^{x}, g(x)=\sin x+\cos x[/math] [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} g(x) d x[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}-1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}+1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}(\sin x+\cos x) d x \\\Rightarrow [-\cos x+\sin x)]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \\\Rightarrow \left(-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}+\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)-(-1+0)=1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #818 (ID: 415218)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=e^{x}, g(x)=\sin x+\cos x[/math] [math]\int g(x) f(x) d x[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{x} \cos x+c[/math]
খ. [math]e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]
গ. [math]e^{x}(\sin x-\cos x)+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x) d x \\\begin{array}{l|l}\Rightarrow e^{x} \sin x+c & f(x)=\sin x \\& f^{\prime}(x)=\cos x\end{array} \\{\left[\because \int e^{x}\left[f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right] d x=e^{x} f(x)+c\right]} \\\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #819 (ID: 415219)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]A=a \cos ^{2} \theta+b \sin ^{2} \theta[/math] [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} A d \theta[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}(a-b)[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}(a+b)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}(a-b)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}(a+b)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi}{4}(a+b)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cdot\left(a \cos ^{2} \theta+b \sin ^{2} \theta\right) d \theta \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[a+a \cos 2 \theta+b-b \cos 2 \theta] d \theta \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[(a+b)+(a-b) \cos 2 \theta] d \theta \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}\left[(a+b) \theta+\frac{(a-b) \sin 2 \theta}{2}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}\left[(a+b) \frac{\pi}{2}+0-0-0\right]=(a+b) \frac{\pi}{4}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #820 (ID: 415220)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]A=a \cos ^{2} \theta+b \sin ^{2} \theta[/math] [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\mathrm{d} \theta}{\mathrm{A}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{4 \sqrt{a b}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{3 \sqrt{a b}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2 \sqrt{a b}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{a b}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{2 \sqrt{a b}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{d \theta}{a^{2} \cos ^{2} \theta+b^{} \sin ^{2} \theta} \\\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sec ^{2} \theta d \theta}{a+b \tan ^{2} \theta}\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\tan \theta=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sec ^{2} \theta \mathrm{d} \theta=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
এখন, [math]\int_{0}^{\infty} \frac{d z}{a+b z^{2}}[/math]
যখন [math]\theta=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 তখন [math]z=\infty[/math]
যখন [math]\theta=0[/math]
 তখন [math]z=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \left[\frac{1}{\sqrt{\mathrm{ab}}} \tan ^{-1}\left(\sqrt{\frac{\mathrm{b}}{\mathrm{a}}} \mathrm{z}\right)\right]_{0}^{\infty} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{\mathrm{ab}}} \times \frac{\pi}{2}=\frac{\pi}{2 \sqrt{\mathrm{ab}}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #821 (ID: 415221)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\sin x \cos ^{3} x[/math] [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} f(x) d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin x \cos ^{3} x d x \\\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin x\left(1-\sin ^{2} x\right) \cos x d x\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sin x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \mathrm{x} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
যখন, [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 তখন, [math]z=1[/math]
যখন, [math]x=0[/math]
 তখন, [math]z=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{1} z\left(1-z^{2}\right) d z \\\Rightarrow \left[\frac{z^{2}}{2}-\frac{z^{4}}{4}\right]_{0}^{1} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{4}=\frac{1}{4}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #822 (ID: 415222)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\sin x \cos ^{3} x[/math] [math]\int \frac{d x}{f(x)}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{2} x-\frac{1}{4} \tan ^{4} x+c[/math]
খ. [math]\ln |\tan x|+\tan ^{2} x+c[/math]
গ. [math]\ln |\tan x|+\frac{1}{2} \tan x+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\ln |\tan x|+\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{2} x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\ln |\tan x|+\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{2} x+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sec ^{2} x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{\sin x \cos ^{3} x} \\\Rightarrow \int \frac{\sec ^{4} x d x}{\tan x} \\\Rightarrow \int \frac{\left(1+\tan ^{2} x\right) \sec ^{2} x d x}{\tan x} \\\Rightarrow \int\left(\frac{1+z^{2}}{z}\right) d z \\\Rightarrow \int\left(\frac{1}{z}+z\right) d z=\ln |z|+\frac{z^{2}}{2}+c \\\Rightarrow \ln |\tan x|+\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{2} x+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #823 (ID: 415223)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=3 \cos x+\sin x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 \cos x-\sin x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=A f(x)+B f^{\prime}(x)[/math] [math]A[/math] ও [math]B[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{2}, \frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}, \frac{3}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2},-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 \cos x-\sin x \equiv A(3 \cos x+\sin x)+B(-3 \sin x+\cos x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad 2=3 \mathrm{~A}+\mathrm{B}[/math]
 এবং [math]-1=A-3 B[/math]
 [math]\therefore A=\frac{1}{2} \quad \quad \therefore B=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #824 (ID: 415224)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=3 \cos x+\sin x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=2 \cos x-\sin x[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=A f(x)+B f^{\prime}(x)[/math] [math]\int \frac{g(x) d x}{f(x)}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{2}(x+\ln |3 \cos x+\sin x|)+c[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(x+\ln |3 \cos x+\sin x|)+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2}(x-\ln |3 \cos x+\sin x|)+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(x-\ln |3 \cos x+\sin x|)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2}(x+\ln |3 \cos x+\sin x|)+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{2 \cos x-\sin x}{3 \cos x+\sin x} d x \\\Rightarrow \int \frac{\frac{1}{2}(3 \cos x+\sin x)+\frac{1}{2}(-3 \sin x+\cos x)}{3 \cos x+\sin x} d x \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \int\left[1+\frac{-3 \sin x+\cos x}{3 \cos x+\sin x}\right] d x \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}[x+\ln |3 \cos x+\sin x|]+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #825 (ID: 415225)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]F(x)=\frac{x-3}{(1-2 x)(1+x)}[/math] [math]F(x)=\frac{A}{1-2 x}+\frac{B}{1+x}[/math] হলে, [math]A[/math] ও [math]B[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{5}{3}, \frac{4}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{5}{3}, \frac{4}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{5}{3}, \frac{-4}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{-5}{3},-\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-5}{3},-\frac{4}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\left(\frac{1}{2}-3\right)}{(1-2 x)\left(1+\frac{1}{2}\right)}+\frac{-1-3}{\{1-2(-1)\}(1+x)}=\frac{-\frac{5}{3}}{1-2 x}+\frac{-\frac{4}{3}}{1+x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #826 (ID: 415226)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]F(x)=\frac{x-3}{(1-2 x)(1+x)}[/math] [math]\int F(x) d x=G(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]G(x)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{3} \ell n |1-2 x|+\frac{4}{3} \ell n |1+x|[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{5}{3} \ell n|1-2 x|-\frac{4}{3} \ell n|1+x|[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{5}{6} \ell n |1-2 x|+\frac{4}{3} \ell n |1+x|[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{5}{6} \ell n |1-2 x|-\frac{4}{3} \ell n |1+x|[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{5}{6} \ell n |1-2 x|-\frac{4}{3} \ell n |1+x|[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}-\frac{5}{3} \int \frac{d x}{1-2 x}+\left(-\frac{4}{3}\right) \int \frac{d x}{1+x} \\\quad\Rightarrow \frac{-5}{3} \frac{\ell n |1-2 x|}{\frac{d}{d x}(1-2 x)}-\frac{4}{3} \ell n|1+x|+c \\\quad\Rightarrow \frac{5}{6} \ell n |1-2 x|-\frac{4}{3} \ell n |1+x|+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #827 (ID: 415227)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=x^{2}+6 x+18[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x+3[/math] [math]\int \frac{d x}{f(x)}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{9} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x+3}{-3}\right)+c[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x+3}{3}\right)+c[/math]
গ. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x+3}{3}\right)+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x+3}{3}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x+3}{3}\right)+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{c}\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}+6 x+18}=\int \frac{d x}{(x+3)^{2}+3^{2}} \\\quad\Rightarrow\frac{1}{3} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x+3}{3}\right)+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #828 (ID: 415228)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=x^{2}+6 x+18[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=x+3[/math] [math]\int \frac{g(x)}{\sqrt{f(x)}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\ln \left|x+\sqrt{x^{2}+6 x+1.8}\right|+c[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{x^{2}+6 x+18}+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{x+\sqrt{x^{2}+6 x+18}}+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln \left|x+\sqrt{x^{2}+6 x+18}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt{x^{2}+6 x+18}+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x^{2}+6 x+18=z^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(2 x+6) d x=2 z d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{(x+3) d x}{\sqrt{x^{2}+6 x+18}} \\\Rightarrow \int \frac{\frac{1}{2}(2 x+6) d x}{\sqrt{x^{2}+6 x+18}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2} \int \frac{2 z d z}{z}=\int d z \\\Rightarrow z+c=\sqrt{x^{2}+6 x+18}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #829 (ID: 415229)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\sin x+\cos x, g(x)=\ln x[/math] [math]\int x^{2}\{g(x)\}^{2} d x[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{3 x}\left(\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{2 x}{3}+\frac{2}{27}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{(\ln x)^{2}}{3}-\frac{2 \ln x}{9}+\frac{2}{27}+c[/math]
গ. [math]x^{3}\left\{(\ln x)^{2}-2 \ln x+2\right\}+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{3}\left\{\frac{(\ln x)^{2}}{3}-\frac{2 \ln x}{9}+\frac{2}{27}\right\}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x^{3}\left\{\frac{(\ln x)^{2}}{3}-\frac{2 \ln x}{9}+\frac{2}{27}\right\}+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\ln x=z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \\\therefore \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \mathrm{dz}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int x^{2}(\ln x)^{2} d x=\int e^{2 z} \cdot z^{2} \cdot e^{2} d z \\\Rightarrow \int z^{2} e^{3 z} d z \\\Rightarrow e^{3 z}\left[\frac{z^{2}}{3}-\frac{2 z}{9}+\frac{2}{27}\right]+c \\\Rightarrow x^{3}\left[\frac{(\ln x)^{2}}{3}-\frac{2 \ln x}{9}+\frac{2}{27}\right]+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #830 (ID: 415230)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=\sin x+\cos x, g(x)=\ln x[/math] [math]\int f o g(x) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]x \cos (\ln x)+c[/math]
খ. [math]x \sin (\ln x)+c[/math]
গ. [math]e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]e^{x} \cos x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]x \sin (\ln x)+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\ln x=z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \\\therefore \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \mathrm{dz}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int f o g(x) d x \\\Rightarrow \int\{\sin (\ln x)+\cos (\ln x)\} d x \\\Rightarrow \int(\sin z+\cos z) e^{z} d^{z} \\\Rightarrow e^{z} \sin z+c \\\Rightarrow e^{\ln x} \sin (\ln x)+c \\\Rightarrow x \sin (\ln x)+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #831 (ID: 415231)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y^{2}=9 x[/math] ও [math]y = 3[/math]

উপরোক্ত সমীকরণদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-1,0)[/math]
খ. [math](1,0)[/math]
গ. [math](0,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1,3)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](1,3)[/math]

Solution:
[math](3)^{2}=9 x\Rightarrow 9 x=9 \therefore x=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #832 (ID: 415166)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math] সমান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\text { xlgox }+x[/math]
C. [math]x \log x-x[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x \log x-x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \log x d x=\log x \int d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} \log x \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x \log x-\int \frac{1}{x} \cdot x d x=x \log x-x+C[/math]


Explanation:

Question #833 (ID: 415167)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2013-2014, 2006-2007 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Board, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1}(e+1)-\tan ^{-1} 2[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1} e-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1}(\mathrm{e}) \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}+\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}(e-1)-\tan ^{-1} 1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\tan ^{-1}(\mathrm{e}) \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}+\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{-x}}{\left(e^{-x}\right)^{2}+1} d x[/math]
 [math]\left[e^{-x}=u\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d u}{u^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\tan ^{-1} u\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\tan ^{-1} e^{-\mathrm{x}}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}^{-1}-\tan ^{-1} 1\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}-\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}^{-1} \pm \frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #834 (ID: 415168)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর : [math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left[\left[\tan ^{-1} x\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{3}}\right.[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{3}-\tan ^{-1} 1[/math]
 [math]\left.=\frac{\pi}{3}-\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{12}\right][/math]


Explanation:

Question #835 (ID: 415169)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos x \cos (\sin x) d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin (\sin x)+c[/math]
B. [math]\cos (\sin x)+c[/math]
C. [math]-\sin (\sin x)+c[/math]
D. [math]-\cos (\sin x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\sin (\sin x)+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি , [math]\sin x=z \Rightarrow \cos x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int \cos x \cos (\sin x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \cos z d z[/math]
 [math]=\sin z+c[/math]
 [math]=\sin (\sin x)+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #836 (ID: 415170)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x_{\tan ^{-1}} \mathrm{xd} x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\pi / 4+1 / 2[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 4-1 / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 2-1[/math]
D. [math]\pi+2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text{ } \int x \tan ^{-1} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} x \int x d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1} x \int x d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} x \frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{x^{2}}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \tan ^{-1} x}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{1+x^{2}-1}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \tan ^{-1} x}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int\left(1-\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \tan ^{-1} x}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(x-\tan ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
বসিয়ে,[math]{\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2} \tan ^{-1} x-\frac{1}{2}\left(x-\tan ^{-1} x\right)\right]_{0}^{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{1}{2}\left(1-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)-0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{8}-\frac{1}{2}+\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:
এই Type এর অঙ্ক Solve করার ক্ষেত্রে কোনটা । আর কোনটা v ধরতে হবে সেটা নিয়ে অনেকের ঝামেলা হয়। যেটা সমাকলন করতে সুবিধা হয় সেটাকে ধরতে হবে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #837 (ID: 415171)

Question:
[math]\int \sin x^{0} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \operatorname{cosec} \frac{\pi x}{180}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \sec \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}+\mathrm{C}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \sin \frac{\pi x}{180}+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \cos \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-180}{\pi} \cos \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}+\mathrm{C}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \sin x^{0} d x=\int \sin \frac{\pi x}{180} d x=\frac{-180}{\pi} \cos \frac{\pi x}{180}+C[/math]

B. [math]\frac{e^{-m x}}{-m}+c[/math]
C. [math]-m e^{-m x}+c[/math]
D. [math]m e^{-m x}+c[/math]

Question #839 (ID: 415173)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 4 x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan 2 x+c[/math]
B. [math]-\tan 2 x+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{4}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-\tan 2 x}{4}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{4}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos 4 x}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} 2 x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \frac{\tan 2 x}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\tan 2 x}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #840 (ID: 415174)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x}{\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sec x+c[/math]
B. [math]-\sec x+c[/math]
C. [math]\operatorname{cosec} x+c[/math]
D. [math]-\operatorname{cosec} x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\operatorname{cosec} x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x}{\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\cos x}{\sin x \cdot \sin x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \cot x \cdot \operatorname{cosec} x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\operatorname{cosec} x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #841 (ID: 415175)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos 2 x^{\circ} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin 2 x^{\circ}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sin 2 x^{\circ}}{2}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{90^{\circ}}{\pi} \sin 2 x^{\circ}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{90}{\pi} \sin \frac{\pi x}{180^{\circ}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{90^{\circ}}{\pi} \sin 2 x^{\circ}+\mathrm{c}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \cos 2 x^{\circ} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \cos \frac{2 \pi x}{180} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{90}{\pi} \sin[/math]
 [math]\frac{2 \pi x}{180}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{90}{\pi}[/math]
 [math]\sin 2 x^{\circ}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #842 (ID: 415176)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 11^{z} d z=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]z 11^{z+1}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{11^{z}}{\ln 11}+c[/math]
C. [math]z 11^{z-1}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{z}{11}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{11^{z}}{\ln 11}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int 11^{z} \mathrm{dz}=\int \mathrm{e}^{\ln 11^{z}} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\int \mathrm{e}^{z \ln 11}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{zln} 11}}{\ell n 11}+\mathrm{c}=\frac{11^{z}}{\ell n 11}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:
