Question #845 (ID: 415179)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]y[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\ln x+c[/math]
খ. [math]-\ln x+c_{1} x+c[/math]
গ. [math]-\ln x+c_{1} x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{6}{x^{4}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\ln x+c_{1} x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=\frac{1}{x^{2}} \Rightarrow \int \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}} d x=\int \frac{1}{x^{2}} d x \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{x}+c_{1} \\\Rightarrow \int \frac{d y}{d x} d x=-\ln x+c_{1} x+c \\\therefore y=-\ln x+c_{1} x+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #846 (ID: 415180)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{m-1} \cdot e^{x^{m}} d x[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{x^{m}}+c[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{e^{x^{m}}}{m}+c[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{e^{x^{m}}}{m-1}+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{e^{x^{m-1}}}{m-1}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{e^{x^{m}}}{m}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int x^{m-1} e^{x^{m}} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]x^{m}=\mathbf{z}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow m x^{m-1} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}\\\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{\mathrm{m}-1} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{m}}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{r}\int x^{m-1} e^{x^{m}} d x \\\Rightarrow \int e^{z} \frac{d z}{m} \\\Rightarrow \frac{e^{z}}{m}+c \\\Rightarrow \frac{e^{x^{m}}}{m}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #847 (ID: 415181)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 3^{3^{x}} 3^{x} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3^{x}}{\ln 3}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3^{3^{x}}}{\ln 3}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3^{x}}{(\ln 3)^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3^{3^{x}}}{(\ln 3)^{2}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3^{3^{x}}}{(\ln 3)^{2}}+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]3^{x}=z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow\left(3^{x} \ln 3\right) d x=d z \\\therefore 3^{x} d x=\frac{d z}{\ln 3}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int 3^{3^{x}} 3^{x} d x \\\Rightarrow \int 3^{z} \cdot \frac{d z}{\ln 3} \\\Rightarrow \frac{3^{z}}{(\ln 3)^{2}}+c=\frac{3^{3^{x}}}{(\ln 3)^{2}}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #848 (ID: 415182)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos ^{5} x \sin x d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sin ^{6} x}{6}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\sin ^{6} x}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\cos ^{6} x}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-\cos ^{6} x}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-\cos ^{6} x}{6}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\cos x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin x d x=-d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int-z^{5} d z \\\Rightarrow \frac{-z^{6}}{6}+c=\frac{-\cos ^{6} x}{6}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #849 (ID: 415183)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left|e^{x}-e^{-x}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln \left|e^{x}+e^{-x}\right|+c[/math]
C. [math]\ln \left|e^{-x}-e^{x}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left|\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\ln \left|e^{x}+e^{-x}\right|+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]e^{x}+e^{-x}=z \therefore\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right) d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{c}\int \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} d x=\int \frac{d z}{z}=\ln z+c \\\quad\Rightarrow \ln \left|e^{x}+e^{-x}\right|+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #850 (ID: 415184)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x}{\sqrt{\cos x}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-2 \sqrt{\cos x}+c[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\cos x}+c[/math]
C. [math]-2 \sqrt{\sin x}+c[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2 \sqrt{\cos x}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\cos x=z \\\Rightarrow -\sin x d x=d z \\\int \frac{\sin x d x}{\sqrt{\cos x}}=\int \frac{-d z}{\sqrt{z}} \\\quad\Rightarrow -2 \sqrt{z}+c \\\quad\Rightarrow -2 \sqrt{\cos x}+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #851 (ID: 415185)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}} d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\tan ^{-1} x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int z d z[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{\sqrt{x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{-1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\mathrm{e}}-1[/math]
C. [math]2(e-1)[/math]
D. [math]1-\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2(e-1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 \int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x=2\left[e^{\sqrt{x}}\right]_{0}^{1}=2(e-1)[/math]

Question #853 (ID: 415187)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}1-x^{2}=z \therefore x d x=\frac{-d z}{2} \\\therefore \int \frac{-d z}{2 \sqrt{z}}=-\sqrt{z}+c=-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #854 (ID: 415188)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{9-x^{2}}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c \text {. }[/math]
B. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{9}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{9} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}+c \text {. }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{9-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{3^{2}-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{3}\right)+c[/math]
 (সরাসরি সূত্র)

Question #855 (ID: 415189)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left|\frac{a+x}{a-x}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln \left|\frac{a-x}{a+x}\right|[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}+\frac{a^{2}}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{a}{2} \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}+\frac{a^{2}}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি,[math]\begin{array}{l}x=a \sin \theta \\\therefore d x=\operatorname{acos} \theta d \theta \\\theta=\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}} d x \\\Rightarrow \int \sqrt{a^{2}-a^{2} \sin ^{2} x} d x \\\Rightarrow \int a \sqrt{1-\sin ^{2} x} a \cdot \cos \theta d \theta \\\Rightarrow \int a^{2} \cdot \cos ^{2} x d x \\\Rightarrow \frac{a^{2}}{2} \int(1+\cos 2 \theta) d \theta \\\Rightarrow \frac{a^{2}}{2}\left[\theta+\frac{1}{2} \sin 2 \theta\right]+c \\\Rightarrow \frac{a^{2} \theta}{2}+\frac{a^{2}}{2} \sin \theta \cdot \cos \theta+c \\\Rightarrow \frac{a^{2}}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+\frac{a^{2}}{2} \cdot \frac{x}{a} \sqrt{1-\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+c \\\Rightarrow \frac{a^{2}}{2} \sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}+\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}+c\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #856 (ID: 415190)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 \sqrt{1-x}(x+2)}{3}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-2 \sqrt{1-x}(x+2)}{3}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-2 \sqrt{1-x}(x+2)}{3}+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি [math]1-x=z^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore d x=-2 z d z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x}}=\int \frac{\left(1-z^{2}\right)(-2 z d z)}{z} \\\quad\Rightarrow -2 \int\left(1-z^{2}\right) d z \\\quad\Rightarrow 2 \int\left(z^{2}-1\right) d z \\\quad\Rightarrow 2\left[\frac{z^{3}}{3}-z\right]+c \\\quad\Rightarrow 2\left[\frac{1}{3}(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}\right]+c\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \frac{2}{3}(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-2(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}+c \\\Rightarrow 2 \frac{(1-x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-3(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}}{3}+c \\\Rightarrow 2 \frac{(1-x)^{\frac{1}{2}}(1-x-3)}{3}+c \\\Rightarrow \frac{-2 \sqrt{1-x}(x+2)}{3}+c \\\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #857 (ID: 415191)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{2 \cos ^{-1} x}\left(\frac{\cos ^{-1} x}{x}-\frac{\ln x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\right) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2 \cos ^{-1} x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} x^{\cos -1} x[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{2 \cos ^{-1} x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(x^{\cos ^{-1} x}\right)^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{2}\left(x^{\cos ^{-1} x}\right)^{2}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x^{2 \cos ^{-1} x}=z[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 2 \cos ^{-1} x \ln x=\ln z \\\Rightarrow\left(\frac{2 \cos ^{-1} x}{x}-\frac{2 \ln x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\right) d x=\frac{1}{z} d z \\\therefore\left(\frac{\cos ^{-1} x}{x}-\frac{\ln x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\right) d x=\frac{d z}{2 z}\end{array}[/math]
এখন , [math]\int z \frac{d z}{2 z}=\frac{1}{2} z+c=\frac{1}{2} x^{2 \cos ^{-1} x}+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}\left(x^{\cos ^{-1} x}\right)^{2}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #858 (ID: 415192)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}-4} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ell n\left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
B. [math]\ell n \left|\frac{x+2}{x-2}\right|-5 x+c[/math]
C. [math]x+\ell n \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]
D. [math]2 x+\ell n\left|\frac{x+2}{x-2}\right|+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x+\ell n \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}-4} d x=\int\left(\frac{x^{2}-4+4}{x^{2}-4}\right) d x \\\Rightarrow \int\left(1+\frac{4}{x^{2}-4}\right) d x \\\Rightarrow x+\frac{4}{2.2} \ell n \left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c \\\Rightarrow x+\ell n\left|\frac{x-2}{x+2}\right|+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #859 (ID: 415193)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{3} e^{x} d x=f(x)+c[/math] হয় তবে [math]f(x)=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3} e^{x}\left(3 x^{2}-6 x+6\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3} e^{x}\left(x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x-6\right)[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}\left(x^{4}-5 x^{3}+3 x^{2}-6 x+6\right)[/math]
D. [math]e^{x}\left(x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x-6\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e^{x}\left(x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x-6\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]=\int x^{n} e^{a x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{a x}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{x^{n}}{a}-\frac{n x^{n-1}}{a^{2}}+\frac{n(n-1) x^{n-2}}{a^{3}}-\frac{n(n-1)(n-2) x^{n-3}}{a^{4}}+\ldots\right]+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int x^{3} e^{x} d x[/math]
 [math]=e^{x}\left[x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x-6\right][/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #860 (ID: 415194)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{10 x} \sin 6 x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{10 e^{10 x} \sin 6 x+6 e^{10 x} \cos 6 x}{136}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{10 e^{10 x} \sin 6 x-6 e^{10 x} \cos 6 x}{136}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{10 e^{10 x} \cos 6 x+6 e^{10 x} \sin 6 x}{136}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{10 e^{10 x} \cos 6 x-6 e^{10 x} \sin 6 x}{136}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{10 e^{10 x} \sin 6 x-6 e^{10 x} \cos 6 x}{136}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int e^{10 x} \sin 6 x \mathrm{dx} \\\Rightarrow \frac{10 \mathrm{e}^{10 x} \sin 6 \mathrm{x}-6 \mathrm{e}^{10 \mathrm{x}} \cos 6 \mathrm{x}}{10^{2}+6^{2}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{10 \mathrm{e}^{10 \mathrm{x}} \sin 6 \mathrm{x}-6 \mathrm{e}^{10 x} \cos 6 \mathrm{x}}{136}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #861 (ID: 415195)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \ln \left|x^{-1}\right| d x=f(x)+c[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x \ln |x|+x[/math]
B. [math]x \ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right|+x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x} \ln x\left|\frac{1}{x}\right|+x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x} \ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right|+\frac{1}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]x \ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right|+x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \ln \left|x^{-1}\right| d x=\int \ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right| d x \\\Rightarrow \ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right| \int d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x}\left(\ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right|\right) \int d x\right) d x+c \\\Rightarrow x \ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right|-\int\left(x \cdot \frac{-1}{x^{2}} \cdot x\right) d x+c \\\Rightarrow x \ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right|+\int d x+c \\\Rightarrow x \ln \left|\frac{1}{x}\right|+x+c\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #862 (ID: 415196)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x}\left(x^{2}+2 x\right) d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x e^{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]2 e^{x} \cdot x+c[/math]
C. [math]2 x \cdot e^{x^{2}}+c[/math]
D. [math]e^{x} \cdot x^{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e^{x} \cdot x^{2}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x}\left[f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right] d x=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
এখানে, [math]f(x)=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}& \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x} \\\therefore & \int e^{\mathrm{x}}\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}+2 \mathrm{x}\right) \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{c}\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #863 (ID: 415197)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} e^{-x+3} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-e^{2}(e-1)[/math]
B. [math]-e[/math]
C. [math]e^{3}+e^{2}[/math]
D. [math]e^{2}(e-1)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e^{2}(e-1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}\int_{0}^{1} & e^{-x+3} d x \\& \Rightarrow -\left[e^{-x+3}\right]_{0}^{1} \\& \Rightarrow -\left[e^{-1+3}-e^{0+3}\right] \\& \Rightarrow e^{3}-e^{2}=e^{2}(e-1)\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #864 (ID: 415198)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 2 \cos ^{2} 2 x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1+\cos 4 x) d x \\\Rightarrow \left[x+\frac{\sin 4 x}{4}\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \\\quad\Rightarrow \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+\frac{0}{4}\right)-0=\frac{\pi}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #865 (ID: 415199)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x+1| d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{1}|x+1| d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{-1}^{1}(x+1) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x\right]_{-1}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left(\frac{1}{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]-\left(\frac{1}{2}-1\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}+1[/math]
 [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]+1=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #866 (ID: 415200)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{7} x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{35}{16}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{16}{35}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{35}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{16}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{16}{35}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin ^{7} x d x=\frac{6.4 .2}{7.5 .3 .1}=\frac{16}{35}[/math]

Question #867 (ID: 415201)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{11} x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{256}{693}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{128}{2079}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{256}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{693}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{256}{693}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{11} x d x \\\Rightarrow \frac{10.8 \cdot 6 \cdot 4.2}{11.9 \cdot 7.5 .3 .1}=\frac{256}{693}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #868 (ID: 415202)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}} \frac{4 d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}4 \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=\left[4 \sin ^{-1} x\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}} \\\quad\Rightarrow 4 \cdot \sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)-4 \sin ^{-1} 0 \\\quad\Rightarrow \left(4 \cdot \frac{\pi}{4}\right)-0=\pi\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #869 (ID: 415203)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\cot ^{-1} x d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{64}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{32}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3 \pi^{2}}{32}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3 \pi^{2}}{32}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\cot ^{-1} x=z \\\frac{-1}{1+x^{2}} d x=d z\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|c|c|}\hline x & z \\\hline 0 & \frac{\pi}{2} \\\hline 1 & \frac{\pi}{4} \\\hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}-\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} z d z \\\Rightarrow -\left[\frac{z^{2}}{2}\right]_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{-1}{2}\left\{\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)^{2}-\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)^{2}\right\} \\\Rightarrow \frac{3 \pi^{2}}{32} .\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #870 (ID: 415204)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x^{2}}{1+x^{3}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 3[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{3} \ln 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}1+\mathrm{x}^{3}=\mathrm{z}\\\Rightarrow 3 \mathrm{x}^{2} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}\\\Rightarrow \dot{x}^{2} d x=\frac{d z}{3}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{|l|l|}\hline \mathbf{x} & \mathbf{z} \\\hline 0 & 1 \\\hline 1 & 2 \\\hline\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l} \int_{0}^{1} \frac{x^{2}}{1+x^{3}} d x \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3} \int_{1}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3}[\ln \mid z]_{1}^{2} \\\Rightarrow\frac{1}{3}\{\ln |2|-\ln |1|\} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3} \ln 2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #871 (ID: 415205)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{\frac{\pi}{3}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cos ^{5} x}{\sin ^{7} x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{152}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{162}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{162}[/math]

Solution:
[math]-\int_{\frac{\pi}{3}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cot ^{5} x \mathrm{~d}(\cot x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\frac{1}{6}[/math]
 [math]\left[\cot ^{6} x\right]_{\frac{\pi}{3}}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{6}\left[0-\frac{1}{(\sqrt{3})^{6}}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{162}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #872 (ID: 415206)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{\sqrt{e}}^{1} x \ln \frac{1}{x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}}{2}+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e}{4}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l} \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{1} x \ln x^{-2} d x \\\Rightarrow \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{1}-2 x \ln x d x \\\Rightarrow 2 \int_{1}^{\sqrt{e}} x \ln x d x \\\Rightarrow 2\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{e}} \\\Rightarrow 2\left\{\left(\frac{e}{2} \ln \sqrt{e}-\frac{e}{4}\right)+\frac{1}{4}\right\} \\\Rightarrow 2\left(\frac{e}{4}-\frac{e}{4}+\frac{1}{4}\right) \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #873 (ID: 415207)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} x^{4} \cos x d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi^{4}}{16}+24[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{4}}{16}-3 \pi^{2}+24[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\pi^{2}}{2}+12 \pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi^{4}}{16}-\frac{\pi^{3}}{2}-3^{2} \pi+24[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi^{4}}{16}-3 \pi^{2}+24[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} x^{4} \cos x d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[[/math]
 [math]x^{4} \sin x+4 x^{3} \cos x-12 x^{2} \sin x-24 x \cos x+24 \sin x[/math]
 [math]]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\pi^{4}}{16}-12[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{\pi^{2}}{4}+24[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\pi^{4}}{16}-3[/math]
 [math]\pi^{2}+24[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #874 (ID: 415208)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x^{5} e^{x} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]120[/math]
B. [math]44e[/math]
C. [math]24-8 e[/math]
D. [math]120-44 \mathrm{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]120-44 \mathrm{e}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \mathrm{x}^{5} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\mathrm { e } ^ { \mathrm { x } } \left(\mathrm{x}^{5}-5 \mathrm{x}^{4}+20 \mathrm{x}^{3}\right.\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\left.-60 x^{2}+120 x-120\right)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}[/math]
 [math](1-5+20-60+120-120)[/math]
 [math]+120[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 120-44 \mathrm{e}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #875 (ID: 415209)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](a x)^{2}+(b y)^{2}=1[/math] উপবৃত্ত দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\pi a b[/math]
খ. [math]\pi a^{2} b^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{a b}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{a^{2} b^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{a b}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{x^{2}}{\left(\frac{1}{a}\right)^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{\left(\frac{1}{b}\right)^{2}}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi \cdot \frac{1}{a} \cdot \frac{1}{\mathrm{~b}}=\frac{\pi}{a b}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #876 (ID: 415147)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = x[/math] সরলরেখা, [math]X[/math] অক্ষ এবং [math]x = 4[/math] কোনটি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]8[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore \int_{0}^{4} y d x[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{4} y d x=\frac{1}{2}\left(x^{2}\right)_{0}^{4}=\frac{4^{2}}{2}=8[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #877 (ID: 415148)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cos x}{9-\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{6} \ln 2[/math]
B. [math]2 \ln 6[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 6[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln 2[/math]
E. [math]6 \ln 3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{\cos x}{9-\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sin x=z \Rightarrow \cos x d x=d z[/math]
যখন, [math]x=0, z=0 \text {; }[/math]
যখন, [math]x=\pi / 2 ; z=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore I=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d z}{9-z^{2}}=\frac{1}{2 \times 3} \ln \left|\frac{3+z}{3-z}\right|_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{6}\left[\ln \frac{3+1}{3-1}-\ln \frac{3+0}{3-0}\right]=\frac{1}{6}\left[\ln \frac{4}{2}-0\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{6} \ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #878 (ID: 415149)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} 3 \sqrt{1-\cos x} \sin \mathrm{x} d \mathrm{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]4\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4\sqrt{2}[/math]

Solution:
Hints: Function Transformation করতে হবে।Solve:[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{0}^{\pi} 3 \sqrt{1-\cos x} \sin x d x \\=3 \int_{0}^{2} \sqrt{z} d z \\=3\left[\frac{z^{\frac{1}{2}+1}}{\frac{1}{2}+1}\right]^{2} \\=3 \cdot \frac{1}{3 / 2}\left[z^{3 / 2}\right]_{0}^{2} \\=2\left(2^{3 / 2}-0\right) \\=2^{1+\frac{3}{2}}=2^{\frac{5}{2}}=2^{2+\frac{1}{2}}=2^{2} \cdot 2^{\frac{1}{2}} \\=4 \sqrt{2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}1-\operatorname{cox}=z \\\Rightarrow \sin x d x=d z\end{array}[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 হলে [math]z=0[/math]
 [math]x=\pi[/math]
 হলে [math]z=2[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: Function Transformation বলতে x এর ফাংশনকে z এর মাধ্যমে (অথবা অন্য কোন চলকের মাধ্যমে) প্রকাশ করাকে বুঝায়। এখানে একটি কথা আবশ্যকভাবে মনে রাখতে হবে, Function Transformation এর সাথে সাথে limit এর মানও ফাংশন অনুযায়ী পরিবর্তন করতে হবে। মূলত Integration কে সহজ করার জন্যই Function Transformation করা

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #879 (ID: 415150)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-4 x+13}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]3 \pi / 4[/math]
C. [math]2 \pi / 3[/math]
D. [math]\pi / 12[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pi / 12[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Hints: } \int \frac{d x}{x^{2}+a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{a} \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}[/math]
 [math]\text { Solve: } \int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-4 x+13}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-4 x+4+9}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{3^{2}+(x-2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}\left[\tan ^{-1} \frac{x-2}{3}\right]_{2}^{5}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3} \times \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখা: Integrand টির হরে [math]x^{2}-4 x+13[/math]
 রাশিটিকে দেখে সহজেই বুঝা - যায় একে [math]x^2 + a^2[/math]
 ফরম্যাটে নেওয়া যাবে। তাই [math](a–b)^2[/math]
 এর সূত্রের সহায়তায় রাশিটিকে [math]x^2 + a^2[/math]
 এর ফরম্যাটে রূপান্তরিত করা হয়েছে। এইফরম্যাটে নেওয়ার কারণ [math]\int \frac{d x}{x^{2}+a^{2}}[/math]
 এর সূত্রে মিলানো।[math]\\ \\ \ \ \\\\[/math]
একইরকম অন্য সূত্রগুলোও এক পলক দেখে নাও[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{- } \int \frac{d x}{a^{2}-x^{2}}=\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \left|\frac{a+x}{a-x}\right|+c\\\text{- } \int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-a^{2}}=\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \left|\frac{x-a}{x+a}\right|+c\end{array}[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #880 (ID: 415151)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math] dx এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\pi^{3} / 8[/math]
B. [math]\pi^{2} / 7[/math]
C. [math]\pi^{2} / 24[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pi^{2} / 24[/math]

Solution:
Hints: Function Tranformation অর্থাৎ পুরো ফাংশনটির কোনো রাশির অন্তরক ফাংশনটিতে বিদ্যমান থাকলে সেটির চলক অন্য কোনো চলকে রূপান্তরিত করতে পারো ।[math]\text { Solve: } \int_{0}^{1} \frac{\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [ধরি [math]z=\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d z=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} z^{2} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 যখন [math]\left.\mathrm{x}=1, \mathrm{z}=\frac{\pi}{2} \mathrm{x}=0, \mathrm{z}=0\right][/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{z^{3}}{3}\right]^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)^{3}}{3}-0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi^{3}}{3 \times 8}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi^{3}}{24}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: Function Transformation বলতে x এর ফাংশনকে z এর মাধ্যমে (অথবা অন্য কোন চলকের মাধ্যমে) প্রকাশ করাকে বুঝায়। এখানে একটি কথা আবশ্যকভাবে মনে রাখতে হবে, Function Transformation এর সাথে সাথে limit এর মানও ফাংশন অনুযায়ী পরিবর্তন করতে হবে। মূলত Integration কে সহজ করার জন্যই Function Transformation করা হয়।এক্ষেত্রে [math]\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
 এর অন্তরক [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 হুবহু বিদ্যমান বলে [math]\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
 কে z ধরা হয়েছে।

Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{4} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{16}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5 \pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{16}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{3 \pi}{16}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{4} x d x=\frac{3 \pi}{16}[/math]

Question #882 (ID: 415153)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{5} \theta \cos \theta d \theta=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1/5[/math]
B. [math]1/6[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 5[/math]
D. [math]\pi / 6[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1/6[/math]

Solution:
Hints: Function Transfer করতে পারো অর্থাৎ x এর পরিবর্তে অন্যকিছু (যেমন z) আনতে পারো।[math]\text { Solve: } \int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{5} \theta \cos[/math]
 [math]\theta d \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} z^{5} d z \sin \theta=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \theta \mathrm{d} \theta[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 যখন [math]\theta=\pi / 2,[/math]
 [math]z=\sin \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 যখন [math]\theta=0, z[/math]
 [math]=\sin 0=0[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{z^{6}}{6}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6}-0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: এক্ষেত্রে sin θ এর অন্তরক cos θ হুবহু ফাংশনে বিদ্যমান। তাই sin θ কে z ধরে একে Differentiate করা হয়েছে। এক্ষেত্রে চলক change করার সময় limit change করতে যেন ভুল না হয় সেদিকে লক্ষ রাখবে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #883 (ID: 415154)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{\sin 2 x}{1+3 \cos 2 x} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math](\pi / 2) \ln 6[/math]
B. [math](\pi / 2) \ln 2[/math]
C. [math](1 / 4) \ln 6[/math]
D. [math](1 / 3) \ln 2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](1 / 3) \ln 2[/math]

Solution:
Hints: Function Transfer করতে পারো অর্থাৎ x এর পরিবর্তে অন্যকিছু (যেমন z.) আনতে পারো ।[math]\text { Solve: } I=\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{\sin 2 x d x}{1+3 \cos 2 x}[/math]
ধরি, [math]1+3 \cos 2 x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-6 \sin 2 x d x[/math]
 [math]=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin 2 x d x=-\frac{1}{6} d z[/math]
যখন [math]x=\frac{\pi}{4}, \quad z=1[/math]
যখন [math]x=0, \quad z=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{I}=-\frac{1}{6} \int_{4}^{1} \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6} \int_{1}^{4} \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6}[\ln \mathrm{z}]_{1}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6}(\ln 4-\ln 1)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6} \ln 2^{2}\\=\frac{1}{6} \times 2 \times \ln 2\\=\frac{1}{3} \ln 2[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: এক্ষেত্রে 1+3cos2x কে z ধরা হয়েছে কারণ এর অন্তরক হুবহু ফাংশনে গুণাকারে বিদ্যমান। Variable change এর সময় limit change করতে যেন ভুল না হয় সেদিকে লক্ষ রাখবে।By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরকে Radian মুডে নিয়ে Integration বাটনটা চেপে ফাংশনটা হুবহু তুলে Lower Limit 3 Upper Limit যথাক্রমে 0 ও [math]\pi / 4[/math]
 বসিয়ে Equal বাটন চাপলে মান আসে 0.231049 যা [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln 2[/math]
 এর সমান ।

B. [math]4 x^{3}+3 x^{2}[/math]
C. [math]8 x^{3}+4 x[/math]
D. [math]\log \left(x^{3}+4 x^{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\log \left(x^{3}+4 x^{2}\right)[/math]

Solution:

 [math]+C[/math]

Question #885 (ID: 415156)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] এর যোগজ নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]-\sqrt{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]1-x^{2}=z \Rightarrow x d x=-\frac{d z}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{\mathrm{xdx}}{\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}=-\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{z}}}=-\sqrt{\mathrm{z}}=-\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}+\mathrm{C}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #887 (ID: 415158)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x_{\tan ^{-1}} \mathrm{xd} x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\pi / 4+1 / 2[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 4-1 / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 2-1[/math]
D. [math]\pi+2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text{ } \int x \tan ^{-1} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} x \int x d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1} x \int x d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} x \frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{x^{2}}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \tan ^{-1} x}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{1+x^{2}-1}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \tan ^{-1} x}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int\left(1-\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \tan ^{-1} x}{2}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(x-\tan ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
বসিয়ে,[math]{\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2} \tan ^{-1} x-\frac{1}{2}\left(x-\tan ^{-1} x\right)\right]_{0}^{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{1}{2}\left(1-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)-0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{8}-\frac{1}{2}+\frac{\pi}{8}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:
এই Type এর অঙ্ক Solve করার ক্ষেত্রে কোনটা । আর কোনটা v ধরতে হবে সেটা নিয়ে অনেকের ঝামেলা হয়। যেটা সমাকলন করতে সুবিধা হয় সেটাকে ধরতে হবে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #888 (ID: 415159)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-y+2 = 0 এবং y = x² দ্বারা পরিবেষ্টিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল হবে

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]8/2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]x-y+2=0 \ldots \ldots .(\mathrm{i}) ;[/math]
 [math]y=x^{2} \ldots \ldots \ldots \text { (ii) }[/math]
(i) ও (ii) সমাধান করে, [math]x=2,-1 ; y=4,1[/math]
:: ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{-1}^{2} y d x=\int_{-1}^{2} x^{2}[/math]
 [math]d x=\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{-1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8}{3}+\frac{1}{3}=3[/math]


Explanation:
যার সাপেক্ষে সমাকলন করতে হবে তার লিমিট বসাতে হবে। এই প্রশ্নের সমাধানে x এর সাপেক্ষে সমাকলন করা হয়েছে তাই x এর যে মান পাওয়া গেছে সেটাই Upper limit এবং Lower limit হিসেবে ব্যবহৃত হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #889 (ID: 415160)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 6} \frac{\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3} \sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{6} , {2}[/math]
C. [math]6 \sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt{6} , {2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 6} \frac{\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin x}} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]1+sinx = z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow cosx \ dx = dz[/math]
এখানে, x = π/6 হলে [math]z=1+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=0[/math]
 হলে [math]z = 1+0[/math]
 [math]= 1[/math]
 [math]=\int_{1}^{3 / 2} \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{z}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{1}^{3 / 2} \mathrm{z}^{-\frac{1}{2}} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{z^{\frac{1}{2}+1}}{-\frac{1}{2}+1}\right]_{1}^{3 / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{z^{\frac{1}{2}}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right]_{1}^{3 / 2}[/math]
 [math]=2\left[\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}-1^{\frac{1}{2}}\right][/math]
 [math]=2 \frac{\sqrt{3}}{\sqrt{2}}-2[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3} \sqrt{2}-2[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{6}-2[/math]


Explanation:
প্রদত্ত [math]Integrand[/math]
 টিতে [math]1+sinx[/math]
 এর অন্তরক c [math]osx[/math]
 হুবহু বিদ্যমান। তাই [math]1+sinx[/math]
 কে z ধরে চলক x কে z এ রূপান্তরিত করা হয়েছে। এরপর যোগজীকরণের একদম [math]\text { Basic Formula }\left(\int x^{n} d x=\frac{x^{n+1}}{n+1}+c\right)[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে মান বের করা হয়েছে। যেহেতু চলক Change করা হয়েছে, সেহেতু Limit-ও পরিবর্তন করা হয়েছে।By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরে Integration বাটনটা চেপে হুবহুফাংশনটা Input দাও। লিমিট বসাও ০ ও π /6। এরপর Equal বাটন চাপো, দেখো Result আসবে 0.449489 অর্থাৎ √6-2 [ক্যালকুলাসের সকল ত্রিকোণমিতিক ফাংশন ক্যালকুলেটরের মাধ্যমে Solve করার সময় ক্যালকুলেটর Radian মুডে রাখতে হবে।]

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #890 (ID: 415161)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} 3 x^{2} \exp \left(x^{3}\right) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]e-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3 e^{3}-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x³ = z[/math]
 [math]⇒ 3x dx =dz[/math]
 [math]x= 1[/math]
 হলে [math]z = 1[/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]z = 0[/math]
 [math]\\ \ \\[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\text{ } \int_{0}^{1} 3 \mathrm{x}^{2} \mathrm{e}^{x^{3}} \mathrm{dx}\\=\int_{0}^{1} e^{\mathrm{z}} \mathrm{dz} \\=\left[\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}}\right]_{0}^{1}=\mathrm{e}^{1}-\mathrm{e}^{0} \\=\mathrm{e}-1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
প্রশ্নটির Integrand টি হচ্ছে 3x² exp(x³)। খেয়াল করে দেখো, x' কে অন্তরীকরণ করলে যা পাওয়া যায়, সেটা হুবহু ex এর সাথে গুণাকারে বিদ্যমান। তাই এই ধরণের রাশিকে যোগজীকরণ করতে চাইলে যে ফাংশনটির অন্তরক ফাংশনটির সাথে গুণাকারে বিদ্যমান, সেই ফাংশনকে কিছু একটা ধরে নিতে পারো। এক্ষেত্রে যেমন x³ এর অন্তরক 3x² বিদ্যমান, সেজন্য x কে z ধরা হয়েছে।By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরে Integration বাটনটা চেপে হুবহু ফাংশনটা Input দাও। লিমিট বসাও 0 ও 1। এরপর Equal বাটন চাপো, দেখো Result আসবে 0.71828 অর্থাৎ e - 1[ক্যালকুলাসের সকল ত্রিকোণমিতিক ফাংশন ক্যালকুলেটরের মাধ্যমে Solve করার সময় ক্যালকুলেটর Radian মুডে রাখতে হবে]

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #891 (ID: 415162)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2019-2020, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]tanx + C[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{\sin x}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \tan ^{-\frac{1}{2}} x d(\tan x)=\frac{\tan ^{\frac{1}{2}} x}{\frac{1}{2}}+C=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #892 (ID: 415163)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 / \pi[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi^{2} / 2[/math]
D. [math]1 / \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)]^ b_{0}=\pi / 2\right.[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #893 (ID: 415164)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2013-2014, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \ln x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x+\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int x \ln x d x=\ln x \int x[/math]
 [math]d x-\int\left\{\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int x d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\int \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2} d x=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{2} \frac{x^{2}}{2}+C[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}[/math]
 [math]+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #894 (ID: 415165)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2007-2008, 2006-2007, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math] সমান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x \log x-x[/math]
B. [math]x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]x \log x+x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \log x-x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math]
 [math]=\log x \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d \log x}{d x} \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x \log x-x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #895 (ID: 415135)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The area of the region enclosed by the curves } y^{2}=x \text { and } y=x^{2} \text { is- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{12} \text { sq. unit }[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3} \text { sq. unit }[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \text { sq. unit }[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{6} \text { sq.unit }[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{3} \text { sq. unit }[/math]

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\Delta=\int_{0}^{1}\left(y_{1}-y\right) d x=\int_{0}^{1}\left(\sqrt{x}-x^{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\left|\left[\frac{x^{\frac{1}{2}+1}}{\frac{1}{2}+1}-\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{1}\right|=\left|\frac{2}{3}-\frac{1}{3}\right|=\frac{1}{3} \text { sq. unit }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #896 (ID: 415136)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{5} \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1-2 \sqrt{6i}[/math]
B. [math]1+2 \sqrt{6}[/math]
C. [math]1-2 \sqrt{6}[/math]
D. [math]1+2 \sqrt{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1-2 \sqrt{6i}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text{Hints: } \int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{f(x)}[/math]
 [math]d x=2 \sqrt{f(x)}+C[/math]
 [math]\text{Solve: } \int_{0}^{5} \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-2} \int_{0}^{5} \frac{-2 x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{5}[/math]
 [math]= -\left[\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{5}[/math]
 [math]=-\sqrt{1-5^{2}}+\sqrt{1-0^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\sqrt{-24}+1[/math]
 [math]= 1-\sqrt{24} \mathrm{i}[/math]
 [math]=1-2 \sqrt{6} \mathrm{i}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রদত্ত Integrand টিতে হরের এর ভিতরের রাশিটি [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right)[/math]
, যার অন্তরজ – 2x, যেটা প্রায় হুবহু লবে বিদ্যমান। লবে Extra 2 যুক্ত করে সামনে – 2 দ্বারা ভাগ করে দিলেই রাশিটি Balanced হয় । যেহেতু এরকম ক্ষেত্রে Integrand টির যোগজ হয় 2√হবের রাশি, তাই প্রশ্নের প্রদত্ত ফাংশনটির যোগঞ্জ হয়েছে [math]2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #897 (ID: 415137)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{5} \frac{x d x}{x^{2}-5 x+6}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln (32 / 243)[/math]
B. [math]\ln (9 / 32)[/math]
C. [math]\ln (40)[/math]
D. [math]\ln (1 / 41)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\ln (32 / 243)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text{Hints: } \int \frac{d x}{x^{2}-a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 a} \ln \frac{x-a}{x+a}[/math]
 [math]\text{Solve: } \int_{0}^{5} \frac{x d x}{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{5} \frac{(2 x-5+5) d x}{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{5} \frac{2 x-5}{x^{2}-5 x+6} d x+\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{5} \frac{5 d x}{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left[\ln \left(x^{2}-5 x+6\right)\right]_{0}^{5}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{5}{2} \int_{0}^{5} \frac{d x}{x-2 x \frac{5}{2}+\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2}-\frac{25}{4}+6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\ln 6-\ln 6)+\frac{5}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{5} \frac{d x}{\left(x-\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2}-\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2} \frac{1}{2 \times \frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\ln \frac{x-\frac{5}{2} \frac{1}{x}}{x-\frac{5}{2}+\frac{1}{2}}\right]_{0}^{5}[/math]
 [math]=\ln \frac{32}{243}[/math]


Explanation:
By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরের ইন্টিগ্রেশন বাটনটি চেপে ফাংশনটি ইনপুট দিয়ে লিমিট 0 ও 5 বসিয়ে সরাসরি ক্যালকুলেটরের মাধ্যমেও অংকটি করতে পারো।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #898 (ID: 415138)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{\tan ^{-1} x} \frac{1}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\log \left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)+C[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\tan ^{-1} x}+C[/math]
C. [math]e^{\sin ^{-1} x}+C[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]\mathrm{e}^{\tan ^{-1} x}+C[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int e^{\tan ^{-1} x} \frac{1}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{\tan ^{-1} x} d[/math]
 [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\tan ^{-1} x}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #899 (ID: 415139)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{e^{2 x}+1}=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}+1}\\\left[\right. \text{ let, } z=e^{x} \Rightarrow d z=e^{x} d x \mid\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1} z+c=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #900 (ID: 415140)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2013-2014, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right) \int_{0}^{1} \frac{-2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)\left[2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right]_{0}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #901 (ID: 415141)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2003-2004, 2013-2014, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}}[/math] এর একটি অনির্দিষ্ট যোগজ-

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right) \ln \left(1+x^{2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}}=\int \tan ^{-1} x d\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #902 (ID: 415142)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]I=\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} \theta+\cos ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]1=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{\sin 2 \theta}{\sin ^{4} \theta+\cos ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]\left[\cos ^{4} \theta\right.[/math]
দ্বারা ভাগ করে][math]I=\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{2 \sin \theta \cos \theta \times \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} \theta \cdot \cos \theta \cdot \cos \theta}}{1+\tan ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} \frac{2 \tan \theta \sec ^{2} \theta}{1+\tan ^{4} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } \tan ^{2} \theta=p[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \tan[/math]
 [math]\theta \sec ^{2} \theta d \theta=d p[/math]
 [math]\text { When, } \theta=0,[/math]
 [math]\theta=\frac{\pi}{4} ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{p}=0, \mathrm{p}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore I=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d p}{1+p^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\tan ^{-1} p\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #903 (ID: 415143)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-4 x+13}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
D. $ \frac{1}{2}(e-1)^{2} $


Correct Answer: D.$ \frac{1}{2}(e-1)^{2} $

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{x^{2}-4 x+13}=\int_{2}^{5} \frac{d x}{(x-2)^{2}+3^{2}} \\=\frac{1}{3}\left[\tan ^{-1} \frac{x-2}{3}\right]_{2}^{5}=\frac{\pi}{12}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #904 (ID: 415144)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2} x+C[/math]
B. [math]\tan x-x+C[/math]
C. [math]\sec x+C[/math]
D. [math]x-\tan ^{2} x+C[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\tan x-x+C[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \tan ^{2} x d x=\int\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right) d x=\tan x-x+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #905 (ID: 415145)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2007-2008, 2006-2007, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math] সমান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x \log x-x[/math]
B. [math]x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]x \log x+x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \log x-x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math]
 [math]=\log x \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d \log x}{d x} \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x \log x-x+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #906 (ID: 415146)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text{let, } \cos x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d z=-\sin x d x\\\text{when, }[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}, z=0 ;[/math]
 [math]x=0, z=1[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x[/math]
 [math]=-\int_{1}^{0}(1+z)^{2} d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\int_{1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]\left(z^{2}+2 z+1\right) \mathrm{d}[/math]
 [math]z=-[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{z^{3}}{3}+\frac{2 z^{2}}{2}+z\right]_{1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}+1+1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #907 (ID: 415081)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x} \sec x(1+\tan x) d x[/math] - এর মান নির্ণয় কর

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \sec x+c[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} \operatorname{cosec} x+c[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{x} \tan x+c[/math]
D. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]e^{x} \sec x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x} \sec x(1+\tan x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(e^{x} \sec x+e^{x} \sec x \cdot \tan x\right) d[/math]
 [math]x=e^{x} \sec x+c[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \int e^{x}\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x=e^{x} f(x)+c\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #908 (ID: 415082)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর : [math]\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left[\left[\tan ^{-1} x\right]_{1}^{\sqrt{3}}\right.[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{3}-\tan ^{-1} 1[/math]
 [math]\left.=\frac{\pi}{3}-\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{12}\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #909 (ID: 415083)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sqrt{\tan x}}{\sin x \cos x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\tan x+c[/math]
B. [math]\cot x+c[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{\tan x}}{2}+c[/math]
E. [math]\log (\sin 2 x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sqrt{\tan x}}{\sin x \cos x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}{\tan x} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x d x}{\sqrt{\tan x}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{\tan x}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #910 (ID: 415084)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos ^{-1} x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x \cos ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]
খ. [math]x \cos ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]
গ. [math]x\left[\cos ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right]+c[/math]
ঘ. [math]x\left[\cos ^{-1} x+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right]+c[/math]
ঙ. [math]\cos ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \cos ^{-1} x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \cos ^{-1} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} x \int d x-\int\left\{\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right) \int d x\right\}[/math]
 [math]d x=x \cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]x-\int\left\{\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \cos ^{-1} x-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{(-2 x)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]=x \cos ^{-1} x-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 2 x \sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]x-\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #911 (ID: 415085)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{5 \mathrm{e}^{2 \pi}}{1+c^{4 x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{4} \ln \left(1+e^{4 x}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5}{2} \ln \left(1+c^{4 x}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(e^{2 x}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{4} \ln \left(1+e^{2 x}\right)+c[/math]
E. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{z} \therefore \mathrm{c}^{2 \mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{\mathrm{dz}}{2} \int \frac{5 \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}}{1+\left(\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}\right)^{2}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5 \int \frac{(\mathrm{dz}) / 2}{1+\mathrm{z}^{2}}=\frac{5}{2} \int \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{1+\mathrm{z}^{2}}=\frac{5}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(\mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #914 (ID: 415088)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \ln x d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1+x+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{4} x^{2}+c[/math]
C. [math]0+c[/math]
D. [math]1+\ln x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{4} x^{2}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int x \ln x d x=\ln x \int x d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int x d x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln x-\int \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{2} x^{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{4} x^{2}+c[/math]
Another easy way is to differentiate the options to find integral function

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #916 (ID: 415090)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 / \pi[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi^{2} / 2[/math]
D. [math]1 / \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)]^ b_{0}=\pi / 2\right.[/math]

Explanation:

Question #917 (ID: 415091)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards: Sylhet Board, Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board, Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1 / 2} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1} x\right]_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{2}-\sin ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #918 (ID: 415092)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{4}^{0} \frac{d x}{(1-x)^{3}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{7}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{9}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{9}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{4}{9}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{4}{9}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{4}^{0} \frac{d x}{(1-x)^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{4}^{0}(1-x)^{-3} d x;[/math]
 [math]1-x=z ;-d x=d z ;-\int_{-3}^{1} z^{-3}[/math]
 [math]d z=\frac{1}{2}\left[z^{-2}\right]_{-3}^{-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{9}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #919 (ID: 415093)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sec x(\sec x-\tan x) d x[/math] এর যোগজ নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\tan x-\sec x+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan x+\operatorname{secx}+c[/math]
C. [math]\sec x-\tan x+c[/math]
D. [math]\tan x+\cos x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\tan x-\sec x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \sec x(\sec x-\tan x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]d x-\int \sec x \tan x d x[/math]
 [math]=\tan x-\sec x+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #920 (ID: 415094)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} ;[/math]
 [math]\text { let, } 1-x^{2}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore x d x=-\frac{1}{2} d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{1}-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} z^{-\frac{1}{2}} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} z^{-\frac{1}{2}} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 2\left[z^{1 / 2}\right]_{0}^{1}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #921 (ID: 415095)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1+2 x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\log \sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]\log 3[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \log \sqrt{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \log 2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\log \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1+2 x}=\left.\frac{1}{2} \log (1+2 x)\right|_{0} ^{1}=\left.\log \sqrt{1+2 x}\right|_{0} ^{1}=\log \sqrt{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #922 (ID: 415096)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x) d x[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]e^{\pi / 2}[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]e[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]e^{\pi / 2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x)[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]=\int e^{x} \sin x d x+e^{x} \int \cos x d x[/math]
 [math]-\int e^{x} \sin x[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[e^{x} \sin x\right]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=e^{\frac{\pi}{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #923 (ID: 415097)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{x}{2}} \cos ^{3} x \sqrt{\sin x} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{21}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{21}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{11}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{3} x \sqrt{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}\left(1-\sin ^{2} x\right) \cos x \sqrt{\sin x} d x[/math]
 [math]\text{Let, } \sin x=z \quad[/math]
 [math]\text{ When, }[/math]
 [math]x=\pi / 2, z=1[/math]
 [math]\cos \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dx} \quad \mathrm{x}=0,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{z}=0[/math]
 [math]\text{So, } \int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(1-z^{2}\right) z^{1 / 2} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3} z^{3 / 2} \int_{0}^{1}-\frac{2}{7} z^{7 / 2} \int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}-\frac{2}{7}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{14-6}{21}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8}{21}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #924 (ID: 415098)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x=\text { কত? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x ;[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } 1+\cos x=z \quad \text { When, }[/math]
 [math]x=\pi / 2, z=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\sin x d x=d x \quad[/math]
 [math]x=0, z=2 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{2}^{1}-z^{2}[/math]
 [math]d z=\frac{1}{3}\left[z^{3}\right]^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}(81)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
