Question #925 (ID: 415099)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=3-2 x-x^{2}[/math] এবং [math]y=0[/math] দ্বারা পরিবেষ্টিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{32}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{32}{-3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{33}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{32}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}^{2}+2[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}-3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}-\mathrm{x}-3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=1,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{-3}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(3-2 \mathrm{x}-\mathrm{x}^{2}\right) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[3 x-x^{2}-\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right][/math]
 [math]_{-3}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=3-1-\frac{1}{3}-(9-9+9)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{32}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #926 (ID: 415100)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\sin x \cdot \cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{\sin ^{2} x+\cos ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sin x+\cos x}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \operatorname{ld} x[/math]
 [math]=x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #927 (ID: 415101)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{(1+x) e^{x} d x}{\cos ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sin e^{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]\cos \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\cot \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\tan \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let } x e^{x}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(e x+x e^{x}\right) d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(1+x) e^{x} d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{(1+x) e^{x} d x}{\cos ^{2}\left(x e^{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d z}{\cos ^{2} z}[/math]
 [math]=\int \sec ^{2} z[/math]
 [math]=\tan z+c[/math]
 [math]=\tan \left(x e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #928 (ID: 415102)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1}-\frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\pi / 4[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]2 r[/math]
D. [math]4 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1}-\frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left(\sin ^{-1}(x-1)_{0}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(0)-\sin ^{-1}(-1)\right]=\frac{\pi}{2}\right.[/math]

Explanation:

Question #929 (ID: 415103)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x e^{x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]4 e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=\frac{1}{2} \int \mathrm{dz}=\frac{\mathrm{z}}{2}=\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}=\mathrm{z} \Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz}[/math]


Explanation:

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)

Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x}(\sqrt{x}+1)}=\int \frac{2 d z}{z}=2 \ln z=2 \ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+c[/math] [math]\text { Let, } \sqrt{x}+1=z ; \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} d x=d z ; \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x}}=2 d z[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2(x+\sqrt{x})+c[/math]
B. [math]\ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+c[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln (x+\sqrt{x})+c[/math]
D. [math]2 \ln (\sqrt{x}+1)+c[/math]

Question #931 (ID: 415105)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x e^{-x}}{(x-1)^{2}} d x[/math] এর যোজিত ফল কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{x}}{1-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{-x}}{1-x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}}{1+\mathrm{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}{1+\mathrm{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{e^{-x}}{1-x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \frac{e^{-x}}{(1-x)}=\frac{(1-x)(-1) e^{-x}-(-1) e^{-x}}{(1-x)^{2}}=\frac{x e^{-x}}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{x e^{-x}}{(1-x)^{2}}=\frac{e^{-x}}{(1-x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #932 (ID: 415106)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\text{Let, } \sin ^{-1} x=z ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dz} ; \mathrm{x}=1,[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{z}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2} ; x=0, z=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{0}^{\pi / 2} z d z=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[z^{2}\right]_{0}^{\pi / 2}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #933 (ID: 415107)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর : [math]\int \frac{2 x d x}{x^{4}+4 x^{2}+5}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(x^{2}+2\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\cot ^{-1}\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}+2\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(x^{2}+1\right)+c[/math]
D. [math]\cot ^{-1}\left(x^{2}+1\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\tan ^{-1}\left(x^{2}+2\right)+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{2 x d x}{x^{4}+d x^{2}+5} \text { Let } x^{2}=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}+4 z+4+1}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d z}{(z+2)^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{z+2}{1}\right)+c[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}\left(x^{2}+2\right)[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #934 (ID: 415108)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\pi[/math]
C. [math]2 \pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-\left(x^{2}-2 x-1\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)\right]^1_0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\sin ^{-1}(0)-\sin ^{-1}(-1)\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #935 (ID: 415109)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{7}{-3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]I=\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}(1+\cos x)^{2} \sin x d x[/math]
 [math]\text { let, } 1+\cos x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\sin x d x=[/math]
 [math]d z=-\int_{2}^{1} z^{2}[/math]
 [math]d z=-\frac{1}{3}\left[z^{3}\right]^1_2[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{3}[1-8][/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #936 (ID: 415110)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\pi / 2}(1-\cos 2 x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[x-\frac{\sin 2 x}{2}\right]_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{\pi}{2}-0-0+0\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #937 (ID: 415111)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int\left(7-4 e^{x}\right) d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]7 x-4 e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]7 x-4 e^{x}+c[/math]
C. [math]7 x-4[/math]
D. [math]7 x-e^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]7 x-4 e^{x}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int[/math]
 [math]\left(7-4 e^{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int 7 d x-\int 4 e^{x}[/math]
 [math]d x=7 x-4 e^{x}+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #938 (ID: 415112)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos x \cos (\sin x) d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin (\sin x)+c[/math]
B. [math]\cos (\sin x)+c[/math]
C. [math]-\sin (\sin x)+c[/math]
D. [math]-\cos (\sin x)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\sin (\sin x)+c[/math]

Solution:
ধরি , [math]\sin x=z \Rightarrow \cos x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int \cos x \cos (\sin x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\int \cos z d z[/math]
 [math]=\sin z+c[/math]
 [math]=\sin (\sin x)+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #939 (ID: 415113)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x e^{x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]e[/math]
ঘ. [math]-e[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0} x^{x}[/math]
 [math]d x=x e^{x}-\int_{0} e^{x}[/math]
 [math]d x=\left[x e^{x}-e^{x}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=e-e+1=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #940 (ID: 415114)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2008-2009, 2005-2006, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4x[/math] & [math]y=x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রে ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{8} \text { sq.units }[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{8}{3} \text { sq.units }[/math]
গ. [math]3 \text { sq.units }[/math]
ঘ. [math]8 \text { sq.units }[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{8}{3} \text { sq.units }[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x \Rightarrow y=2 \sqrt{x}[/math]
 আর [math]y=x[/math]
 এর ছেদবিন্দু [math](0,0)[/math]
 এবং [math](4,4)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল: [math]\int_{0}^{4}(2 \sqrt{x}-x) d x=\left[2 \frac{x^{3 / 2}}{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{4}=\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #941 (ID: 415115)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(e^{-x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int \frac{e^{x} d x}{e^{2 x}+1}=\int \frac{d z}{z^{2}+1}\\\left[\right. \text{ let, } z=e^{x} \Rightarrow d z=e^{x} d x \mid\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1} z+c=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #942 (ID: 415116)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 / \pi[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi^{2} / 2[/math]
D. [math]1 / \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)]^ b_{0}=\pi / 2\right.[/math]

Explanation:

Question #943 (ID: 415117)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় করঃ [math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{3} x \sqrt{\sin x} d x[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]\frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{15}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of the above }[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2}[/math]
 [math]\cos ^{3} x \sqrt{\sin x} d x ; \sin x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos d x=d z[/math]
 [math]x=0 \Rightarrow z=0 ;[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow z=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{1}\left(1-z^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{z} d z=\int_{0}^{1}\left(\sqrt{z}-z^{\frac{5}{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]d z=\left[\frac{z^{\frac{1}{2}+1}}{\frac{1}{2}+1}-\frac{z^{\frac{5}{2}+1}}{\frac{5}{2}+1}\right][/math]
 [math]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{8}{21}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #944 (ID: 415118)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-1+2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{x-1}{1}\right)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #945 (ID: 415119)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f\left(\frac{x}{x+1}\right)=x+1[/math] হলে [math]\int f(x+3) d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln x+c, x \neq 3[/math]
B. [math]\ln |x+4|+c, x \neq-4[/math]
C. [math]\ln |x+3|+c, x \neq-3[/math]
D. [math]-\ln |x+2|+c, x \neq-2[/math]
E. [math]\ln |x+1|+c, x \neq-1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\ln |x+2|+c, x \neq-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Hints: } \int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{f(x)}[/math]
 [math]d x=\ln |f(x)|+c[/math]
 [math]\text{Solve: } f\left(\frac{x}{x+1}\right)=x+1[/math]
ধরি,[math]y=\frac{x}{x+1} \text{ then, } f(y)=x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y x+y=x \quad[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-y x=y \quad[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(1-y)=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{y}{1-y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{1-y}+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y+1-y}{1-y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1-y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(y)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1-y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x+3)=\frac{1}{1-x-3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-x-2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-(x+2)}[/math]
 [math]\text{then } \int f(x+3) d x[/math]
 [math]=-\int \frac{1}{(x+2)} d x[/math]
 [math]=-\ln |x+2|+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #946 (ID: 415120)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{5} \theta \cos \theta d \theta[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]1 / 4[/math]
B. [math]1 / 5[/math]
C. [math]1 / 6[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \sin ^{5} \theta \cos \theta d \theta=\int_{0}^{1} z^{5} d z=\left[\frac{z^{6}}{6}\right]_{0}^{1}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sin \theta=\mathrm{z} \quad \therefore \cos \theta \mathrm{d} \theta=\mathrm{dz} ; \quad \theta=0[/math]
 হলে [math]z=0 ; \quad \theta=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 হলে [math]z=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #947 (ID: 415121)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{e^{\operatorname{mtan}-1} x}{1+x^{2}} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{m} e^{\operatorname{man}^{-1} x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{m \operatorname{tan} n^{-1} x}[/math]
D. [math]m e^{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
E. [math]\mathrm{me}^{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{m} e^{\operatorname{man}^{-1} x}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan ^{-1} x=z[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{1+x^{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{e^{m \tan ^{-1} x}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int e^{m z} d z=\frac{1}{m} e^{m z}[/math]
 [math]+c=\frac{1}{m} e^{m \tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #948 (ID: 415122)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2007-2008, 2006-2007, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math] সমান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x \log x-x[/math]
B. [math]x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]x \log x+x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \log x-x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \log x d x[/math]
 [math]=\log x \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d \log x}{d x} \int d x\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=x \log x-x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #949 (ID: 415123)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=x[/math] পরাবৃত্ত এবং [math]y = x[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল -

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]1[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]=\frac{1}{6}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: D.[math]=\frac{1}{6}[/math] বর্গ একক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}x^{2}=x \Rightarrow x^{2}-x=0 \\\Rightarrow x=0, x=1\end{array}[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল, [math]A=\int_{0}^{1}\left(y_{1}-y_{2}\right) d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1}(\sqrt{x}-x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x^{\frac{3}{2}}}{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{1}=[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3} .1-\frac{1}{2}, 1=\frac{4-3}{6}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]
 বর্গএকক।Shortcut: ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{8 \mathrm{a}^{2}}{3 \mathrm{~m}^{3}}=[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8 \times\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)^{2}}{3 \times 1^{3}}=\frac{8 \times 1}{3 \times 1 \times 4 \times 4}=\frac{1}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #950 (ID: 415124)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1} e-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}+\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}-\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}+\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{t} \therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dt}[/math]
যখন, [math]x=0[/math]
 তখন [math]t=1[/math]
;যখন, [math]x=1[/math]
 তখন, [math]\mathrm{t}=\mathrm{e}[/math]
;[math]\therefore I=\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d t}{t^{2}+1}=\left[\tan ^{-1} t\right]_{1}^{e}=\tan ^{-1} e-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
সমাধানঃ [math]I=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+\frac{1}{e^{x}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{x} d x}{\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}+1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #951 (ID: 415125)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{+1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\pi[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{+1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[2 \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{1}\right]_{0}^{1} ;[/math]
 [math]2 \tan ^{-1} 1-2 \tan ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #952 (ID: 415126)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 3} d(\sin x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 1
B. [math]\pi / 3[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{3} / 2[/math]
D. [math]1/2[/math]
E. [math]\pi / 4[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{Hints: } \int \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{c}\\\text { Solve: } \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{3}} d(\sin x)=[\sin x]_{0}^{\pi / 3}=\sin \frac{\pi}{3}-\sin 0 \\\quad=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}-0=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যাঃ 1 কে x এর সাপেক্ষে যোগজ করলে মান আসে x অর্থাৎ [math]∫ dx = x[/math]
 তেমনি 1 কে [math]sinx[/math]
 এর সাপেক্ষে যোগজ করলে মান আসবে [math]sinx[/math]
 অর্থাৎ [math]∫ d(sinx) = sinx[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #953 (ID: 415127)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 4} 4 \tan ^{3} x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 2
B. 1
C. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
D. [math]\pi / 4[/math]
E. [math]\pi / 8[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
Hints: tanx এর অন্তরক [math]\sec ^{2} x[/math]
, যা ফাংশনটির সাথে গুণাকারে বিদ্যমান।[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{Solve: } \int_{0}^{\pi / 4} 4 \tan ^{3} x \sec ^{2} x d x\\=\int_{0}^{1} 4 z^{3} \mathrm{dz}=4 \int_{0}^{1} z^{3} \mathrm{dz} \\=4\left[\frac{z^{4}}{4}\right]_{0}^{1}=4\left(\frac{1^{4}}{4}-\frac{0^{4}}{0}\right) \\=4 \frac{1}{4}=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রশ্নটির Integrand টি হচ্ছে [math]4 \tan ^{3} x \sec ^{2} x[/math]। খেয়াল করে দেখো, tanx কে অন্তরীকরণ করলে যা পাওয়া যায়, সেটা হুবহু tanx এর সাথে গুণাকারে বিদ্যমান। তাই এই ধরণের রাশিকে যোগজীকরণ করতে চাইলে যে ফাংশনটির অন্তরক ফাংশনটির সাথে গুণাকারে বিদ্যমান, সেই ফাংশনকে কিছু একটা ধরে নিতে পারো। এক্ষেত্রে যেমন tanx এর অন্তরক sec x বিদ্যমান, সেজন্য tanx কে 2 ধরা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #954 (ID: 415128)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
পাশের চিত্রে প্রদত্ত সীমার মধ্যে [math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{kx}^{2}[/math] ফাংশন ও [math]x[/math] অক্ষের মধ্যবর্তী অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. 0
খ. 12
গ. 4
ঘ. 36
ঙ. 7


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Hints: [math]y = f(x)[/math]
 বক্ররেখা ও [math]x[/math]
 অক্ষ দ্বারা আবদ্ধকৃত অংশের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]= ∫ ydx[/math]
Solve: [math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{kx}^{2}[/math]
 ও চিত্রের সরলরেখাটির ছেদবিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math](4, 3 )[/math]
 [math]\therefore 3=\mathrm{k} 4^{2} \Rightarrow \mathrm{k}=\frac{3}{4^{2}}=\frac{3}{16}[/math]
∴ ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{4} \mathrm{ydx}=\int_{0}^{4} \mathrm{kx}^{2} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\int_{0}^{4} \frac{3}{16} x^{2} d x\\=\frac{3}{16} \int_{0}^{4} x^{2} d x\\=\frac{3}{16}\left[\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{4} \\=\frac{3}{16}\left(\frac{4^{3}}{3}-\frac{0^{3}}{3}\right)\\=\frac{3}{16}\left(\frac{64}{3}-0\right)\\=\frac{3}{16} \times \frac{64}{3}=4\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: চিত্রে [math]y=k x^{2}[/math]
 বক্ররেখাটিকে 3 একক দৈর্ঘ্যের AB রেখাংশ A বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে। OB এর দৈর্ঘ্য 4 একক ও AB = 3 একক বলে A বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক (4,3) kx2 বক্ররেখার উপর অবস্থিত বলে বিন্দুটি দ্বারা (4,3) বিন্দুটি [math]y=k x^{2}[/math]
 বক্ররেখাটিকে সিদ্ধ করে k এর মান পাওয়া গেলো [math]3/16[/math]
তাহলে [math]y=\frac{3}{16} x^{2} 3 x=4[/math]
 সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রফলই হচ্ছে নির্ণেয় ক্ষেত্রফল ।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #955 (ID: 415129)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} \log x d x[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\log 2[/math]
B. [math]2 \log 2[/math]
C. [math]2 \log 2-1[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 \log 2-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]I=\int \log x d x[/math]
 [math]=\log x \int d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{d}{d x}(\log x) \int d x\right] d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \log x-[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot x \cdot d x[/math]
 [math]=x \log x-x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{2} \log x d x[/math]
 [math]=[x \log x-x]_{1}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(2 \log 2-2)[/math]
 [math]-(1 \log 1-1)[/math]
 [math]=2 \log 2-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #956 (ID: 415130)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{5} x d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{15} .[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{15}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{7}{15}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{11}{15}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{8}{15}[/math]


Correct Answer: E. [math]\frac{8}{15}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \cos ^{5} x d x=\frac{5-1}{5} \times \frac{5-3}{5-2}=\frac{4}{5} \times \frac{2}{3}=\frac{8}{15}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #957 (ID: 415131)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\int \frac{d x}{a+b \cos x}[/math] [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math] [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{b+a \cos x}{a+b \cos x}[/math] হয় [math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{d x}{a+b \cos x}[/math] এর মান হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-2}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{d x}{a+b \cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{1}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}} \cos ^{-1} \frac{b+a \cos x}{a+b \cos x}\right]_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\cos ^{-1} \frac{b-a}{a-b}-\cos ^{-1} \frac{b+a}{a+b}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\cos ^{-1}(-1)-\cos ^{-1} 1\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\frac{\pi}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #958 (ID: 415132)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর [math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{1+\tan x}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{1+\tan x}+C[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{1+\tan x}+C[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{1+\tan x}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{1+\tan x}}=\int \frac{\sec ^{2} x d x}{\sqrt{1+\tan x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}}=2 \sqrt{z}+c=2 \sqrt{1+\tan x}+c[/math]
 [math]\text { Shortcut: } \int \frac{f^{\prime}(x)}{\sqrt{f(x)}} d x=2 \sqrt{f(x)}+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #959 (ID: 415133)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যোগজ নির্ণয় কর: [math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{\left(x^{2}+1\right)}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{-1} x+C[/math]
B. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{-1} x+C[/math]
C. [math]-x^{2} \sqrt{x^{2}-1}+C[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\text { None of these }[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x^{2}+1=z^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x d x=2 z d z[/math]
 [math]\therefore x d x=z d z[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{\left(x^{2}+1\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{x d x}{x^{2} \sqrt{x^{2}+1}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{z d z}{\left(z^{2}-1\right) z}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}^{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln \frac{\mathrm{z}-1}{\mathrm{z}+1}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \ln[/math]
 [math]\frac{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}^{2}+1}-1}{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}^{2}+1}+1}+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #960 (ID: 415134)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Evaluagte the integral } \int e^{x} \sec x(1+\tan x) d x-[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{-x} \cos x+c[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} \sec 2 x+c[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \sec x+c[/math]
D. [math]e^{x} \sin x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]e^{x} \sec x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x} \sec x(1+\tan x) d x=e^{x} \sec x+C[/math]
 [math]\left[\therefore \int \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\left[\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})+\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})\right] \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} f(x)+c\right][/math]


Explanation:

Question #961 (ID: 415067)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=2 x[/math] পরাবৃত্ত (Parabola) এবং এর উপকেন্দ্রিক লম্ব দ্বারা বেষ্টিত ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল: [math]2 \int_{0}^{1 / 2} y d x[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}} \sqrt{x} d x=2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\left[x^{3 / 2}\right]_{0}^{1 / 2}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\Rightarrow 2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{2}{3}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \sqrt{2} \cdot \frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{3 / 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 \sqrt{2}}{3}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3} \cdot \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #962 (ID: 415068)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \mathrm{xe}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x e^{x}-e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]x e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]x e^{x}+e^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x e^{x}-e^{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int x e^{x} d x=x \int e^{x} d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} x \int e^{x} d x\right) d x \\=x e^{x}-\int 1 \cdot e^{x} d x=x e^{x}-e^{x}+C\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #963 (ID: 415069)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{9-16 x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{3 x}{4}+C[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{3}+C[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sin ^{-1} x+C[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3} \sin ^{-1} \frac{3 x}{4}+C[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{3}+C[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{9-16 x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{4} \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{3}{4}\right)^{2}-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}=\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{-1} \frac{4 \mathrm{x}}{3}+\mathrm{C}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #964 (ID: 415070)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} x^{2} e^{x^{3}} d x[/math] এর সঠিক মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{8}-e[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(e^{8}-e\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(e^{8}-e\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}\left(e^{8}+e\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{3}\left(e^{8}-e\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{2} x^{2} e^{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]d x ; z=x^{3} ;[/math]
 [math]d z=3 x^{2} d x ; x^{2} d x=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]d z=\int_{1}^{8} \frac{1}{3} d z e^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}\left[e^{2}\right]^8[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}\left(e^{8}-e\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #965 (ID: 415071)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math] মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-\left(1-2 x+x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d(x-1)}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1}(1-1)-\sin ^{-1}(0-1)[/math]
 [math]=0+\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #966 (ID: 415072)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\cos ^{-1} x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান =?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]

Solution:
[math]u=\cos ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d u=\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x \quad[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\cos ^{-1} x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\int_{\pi / 2}^{0} u d u[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}\left[u^{2}\right]_{\pi / 2}^{p}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #967 (ID: 415073)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{+1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\pi[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{+1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[2 \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{1}\right]_{0}^{1} ;[/math]
 [math]2 \tan ^{-1} 1-2 \tan ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #968 (ID: 415074)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=4 x, x[/math] অক্ষ এবং [math]x=4[/math] সরলরেখাগুলি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]16[/math]
গ. [math]32[/math]
ঘ. [math]18[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]32[/math]

Solution:
[math]A=(4,16)[i[/math]
 ও [math]ii[/math]
 হতে ][math]\mathrm{B}=(4,0)[\mathrm{ii}[/math]
 ও [math]iii[/math]
 হতে [math]0(0,0) ; \Delta \mathrm{OAB}=\left|\frac{4 \times 0-4 \times 16}{2}\right|=\left|\frac{-4 \times 16}{2}\right|=32[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:

Question #969 (ID: 415075)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 2 \cos ^{2} x d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1+\cos 2 x) d x=\frac{1}{2}\left[x+\frac{1}{2} \sin 2 x\right]_{0}^{\pi / 2}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]\int \frac{72 \cos 8 x+3 x^{2}}{x^{3}+9 \sin 8 x} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]e 7 \cos 8 x+3 x^{2}+C[/math]
B. [math]\log \left(x^{2}+9 \sin 8 x\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\cos 8 x \log \left(x^{3}+9 \sin 8 x\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\log \left(x^{3}+9 \sin 8 x\right)+C[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\log \left(x^{3}+9 \sin 8 x\right)+C[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{72 \cos 8 x+3 x^{2}}{x^{3}+9 \sin 8 x} d x=\log \left(x^{3}+9 \sin 8 x\right)+C[/math]

Question #971 (ID: 415077)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{x(\ln x)^{2}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{\ln x}+k[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{\ln x}+\mathrm{k}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2 x}{\ln x}+k[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{(\ln x)^{2}}+\mathrm{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{\ln x}+k[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } z=\ln x \Rightarrow d z=\frac{1}{x} d x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{x}(\ln \mathrm{x})^{2}}=\int \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}^{2}}=-\frac{1}{\mathrm{z}}+\mathrm{k}=-\frac{1}{\ln \mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #972 (ID: 415078)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \sec ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x \sec x \tan x-\ln (\cos x)[/math]
B. [math]x \tan x+\ln (\cos x)[/math]
C. [math]x \tan x-\ln (\cos x)[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]x \tan x+\ln (\cos x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int x \sec ^{2} x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \int \sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]d x-\left\{\frac{d}{d x} x \int \sec ^{2} x d x\right\}[/math]
 [math]d x[/math]
 [math]=x \tan x-\int \tan x d x[/math]
 [math]=x \tan x+\ln[/math]
 [math](\cos x)+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #973 (ID: 415079)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^{x} \sin 2 x d x[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{5}(\sin 2 x-2 \cos 2 x)[/math]
B. [math]e^{5 x} \log |x|=z[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}(\sin 2 x+\cos 2 x)[/math]
D. [math]2 \sin 2 e^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{e^{x}}{5}(\sin 2 x-2 \cos 2 x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int e^{x} \sin 2 x d x=\frac{1}{1^{2}+2^{2}} e^{x}(\sin 2 x-2 \cos 2 x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x}}{5}(\sin 2 x-2 \cos 2 x)+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #974 (ID: 415080)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x[/math] এবং [math]y^{2}=16 x[/math] রেখাদুটি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]512 / 3 \text { sq. Unit }[/math]
খ. [math]128 \text { sq. Unit }[/math]
গ. [math]128 / 3 \text { sq. Unit }[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x[/math]
 এবং [math]y^{2}=16 x \Rightarrow x^{2}=16 x \Rightarrow x^{2}-16 x=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=16,0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখা দুটি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{16}(4 \sqrt{x}-x) d x=\left[4 x \frac{2}{3} x^{3 / 2}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{16}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{8}{3} \times 16^{3 / 2}-\frac{16^{2}}{2}-0+0=\frac{128}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #978 (ID: 415061)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos ^{2} x d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} 2 \cos ^{2} x d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}}(1+\cos 2 x) d x=\frac{1}{2}\left[x+\frac{1}{2} \sin 2 x\right]_{0}^{\pi / 2}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Question #979 (ID: 415062)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e^{2}} \frac{1}{2 x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]e[/math]
C. [math]-e[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{e^{2}} \frac{1}{2 x}[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{1}{2}[\ln x]_{1}^{e^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\ln e^{2}-\ln 1\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}, 2=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #980 (ID: 415063)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan x}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{\tan x} \ln \left(\cos ^{2} x\right)[/math]
C. [math]\sin x \sqrt{\tan x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3}(\tan x)^{3 / 2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2 \sqrt{\tan x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } \tan x=z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sec ^{2} x d x=d z[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\cos ^{2} x} d x=d z ;[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x \sqrt{\tan ^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{d z}{\sqrt{z}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{z}=2 \sqrt{\tan x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #981 (ID: 415064)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] এবং [math]y=x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4 / 3[/math]
খ. [math]6 / 5[/math]
গ. [math]8 / 3[/math]
ঘ. [math]9 / 5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]8 / 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x ; y=x \Rightarrow y^{2}=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x^{2}=4 x \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0,4[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\int_{0}^{4}(2 \sqrt{x}-x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #982 (ID: 415065)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \cos x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]x \sin x+\cos x+c[/math]
B. [math]x \cos x+\sin x+c[/math]
C. [math]x \sin x-\cos x+c[/math]
D. [math]x \sin x+\cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x \sin x+\cos x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int x \cos d x=x \int \cos[/math]
 [math]d x-\int\left(\frac{d}{d x} x \int \cos x d x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=x \sin x-\int \sin x[/math]
 [math]d x=x \sin x+\cos x+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #983 (ID: 415066)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\pi[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}+1[/math]
E. [math]1-\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]-\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]+\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\frac{1}{2}(-2 x)}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[\sin ^{-1} x\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]+\left[\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right][/math]
 [math]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1}(1)-0+0-1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #984 (ID: 415046)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x e^{x^{2}} d x=[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(e+1)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}(e+1)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}(e-1)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}(e-1)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{2}(e-1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} x e^{x^{2}} d x=\frac{1}{2} \int_{0}^{1} e^{2} d z=\frac{1}{2}\left(e^{1}-e^{0}\right)=\frac{1}{2}(e-1)[/math]
 [math]\text { Let, } x^{2}=z \Rightarrow x d x=\frac{d z}{2}[/math]

[Image]
[math]\text { Or, [Use of calculator] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #986 (ID: 415048)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x^{2} \log x d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{3} \log x-\frac{1}{9} x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3} x^{3} \log x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \log x-\frac{1}{9} x^{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x^{3}}{3} \log x-\frac{x^{3}}{9}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{x^{3}}{3} \log x-\frac{x^{3}}{9}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int x^{2} \log x[/math]
 [math]d x=\log x \int x^{2} d x-\int[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d}{d x} \log x \int x^{2} d x\right)[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{x^{3}}{3}[/math]
 [math]\log x-\frac{1}{3} \int x^{2}[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{x^{3}}{3}[/math]
 [math]\log x-\frac{1}{9} x^{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #987 (ID: 415049)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\cos ^{-1} x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান =?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{16}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]

Solution:
[math]u=\cos ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow d u=\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} d x \quad[/math]
 [math]\int_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\cos ^{-1} x d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\int_{\pi / 2}^{0} u d u[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}\left[u^{2}\right]_{\pi / 2}^{p}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi^{2}}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #988 (ID: 415050)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{(x+4) \sqrt{x+3}}[/math] এর মান=?

Options:
A. [math]2 \tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x+3})+c[/math]
B. [math]\operatorname{In}(x+\sqrt{x+3})[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{x+3}+c[/math]
D. [math]\operatorname{In}(\sqrt{x+3})+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2 \tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x+3})+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]u=\sqrt{x+3} \Rightarrow d u=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x+3}} d x[/math]
 [math]\int \frac{d x}{(x+4) \sqrt{x+3}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \int \frac{d u}{\left(u^{2}+1\right)}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1}(u)+c[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{x+3})+c[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #989 (ID: 415051)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=4^{2}[/math] বৃত্তের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]4 \int_{0}^{4} y d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]16 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]16 \sin \pi[/math]
গ. [math]16 \pi y[/math]
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]16 \pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4^{2}-x^{2} \Rightarrow y=\sqrt{4^{2}-x^{2}} \text { Use Calculator }[/math]

Explanation:

Question #990 (ID: 415052)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]A=\int_{1}^{6} \frac{d x}{1+x}[/math] এবং [math]B=\int_{1}^{4} \frac{d x}{1+x}[/math] হয়, তবে নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]A=B[/math]
খ. [math]A
গ. [math]A>B[/math]
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.[math]A>B[/math]

Solution:
[math]A=\int_{1}^{6} \frac{d x}{1+x}\left[\operatorname{ln}|1+n|_{1}^{\mathrm{4}}=\operatorname{ln} \frac{6}{1} ; B=\int_{1}^{4} \frac{d x}{1+x}=[\operatorname{ln}1+n]_{1}^{4}=\operatorname{ln} \frac{5}{1} A>B\right.[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #991 (ID: 415053)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{-1}^{+1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\pi[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{-1}^{+1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[2 \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{1}\right]_{0}^{1} ;[/math]
 [math]2 \tan ^{-1} 1-2 \tan ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #993 (ID: 415055)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] এবং [math]y=x[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{8}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{5}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{8}{-3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x \Rightarrow y=2 \sqrt{x}; y=x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(x-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0,4[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল= [math]\int_{0}^{4}(2 \sqrt{x}-x)[/math]
 [math]d x=\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #994 (ID: 415056)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\mathrm{e}} \log x \mathrm{dx}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{1}^{e} \log x d x=[x \log x-x]_{1}^{e}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #995 (ID: 415057)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1+\sin x+c[/math]
B. [math]\log (1+\cos x)+c[/math]
C. [math]\tan \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]
D. [math]\cos \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\tan \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+\cos x}=\int \frac{d x}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}=\frac{1}{2} \int \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2} d x=\tan \frac{x}{2}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #996 (ID: 415037)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}[/math] পরাবৃত্ত ও [math]y = x[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]3 / 2[/math]
গ. [math]2 / 3[/math]
ঘ. [math]1 / 6[/math]
ঙ. [math]1 / 3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1 / 6[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{x}^{2}, \mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{x} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}^{2}=\mathrm{x} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=0,1 . \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}=0,1 .[/math]

[Image]
[math]\therefore[/math]
 ছেদবিন্দুদ্বয় [math]=(0,0) ;(1,1)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1}\left(x-x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{x^{3}}{3}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #997 (ID: 415038)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x-x^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\pi / 4[/math]
B. [math]-\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 4[/math]
D. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
E. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{\frac{1}{x}-1}}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\frac{1}{x}=z^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{zdz} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \mathrm{xz} \mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \frac{1}{\mathrm{z}^{2}} \mathrm{zdz}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 \mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{\frac{1}{x}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{-\frac{2 d z}{z}}{\sqrt{z^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \int \frac{d z}{z \sqrt{z^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=-2\left[\sec ^{-1} z\right]+c[/math]
 [math]=-2 \sec ^{-1}+c=-2 \cos ^{-1} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[-2 \cos ^{-1} \sqrt{x}\right]_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \cos ^{-1}(1)+2 \cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
বিকল্পঃ [math]\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\frac{1}{4}-\left(x^{2}-x+\frac{1}{4}\right.}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}-\left(x-\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1} \frac{x-\frac{1}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}\right]_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1} 1-\sin ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #998 (ID: 415039)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{\ln a} x e^{x} d x=3 a[/math] হলে [math]a[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{3}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{4}[/math]
E. [math]\mathrm{e}^{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\mathrm{e}^{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text{Hints: } \int\left[e^{x}\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\}\right] d x=e^{x} f(x)+c[/math]
 [math]\text{Solve: } \int_{1}^{\ln a} x e^{x}[/math]
 [math]d x=3 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{1}^{\ln a}\left[e^{x}\{(x-1)+1\}\right][/math]
 [math]d x=3 a[/math]
 [math]\text{ } \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{x}-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{1}^{\ln a}\left[e^{x}\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\}\right]=3 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[e^{x} f(x)\right]_{1}^{\ln a}=3 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left[e^{x}(x-1)\right] \quad[/math]
 [math]\ln a=3 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{\ln a}(\ln a-1)-0=3 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a(\ln a-1)=3 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a \ln a-a=3 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a \ln a=4 a[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln a=4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=e^{4}[/math]
 [math][\therefore a 
eq 0][/math]


Explanation:
এই অঙ্ককে uv আকারের method-এ ও করা যায় অর্থাৎ [math]\int u v d x=[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{u} \int \mathrm{vdx}-\int\left(\frac{\mathrm{du}}{\mathrm{d} x} \int \mathrm{vdx}\right) \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 নিয়মেও করা যায়। উক্ত অঙ্কে [math]\mathrm{u}=\mathrm{x} ; \mathrm{v}=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \text {। }[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #999 (ID: 415040)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{4 / a} e^{\sqrt{a x}} d(\sqrt{x})[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\left(e^{2}-1\right) / \sqrt{ } a[/math]
B. [math]\left(e^{2}-1\right) / \sqrt{ } a[/math]
C. [math]\left(e^{2}-1\right)[/math]
D. [math]\left(1-e^{2}\right) / \sqrt{a}[/math]
E. [math]\left(1-e^{2}\right) / a[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\left(e^{2}-1\right) / \sqrt{ } a[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{4}{a}} \mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{\mathrm{ax}}} \mathrm{d}(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}})[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}} \mathrm{dz}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{a}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{\mathrm{a}}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}}\right]_{0}^{\mathrm{2}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{\mathrm{a}}}\left(\mathrm{e}^{2}-\mathrm{e}^{0}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}^{2}-1}{\sqrt{\mathrm{a}}}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{ax}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{z} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sqrt{\mathrm{a}} \mathrm{d}(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}})[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dz}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{d}(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{a}}} ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 হলে [math]z=\sqrt{a x}=\sqrt{a \times \frac{4}{a}}=2 ; x=0[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{z}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\mathrm{ax}}=0[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: Upper limit ও lower limit কে variable change করার সময় convert করতে হয়। [math]\sqrt{x}[/math] এর পরিবর্তে z use করার জন্য উক্ত অঙ্কে variable অনুযায়ী তাই limit change করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

Question:
নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:

খ. [math]\int \frac{\frac{1}{2} f^{\prime}(x) d x}{\sqrt{\{f(x)\}}}=\sqrt{\{f(x)\}}[/math]
গ. [math]\int \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{a}^{2}-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}=\sin ^{-1} \frac{\mathrm{x}}{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
ঘ. সবগুলো


Correct Answer: A.[math]\int \frac{f^{\prime}(x) d x}{f(x)}=\ln f(x)[/math]

Question #1001 (ID: 415042)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{(1-\sin 2 x)} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]sinx + cosx[/math]
B. [math]cos2x[/math]
C. [math]sin2x[/math]
D. [math]sinx - cosx[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]sinx + cosx[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sqrt{1-\sin 2 x} d x=\int \sqrt{(\cos x-\sin x)^{2}} d x \\=\int(\cos x-\sin x) d x=\sin x+\cos x\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1002 (ID: 415043)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Mymensingh Board, Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{a} \sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}} d x[/math] এর যোজিত ফল কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi \mathrm{a}^{2}}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}[/math]
 যা বৃত্তের সমীকরণ।[math]\int_{0}^{a} y d x[/math]
 হল বৃত্তের অংশ। যার মান [math]\frac{\pi a^{2}}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1003 (ID: 415044)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{1}{3 \sqrt{x}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2} \sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}} \sqrt{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{3}{3} \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} d x=\frac{1}{3} \times 2 \sqrt{x}=\frac{2}{3} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1004 (ID: 415045)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\sqrt{\cos ^{2} x+\sin ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\sqrt{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}}}dx[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\cos x+\sin x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]d x=[x]_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]=\pi-0=\pi[/math]
 [math]\text { Shortcut: } \sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\cos x+\sin x[/math]
 সর্বদা ২য় মান মনে রেখ [math]\therefore[/math]
 প্রদত্ত সমীকরণ [math]\int_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]d x=[x]_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]=\pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1005 (ID: 415026)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1[/math] উপবৃত্তের প্রথম চতুৰ্ভাগ [math]AOB[/math] হয়, যেখানে [math]OA = a, OB = b[/math], তাহলে AB বক্ররেখা ও [math]AB[/math] জ্যার মধ্যবর্তী ক্ষেত্রফল কত হৰে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2} a b(\pi+2)[/math]
খ. [math]a b(\pi-1)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{4} a b(\pi-2)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{4}(\pi+2)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{4} a b(\pi-2)[/math]

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\Delta=\frac{\pi a b}{4}-\frac{1}{2} a b=\frac{a b}{4}(\pi-2)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1006 (ID: 415027)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2013-2014, 2006-2007 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1}(e+1)-\tan ^{-1} 2[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1} e-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1}(\mathrm{e}) \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}+\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}(e-1)-\tan ^{-1} 1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\tan ^{-1}(\mathrm{e}) \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}+\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{-x}}{\left(e^{-x}\right)^{2}+1} d x[/math]
 [math]\left[e^{-x}=u\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d u}{u^{2}+1}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\tan ^{-1} u\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\tan ^{-1} e^{-\mathrm{x}}\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]=-\left[\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}^{-1}-\tan ^{-1} 1\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}-\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}^{-1} \pm \frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1007 (ID: 415028)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+e^{x}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\log \left(1+e^{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\log \left(e^{-x}+1\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{e x} \log \left(1+e^{-x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]-\log \left(1+e^{-x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\log \left(1+e^{-x}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d x}{1+e^{x}}=\int \frac{e^{-x} d x}{e^{x}+1}\left[e^{-x}\right.[/math]
 দিয়ে গুন ] [math]=-\log \left(1+e^{-x}\right)[/math]


Explanation:
