Question #1008 (ID: 415029)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{x e^{x}}{(x+1)^{2}} d x=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{x+1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\ln x}{1+x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{x-1}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln x}{1-x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{e^{x}}{x+1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int\left\{\frac{1}{x+1}-\frac{1}{(x+1)^{2}}\right\} e^{x} d x=\frac{e^{x}}{x+1}[/math]
 যেহেতু [math]\int\left\{f(x)+f^{\prime}(x)\right\} d x=f(x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1009 (ID: 415030)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{e^{2}}^{e}(\ln x)^{2} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5 e^{3}-2 e^{2}[/math]
B. [math]e-2 e^{2}[/math]
C. [math]5 e^{3}-1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]e-2 e^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int(\ln x)^{2}[/math]
 [math]d x=(\ln x)^{2} \int[/math]
 [math]d x-\int 2(\ln x) \frac{1}{2} \int d x[/math]
 [math]=x(\ln x)^{2}-2 \int \ln x d x[/math]
 [math]=x(\ln x)^{2}-2(x \ln x-x)[/math]
লিমিট বসিয়ে: [math]e-2 e^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1010 (ID: 415031)

Question:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x-x \sin x+3 x^{2}}{x \cos x+x^{3}} d x=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sin x+x \cos x}{x \sin x+3 x}+C[/math]
B. [math]\log \left(x^{3}+x \cos x\right)+C[/math]
C. [math]\log \left(\frac{\sin x+x \cos x}{x^{2}+x \sin x}\right)+C[/math]
D. [math]\log \left(\frac{\sin x+x \cos x}{x^{2}+x \sin x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\log \left(x^{3}+x \cos x\right)+C[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\cos x-x \sin x+3 x^{2}}{x \cos x+x^{3}} d x=\log \left(x \cos x+x^{3}\right)+C[/math]

Question #1011 (ID: 415032)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cos x}{9-\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{6} \ln 2[/math]
B. [math]2 \ln 6[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \ln 6[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3} \ln 2[/math]
E. [math]6 \ln 3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi / 2} \frac{\cos x}{9-\sin ^{2} x} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\sin x=z \Rightarrow \cos x d x=d z[/math]
যখন, [math]x=0, z=0 \text {; }[/math]
যখন, [math]x=\pi / 2 ; z=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore I=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d z}{9-z^{2}}=\frac{1}{2 \times 3} \ln \left|\frac{3+z}{3-z}\right|_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{6}\left[\ln \frac{3+1}{3-1}-\ln \frac{3+0}{3-0}\right]=\frac{1}{6}\left[\ln \frac{4}{2}-0\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{6} \ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1012 (ID: 415033)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{\left(2 x-x^{2}\right)}}[/math] এর মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5 \pi}{2}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\therefore I=\int_{1}^{0} \frac{-d t}{\sqrt{1-t^{2}}}=-\left[\sin ^{-1} t\right]_{1}^{0}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\left[\sin ^{-1} 0-\sin ^{-1} 1\right]=-\left(0-\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \pi+\frac{\pi}{2}=\frac{5 \pi}{2}[/math]
সমাধান: [math]I=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-\left(1-2 x+x^{2}\right)}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-(1-x)^{2}}}[/math]
ধরি, [math]1-\mathrm{x}=\mathrm{t} \quad \mathrm{x}=0 \rightarrow \mathrm{t}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dt} \quad \mathrm{x}=1 \rightarrow \mathrm{t}=0^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1013 (ID: 415034)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\tan ^{-1} e-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}+\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}-\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{e}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}+\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}=\mathrm{t} \therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \mathrm{dx}=\mathrm{dt}[/math]
যখন, [math]x=0[/math]
 তখন [math]t=1[/math]
;যখন, [math]x=1[/math]
 তখন, [math]\mathrm{t}=\mathrm{e}[/math]
;[math]\therefore I=\int_{1}^{e} \frac{d t}{t^{2}+1}=\left[\tan ^{-1} t\right]_{1}^{e}=\tan ^{-1} e-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
সমাধানঃ [math]I=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{e^{x}+\frac{1}{e^{x}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{e^{x} d x}{\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}+1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1014 (ID: 415035)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \frac{\left(\tan x+\tan ^{3} x\right) d x}{e^{\sec ^{2} x}+e^{-sec^{2} x}}[/math] এর মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(e^{sec^{2} x}\right)+c[/math]
B. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2} e^{sec^{2} x}\right)+c[/math]
C. [math]2 \tan ^{-1}\left(e^{\sec ^{2} x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(2 e^{sec{2} x}\right)+c[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(e^{sec{2} x}\right)+c[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}\left(e^{sec^{2} x}\right)+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]I=\int \frac{\left(\tan x+\tan ^{3} x\right) d x}{e^{sec{2} x}+e^{sec{2} x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int[/math]
 [math]\frac{\tan x\left(1+\tan ^{2} x\right) d x}{e^{\operatorname{sec}^{2} x}+\frac{1}{e^{\sec x} x}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{e^{\sec^{2} x} \cdot \tan x \cdot \sec ^{2} x}{\left(e^{\sec ^{2} x}\right)^{2}+1} d x[/math]
ধরি, [math]\mathrm{e}^{\sec ^{2} x}=\mathrm{t}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{sec}^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 2 \sec x[/math]
 [math]\cdot \sec x \tan x \mathrm{dx}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{dt}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{I}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \int \frac{\mathrm{dt}}{\mathrm{t}^{2}+\mathrm{l}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{t}+\mathrm{c}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\mathrm{e}^{\operatorname{sec}^{2} \mathrm{x}}\right)+\mathrm{c}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1015 (ID: 415036)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi/ 4} \frac{\cos \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} d \theta=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}-2[/math]
E. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { Blank }[/math]

Solution:
[math]I=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\cos \theta}{\cos ^{2} \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \frac{1}{\cos \theta} d \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\sec \theta d \theta[/math]
 [math]=[\ell n|\tan \theta+\sec \theta|]_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\ell n[/math]
 [math]\left|\tan \frac{\pi}{4}+\sec \frac{\pi}{4}\right|[/math]
 [math]-\ell n|\tan 0+\sec 0|[/math]
 [math]=\ell n|1+\sqrt{2}|-\ln 1[/math]
 [math]=\ln |1+\sqrt{2}|-0[/math]
 [math]\text { [Ans: Blank] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1016 (ID: 415022)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] বক্ররেখা এবং [math]y=x[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{8} \text { sq. units }[/math]
খ. [math]3 \text { sq. units }[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{8}{3} \text { sq. units }[/math]
ঘ. [math]8 \text { sq. units }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]A=\int_{0}^{4} 2 \sqrt{x} d x-\int_{0}^{4} x d x=\left[\frac{4}{3}(x)^{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}\right]_{0}^{4}[/math]
 [math]=\left\{\frac{4}{3} \times 4^{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{4^{2}}{2}\right\}=\frac{8}{3} \text { sq.units }[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1017 (ID: 415023)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math] মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{2 x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-\left(1-2 x+x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{d(x-1)}{\sqrt{1-(x-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\sin ^{-1}(x-1)\right]_{0}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin ^{-1}(1-1)-\sin ^{-1}(0-1)[/math]
 [math]=0+\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1018 (ID: 415024)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{1-\sin 2 x} d x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\cos 2 x+c[/math]
B. [math]\cos x+\sin x+c[/math]
C. [math]-(\cos x+\sin x)+c[/math]
D. [math]\cos x-\sin x-c[/math]
E. [math]\text { B & C }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { B & C }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{(\sin x-\cos x)^{2} d x}=\int[/math]
 [math]\pm(\sin x-\cos x) d x[/math]
 [math]=\pm(-\cos x-\sin x)[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]+(\cos x+\sin x)[/math]
 [math]+c,-(\cos x+\sin x)[/math]
 [math]+c[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1019 (ID: 415025)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}} d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]d x=\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\sqrt{\cos ^{2} x+\sin ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x}} d x[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\sqrt{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}}}dx[/math]
 [math]=\int_{0}^{\pi} \frac{\cos x+\sin x}{\cos x+\sin x} d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]d x=[x]_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]=\pi-0=\pi[/math]
 [math]\text { Shortcut: } \sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\cos x+\sin x[/math]
 সর্বদা ২য় মান মনে রেখ [math]\therefore[/math]
 প্রদত্ত সমীকরণ [math]\int_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]d x=[x]_{0}^{\pi}[/math]
 [math]=\pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1020 (ID: 415018)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2003-2004, 2013-2014, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}}[/math] এর একটি অনির্দিষ্ট যোগজ-

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right) \ln \left(1+x^{2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{1+x^{2}}=\int \tan ^{-1} x d\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{1}{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}+C[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1021 (ID: 415019)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{x}-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\pi / 4[/math]
B. [math]-\pi / 2[/math]
C. [math]\pi / 4[/math]
D. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
E. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pi / 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{\frac{1}{x}-1}}[/math]
ধরি, [math]\frac{1}{x}=z^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \mathrm{dx}=2 \mathrm{zdz} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{1}{x} \mathrm{dx}=-2 \mathrm{xzdz}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \frac{1}{\mathrm{z}^{2}} \mathrm{zdz}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 \mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{z}} \text {. }[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int \frac{d x}{x \sqrt{\frac{1}{x}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=\int \frac{-\frac{2 d z}{z}}{\sqrt{z^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \int \frac{d z}{z \sqrt{z^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -2\left[\sec ^{-1} z\right]+c[/math]
 [math]=-2 \sec ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}+c[/math]
 [math]=-2 \cos ^{-1} \sqrt{x}+c[/math]
 [math]\therefore \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d x}{\sqrt{x-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[-2 \cos ^{-1} \sqrt{x}\right]_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2[/math]
 [math]\cos ^{-1}(1)+2 \cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1022 (ID: 415020)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2013-2014, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int x \ln x d x[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x+\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}+C[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int x \ln x d x=\ln x \int x[/math]
 [math]d x-\int\left\{\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \int x d x\right\} d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\int \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{x^{2}}{2} d x=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\int x d x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{1}{2} \frac{x^{2}}{2}+C[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{2} \ln x-\frac{x^{2}}{4}[/math]
 [math]+C[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1023 (ID: 415021)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \sqrt{(1-\sin 2 x)} d x[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]sinx + cosx[/math]
B. [math]cos2x[/math]
C. [math]sin2x[/math]
D. [math]sinx - cosx[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]sinx + cosx[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\int \sqrt{1-\sin 2 x} d x=\int \sqrt{(\cos x-\sin x)^{2}} d x \\=\int(\cos x-\sin x) d x=\sin x+\cos x\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #1052 (ID: 793952)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: ব. বো.'২০১৭
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int {\ln x } dx = ?[/math]

Options:
ক. <p><span class="math-tex">\({1 \over x } + c\)</span></p>

খ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(x \ln x - x  + c\)</span></p>

গ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(x \ln x + x  + c\)</span></p>

ঘ. <p><span class="math-tex">\({1 \over x^2} + c\)</span></p>



Correct Answer: খ

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #1081 (ID: 793937)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: ভিকারুননিসা নূন স্কুল এন্ড কলেজ, ঢাকা
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int 5x \; \sec^2x \; dx = ?[/math]

Options:
ক. <p><span class="math-tex">\(5 [x \tan x + \ln |\sin x|] + c\)</span></p>

খ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(5 [x \sec^2 x + \ln |\sin x|] + c\)</span></p>

গ. <p>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(5 [x \tan x + \ln |\sec x|] + c\)</span></p>

ঘ. <p>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(5 [x \tan x -  \ln |\sec x|] + c\)</span></p>



Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1082 (ID: 793938)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: দি. বো.'২০২৩
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int {1 + tan^2 x \over (1 - tanx)^2}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. <p><span class="math-tex">\({-1 \over 1 + \tan x } + c\)</span></p>

খ. <p><span class="math-tex">\({-1 \over 1- \tan x } + c\)</span></p>

গ. <p><span class="math-tex">\({1 \over 1 - \tan x } + c\)</span></p>

ঘ. <p>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({1 \over 1 + \tan x } + c\)</span></p>



Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

Question #1083 (ID: 793939)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int e^x \cos x(1 + \tan x )dx[/math]  এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. <p>e<sup>x</sup> cosx + c</p>

খ. <p>e<sup>x</sup> tanx+ c</p>

গ. <p>e<sup>x</sup> secx + c</p>

ঘ. <p>e<sup>x</sup> sinx + c</p>



Correct Answer: ঘ

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int {dx \over 4-x^2} = ?[/math]

Options:
ক. <p><span class="math-tex">\({1 \over 4} \ln |{ 2+x \over 2-x }| + c\)</span></p>

খ. <p><span class="math-tex">\({1 \over 4} \ln |{ 2-x \over 2+x }| + c\)</span></p>

গ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(sin^{-1} {x\over 2} + c\)</span></p>

ঘ. <p><span class="math-tex">\({1 \over 2 } sin^{-1} {x\over 2} + c\)</span></p>



Correct Answer: ক

Solution:

Options:
ক. <p><span class="math-tex">\(\ln |\sin x| + c\)</span></p>

খ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(\ln |\sec x| + c\)</span></p>

ঘ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(\ln |\tan ({{\pi \over 4} + {x\over 2}})| + c\)</span></p>



Correct Answer: গ
